Ifi deu ye wegenac kemma kokockeec. Kokockeu ngakpia homuna negemma yoac yofi dema keneheec, “Medacnaac ngakpi homuna imoc
Anutungo sawaac dzimbong nga bangec kerec miu wit nga yagong nga waing gboria amma uagau wiac sasawa keneheu fora homac fingeru.

Ngiha ngiha yeni geac enac tofoc tofohongic kecbisia amma ngicngac habuya habuya yeni ge ngonducnegembisia. Ge ine dacmunafocga yeneac ngic kunengngina ambesannec. Nga nonggogaac medacfora yeni ge ngonducnegembisia. Nga ge sowecgugecde yeni sowecnginagoc nga ge kenecgugecde yeni kenecnginagoc anggecde.”
Anu Itsak ye Yacakow keneheu wisickeu Yacakow ye mama wama maec imohaingoc dara Esaw ye kateyang kpema dzigenema haec.
Hama ye ifingoc yaka gombunga ohoma mamaaru meemma yofi deec, “Manna, ge yacma medacga neac kateyang nema kenecnuna.”
Ifi deu manggaha Itsakngo yofi dema kpesimiec, “Hei, ge merac?” Ifi deu yeng yofi meremmiec, “Ni waracmedacga Esaw.”
Ifi deu Itsakngo kpidohoma dzonoma homac yombong fedeu yofi kpesimiec, “Ge mi hamana merang kateyang kpema ohoma mehama nenu nema kenehedua? Kenec imoc yearu fefeseri fekefude.”
Ifi deu Itsak ye ine yofi deec, “Munagango hama faitobang anemma kenecga bic mema kendac.”
Ifi deu Esaw ye yofi deec, “Ye ikoc anu naso yohockang ande imocac naric kpara Yacakow

Ifi deu yofi meremmiec, “Negennec, ye geac kunengga amma kefudeac faidua nga namanebecfora sasawa yeni yeac enac tofoc tofoho kecgecdeac dedua. Nga wit nga yagong amma waing gboria uayau fingerudeac dedua. Imocac medacna dafi anggembade?”
Ifi anu mamango yoac turunga yofi merenec, “Negennec, ge bangec kereha mi fede nga kurumennunac dzimbong mi maande imohai amagerecga menade.
Nga ge dzikacbeangngo ewema kecma yaka meficgenade nga munaga kingang kpeminade. Nga ge modzoga tiu munagaac tofo hembarackema fuagaunac meickema ukunade.”
Anu Riweka ye waracmedahaac yoac imoc edegec negemma medaha Yacakow deu hau yofi dema edeec, “Negennec, dacga Esaw ye faitobang amminecac turunga kpouma kpebucguudeac dedac.
Imocac amma medacna, ni yoac deba negemma modabesena. Ge bic yombong yacma Haran taonnu worama neac nainna Lawanggaru kemma kecbesena.

Ngeri uameme mocgungoc ni wanubaocac ge kemma yegoc ihai naso dafiguc kecmana dacga herebuya kuha mabeso. Nga ge dacgaac faka ammidang imoc nigeckpeu herebuya kuha mau ni gearu yoac faiba hau negemma dzigenema habesena.”

Anu Riweka ye Itsak yofi dema edeec, “Ni hitingac yereac modzona tiande. Amma Yacakow ye ifingoc hitingic yeneac naroangfocngina, bangec yomocac mingina yenearunac mong meudeu ni kecbadeac modzona tiude.”
Ge ine yacma Paddan Aram bangecfu esaga Betucelac amau kembesena. Kemma imohacnac nonggogaac naina Lawan yeac naroangfora yenearunac mong mebesena.
Nga Anutu Kuctoa minginango kenecguma meficguu fingecsahe amma seregurutoa ambesena. Ifi amma ngicngacareng habuya habuya ambesannec.
Amma yeng ge nga medacfocga Awrahamgac kenec imoc ngemmebeso. Ifi anu ge bangec yomoc yaguc kuric kecnec imoc mebesannec. Bangec imoc yombong Anutungo Awraham miec.”
Ifi amma Itsakngo Yacakow sueu Paddan Aram bangecfu Lawanggac kenudeac kenec. Lawan ye aramngic Betucel yeac medaha nga Yacakow nga Esaw nonggongira Riweka yeac naina.

Itsakngo Yacakow kenehema yofi anudeac edema Paddan Aram bangecfu sueec, “Ge ngac menadeac dema kenacannaroangfocngina yenearunac mong mi mebesena.” Anu yoac ifi dema Yacakow kenehema sueec imoc Esaw henec.
Nga Yacakow ye nonggomama yereac yoacngira tofohoma Paddan Aram bangecfu kenec imoc ifingoc negenec.
Imocac amma Esaw ye negenec mama ye kenacangngac yeneac songo mi negengkefec.
Ye ngac yohockang bic meyuruma kefec nga torokpema Awraham medaha Ismacel yearu kemma ngac mong kpara Mahalat, Newayot naina meec.
Kengkecma wenac bic kemeecac tofocnac imohai bangec botuha monnu tarec. Tacma ye hoc mong imohacnac mema kparicgang isoc oruhau faima heima feec.
Fema gaukpefinnu tire mong henu hania bangecfu nanu hemmodacma henu kurumeng kpeserema nanec. Nanu Anutuac angerofora yeni imohai engemmama anggec yenenec.

Ngemmeba bangecfocga yeni fingecsahe angengkecma bangecfu sendung fede ifi isoc ambesandae. Anu ge bangec wenac keme kemeaubigeng nga wenac ere ereaubigeng nga wi nga emu imohai sahedacma tohoma kemma kecnade. Anu bangecsoc ngicngachabu yeni ge nga bangecgaac arennu kenecgoc ambesandae.
Negennec, ni mi wagubade. Ge bangec kecnadesoc gegoc kecma garenggubade amma wiac deserigendua imoc fora fingerudeac merengguba bangec yomohai monggoc dzigenema habesannec.”
Ifi deu Yacakow ye gaunac gborima yacma yofi deec, “Foracngoc,
Ifi dema kengec amma deec, “Bangec yomoc wiac engena ande. Yomoc Anutuac ama nga kurumenggac nagu ande.”
Anu ama wereckenu Yacakow ye asoac yacma hoc heima feec imoc miacma gununggeu nanu witiau kerecdoku nadzicmiec.
Amma ye amabangec imocac kpara Bet El
Nga Yacakow ye yoac yofi deseriec, “Anutu ye nigoc kefu sing herea yomoc kengkecbare nenggareng anenudeu nga sebinaac mefic yaka meficgenenu nebadeu nga wamba nganoc meficgenenu heibadeu
amma gombunga kecma mannaac amau dzigenebesanduaeu
Anu hoc yomoc gununggebanande imocngo Anutuac ama ambeso nga wiac sasawa nengkecnadeimoc mendzicma tenunac mocgu ifi merenggengkecbade.”
Anu Yacakow ye wenac ere ereaubigeng ngicngac kecgec yeneac bangecfubigeng kengkefec.

Kengkecma kic fiu kenu uau dokuteng mong henec. Henu imohai ramahabu harebec fegec. Amabangec imocac mingina yeni dokuteng imohacnac ramaburumakafocngina doku gumecyunuandae. Nga dokuteng enarau ine hoctoango hedzickema tarec.
Anu doku imohai rama habuya habuya kpedzucnedacgec ine ramagareng yeni dokuteng enarau hoc imoc kpedidinggema doku gumecyunuma hoc imoc monggoc enarau hedzickegec tacande.
Anu Yacakow ye ramagareng yenemma kpesiyemmeec, “Tosofocna, ngeni dahacnac hadae?” Ifi deu yeni yofi meremmigec, “Neni Harannac.”
Ifi degec yofi dema kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni Nahor esea Lawan ye negemmidae me?” Ifi deu yeni yofi meremmigec, “O, negemmidimbe.”
Ifi degec kpesiyemmema yofi deec, “Ye naric kecde me?” Ifi deu yeni yofi meremmigec, “Ye naric kecde nga naroanga Rahel ye edimoc ramahabu wangecyunu hade.”
Anu Yacakow ye yofi deec, “Negendae, wenac nandengoc rama meyunu kenggecdeac naso mi ande. Imocac amma doku gumecyunuma faiyunugec kemma kpindzing monggoc negec.”
Ifi deu yeneng ine yofi degec, “Rama habuya habuya mi hadacmagec imoc naric mi annide. Hadacgec ine teng enarau hoc tacde imoc kpedidinggema doku gumecyunuandimbe.”
Anu Yacakow ye yenigoc yoac denegeng amma nammagecngoc Rahel ye mamaac rama meyunuma hasikeec. Ye yeneac gareng kefec imocac amma wangecyunuma haec.
Nga Yacakow ye aniha Lawanggac naroanga Rahel nga anihaac ramahabu yenemma kemma dokutennunac hoc kpedidinggema anihaac rama doku gumecyunuec.
Amma ye Rahel kokockema kiarec.
Kiacma Rahel yofi dema edeec, “Ni sactosoga, manggaac naina Riweka yeac medac.” Ifi deu Rahel ye nedzima kemma mama edeec.
Edeu Lawan ye deuya Yacakowac siduc negemma ye henudeac nedzima kemma tofohoma kokockema ameau wangecma enec. Enu ye siduha sasawa Lawan ammidarec.
Ammidaru Lawangngo yofi dema edeec, “Fora, ge sactosona yombong annec.” Anu Yacakow ye afo mocgu yegoc kefec.
Anu Lawangngo Yacakow yofi dema edeec, “Ge deuyombonnango enacna tofohoma eng kecnade imoc mi ngereude. Noc wiac menadeac negennec imoc edenuna.”
Anu Lawan ye naroanghora yohockang kefoc waracnaroanga kpara Lea nga yeac bageau kpara Rahel.
Lea ye kiwa gombunga nga Rahel ye ine kic nga siriha hafoangoc gombunga yombong.
Nga Yacakow ye songea Rahelaru feecac amma yofi deec, “Ni naroangga Rahel mebadeac kifa seweng enactofoc tofohoga kecbade.”
Ifi deu Lawangngo yofi meremmiec, “Ngicareng mong mi yemmebade. Ge gemba naric anude. Imocac amma ge nigoc kecbesena.”
Anu kecma kifa imoc wisickeu Yacakowngo Lawan yofi dema edeec, “Naso bic wisickedacac ni enennagoc febadeac negenduae imocac amma yaguc nenna.”
Ifi deu Lawan ye imocac yaka ohoma ngicngac heitaiyunuu hama yaka imoc negec.
Ama toforeu ye ine naroanga Lea wangecma emma Yacakowaru faiec. Fau yegoc feoc.
Anu Lawan ye wanacnaroanga Dzilepa naroanga Leaac enac tofoc tofoho kefudeac miec.
Anu ama wereckenuguc ine Yacakow ye henec imoc Lea. Ifi hemma ye kemma Lawan yofi dema edeec, “Ge noc faka anendang? Ni Rahelac amma geac enac tofoc tofohoua mekefai. Ge nocac tobannudang?”
Ifi deu Lawangngo yofi meremmiec, “Amabangec yomocac faka yofi fede waracnaroang yeni eng kecmagec munafocngina ngicfu faifaiyunu imoc sing mong mi fede.
Imocac sonda mocgu tomai kecna wisickeu Rahel ifingoc gennide anu yeac amma torokpema kifa seweng monggoc neac enac tofoc tofoho kecbesena.”
Anu Yacakow ifi amma Leagoc kefu sonda mocgu wisickeec. Wisickeu Lawan ye naroanga Rahel miu meec.
Anu Lawan ye Rahel enac tofoc tofohongac kefudeac wanacnaroanga Bilha miec.
Anu Yacakow ye Rahelgoc feec. Nga ye songea yearu kuneng feec nga Leaac kapianec femiec. Amma ye kifa seweng torokpema Lawanggac enac tofo tofoho kefec.
Nga Lea ye medac kpenanggema mema yofi deec, “
Ammaimocac ngadeau medac mong kpenanggema meec. Mema yofi deec, “Ubango mi hoannunuya imocac amma
Anu yeac ngadeau medac monggoc kpenanggema meec. Mema yofideec, “Ni ewenaac medac harebec meyunudua imocac yeng nearukpeketahaude.” Ifi dema kpara Lewi
Amma imocacngadeau medac monggoc kpenanggema meec. Mema yofi deec, “Yaguc ine ni
Anu Rahel ye ine Yacakowac nambarac mong mi mema eng kefec. Imocac dara Leaac keracmangang amma Yacakow yofi dema edeec, “Ge kogoc mong meficgenembesena, ifi mi annadeu ni homebade.”
Ifi deu Yacakow ye Rahelac herebu negemma yofi meremmiec, “Anutungo segeregemmanu ni dafi yeac tatac mema kogoc mong meficgegembade?”
Ifi deu Rahelngo yofi deec, “Negennec, ge wanacnaroanna Bilha yearu kenna. Anu yeng nambarac goa meyunuma tabunau faiyunuu yeni neac ambisia.”
Ifi dema wanacnaroanga Bilha Yacakow enema anudeac miec.
Miu yegoc kefu Bilha ye Yacakowarunac medac mong kpenanggema meec.
Meu Rahel ye yofi deec, “Anutungo yoacna negemma firang ambadeac nanggenuma medac mong nendac.” Ifi dema Dan
Anu Rahel wanacnaroanga ye imocac ngadeau Yacakowac medac monggoc kpenanggema meu yeri yohockang anoc.
Anu Rahel ye yofi deec, “Dacnagoc Anutuac dzikac mekecma heiseriai.” Ifi dema medacac kpara Naftali
Anu Lea ye medac kpac kecdua ifi negemma enac tofoc tofohonaroanga Dzilepa mema Yacakowac enema anudeac miec.
Miu yeng Yacakowac medac mong meec.
Meu Lea ye yofi deec, “Ye ubangerecgoc hadac.” Ifi dema kpara Gad
Anu ye Yacakowac medac mong monggoc meu yeri yohockang anoc.
Anec Lea ye yofi deec, “Ni yaguc sogaiduae nga ngac yeni neac ifingoc yofi degecde, ‘Ye sogac sogaiac areng ande.’ ” Ifi dema kpara Aser
Anu semeng kpememe nasou Recuwen ye tumiatoau kemma mandrago gbomea

Ifi deu ine Leango yofi deec, “Ge ewena wangecnunec imoc negenna wiac kapia anu yaguc medacnaac mandrago gbomea ifingoc mebeso denec me?” Ifi deu Rahel ye yofi deec, “Naric, medacgaac mandrago gbomeaac turunga yaguc tofocnac ewenira ye gegoc naric feude.” Ifi deec.
Anu Yacakow ye marai uaunac hasikeu Lea ye kemma meficgema yofi dema edeec, “Ni medacnaac mandrago gbomeango ge bummeguduaac ge yaguc tofocnac nigoc febesena.” Ifi deu tofocnac imohai yegoc feec.
Anu Anutungo Lea negemmiu Yacakowac medac mong kpenanggema meu yeni 5 anggec.
Anggec Lea ye yofi deec, “Ni wanacnaroanna ewena miaiac Anutungo medac mong nende.” Ifi dema kpara Issashar
Anu imocac ngadeau Lea ye Yacakowac medac monggoc kpenanggema meu yeni 6 anggec.
Anggec Lea ye yofi deec, “Anutungo sese gombunga nenu ewenaac medacfora 6 meyunuai imocac yaguc eweheiheigoc anennude.” Ifi dema kpara Dzewulun
Imoc yeneac ngadeau naroang mong mema kpara Dina kparec.
Memiu ye medac kpenanggema mema yofi deec, “Anutungo gamena wangecnude.”
Ifi dema kpara Yosef
Anu Rahel ye Yosef meu Yacakowngo Lawan yofi dema edeec, “Ni amabangecnau fainuna kembesare.
Ni geac enac tofoc tofoho ua naso herea mekefai imoc ge geanggaoc negennecac enenghocna nga naroangmedacfocna desinendacna wangecyunu kembesare.”
Ifi deu Lawangngo edema yofi deec, “Ge neac negenna ngereeudeu yoac mong deba negenna. ‘
Ifi dema yofi deec, “Uagaac bung dena imocacsoc gembade.”
Ifi deu Yacakowngo yofi deec, “Ni geac enac tofoc tofoho ua dafi mekefai nga ramaburumakafocga garengyunubareng dafi anggec imoc ge geanggaoc negennec.
Ni mi hayai naso imohai ramanoningfocga efeanecsac kecgec. Yaguc ine fingecsahe amma habutoa anggec kecdae. Nga ni noboc noboc kengha amba

Ifi deu Lawangngo kpesimiec, “Anu ni noc wiac gembadeac negennec?” Kpesimiu meremmiec, “Ge wiac mong bic mi nembesena. Ni yoac negenduae imoc deba negenna naric annadeu ine ramanoninghabufocga monggoc garengyunuma kecbade.

Imoc yofi, ni yaguc ramanoningfocga habuya habuya kemma hennegeng ambade. Ifi amma rama gboria yenearunac tiko piriko nga faikperecge sasawa meisingyunuma meicyunubade. Meicyunuma ramamedaha dzadzu dzadzu sasawa meicyunubade. Nga noning siricngina ifiangoc meicyunuba ramanoning imoc yeneng neac ua bunna ambisia.

Nga wiac mebade imoc soha me kpac, imocac hania ngadeguc fingectegerude. Ni faka dindingac modacdua imoc hennade. Ge kecma bunna hembeso hama noning yeneac botucfu tiko pirikosac kpac me ramamedaha yeneac botucfu dzadzu dzadzusac kpac, goa momoc kecgecde ifi meficyunuma yofi debesena. Ge yeni hamangec meyunudang.”
Ifi deu Lawangngo yofi deec, “Naric, denec isoc fingecbeso.”

Lawan ye ifi dema kemma uameme imohaingoc noningngiwa kibi kibi nga tiko piriko amma noning ngagera rama faikperecge nga tiko piriko sebingina kapianec kongac kongac anec imoc sasawa meicyunuma ramamedaha dzadzu dzadzu ifingoc meyunudacma imoc sasawa medacfora yeneac mariu faiyunudarec.
Anu ye yengena nga medacfora Yacakow wama uameme harebecacsoc bangec goa ferahema sing kengkecma bangec monnu sikegec. Anu Yacakow ye Lawanggac ramanoning tosea garengyunuma kefec.
Anu Yacakow ye ic kpacngina popela

Ifi amma yasu kpeti kpetia imoc rama yeneac dokusingnginau nga ototoanginau fau kemeec. Fau kemeu rama yeni doku imohai negecdeac kengha angkecgec naso imohai kicnginau yasu imoc fau fekefec. Imoc yofiac, yeni doku negecdeac hama ngiwa yeni ngagera feracyunuandae.
Ifi anu ramahabu yeni hama ngiwa yeneng yasu wegenahau ngagera feracyunugec kecma medacfocngina tiko piriko nga faikperecge ifi meyunugec.

Anu Yacakow ye ramamedaha meicyunuma habu tosea ayemmeu Lawanggac rama habuya habuya tiko piriko nga dzadzu dzadzu yenearubigeng kic fima nanggec. Ye ifi amma yengena habu mong tembuc faiyunuma Lawanggacgoc mi kpeturangyunuec.
Anu rama seria yeni feracemebeso anggecsoc Yacakowngo kicnginau yasu imoc otonginau fau kemeande. Imoc yeni yasu hemma feracemegecdeac ifi anec.
Anu ramanoning kucngina kpac yeneac kicfu yasu mi faiec. Ifi anu ramanoning kucngina kpac, imoc yeni Lawanggac anggec nga kucnginagoc imoc yeni Yacakowac.
Ye ifi yombong amma finac monggoc nga monggoc meficgeec. Anu ye rama amma wanacngicngacfora nga kamelefora amma donggifora imoc sasawa homac anggec.
Anu Lawan medacfora yeneng yoac yofi degec imoc Yacakowac kedzacfu kemeec. “Yacakow ye manninaac iwai sasawa medarec. Manniaac wiactoa feec imohacnac hanahema iwai sasawa mekpedzuc amma medarec.”
Ifi degec Lawanggac kicmesuya merenu siriha mong anu Yacakow ye imoc bic hentegecma yofi negenec ye warac gombunga anengkefec ifi isoc monggoc mi anenude.
Deu Yacakow ye yoac fau Rahel nga Lea yerearu kenu yeri rama uau haoc.
Haec edeyuruec, “Ni mangngiraac kicmesuya hemma yofi negenduae ye warac faka anengkefec ifi isoc monggoc mi anende. Nga mannaac Anutungo ine nigoc kecande.
Nga ni mangngiraac ua kucgoc mekecanduae imoc negendape.
Anu mangngirango ine tobannuma ua bunna meeng mema anu atac 10 anec anu Anutungo kpae heimiu mong mi memanganenuec.

‘Nga ramanoning faikperecge yeni geac bung ambisia.’ Ifi deec isoc rama nga noning yeni medacfocngina faikperecge sasawa fingecdacgec me ‘Kibi kibi yeni geac uabung ambisia.’ Ifi deec isoc medacfocngina kibi kibi sasawa fingecdacgec.
Ifi fingecgec Anutungo mangngiraac ramanoning wangecma ni nenec.
Anu ramanoningngiwa yeneng ngagera feracyunugec naso imohai gau fema gaukpefinnu yofi henai. Yeni ngagera feracyunugec yeneac sebingina imoc kibi kibi nga faikperecge andacgec.”
Amma gaukpefinnungoc Anutuac angerongo kpacnuma yofi dema edenuec, “Yacakow.” Deu ni yofi meremmiai, “Ni yoc.”

Ifi deba yofi dema edenuec, “Lawangngo faka hania hania anggendarec imoc ni hendarai. Imocac ge kicga fina kenu henna. Ramaga nga noningga ngiwango ngagera feracyunuandae ngiwa imoc yeni sebingina faikperecge nga kibi kibi sasawa.
Amma ni Bet El bangec imocac Anutu. Ge imohai hoc mong kerecdokungo nadzicmima yoac mong deserinennec. Ge yaguc yacma bangec yomoc wama arengfocgaac bangecfu dzigenema kembesena.”
Ifi deu Rahel nga Lea yeri Yacakow yoac turunga yofi meremmioc, “Manniraac maridzoming nganoc nereac onga mong mi fede.
Neri yeac kicfu kuric isoc yombong kecandipe. Ye bunnira mema dzonira ukudarec.
Imocac amma Anutungo manniraac wiac wangecdarec imoc sasawa nenang nga nambaracfocnina nenanggac ande. Imocac Anutungo derecgegendac imoc sasawa ambesena.”
Ifi deec Yacakow ye yacma enenghora nga nambaracfora sasawa yeni kamele witiau faiyunuec.
Faiyunuma ramaburumaka nga noning nga finac goa Paddan Aram bangecfu kecma meec imoc mekpedzunedacma Kenacan bangecfu mama Itsak yearu dzigeneudeac kenec.
Yacakow ye woraudeac negemma faka sufu sufuu amma aramngic Lawan yoac mong mi edeec.
Ye engsac yacma wiara sasawa medacma woraec. Worama kemma doku
Anu uameme harebec wisickemanu Lawan yofi dema edegec, “Yacakow ye bic woradac.”
Ifi edegec negemma ye sactosofora meyunuu uameme seweng kisangyunuma kengkecma Gilecad sifecbangecfubigeng meficyunugec.
Anu Anutungo ine aramngic Lawan tofocnac gaukpefinnu fingecmima yofi dema edeec, “Ge fakaga garenggema Yacakow yoac kucgoc mi debesena me mangana mong mi ammibesena.”
Anu Yacackow ye sifecfu kporucamangina kpedziu Lawan yeng kengkecma meficyunuec. Meficyunuma sactosoforagoc Gilecad sifecbangecfu momoc kporucamangina kpedzima yai fegec.
Anu Lawangngo Yacakowac yofi dema edeec, “Ge noc faka yombong anendang? Ge hesonnuma naroanghocna dzikacfu meyunuma witicamau kengandae ifi isoc meyuruma hadang.
Anu ge nocac hesonnuma waic waic woradang? Edenubang debac ni wiacfocna edeyunuba yegec heima tambaring nganoc kpema sogac sogaigoc namma faingunuba habau.
Anu ge ine naroanghocna kokocyurubadeac mi negensinendang amma esafocna maringina mebadeac mi negendang. Ge faka imoc mi angana anendang.
Imocac ni faka mong anggembeso kuc fenende. Nga manggaac Anutungo ine tofocnac kpetarinemma yofi dedac. ‘Ge fakaga garenggema Yacakow yoac kucgoc mi debesena me mangana mong mi ammibesena.’
Anu ge manggaac amau kennadeac songoga kuneng anu woradang imoc naric. Amma ge nocac nemuongana hamangec medang?”
Ifi deu Yacakowngo Lawanggac yoac turunga yofi meremmiec, “Ge naroanghocga goriangoc wangecnubanggac ni kengec amma mi edeguma woradua.

Anu ge monggaru me monggaru nemuonga meficgenadeu imoc ye homebeso. Wiac sasawa mekecdimbe imoc sactosofocnira yeneac kicfu hendacbesena. Amma nemuonga mong meficgenadeu mebesena.” Yacakow ye Rahelngo wiac imoc hamangec meec imoc mi negenec.
Anu Lawan ye Yacakow nga Lea amma wanacngac yohockang yeneac kporucamau emma nemuongaya mong mi henec. Anu ye Leaac kporucamaunac mama Rahelac kporucamau enec.
Enu Rahelngo nemuonga mema kamele yeneac finac meme hie imohai barima witiau heima tarec. Taru Lawan ye bedzou hofoc hofoc ua mekefu kpac andarec.

Ifi anu Rahel ye mama yofi dema edeec, “Kunenna ngachafi ayemmeande imoc anendacac ni geac kicfu naric mi yacbade.” Ge herebu mi ambesena. Ye ine wiac sasawa imoc hendarec nga nemuongaya ine mong mi henec.
Ifi anu Yacakow ye herebu negemma Lawan yoac demima yofi dema kpesimiec, “Ni noc wiac mangana me kopocsic meficgeaiac kucgoc kporacnuma hadang?
Nga ge yaguc wiacna sasawa hendacdang imohai ge wiac mong meficgedannu sactosofocnira yeneac kicfu faina yeneng hemma neranggac yoac negemma mengerebisia.
Amma ni gegoc kecba kifa 20 wisickeec naso imohai rama nga noningfocga yeni medac meyunugec imoc mong mi manganeec. Nga geac ramahabuunac ngiwa mong kpenec mi anai.
Me wasaiyang yeneng ramafocga yinigec mehama mi edzacguanduae. Ni neannaoc turunga faianduae. Ge wenacfu me tofocnac hamangec meyunugec turunga gembadeac deannec.
Anu ni wenacfu wenactoango nohokefec nga tofocnac nomanggoc yombong gauna kpac kefai.

Nga kifa 20 yombong amagau enac tofoc tofohoga kefai. Kifa 14 imoc naroanghocga yereac amma kefai nga kifa 6 imoc ramanoninghabuga yeneac amma kefai. Amma geng ine uabunna mekemmeha angkecna atac teng anec.

Anu mannaac Anutu, Awrahamgac Anutu ye Itsakngo eweheimikefec ye mi kecbac debac ge eng yombong fainuna habai. Anutungo ine ubaebicna nga kpendzeng uana imoc hemma tofocnac yoac imoc isinggema edegudac.”

Ifi deu Lawangngo Yacakow yofi dema edeec, “Naroanghocna yeri neac nambarachocna nga ramanoning nga wiac sasawa hendacnec imoc yeni neac sasawa. Naroanghocna yomoc nga nambarac meyunugec yeni ine wiac mangana ayemmeba naric mi anude.
Imocac amma nerang dzadzahac mong amma wiac mong faide imocngo dzadzahacniraac kpete ambeso.”
Ifi deu Yacakow ye hoc mong miacma gununggema kpete faiec.
Faima sactosofora yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ngeni hoc homac kpedzucnegec.” Ifi deu yeni hoc kpedzucnegec enu hocguru imocac witiau yakangina faima enacurec negec.
Anu Lawangngo hocguru imocac kpara Yegar Sahaduta
Amma ye torokpema yofi deec “
Nga ge naroanghocna sisic ayecmenade me mi negembare ngac goa monggoc meyununadeu ine yofi negembesena. Ngic mongngo mi genude gedang anu Anutungo hepucnira amma genudenoc.”
Anu Lawangngo torokpema Yacakow yofi dema edeec, “Negennec, hocguru nga hockpete botucnirau gununggema faidua
imocngo kpetenira nammanu ni ngaba amma gearu mi habade. Nga ge ifingoc ngaba anemma kpete imoc ferahama nearu mi habesena.
Anu Awraham nga Nahor yereac Anutungo desi desinira ambeso. Ifi deu Yacakow ye mama Itsakngo Anutu eweheimima kefec yeac kpacfu deseriec.”
Deserima tikiu Anutuac sesegerec ohoma sactosofora yakaac heitaiyunu hama yaka imoc enacurec nema tiki imohaingoc fegec.
Fegec ama wereckenu Lawan ye asoacguc yacma esamedacfora kokocyunuma kenecyunuec. Ifi amma faiyunuma dzigenema amabangehau kenec.
yenemma yofi deec, “Anutuac wasaifora yeneac habu yomoc.” Ifi dema amabangec imocac kpara Mahanayim
Yacakow ye dara Esaw Secir bangecfu Edom amabangec imohai kefec. Imocac amma Yacakowngo siducdedengicfora yofi dema edeyunuma sueyunuu waraima yearu kenggec.
“Ngeni kemma kunenna Esaw yofi dema edebisia, ‘Enac tofoc tofohongicga Yacakow ye yofi dede.’ ‘Ni Lawanggoc kuric kecerekefai. Kecma yaguc monggoc dzigenema haduae.
Ni burumaka, donggi nga rama habuya habuya amma wanacngicngac homac meyunukecduae. Amma kunenna geng neac negenna ngereeudeac yoacsiducna imoc faiba hade.’ ”
Nga siducdedengic yeni Yacakowaru monggoc dzigenema yofi dema edegec, “Neni dacga Esaw yearu kemma meficgeing. Anu ye ine ge meficguudeac ngicfora 400 yenigoc hama kecdae.”

Ifi degec Yacakow ye kengec kuneng kpeu ebic kuneng mema yofi negenec, “Esaw ye hama habu mong yunuudeu ine habu mong yeni naric woragecde.” Ifi negemma ngicfora nga ramaburumakafora amma kamelefora sasawa mendzicyunuu habu yohockang anggec.

Nga ge enac tofoc tofohongicnecga makpekpea, ni yasunasac mekecma Yodang doku yomoc ferecge kenai anu ge nigoc yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecnec. Amma ge yoacga modacma nigoc kecnecac yaguc ine habu yohockang yenigoc haduae.
Nga dacna Esaw ye yaguc hama ni nga enengnambaracfocna sasawa kpebucnunubacac kengecnude. Imocac amma ge onggonnuma dacnaac mariunac mesinunadeac numugenduae.

Anu ge warac geanggaoc yofi denec, ‘Foracngoc ni gombunga anggemma bangecfocga mesaheyunuba kondunnu sangi fede ifi isoc homac yombong anggecde. Ifi anggecdeac imocac kpete mongngo naric mi osodarude.’ ”
Anu Yacakow ye tofocnac ihai feec. Feu ama wereckenu ine wiara femiec imohacnac goa dara Esaw miudeac yofi meisinggeec,
noningngagera 200 nga ngiwa 20 amma ramangagera 200 nga ngiwa 20,
kamele namunginagoc nga medacfora 30 nga burumakangagera 40 nga ngiwa 10 amma donggicngagera 20 nga ngiwa 10.
Meisinggema habu harebec imoc tembuc tembuc enac tofoc tofohongicfora maringinau faima yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ngeni warainemma habu botucnginau sawea herea herea kembisia.”
Nga ngic waraiec ye ine yofi anudeac edeec, “Dacna Esaw ye meficguma ge meracac enac tofoc tofohongic nga dahai kembeso hanec nga ramaburumaka waraidae imoc meracac?”
Ifi kpesigenu yofi dema edebesena, “Imoc enac tofoc tofohongicga Yacakowngo kunenga Esaw ge genudeac fau hade nga negennec yengena ifingoc ngade modacnunuma hama kecde.”
Anu enac tofoc tofohongic namba 2 nga namba 3 nga imocac habugareng kendacgec yeni sasawa yoac imocngoc edeyunuma yofi deec, “Ngeni kemma Esaw meficgema yoac imoc sasawa ededacbisia.

Anu torokpema yofi debisia, ‘Negennec, enac tofoc tofohongicga Yacakow ye ngade hama kecde.’ ” Yacakow ye yofi negemma wiac imoc andarec, “Ubangerecac wiac faiba waraima kenu Esawngo imoc hemma herea nomanemanu kengkecma meficgeba ogo anembeso.”
Amma ifi negensima ubangerecac wiac fau waraiec. Waraiu yengena ine tofocnac ngicngacfora yenigoc feec.
Anu Yacakow ye ama mi wereckemmanu tofocnacngoc yacma enenghora nga wanacngachora nga medacfora 11 yeni meyunuu kemma doku ferec ferecgea kpara Yabbok imohai ferecgegec.
Ye wiacfora meyunudacma doku ferec ferecgea imohai ferecgegec nga finacgedanga imoc momoc sasawa fau kendarec.
Yacakow yengena ine dzigenema tembuha noboc tarec. Tacmanu ngic mongngo fingecmiu yegoc ewekpekpe amma kecmaec ama wereckenec.
Anu ngic imocngo Yacakowac kuc memaudeac ambibiema kecma fekinga kpeu fotockeec.
Fotockeu ngic ye yofi dema edeec, “Ama wereckendeac wanuna kemba.” Ifi deu Yacakowngo yofi meremmiec, “Eng mi waguba kennade, ge kenecnunaguc ine waguba kennade.”
Ifi deu ngic imocngo yofi dema kpesimiec, “Ge kpacga merac?” Kpesimiu meremmiec, “Ni kpacna Yacakow.”
Ifi deu yofi dema edeec, “Ge Anutu nga ngic yenigoc momoc dzikac kpema firang andanggac geac kpacga Yacakow monggoc mi kpacbesonga. Geac kpacga imoc Isracel
Ifi deu Yacakowngo kpesimima yofi deec, “Ge kpacga naric edenubang me?” Ifi kpesimiu ye yofi deec, “Ge nocac kpacnaac kpesinec?” Ifi dema imohaingoc keneheec.
Keneheu Yacakow ye yofi deec, “Ni Anutuac kicmesuya yombong hendua anu mi homedua.” Ifi dema amabangec imocac kpara Penicel
Anu ye Penicel bangec wama kemmanu wenac ereec. Nga ye fekinga fotockeecac tiwirindzic tima kenec.
Imocac amma Isracel ngicngacareng yeni naso imohacnac erekecma yaguc yang neandae imohai fekinnu ginoma tacde imoc mi neandae. Ngic imocngo warac Yacakow imohai kpeecac ifi angandae.
Faiyunuma wanacngac yeri medacfocngiragoc waraigecdeac edeyunuec yeneac ngadeu Lea nga nambaracfora amma Rahel nga Yosef yeri ine ngade kenoc.
Nga ye yengenaoc waraiyemmema kemma eweheiheiac faka modacma fafoc heima bangecfu ngonducneu atac seweng ammanu daraaru kensikeec.
Ifi anu Esaw ye nedzima kemma meficgema tofohoma kokockeu kiacemeoc.

Kiaceme namma Esaw ye kic fiu kenu ngacnambarac hagec yenemma munia yofi kpesimiec, “Imoc damoc yeneng gegoc hadae?” Ifi deu Yacakowngo yofi meremmiec, “Anutungo enac tofoc tofohongicga ni faka gombunga anemma nambaracfocna nenec imoc yeneng.”
Ifi demanu wanacngac nga medacfocngira yeni hama Esawac kicfu ngonducnegec.
Yeneac ngadenginau Lea nga nambaracfora yeni ifingoc hama ngonducnegec. Anu wisic wisickea yombong ine Yosef nga Rahel yeri hama ifingoc ngonducnemioc.

Anu Esawngo yofi dema kpesimiec, “Ngic nga ramaburumakahabu sinnu hagec meficyunudua imoc dafi negemma faiyununa hadau?” Ifi deu yofi meremmiec, “Kunenna, imoc geng neac negenna ngereeudeac faiyunuba hadau.”
Ifi deu Esawngo yofi deec, “Munana, ni neanna wiacna homac yombong fenende imocac wiacga nembeso denec imoc wana geangga fegembeso.”
Ifi deu Yacakowngo yofi meremmiec, “Kpac, ge ogo anemma hoannuna kicmesuga hemba Anutuac kicmesu isoc andac. Ge neac negenna ngereeudeu sese imoc sifu marinaunac mebesena.
Anutungo gombunga anemma wiac sasawa nenec.” Imocac sese mehama genduae imoc mebesena. Ifi dema seseri ammiu meec.
Anu Esawngo yofi deec, “Yaguc nenahafoc kennide. Ni waraiba ge modacnuma ngadenau hana.”

Ifi deu Yacakowngo yofi meremmiec, “Kunenna, nambaracfocna yeni mi seridau nga ramaburumakamedaha yeni namu nemangoc kecdae ge imoc hennec. Imocac amma yeni uameme mocguac manau kisangyununi nedzi nedzi kemma kucngina kpac anu rama sasawa homedacgecde.
Imocac kunenna, ge enac tofoc tofohongicga ni naric wanuma waraima kenna. Ni ine ramaburumaka nga nambarac yeneac arennu dengec dengec hakecma kunenna gearu Secir bangecfu hasikebesare.”

Ifi deu Esawngo yofi meremmiec, “Ifi denecac ine ngicngacfocna nigoc kecdae yenearunac goa naric hendzicyunuba gegoc tacgecde.” Ifi deu ye yofi deec, “Kunenna, ge nocac ifi annade? Ge neacsac negenna ngereebeso negenduae.”
Ifi deu Esaw ye uameme imohaingoc dzigenema kengkecma Secir bangecfu sikeec.
Yacakow ye ine Sukkotbigeng kemma amea meec. Mema ramaburumakafora yeneac bedzo nganoc momoc meec. Imocac amabangec imoc kpara Sukkot
Anu Yacakow ye Paddan Aram bangecfunac dzigenema gombunga hakecma Kenacan bangecfu Sehem taunnu hasikema imocac wegenahau kporucamangina kpedzima ihai tacyac angkefec.
Amma kporucamangina kpedziec ua bangec imocac noboha imoc Sehem mama Hamor yeac medacfora yenearunac kesitadzo 100ngo bummeec.
Anu ye imohai arata mong mema kpara yofi kparec El Elohe Isracel.
Kenu bangec imocac ngickuneng hiwingic Hamor yeac medaha Sehem ye naroang imoc henec. Hemma wangecma kemma yegoc fema faka gameagoc ammiec.
Anu Sehem ye meudeac songea negemma yeac yoac gombunga yombong deec.
Dema mama Hamor yofi dema edeec, “Ge naroang imoc menenna neac enenna ambeso.”
Anu ye naroanga memanganeec siduc imoc Yacakow negenec. Anu yeac medacfora yeni uau ramaburumaka garengyunuma kecgecac ye yeneac tomai amma imocac yoac mong mi deec.
Anu Sehem mama Hamor ye Yacakowgoc yoac deecdeac yearu bic haec.
Negenggec Hamorngo yofi dema edeyunuec, “Medacna Sehem ye geac naroanggaac songea homac andeac sifu mina yeac enema ambeso.
Migec nenang emekpesi yofi anni. Ngeni naroangfocngina nemmema neneac naroangfocnina meyunubisia.
Ifi amma nenigoc kecmagec bangec yomocngo ngeneac yombong ambeso. Anu ngeni yomohai kecma ua mema finactoanginagoc amma kecserima kecbisia.”
Anu Sehem ye Dina mama nga naingfora yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ngeni sifu neac negenggec ngereebeso. Anu ngeni noc wiacac degecde imoc naric ngemmedacbade.
Ngeni ngacbung ramaburumaka nga dzo amma wiac goa degecde imocacsoc ngemmebade. Nga naroang ye ine neac enenna anudeac nengyombonggebisia.”
Sehem ye naingngina memanganeecac Yacakow medacfora yeni faitobang amma Sehem nga mama Hamor yeri yoac turunga yofi dema edeyurugec.
“Neni ngic mong sebia tosea mi herec herecgea ifia nainnina naric mi minide faka ifia imoc nenearu gameagoc angande.
Imocac amma yofi anggec ine naric denide. Ngeni neni isoc amma ngic sasawa sebingina tosea herecgedacbisia.
Ngeni ifi anggecdeu ine naroangfocnina naric ngemmenide nga neni ifingoc ngeneac naroangfocngina naric meyununide. Amma ngenearu torokpeni ngicngachabu mocgu andacbisina.
Anu yoac edengunudimbe imoc wama sebingina tosea mi herecgegecdeu ine neni nainnina wangecma amabangec yomoc wama monnu kennide.”
Ifi degec Hamor medahagoc yeri yoac imocac negenec naric anec.
Sehem ye manggahaac amau ngic sasawa feracyunuecac wiacfora yeni yeac negenggec engena anec. Nga ye Yacakow naroanga hembokoecac amma faka imoc anudeac naso mong mi ukuec.
Ifi amma Hamor medahagoc yeri dzigenema kemma taonggac naguu emma taongngic yofi dema edeyunuoc,

“Ngicngac imoc yeni ruaengicngac imocac negenggec, bangecnina kuneng fedeac nenahafoc sokodacma naric kecnide. Yeni naric bangecninau kecma yomohai kengha ambisia. Anu nenang yeneac naroangfocngina meyununi yeni nenang naroangfocnina ifingoc meyunubisia.
Anu nenang faka mocgu yofisac anni ine nenanggoc kecma ngicngacareng mocgu annideac dedae. Yeni sebingina tosea herecgeandae ifi isocngoc ngic sasawa nenang sebinina tosea herecgedacbisina.
Ifi anni ramaburumakfocngina nga finacngina sasawa imoc nenanggac momoc anude. Imocac negengyemmeni nenanggoc tacyac angkecbisia.”
Ifi deec bangec imocac mingina sasawa taonnaguu kengha anggec yeni Hamor medahagoc yereac yoac imoc negenggec naric anu ngic sasawa taonnaguusing kengha anggec yeni sebingina tosea herecgedacgec.
Anu Hamor medahagoc yeri momoc dzikacbeangngo kpebucyuruma Sehemgac amaunac Dina wangecma mama kenoc.
Anu Yacakow medacfora goa yeni naingngina memanganegecac amma kemma ngic kpebucyunuoc imoc yenemma finac nganoc taongtoau feec imoc medacgec.
Amma ramaburumakahabungina nga donggifocngina megec. Wiac sasawa amasobennu kecgec nga uau kecgec imoc momoc meyunudacgec.
Amma finacngina nga ngacnambaracfocngina momoc wangecyunuma kenggec. Anu amau wiacngina fedarec imoc momoc medacma kenggec.

Anu Yacakowngo Simecon nga Lewi yofi dema edeyuruec, “Ngeri bangec mingina kenacangngic nga peridzingic yeneac kicfu kpacna memanganedaocac yeni ubango ukunugecde amma ngeri ebic kuneng witinau faidaoc. Ni ngicfocna efeanecsac kecdae. Anu yeni kpedzucnema hama nigoc ewema ni nga wiacfocna kpetotienunugecde.”
Ifi deu yeri yofi deoc, “Ye nainnina singtoangac isoc faka gameagoc ammiu naric mi andac!”

Ifi deu Yacakowngo arengfora nga ngicngacfora yegoc kecgec sasawa yeni yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ngeni bangec monnunac nemuongafocngina botucnginaunac meicyunudacma ubaongangina hafoangoc kpedzucnedacma wambangina dzuac dzuara heigec kemedacbeso.
Kemedaru nenang ama yomoc wama Bet El ennide. Ni warac ebic witiau kecbare negennemma sinnu nigoc kecma onggonnuec Anutu imocnoc yeac arata mong imohai mebade.”
Ifi edeyunuu yeni bangec monnunac nemuonga mekecgec nga kedzacac ringngina imoc momoc Yacakow midacgec. Midacgec ye Sehem taong wegenahau terebint ic mong nanec imocac haniau tonggoec.
Ifi amma yacma kenggec. Anu taongtoa tegia tegia tackenec imoc yeneac mingina sasawa yeni Anutuac kengectoango mewakeyunuu mongngo mong Yacakowac medacfora mong mi kisangyunugec.
Ye bicngoc daraac kengec kpeu worama kemmanu Anutungo imohai yeac kicfu fingectegerecac ihai arata mong mema kpara El Bet El
Kenehema yofi dema edeec, “Ge kpacga Yacakow, yaguc ine Yacakow monggoc mi degecde Isracel kpacgugecde.” Ifi dema kpara Isracel kparec.

Anu Anutungo yofi dema edeec, “Ni Anutu Kuctoa mingina. Ge fingecsahe amma seregurutoa ambesena. Nga gearunac ngicngacareng mong fingecma ngicngacareng habuya habuya fingeckenggecde. Amma gearunac ngictau fingecbesandae.
Anu Awraham nga Itsak bangec yemerai imoc ge nga esamedacfocga yeni momoc yemmebesandua.”
Anu Anutungo Yacakowgoc yoac denegeng anec wisickeu yacma enec.
Enu Yacakow ye Anutungo yoac edeec imohai kpete dema hoc mong miacma gununggeu nanu sesedoku witiau kpakema kerecdoku nadzicmiec.
Anu Anutungo yegoc yoac denegeng anec bangec imocac kpara Bet El kparec.
Anu yeni Bet El wama kengkecma Efrata amau mi kensikemagecngoc Rahel ye medac meudeac gadze herea yombong kiec.
Kiu medac meudeac ebiriu gadzememeyango yofi dema edeec, “Ge medacngoc menadeac kengec mi guu.”
Ifi deu medac mema homebeso amma asuya kpac ambeso ammanu kpara Ben Oni
Anu Rahel ye homeec. Homeu Efrata sinnu tonggogec. Efrataac kpara mong imoc Bet Lehem
tonggoma Yacakow ye kicsereyau hoc mong miacma gununggeu nanec. Hoc imocngo Rahelac kicserea nanecngoc nande.
Anu Isracel ye sing monggoc torokpema kengkecma Migdal Ederac
Amma ye amabangec imohai tacyac amma kecmanu Recuwen ye mamaac wanacenema Bilhaaru kemma yegoc feoc. Feec Isracelngo siduc imoc negenec.
Anu Yacakow ye medacfora 12ngoc kecgec.
Leaarunac medacfora yofiguc Recuwen ye Yacakowac waracmedac amma Simecon, Lewi, Yehuda nga Issashar amma Dzewulun.
Nga Rahel ye medachora Yosef nga Benyamin.
Nga Bilha, Rahelac wanacngacac medachora Dan nga Naftali.
Nga Dzilepa, Leaac wanacngac yeac medachora ine Gad nga Aser. Yacakow ye Paddan Aram bangecfu kecmanu medacfora imoc yeni fingecgec.
Itsak ye kifaya 180 ammanu
kifa kpouyombonggema ngickpengeng amma asuya kpac anu homeec. Homeu medachora Esaw nga Yacakow yereng tonggooc.

Esaw ye kenacangngic yeneac naroangfocngina yenearunac enengfora meyunuec. Mong imoc Ada hitingic mong kpara Elon yeac naroanga nga mong imoc hiwingic Tsiwecon medaha Ana yeac naroanga kpara Oholiwama.
Amma mong imoc Ismacel naroanga kpara Besemat imoc Newayot naina.
Nga Ada ye Esawac medac Elifadzi meec anu Basemat yeng Recucel meec
nga Oholiwama yeng ine Yecus nga Yacelam amma Kora meyunuec. Esaw medacfora imoc yeni Kenacan bangecfu fingecgec.

Anu Esaw ye enengfora nga naroangmedacfora amma ngicngac yenahafoc kecgec amma ramaburumaka nga donggikamele amma finacgedanga sasawa Kenacan bangecfu kecma medarec imoc medacma munia Yacakow wama sing herea yombong kemma bangec monnu kefec.

Yeri finacgedangira homac mekefocac yerahafoc tacyac anecdeac negenu osiu ye Yacakow wama kenec. Imoc yofiac, yeri ramaburumakafocngira seregurutoaac amma bangec kefoc imoc yeri yohockangngo yaka nganoc meficgeecdeac soha mi anec.
Imocac ye kemma Secir sifecfu kefec. Anu Esawac kpara mong imoc Edom.
Esaw medacfora yeneac kpacngina imoc yofiguc, Elifadzi ye Esaw enema Ada yeac medaha. Nga Recucel ye Esaw enema Basemat yeac medaha.
Anu Elifadzi medacfora yofiguc, Teman, Omar, Tsefo nga Gacatam amma Kenadzi.
Anu Esaw medaha Elifadziac wanacenema Timena yeng Amalek meec. Imoc Esaw enema Ada yeac esamedacfora.
Recucel medacfora imoc Nahat, Dzera nga Samma amma Midza. Imoc Esaw enema Basemat yeac esamedacfora.
Anu Esaw enema Oholiwama ye Tsiwecon medaha Ana yeac naroanga. Nga ye Esawarunac medacfora yofi meyunuec Yecus nga Yacelam amma Kora.
Anu yomoc ine Esawac esamedacfora ngictau kpac megec yeneac kpacareng. Esawac waracmedaha Elifadzi yeac medacfora yeni yofiguc, ngictau Teman, ngictau Omar, ngictau Tsefo, ngictau Kenadzi
ngictau Kora nga ngictau Gacatam amma ngictau Amalek. Elifadziarunac ngic imoc yeneng Edom bangecfu ngictau kpac mema kecgec. Ngic imoc yeni Adaac esafora.

Anu yomoc ine Esawac medaha Recucel yeac medacfora ngictau Nahat, ngictau Dzera nga ngictau Samma amma ngictau Midza. Imoc yeni Reuelac ngichabu Edom bangecfunac amma yeni Esawac enema Basemat yeac esafora.
Esaw enema Oholiwama yeac medacfora yeni yofiguc, ngictau Yecus nga ngictau Yacelam amma ngictau Kora. Nga ngictau imoc yeni Esawac enema Oholiwamaarunac fingecgec. Nga Oholiwama ye Ana naroanga.
Ngic imoc yeni Esawac esamedacfora nga ngictaufocngina. Anu Esawac kpara mong Edom.
Dison nga Etser amma Disan yeni Edom bangecfu kecgec. Ngic imoc yeneng Secirac medacfora amma yeni horingic habu fekenggec yeneac ngictaufocngina.
Lotanggac medachora imoc Hori nga Hemam nga Lotanggac naina imoc Timena.
Anu Sowal medacfora imoc yofiguc, Alewan, Manahat, Ewal nga Sefo amma Onam.
Anu Tsiwecon medachora imoc yofi, Aia nga Ana. Anaac siduc mong imoc yofi, ye mama Tsiweconggac donggihabu garenggekecma bangec ngiha kpacfu doku gereaac kiwa meficgeec.
Nga Ana nambaracfora imoc yofiguc, Dison nga naroanga kpara Oholiwama.
Nga Dison medacfora imoc Hemedan, Eseban nga Iteran amma Heran.
Nga Etser medacfora yeni yofiguc, Bilhan, Dzacawan nga Akan.
Nga Disan medachora Uts nga Aran.
Nga horingic yenearunac ngictaufocngina yofiguc fingecma kecgec, ngictau Lotan, ngictau Sowal, ngictau Tsiwecon, ngictau Ana,
ngictau Dison nga ngictau Etser amma ngictau Disan. Ngic imoc yeneng horingic ngicngacarengsoc yeneac ngictau kpac mema Secir bangecfu kecgec.
Becor medaha kpara Bela ye Edonnu ngictau kefec yeac taongtoa imoc kpara Dinhaba.
Nga Bela homeu Yowawngo yeac tatac mema ngictau anec. Ye Dzera, Botsera amaunac yeac medaha.
Yowaw ye homeu Husam, temangngic yeneac bangecfunac yeng yeac tatac mema ngictau anec.
Anu Husam homeu Hadad, Bedad medaha yeng yeac tatac mema ngictau anec. Yeneng midiangngic Mocaw bangecfu yunuec. Nga Hadad ye taongtoaya kpara Awit.
Hadad homeu Samela Masereka amaunac yeng yeac tatac mema ngictau anec.
Nga Samela ye homeu Saculngo yeac tatac mema ngictau anec. Rehowot ama doku wegenahau tarec ye imohacnac.
Sacul ye homeu Bacal Hanan, Aheborac medacngo tataha mema ngictau anec.
Bacal-Hanan, Aheborac medac homeu Hadarngo tataha mema ngictau anec. Hadarac taongtoa imoc kpara Pau nga enema kpara Mehetawecel. Ye Matered naroanga nga Matered ye Me Dzahawac naroanga.
Esaw medacfora ngictau kpac mema kecgec yeni habunginasoc nga amabangecnginasoc kpacarengngina yofiguc, Timenaac ngictau, Alewaac ngictau, Yetetac ngictau,
Oholiwamaac ngictau, Elaac ngictau, Pinonggac ngictau,
Kenadziac ngictau, Temanggac ngictau, Miwetsarac ngictau
nga Magedicelac ngictau amma Iramgac ngictau.
Ngic imoc yeni amabangec megec imocacsoc kecgec. Imoc Edom ngictau kpacngina amma bangecnginaac kpac sasawa. Edomngic yeneac bangecngina Esaw yeac esamedacfora imoc yeninoc.

Anu Yacakow medacfora yeneac siduc yofi fede. Yosef ye kifaya 17 ammanu dacfora yenigoc ramahabu garengyunuma kecgec. Ye mamaac enenghora Bilha nga Dzilepa yereac medacfocngira yenigoc kefec. Anu dacfora yeni kopocsic meficgegec negenec Yosefngo ine mama siduc ammikefec.

Anu Isracel ye bic ngickpengeng ammaguc Yosef kpeficgeecac amma yeac songo kuneng negengkefec. Imoc medacfora goa yeneac songo negenec imoc ferahaec. Anu ye ngakpi maria herea kibi kibi gombunga mong mengerema miec.
Ifi anu mangngina ye Yosefaru songea kuneng feec nga yeneac songo efeanecsac feec imoc bic hentegecgec. Ifi hemma munangina ubango wama yegoc yoac ruaegoc denengeng anggecdeac mong mi ayemmekefec.
Anu kecma naso monnu Yosefngo gaukpefing hemma dacfora edeyunuu yeni imoc negemma torokpema ngadehegec.
Ye yofi dema edeyunuec, “Negenggec, ni gaukpefing mong yofi hendua.
Nenang uau wiac dedeckeni nanu neac dedecngo dindingac yombong yacma nandac. Ngeneac dedecngo ine neac dedec yerecgema ngonducneandimbe ifi isoc ngonducnema nandacdau.”
Ifi deu dacfora yeni yofi degec, “Ge neneac ngictau amma naric mi garennununade.” Ifi dema monggoc ngadehema gaukpefinga edeyunuec imoc wama deendema anggec.
Anu imocac ngadeau gaukpefing mong ifingoc hemma imoc dacfora siduc ayemmema yofi deec, “Negenggec, ni gaukpefing mong monggoc hendua, afo nga wenac amma asomeng 11 yeni ngonducnenendau.”
Anu ye siduc imoc mama nga dacfora momoc ayemmeu mamango ngaba ammima yofi deec, “Ge gaukpefing imoc sicsauc hendang. Nonggomangga nga dacfocga neni hama fafoc heima ngonducnegennideac denec me?”
Anu dacfora yeni yeac keracmangang anggec nga mamango ine yoac imoc negeng negenau fau fekefec.
Amma kecma dacfora yeni mangnginaac ramahabu henggareng amma kecgecdeac Sehem bangecfu kemma kecgec.
Kecgec Isracelngo Yosef yofi dema edeec, “Dacfocga yeni Sehem amabangecfu rama yenenggareng amma kecdae. Imocac amma ge hana, ni yenearu sueguba kembesena.” Deu yofi deec, “Naric, ni efaiduae.”

Ifi deu yofi dema edeec, “Ge kemma dacfocga yenembesena. Yeni gombunga kecdae me dafi? Amma ramahabu yeni ifingoc naric kecdae me kpac imoc yenemma hama yoac siduc anembesena.” Ifi dema Heweron tumiaunac sueu kengkecma Sehem kensikeec.
Kemma imohai bangectoau yerecgema kecma ngic mong meficgeu yeng yofi dema kpesimiec, “Ge noc wiac hofocnec?”
Kpesimiu Yosefngo yofi meremmiec, “Ni dacfocna hofocyunuduae. Yeni dahaigeng kecma ramafocngina garengyunudae imoc naric edenubang me?”
Ifi deu ngic imocngo yofi meremmiec, “Yeni yofi degec negenai, ‘Nenang Dotan kenni.’ ” Ifi degecac yeni yomoc bic wama kendau. Ifi deu Yosef ye dacfora modacyunuma Dotan kemma meficyunuec.
Amma yenaocngoc yofi degec, “Henggec, gauhehengngic edimoc hade.
Negendae, ye hau nenang kpebucgebisina. Kpebucgema teng monnu ukuni kemema feu yofi debisina, ‘Kateyang wasai mongngo hama nedac.’ Ifi deni yeac gaukpefinggac hania fingectegeru hembisina.”

Ifi dema yenearunac mesima mamaaru monggoc mekenudeac negensiec. Anu yofi deec, “Ifi kpac, nenaoc marininango mi kpeserebisina nga sawa mi hetinggebisina. Bangec ngiha kpacfu teng nande imohai ine ukugec kemeu kekeha onggonggebisina.”
Anu Yosef ye dacfora yenearu kensikeu ngakpia herea kibiagoc heima kefec imoc hesimigec.
Hesimima Yosef mema tennu ukugec kemeec. Nga teng imoc dokuya kpac.

Yeni ifi amma yaka negecdeac mama tacgec. Tacma kic figec kenu henggec ismacelngic habuareng mong yeni Gilecad bangecfunac hagec. Yeni kamelefocnginagoc icsopea homuna gombunga nga kerec homuna gombunga amma mandari icac sopea homunagoc atickema Aigita bangecfu mekenggecdeac hagec.
Anu Yehudango dacmunafora yofi dema edeyunuec, “Nenang munanina kpebucgema sawa semenideu faka imoc memefihagoc mi anude.

Imocac amma ismacelngic yemmeni yeneng bung nemmebisia. Ye munanina nga nenang sactosonina yombong ande imocac marininango yeac sebi mi kpeserebisina.” Ifi deu dacmunafora yeni yoac imocac uba mocgu anggec.
dzigenema munafora yenearu kemma yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ni medac hofocduae, yaguc dafi ambade?”
Ifi deu yeni noningngiwa mong kpema Yosefac ngakpi herea imoc mema noning sawau nemurukegec.
Nemurukema ngakpihereha kibiagoc imoc faigec mangnginaaru kenu yofi degec, “Ngakpi mong meficgeding imoc henna! Imoc medacgaac ngakpi me meracac?”
Ifi degec mangnginango ngakpi imoc hemma yofi deec, “O, imoc medacnaac ngakpiherec. Foracngoc, wasaiyang mongngo Yosef kibucgema nedac.”
Ifi dema Yacakow ye ngakpia mesuckema ubamanganggac toruwamba heima uameme homac yombong medahaac kiac ubahodung amma kefec.

Ifi anu nambaracfora yeni sasawa hadacma demekiri ammigecdeac hadacgec. Hadacgec yenemma yoac imoc wama yofisac deec, “Ni kiac ubahodung amma kecma homema medacnaaru homecamau kembade.” Mamango ifi dema kiac ubahodung amma kefec.

Anu midiangngic yeni Yosef mema Aigita bangecfu kenggec. Kengsikema wasaienara mong kpara Potifar yearu suegec bummeec. Anu Potifar yeac uaya yofi, ye wasaingic Pareco garenggekecgec yeneac kaptengngina kefec.
Anu yofi fingerec, Yehuda ye dacmunafora wayunuma kemma adullangngic mong kpara Hira yegoc kefoc.
Kecma bangec imohai kenacangngic mong kpara Sua yeac naroanga hemma meu enema anec.
Anu ngac yeng medac kpenanggema meu kpara Er kparec.
Nga ye monggoc heregoc amma medac mong mema yeac kpara Onan kparec.
Amma ye medac monggoc kpenanggema mema kpara Sela kparec. Anu Yehuda ye ine Hedziw amau kecmanu medac imoc fingerec.
Anu Yehuda ye kecma morocmedaha Er yeac ngac mong meficgeec kpara Tamar.
Nga waracmedac ye
Homeu kecma Yehudango Onan yofi dema edeec, “Ge kemma dacgaac hotsec imoc mebesena. Nga hotsec yearunac sabac mefic meficgeac yoac dedea fede imoc modacma dacgaac onga sabac meficgebesena.”
Ifi deu Onan ye ine yofi negenec ni sabac meficgeba neac onga mi anude. Ifi negemma daraac sabac mong mi meficgeudeac negemma ngacaru kenecsoc sebidokuya imoc ngadeau eng kpakekefec.
Anu ye ifi anu

Homeu Yehuda ye yofi negenec, “Sela ye dachora homedaoc ifi isoc homebacac.” Ifi negemma erangia Tamar yofi dema edeec, “Ge manggaac amau kemma kecmana medacna Sela yadiuguc deba ine habesena.” Ifi deu Tamar ye kemma mamaac amau kefec.

Anu naso herea kecma Suaac naroanga, Yehuda enema ye homeec. Homeu kiac ubamanganggac naso wisickeu Yehuda ye ogea Hira, Adullam amaunac yegoc Timena amau kenoc. Uangicfora yeneng Yehuda ramafora sebidzongina merecgegec imohai kenec.
Kenu ngic mongngo Tamar yofi dema edegec, “Negennec, erangiga ye ramafora sebidzongina merecgeudeac Timena amabangecfu kembeso ande.”

Ifi degec negemma ye yacma hotsecwambaya hesima wamba gombunga heima kporucsusuc mongngo kiwa biranggeec. Biranggema kemma Timena sinnu ama mong tarec kpara Enayim, ama imocac nagutoayau tarec. Imoc yofiac, Sela ye bic yadiec amma Tamar ye yeac enema anudeac bic mi migec.

Anu ye eranginango tacde imoc mi negemma sing tegiau yearu kemma yofi deec, “Hana, ni gegoc geac amau endedeac negenduae.” Deu ngacngo yofi meremmiec, “Ge neac amau hanadeac naric deba noc wiacga nennade?”
Ifi deu yofi deec, “Ni noningmedaha mong faigemba haude.” Ifi deu yofi meremmiec, “Ge wiac goa nenna mema kecbareng ine faina habeso.”

Ifi deu yeng yofi dema kpesimiec, “Noc wiac gembadeac negennec?” Kpesimiu ngacngo yofi meremmiec, “Maga nga witicga amma yasu marigau mekecnec imoc nenna.” Ifi deu wiac dedarec imoc midacma yegoc feec. Feu ngac ye yearunac heregoc anec.
Amma ye yacma kemma kporucsusuc meickema hotsecwambaya monggoc heiu kemeec.
Anu ngadeguc Yehudango ogea Adullam amaunac ye ngacarunac wiara monggoc meudeac noningmedaha mong mema mima sueu kenec. Ye kemma ngac imoc mi meficgeec.

Ye hofocma kemma bangec imocac ngic kpesiyemmema yofi deec, “Nemu yeneac womonggac singtoangac Enayim sinnu tarec ye dahai?” Ifi deu yeni yofi degec, “Nemuwomonggac singtoangac mong yei mi hau hening.”
Ifi degec ye Yehudaaru dzigene kemma yofi dema edeec, “Ni ngac imoc mong mi meficgedua anu amabangec imocac ngic yeneng yofi dema edenudau, ‘Nemuwomonggac singtoangac mong yei mi hama kefec.’ ”
Ifi deu Yehudango yofi deec, “Gameniragoc mi andedeac ye wiacna imoc naric mekecbeso. Negennec, ni yoacna modacma noningmedaha gemba mekemma mi meficgedang.”

Anu afo harebec nganoc wisickeu Yehuda yofi dema edegec, “Negennec, erangiga ye kaiserofaka amma hereagoc amma tacde.” Ifi degec Yehudango yofi deec, “Ye wangecma ngadeu kemema gerecngo ohogec homebeso.”

Anu yeni Tama wangecma ngadeau mekenggec erangiaru yoac yofi fau kenec, “Wiac yomocac mingina kecde yeng menuu herenagoc anai. Imocac ge wiac mekecduae imoc gombunga yombong henna. Ma nga witic amma yasu imoc meracac?”

Anu yeneng wiac imoc Yehuda edzahegec ye hentegecma yofi deec, “Wiac imoc neac i. Ye faka dindingac ammanu neng ine mangana ammiai. Imoc yofiac, ni medacna Sela mi miaiac ifi anec.” Ifi dema yegoc monggoc mi feec.
Anu medac mebeso ammanu medac mariango hanahema maec. Mau gadzememengacngo mema witic sacsacngo mariau dzegeec. Imoc yofi dema ifi anec, “Yeng warac warac fingecdac.”
Anu sabac ye ine maria monggoc kpedziu emmanu mongngo warac warac fingerec. Fingeru gadzememengacngo yofi deec, “Ge nocac igockema yombong hanec?” Ifi deu kpara Perets
Nga ngadeguc maria witiha sacsac ye fingerec. Fingeru yeac kpara Dzera
Anu
Kecma ua meecsoc imoc ye yegoc kecma meficgeu ngereedarec.
Kunengango ifi hemma Yosefac negenu ngereeu yengena enac tofoc tofoho yombong anudeac dema amea nga finacgedanga sasawa imocac garenga faiec.
Yosefac mariu amea nga dzofinacgedanga faiec naso imohai hanahema
Imocac ye wiac sasawa femiec imoc Yosefac mariu faima wiac monggac me monggac negengyohoc mi anec ye ine yaka neudeacsac negengkefec. Anu Yosef ye kicsiriha gombunga yombong.
Kecma Potifarac enemango Yosef hengkerec ammima yofi dema edeec, “Ge nigoc febesena.”
Deu ye imoc wama yofi dema meremmiec, “Negennec, kunenna ye neac negenu naric anu ameau wiac sasawa fedacde imocac negengyohoc mi amma neac mariu faidarec.

Anu ama yomohai yengena isoc amma kecbadeac fainuec. Ye wiac sasawa desinendarec nga ge ine yeac enema imocac mi desiec. Ni ifi amma Anutu woseau naric mi mebade. Ni faka mangana imoc naric mi ambade.”
Anu ngac ye uamemesoc Yosefngo yegoc feudeac kpesimikefu ye ngac imocac kerecyoac imoc mi modarec nga yegoc mong mi feec. Ye yeac wegenac ifingoc mi kengkefec.
Anu uameme monnu Yosef ye uaya meudeac amau enu enac tofoc tofohongic yenearunac mongngo mong mi kecgecngoc.
Anu ye enu ngac imocngo ngakpiau mema kpedzima yofi deec, “Ge hana nigoc fede.” Kpedziu ngakpia hefotockeu ngacac mariu taru Yosef ye nedzima ngadeau kemeec.
Ngac ye henu Yosef ye ngakpia hesima worama ngadeau kemeec.

Kemeu ngac ye enac tofoc tofohofora kpacyunuma yofi dema edeyunuec, “Henggec, Potifarngo hebiraiongic yomoc mehaec yeng kerec amma faka mangana annideac anemmede. Ye nigoc feudeac ereu ni kunengngoc arohodua.
Arohoba negemma ngakpia wau nigoc taru worama ngadeau madac.”
Ifi dema ngakpia imoc fau taru kecmanu Potifar amau haec.
Hau siduc imocngoc ammima deec, “Hebiraio bangecfunac enac tofoc tofohongic nenearu wangecma hanec yeng nearu erema kerec anemma faka mangana ambadeac dedac.
Deu ni kunengngoc arohoma kpacba ye ngakpia nigoc wau taru nedzima mama woradac.”
Anu Potifar enemango yofi deec, “Enac tofoc tofohoga ye ifi anendac.” imoc edeu Potifar ye imoc negemma herebu kuneng negenec.
Negemma Yosef mema witicamau faiec imoc ngictauac witicngic tacgec imohaingoc fau tarec.
Ammanu
Ifi anu Yosefngo yeac turunga witicngic sasawa witicamau kecgec yenigarengyunuudeac demiec. Nga ua sasawa imoc yeng meec.
Anu
Anu faka imoc fingerec imocac ngadeau Aigita ngictau Pareco yeac wainggareng nga icsogong oho ohogareng yeri kopocsic meficgema ngickunengngira Aigita ngictauac ngaba meficgemioc.
Meficgemiec Pareco ye uangichora wainggareng yeneac enaratoa nga icsogong oho ohongic yeneac enaratoa yereac herea buu
witicamau faiyuruec. Witicama imoc wasaingic Pareco garenggekecgec yeneac kaptenggac amau feec. Anu Yosef ye witicama imohaingoc witicngic kefec.
Anu wasaingic yeni Pareco garenggekecgec yeneac kaptengngina ye Yosefngo ngic yohockang imoc garengyuruudeac deu ye yereac enac tofoc tofoho kefec. Anu yeri witicamau naso herea isoc kefoc.

Ammanu naso monnu tofocnac mocgungoc Aigita ngictauac wainggareng nga icsogong oho oho gareng witicamau faiyurugec taroc yeri gaukpefing henoc. Mong ye gaukpefing siriha mong henec nga mong ye siriha mong henec nga gaukpefingngira imocac hania mong mong anec.
Hemmaec ama wereckenu Yosef ye yereac ama manau emma yerenu ubaebic siric taroc.
Ifi yeremma ye Parecoac uangic yegoc kunengnginaac amau witicngic kefoc yeri kpesiyemecma yofi deec, “Ngeri yaguc nocac ubamangang siric tacdape?”

Ifi deu meremmioc, “Neri gaukpefing hendic nga imocac hania edenuruudeac ngic mong mi kecde.” Ifi deec Yosefngo yofi deec, “Gaukpefinggac hania dede imoc Anutuac wiac. Ngeri siduc naric anenec negembade.”
Ifi deu wainggareng yeneac enaratoango gaukpefing henec imocac siduc Yosef ammiu negenec, “Ni gaukpefing yofi hendua waing witic mong neac kicfu nandac
imohai fawa harebecfu sera bic erema dzuria kpema fora imoc bic gbariagoc amma kpauedac.
Anu ni Parecoac kpakenec marinau mema namma waing kpauedac imoc mesima medzohoba Parecoac kpakenecfu kemeu mariau faiba medac.”
Ifi deu Yosef ye yofi dema edeec, “Imocac hania yofi, fawa harebec imoc uameme harebec.
Uameme harebec wisickeu Parecongo orucga miacma uagau monggoc faiguude nga ge warac wainggareng enara kecma Parecoac kpakenec mariau faikecnec ifingoc monggoc amma kecnade.
Ifi amma ubangerecgoc kecma ine neacnec negensima ubangerec anemma neac siduc Pareco edebesena ifi amma meficnuna witicama yomoc wama mabesare.

Foracngoc, ni hebiraiongic yeneac bangecfunac. Anu ngic yeneng sing ferahema fainugec goa yeneng menuma yei hagec. Nga yei ifingoc faka mangana mong mi ambareng witicamau bangec usu usuya manau emu yombong fainugec.”

Anu icsogong oho ohongic yeneac enaratoa ye Yosefngo gaukpefinggac hania gombunga dekperagiec ifi hemma yofi dema edeec, “Ni gaukpefing henduangoc imoc yofi, ni sakac harebec orucnau witiu witiu faima medua. Imoc yeneac manau icsogong witflawango memea tarec.
Sakac hanac hanahea tarec imohai Parecoac yaka flawa nga icsogong songea hania hania mengerema oho ohoya tacmanu neng yeneng hama nedau.”
Ifi deu Yosef ye turunga yofi meremmiec, “Imocac hania yofi, sakac harebec imoc uameme harebecngoc.
Uameme harebec wisickeu Parecongo deu yeni orucga ubagausing herecgema sebiga icfu gbedicgugec nanna neng yeneng hama fusiga negecde.”

Anu uameme harebec wisickeu Parecoac fingec fingecnaso anu enac tofoc tofohofora sasawa yeneac yakatoa ohoma deu enacurec negec. Ye enac tofoc tofohofora yeneac botucfunac wainggareng yeneac enaratoa nga icsogong oho ohongic yeneac enaratoa yereac orucngira miacma yofi anec.
Ye wainggareng yeneac enara kpakeneha monggoc miudeac uaya mengereu ye hanahema kpakenec monggoc Parecoac mariu faiec.
Amma icsogong oho ohongic yeneac enaratoa ye ine Yosefngo gaukpefingngiraac hania edeyuruec, ifi isoc ngictaungo uangicfora edyunuu gbedickegec nanec.
Anu wainggareng yeneac enaratoa ye ine Yosef mi negensima nigeckpeu kefec.
Kecma kifa yohockang wisickeu Parecongo gaukpefing mong yofi henec. Ye dokuu
burumaka kuneng seweng siricngina gombunga amma fusitoanginagoc yombong anu sebingina pososoc yeni dokuunac erema dokuac kpindzing nema nanggec.
Ammanu burumaka seweng monggoc dokuunac eregec imoc yeni pandzeng homedzonga yombong. Anu yeni buramaka warac warac eregec yenigoc nanggec.
Ammanu burumaka pandzeng homedzonga imoc yeni burumaka kuneng fusitoanginagoc amma sebingina pososoc imoc gbokoyunudacgec. Ifi hemma Pareco ye gaunac gborima yarec.
Amma monggoc fema gaukpefing mong yofi henec, wit foragoc mong erema nanec imocac fora seweng kuneng yombong amma gombunga yombong erema nanec.
Ngade monggoc torokpema henu wit foragoc seweng monggoc eregec imoc yeni kapiabisic bisic wenactoa nga firang gereagoc kpema dzeu dzangge dzanggea ifia isoc kapia yombong anggec.
Anu fora kapia seweng imoc yeneng fora kuneng amma gombunga imoc gbokoyunudacgec. Anu Parecongo gborima yacma yofi negenec, “Ni gaukpefing fora hendua.”
Ifi anggec wainggareng yeneac enaratoango Pareco yofi dema edeec, “Ni yaguc kopocsicna negensiduae.
Pareco, ge enac tofoc tofohongicfocga neneac herebu negemma icsogong oho oho yeneac enara amma ni, neri wasaingic yeni Pareco ge garengguma kecdae yeneac kaptenggac amau witicamau fainurunec.
Witicamau kecma naso monnu tofocnac monnu neri nerahafoc gaukpefing henic nga gaukpefinniraac siriha imoc tembuc tembuc anec.

Anu naso imohai hebiraiomedac mong ye wasaingic Pareco, ge garengguandae yeneac kapten Potifar yeac wanacngic yeng nerigoc kefec. Anu gaukpefing henic imocac edede yeng hania mendzicma edenuruec. Anu gaukpefinnira henic isoc edede yeng hania tembuc tembuc mendzicma edenuruec.
Anu edenuruec ifi isoc yombong fingerec. Ni monggoc uanau fainugec nga icsogong oho oho yeneac enara ye ine ubia herecgema sebia meemma gbedickegec.”

Ifi deu Parecongo negemma Yosef haudeac deu imohaingoc yeni witicamaac bangec usu usuya imocac manaunac wangecma yearu hagecdeac deec. Deu yosef ye ngebacdzoya merecgema wamba mong heima Parecoaru kenec.

Kenu Parecongo yofi dema edeec, “Ni gaukpefing mong hendua amma imocac hania mongngo mong negentegecma mi edenudau. Anu geac ine yofi degec negendua, ‘Ngicngac yeneng gaukpefing hemma edegugec geng hania dekperagiyemmeannec.’ ”
Ifi deu Yosefngo yofi meremmiec, “Pareco, ni neannaoc debadeacsoc mi ande. Nga ge naric kecnadeac Anutungo yoac turunga edegubeso.”
Ifi deu Parecongo Yosef yofi dema edeec, “Ni gaukpefinnu doku tegiau nandua.
Namma hemba dokuunac burumaka kuneng seweng siricngina gombunga amma fusitoanginagoc yombong anu sebingina pososoc yeni erema dokuac kpindzing nema nandau.
Nammagec imoc yeneac ngadenginau hemba burumaka sewengngoc pandzeng homedzonga yombong amma sicnginasac ifiango eredau. Ni burumaka homedzonga ifia Aigita bangectoau mong mi yenenai.
Anu burumaka seweng pandzeng homedzonga imoc yeneng burumaka kuneng seweng waraima eregec imoc gbokoyunudacgec.
Gbokoyunudacma yeni warac warac homedzonga nanggec ifi isocngoc nandacgec. Anu gbokoyunugec imoc mongngo naric mi negenude. Ni gaukpefing ifi hemma gborima yacdua.”
“Yacma monggoc fema mong yofi hendua, wit mong erema nandac imoc hania mocgu nga erema fora seweng kuneng amma gombunga yombong anec.
Imocac ngadeau witfora sewengngoc yenemba eredau. Anu yeni gbangge gbanggea nga kapiabisic bisic nga wenactoa amma firang gereagoc kpema dzeu dzangge dzanggea anggec.

Anu witfora kapic kapic seweng imoc yeneng fora gombunga seweng gbokoyunudacdau. Anu ni sesememengic mosocfaka amma wiac hengandae imoc edeyunuba yenearunac mongngo gaukpefing imocac hania mong mi edenudac.”
Ifi deu Yosef ye Pareco yofi dema edeec, “Pareco, ge gaukpefing yohockang hendang imocac hania mocgu ande. Anutungo faka mong meudeac edegudac.
Burumaka gombunga seweng imoc kifa seweng nga witfora gombunga seweng imoc kifa sewengngoc ande. Imocac gaukpefing yohockang imoc yeri mocgu andape.

Anu burumaka pandzeng homedzonga seweng ngade eregec imoc kifa seweng. Nga wit seweng wenactoa amma firang gereagoc kpema dzeu dzangge dzanggea nga kpakparua imocac hania yofi, bodinaso fingecma kifa seweng feude.
Pareco, ni imocac ge yofi dema edeguduae Anutu ye faka meudeac ge edzacgudac.
Negennec, Aigita bangectoau kifa seweng semeng homac yombong fingecma feude.

Anu semengtoagoc kekecac naso wisickeu semeng kpac andaru herehomegoc kecmina kifa sewengngoc wisickeude. Naso imohai Aigita bangecfu semengtoagoc kefing imoc nigecnunuu boditoango bangec memanganeude.
Boditoa imohai fingerude imoc ebic monggoc anudeac semengtoa waraima fingerude imoc nigecyunuude.
Anu Pareco, Anutungo atac yohockang gaukpefing hania mocgu imoc edzacguu hendang imocac hania yofi, ye imoc meseridac anu imoc bic yombong fingerude.”
“Imocac Pareco, ge ngic mong negen negenga gombunga amma negen negentegehagoc meficgema Aigita bangec garenggeudeac faibesena.
Anu bangecac enara goa ifingoc faiyununa yeni kifa seweng semengtoagoc kecgecde naso imohai Aigita bangecfu yaka guru 5 imohacnac guru mocgu imoc faigec yeneac mariu kembeso.
Anu kifa gombunga hagecde imohai yeni wit megecdesoc mekpedzuc amma Pareco geac mariu faigec tacbeso. Ifi anggec taongtoatoaninasoc yakagoc anggecde.
Faigec tarudeu yakatohongnginau yaka soha tarude. Anu Aigita bangecfu bodi kifa seweng femanungoc bangecnina naric mi kpac anude.”
Pareco nga uangicfora yeni yoac imocac negenggec ngereu
yeng yofi dema edeyunuec, “Nenang ngic yomoc isoc Anutuac Asugoc kecde ifia mong naric mi meficgenide.”
Ifi dema yeng Yosef yofi dema edeec, “Anutungo yoac imoc sasawa edegudarecac ngic negen negenggoc nga negen negentegecgoc ge isoc ifia mong mi kecdae.
Imocac ge amanaac gareng faigubade nga ngicngacfocna yeni geac yoac modacdacbisia. Mocgu imoc ine yofi, ngictau tatacna imocngo ine neanna ambeso.”
Ifi dema ringa ngictau ongayagoc imoc mariaunac hesima Yosefac mariu heu kemeec amma wamba linengkporucngo

Amma Parecongo deu Yosefe ye Aigita bangecac ngic kuneng kpete yohockanggac keretac imohai emma kenec. Kenu ngic yeneng waraima kemma yofi dema kpacgec, “Fafoc heimigec!” Ifi amma Aigita bangectoa imocac enaratoa anudeac faima
Yosef yofi dema edeec, “Ni Pareco, neng yofi deduae Aigita bangectoau ngicngac yeni geac marabeau kecma geac yoac modacbisia.”
Anu Pareco ye Yosefac kpara Tsafenat Pacenea kparec amma On amaunac sesememengic kpara Poti Fera yeac naroanga kpara Asenat yeac enema anudeac miec. Nga Yosef ye Aigita bangec henudeac yerecgekefec.
Yosef ye kifaya 30 ammanu Aigita ngictau Parecoac kicfu nanec. Anu ye Pareco wama keretafu kemma Aigita bangec sasawa yerecgedarec.
Anu kifa seweng imocac manau bangecngo semeng meficgeec imoc wiac engena yombong.

Ifi anu Yosef ye kifa seweng imocac manau Aigita bangecfu semeng sasawa feec imoc kpedzucnegecdeac edeyunuec. Taontoatoa fekenec imoc yeneac ngadenginau semeng ua fekenec imohacnac semeng mekpedzuc amma taongtoatoanginasoc semengamau faigec tarec.
Yosef ye ifi amma wit nga barliac semeng homac yombong tohongamatoayau kpedzucneu enec. Imoc kondunnu sangi fede ifi isoc feecac amma kpete meudeacsoc mi anu waec.
Asenat ye On amaunac sesememengic Poti Fera yeac naroanga. Anu bodiac kifa mi hamanungoc yeng Yosefac medachora yohockang meyuruec.
Anu Yosef ye yofi deec, “Anutungo meficnuu ebicna sasawa nga mannaac arengfora nigecnuec.” Ifi dema warac medahaac kpara Manasse
Nga ngademedaha fingerec yeac negemma yofi deec, “Anutungo bangec yomohai ebicgoc kecbareng imoc hemma mesahenude.” Ifi dema yeac kpara Efraim
Anu Aigita bangecfu kifa seweng semengtoagoc naso imoc wisickeec.
Anu Yosefngo deec ifi isoc fingeru kifa sewenggac bodinaso hanaheec. Ammanu bangec sasawau boditoa fingerec nga Aigita bangectoau yeni semeng mong mi hofocgec.
Kecma Aigita bangecfu ngicngac yeni herenginaac homema Pareco yakaac kiacmigec Parecongo aigitangicngac sasawa yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ngeni Yosefaru kenggec yeng dafi deude imoc modacbisia.”
Anu bodi imocngo bangectoa sokodacma feu Yosefngo yakaama nagungina witima semeng sueu aigitangicngac yeni bummegec. Amma bodi imoc Aigita bangecfu ebira yombong feec.
Anu boditoango bangectoa bangec sasawa sokodarecac amma yeni sasawa semeng bummebesonga dema Aigita bangecfu Yosefaru kenggec.
Negendae, Aigita bangecfunac yaka naric bummenide ni ifi degec negenduae. Kecma nenang yakaac amma homebinggac ngeni imohai kemma yakanina bummema hagec.”
Ifi deu Yosef dacfora teng yeni wit bummegecdeac Aigita bangecfu kenggec.
Mamango Yosef munia Benyamin yeac yofi negenec ye kecma sinnu kemma ebic witiau embacac Ifi negemma segerema dacforasac sueyunuec.
Kenacan bangecfu boditoa anecac Isracel medacfora yeni ngicngachabu yenigoc wit bummegecdeac kenggec.

Anu ye dacfora yenemma bic negenec anu ye mi negengyunude siric amma yoac gereagoc kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni dahacnac hadae?” Ifi deu yeni yofi meremmigec, “Neni Kenacan bangecfunac yaka bummenideac hadimbe.”
Yosef ye dacfora yenemma negenec nga dacfora yeneng ine ye hemma mi negenggec.
Nga ye warac yeneac gaukpefing henec imoc negensima yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ngeni bangecnina kpaeya kpac eng fede imoc sufu sufuu hennegeng anggecdeac hadau me?”
Ifi deu yeni yofi meremmigec, “Kunennina, ifi kpac, neni enac tofoc tofohofocga yaka bummenideac hading.
Neni ngic dindingac ngic mocguac medacfora sasawa. Enac tofoc tofohofocga neni sufu sufuu bangec hennegeng annideac mi hading.”
Ifi degec yeng yofi deec, “Kpac, ngeni bangec yomoc damohaibigeng kpaeya kpac eng feu hemma negentegecgecdeac hadau.”

Ifi deu yeni yofi meremmigec, “Negennec, enac tofoc tofohofocga neni Kenacan bangecfunac. Neni dacmuna ngic mocguac medacfora 12ngo fingering. Ngicdzianina ye manninagoc tacdac nga munanina mong ye mi kecde.”
Ifi degec Yosefngo monggoc deec, “Ni bic dedua ngeni bangec sufu sufuu hennegeng anggecdeac hadau ifi isoc ande.
Imocac yoacnginaac hania fingectegecbeso. Ni Pareco kecde yeac kpacfu isingngunuma deseriduae, Munangina dzia mi hesickema hagecdeu ngeni bangec yomohanac monggoc mi dzigenema kenggecde.

Amma yoacnginaac hania fingectegerudeac ngenearunac mong suegec kemma munangina ngicdzia hesickema habeso nga goa ngeni ine witicamau tacgecde. Ngeni yoac fora dedae me kpac imoc hembade. Nga yoacngina fora mi andeu Pareco kecde yeac kpacfu deseriduae ngeni bangec sufu sufuu hennegeng anggecdeac hadau.”
Ifi dema witicamau faiyunuu uameme harebec ihai tacgec.
Anu uameme harebec ammanu Yosefngo yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ni Anutu eweheimianduae imocac ngeni kekecngina onggonggegecdeac yofi ambisia.
Ngeni ngic dindingac andaeu ine dacngina mong yei witicamau wagec taru goa ngeni wiacfocngina yakaac homeckpai ambauac yeneac wit mema kembisia.
Kemma ine yoacngina fora ande me kpahac, imoc negembadeac munangina nearu wangecma habisia. Ifi anggecdeu kekecngina onggonggegecde.” Anu yeni yoara modacma ifi anggec.

Anu yeni yenaocngoc denegeng amma yofi degec, “Foracngoc, nenang kopocsicninagoc. Faka munanina ammiing imocac turunga hanemmede. Ye kpebeso anni wosea damu anec imoc hemma negening nga ye onggonggenideac derecgeu yoara negemma ioc baoc amma waing. Imocac ebic kuneng yomoc medimbe.”
Ifi degec Recuwengngo yoac yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ngeni kopocsic mi meficgebisia medac imoc faka mangana mi ammibisia ifi edengunuba yoacna wagec. Negendae, yeac sacac turunga yagucnoc hanemmede.”
Anu Yosef ye yenigoc yoac deudeac dema yoac mereng mong deu botucnginau tacma yoac merengkefecac yeni Yosef ye yoacngina negenec imoc mi negenggec.
Ifi anu ye wayunuma kemma kiarec. Kiaru wisickeu dzigenema hama yenigoc denengeng monggoc anggec. Amma deu Simecon mema kicnginau witickegec.

Anu yeng uangicfora yofi anggecdeac edeyunuec, “Ngeni torunginau wit figec kemema wakedaru dzongina sasawa monggoc meremma torunginasoc banidacma singgac yaka momoc yemmedacgec.” Deu yeni imocacsoc ayemmegec.
Ifi ayemmedacgec yeni witngina mema donggi witiau faidacma emma kenggec.
Kengkecma sing botuhau fegecdeac yenearunac mongngo donggia yaka gumeudeac toru enara yungecma henu dzoya monggoc toru enarau banigec tarec.

Imoc hemma dacmunafora yofi dema edeyunuec, “Negendae, yeni dzona meremma toru enarau monggoc baridau.” Ifi deu yeni kerectegec yombong amma kengecyunuu dzonongngina fedeu engemma yofi denegeng anggec, “Anutungo noc faka anemmede.”
Anu yeni Kenacan bangecfu mangngina Yacakowaru kengsikema faka fingecdarec imocac siduc ammima yofi degec,
“Bangec kening imocac enaratoa ye yoac gereagoc anemmema yofi deec, ‘Ngeni bangec sufu sufuu hennegeng anggecdeac hadau me?’
Ifi deu yofi dema meremmiing, ‘Neni ngic dindingac. Neni ama bangec sufu sufuu hennegeng annideac mi hading.
Neni dacmuna 12, imoc ngic mocguac medacfora. Mong imoc mi kecde nga munanina ngicdzia ye ine yaguc Kenacan bangecfu manninagoc kecde.’

Ifi deni bangec imocac enaratoa yeng yofi dema edenunudac, ‘Ngeni ngic dindingac me kpac, imoc negembadeac yofi anggec haniangina fingectegeru hembade. Ngenearunac dacngina mong yei wagec tarude nga goa ngeni wiacfocngina yakaac homeckpai ambauac yaka mema kenggec.

Ngeni sufu sufuu bangec hennegeng anggecdeac mi hadau amma ngeni ngic dindingac imocac hania hentegecbadeac ine munangina ngicdzia wangecma nearu habisia. Ifi anggec ni dacngina monggoc ngemmebade nga ngeni bangec yomohai naric kengha anggecde.’ ”
Ifi dema yeni torunginasoc wit hetinggegec dzongina sangoyagoc meficgedacgec. Meficgema dzongina hemma dedamu amma kengec kuneng anggec.

Anu mangngina Yacakowngo yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ngeni medacfocna wangecnudacgecde, Yosef mi kecde amma Simecon ye yei mi kecde anu yaguc ine Benyamin ifingoc wangecnuma kembesonga dedae. Imoc sasawa fingeru imocac ubaebic kuneng meduae.”

Ifi deu Recuwengngo yoac turunga yofi dema meremmiec, “Ni ye monggoc mi hesicke habadeu imocac turunga neac medachocna naric kpebucyurubesena. Ge medacga naric neac mariu faina. Anu ni ye mekemma monggoc hesickema habade.”

Deu Yacakowngo ine yofi deec, “Dara homeu tembucneha kecande. Medacna ye ngenigoc naric mi kenude. Ngeni sinnu kenggecde naso imohai ebic mong fingecmiudeu ni ubamangangngo mehomenuu orucna yegbonnagoc homecamau kembadeu imoc ngeneng anenggecac ifi fingerude.”
Anu bodi imoc bangecnginau ebira yombong feec.
Anu yeni Aigita bangecfunac yaka mehagec imoc nekecgec kpac anu mangnginango yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ngeni yakanina goa monggoc bummegecdeac kembisia.”
Imocac ge munanina nenigoc kenudeac desinadeu ine neni naric kemma yaka bummegennide.
Ngic imoc ye yofi deec, ‘Ngeni munangina nearu mi hesicke hagecdeu neac kicmesuna monggoc mi henggecde.’ Imocac yofi ande ge ye segerenadeu neni mi kennide.”
Ifi deu Isracelngo yofi deec, “Ngeni nocac munangina mong kecde imoc dema edegecac ebic witinau faigec?”

Ifi deu yofi meremmigec, “Ngic imoc ye neni nenang nga wiacfocnina neneac piti yombong dekpesi anemmema yofi deec, ‘Mangngina kecdengoc me? Amma munangina mong kecde me kpac? Ifi dema dekpesi anemmeu turunga merening. Nga ye munangina wangecma habisia deude imoc mi negentegering.’ ”

Anu Yehudango mama Isracel yofi dema edeec, “Medac neac mariu faina ine neni kennideac efaima yacma kenni. Kemma nenang amma nambaracbisic bisicfocnina kekecninagoc amma naric mi homenideac yakanina bummehanide.
Ni neannaoc medacga garenggema kemma monggoc hesicke habadeac deseriduae. Mi merenggembadeu ebic imocac turunga neac witinau febeso nga ni kopocsic imocgoc kecbareng bangecfu kekecnasona wisickebeso.
Ge imocac negengyohoc mi ambang debac neni kengha anni yohockang bic ambac.”

Ifi deu mangngina Isracelngo yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ifi ambesonga dedaeu ine yofi ambisia, bangec yomohai wiac goa fingecande imohacnac wiac goa gombunga gombunga meisinggema torunginau banima mema kemma ngic imoc mibisia. Imoc kerec homuna gombunga, hani,
Amma dzo gboria nga silwadzo warac torunginau banigec imoc momoc mekembisia imoc nigecyunuu mesufuma baningemmegec gedang.
Ifi anggec wisickeu munangina wangecma ngic yearu kembisia.

Anutu Kuctoa mingina yeng ngic imocac negen negennu ua meu ye ngeneac ubia manganebeso. Amma dacngina nga Benyamin merengyuruu ngenahafocngoc habisia. Kebungo nambarachocna kpac anecdeac negenecfu ifi fingerude.”
Anu yeni enaratoa yeac ubangerecac wiac amma dzo esea nga gboria momoc mema yacma Benyamin wangecma Aigita bangecfu kemma Yosefac kicfu nanggec.
Nanggec yeng Benyaming yenigoc nanu hemma amagarenga yofi dema edeec, “Ngic imoc yeni yaguc wenacfu nigoc yaka negecde. Ge amau wangecyunu kemma yang mong kpema yakagoc ohobesena.”
Anu ngic ye Yosefngo deec isocngoc andacma ngic imoc wangecyunuma amaac totong manau enggec.

Yeni Yosefac totong manau wangecyunu enggecdeac anggec kengecyunuu yofi degec, “Warac warac hani yeni toruninau silwadzo monggoc meremma baninemmegec dzo imocac amma ama yomohai wangecnunu hadae. Nenang yei eng tacmina yeni erema nunuma witicnunuma wanacfocngina amma kecnideac degecde nga donggifocnina ifingoc wangecnunugecde.”
Ifi dema Yosefac amagareng ye naguu nanu yearu kemma yofi degec,
“Kunennina neni warac yaka bummebeso haing
naso imohai kengkecma amabangec botuha monnu feing imohai kemma torunina yungecma henni dzonina sasawa yakatoruac enarau tacdarec. Imocac amma dzo imocac ebic meinggac yaguc monggoc mema hading.
Amma yaka gboria bummenideac dzonina momoc mema hading. Dzonina merang meremma toruninau baniec imoc neni mi negendimbe.”
Anu Yosefac ama manau hesicyunuma emma doku fima hama yemmeu yeni haningina dzuacgec nga donggifocngina yaka gumecyunugec.
Ifi ammagec ye amau hau yeni yeac wiac meemma mima kicmesungina bangecfu hetutuckema ngonducnemigec.
Ngonducnemigec yeng ruae yenigoc feudeac dema dekpesi ayemmema yofi deec, “Ngeni mangngina ngickpengeng yeac hanahema edenugec ye kecde me?”
Ifi deu yofi meremmigec, “Enac tofoc tofohofocga mannina kecdengoc ye ebiha kpac.” Ifi dema kicmesungina bangecfu hetutuckema ngonducnemigec.
Anu ye kic fima munia Benyaminggoc nonggongira mocguac hemma yofi deec, “Munangina ngicdziaac edenugecmoc ye imoc me?” Ifi dema yofi deec, “Medacna, Anutungo gombunga anggembeso.”
Yosef ye ifi dema munia hemma ubia homac manganeu kiacbeso ammiu wayunuma mama yengena ama mana monnu emma kiarec.
Kiaru wisickeu kickumaya mekerenggema ubia sawereu monggoc mama yofi deec, “Yakanina faigec neni.”

Ifi deu yeni yeac yaka tembuc faimigec yeneac ifingoc tembuc faiyemmegec amma aigitangic yegoc yaka momoc negec yeni ifingoc tembuc yemmegec. Imoc yofiac, aigitangic yeni hebiraiongic yenigoc momoc tacma yakanene imocac modzongina tiande. Ifiac amma aigitangic yeni yenigoc yaka momoc mi negec.

Ifi anu Yosef noboc taru yeni noboc dacngina waracmedacac kpac mekefec yearunac hanahema arenggoc tacgec makecma ngicdziangina yearu wisickeec yeni fingecgec isoc tacgec. Anu ngic yeni ifi hemma kerectegec amma yenaocngoc engemma negenggec wiac kuneng yombong anec.
Ifi tacgec Yosefngo deu yengena tebounac yaka mema yemmegec. Nga goa yeneac mocgu mocgu faima Benyaminggac ine 5 faigec. Anu yeni yegoc yaka nga waingdoku nema songogoc tacgec.
Anu neac kpakenecna silwango memea imoc ine ngicdzianginaac toru enarau wit bummeudeac dzo mehadac imocgoc momoc banimibesena.” Anu amagareng ye Yosefngo yoac deec ifi isoc andarec.
Anu ama wereckenu yeni donggifocnginagoc faiyunugec kenggec.

Kemma taongtoa wama kenggec sing mi hereemanu Yosefngo amagarenga yofi dema sueec, “Ge yacma ngic imoc modacyunuma kenna. Kemma meficyunuma yofi debesena, ‘Neni faka gombunga angemmeding anu ngeni nocac faka mangana andau? Ngeni kunennaac kpakenec silwango memea imoc hamangec medau.
Kunenna ye kpakenec imohai doku neande anu imocngo kpefingyoac heficgeande. Ammanu ngeni faka imoc mangana yombong andau.’ ”
Ifi deu ye kemma meficyunuma yoac imoc edeyunuec.
Edeyunuu yeneng yoac turunga yofi meremmigec, “Kunennina, ge nocac yoac ifi edenununec? Enac tofoc tofohofocga neni faka ifia naric mi annide.
Negennec, neni warac torunina enaraunac dzo meficgeing imoc Kenacan bangecfunac monggoc mema dzigenema haing. Imocac dafi kunenggaac amaunac silwa me gol hamangec menide?
Enac tofoc tofohofocga nenearunac mong me mong yearunac imoc meficgenadeu ye kpebucgebisia nga goa neni ine kunennina, geac wanacngicfora amma kecbisina.”
Ifi degec yeng yofi merengyemmeec, “Naric, dedae isoc ambade nga sifu yofi ambade, monggarunac meficgebade yengsac wanacngicna anude nga goa ngeni ine kopocsicngina kpacac onggongngunubade.”
Ifi deu yeni sasawango torungina bic yombong bangecfu faima enara yungecdacgec.
Yungecdacgec ye hanahema warac dacnginaarunac hofoc hofoc kengkecma ngicdzianginaaru kenec. Kemma yeac toruunac kpakenec meficgeec.
Meficgeu yeni ubaebic mema ngakpingina mesuckema torugedangngina donggiu faima monggoc dzigenema taonnu kenggec.
Kemma henggec Yosef ye ameaungoc tarec. Tacmanu Yehuda nga dacmunafora yeni kemma hemma kicmesungina bangecfu hetutuckema fegec.
Ifi anggec yeng yofi dema kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni noc faka andau? Ni ngic yofia, ni kpefing amma faka sufu sufuu angkecdae naric meficgebade. Ngeni imoc negembau imoc ngereebac.”

Ifi deu Yehudango yofi deec, “Neni kunennina geac yoac turunga mong naric mi denide me Anutungo enac tofoc tofohofocga neneac kopocsic mekperagiecfu neni kopocsicnina dafi meickenide. Kunennina negennec, neni yaguc geac wanacngicfocga andacdimbe neni nga ngic meracac toruunac kpakenec meficgedau imoc nenahafoc sasawa yei kecnide.”
Ifi deu yeng yofi deec, “Ifi kpac, imoc naric mi ambade. Ngic meracac toruunac kpakenec meficgeding yengsac wanacngicna amma kecbeso. Goa ngeni ine ruaegoc mangnginaaru kembisia.”
Ifi deu Yehudango wegenac kemma yofi deec, “Kunenna, ge Pareco isocngoc kecnec. Nga ni enac tofoc tofohongicga geac kedzacfu yoac deba negemma ngaba kuneng mi anembesena.
Kunenna, ge warac enac tofoc tofohofocga yofi dema kpesinemmenec, ‘Ngeni mangngina nga munangina mong kecde me?’

Ge ifi dena neni yofi edeguing ‘Neni mannina kecde ye ngickpengeng ammaguc munanina ngicdzia kpeficgeec. Yeac dacyombonga homeec. Nonggongirango medac yohockangsac meyuruecac amma ye tembuha kecde nga mamango yeac songo kuneng yombong negengande.’
Anu ge yofi dema edenununec, ‘Ngeni ngicdziangina wangecma hagec hembesare.’
Kunennina, ge ifi dena neni yofi edeguing ‘Medac imoc ye mama naric mi wama haude. Ifi anudeu manggac ye homeude.’
Ifi deni ge enac tofoc tofohongicfocga yofi dema edenununec, ‘Ngeni munangina ngicdzia mi wangecma hagecdeu neac kic yei monggoc mi henggecde.’
Ifi dena neni dzigenema kemma ge yoac denec imoc mannina ededaring.
Anu kecma manninango yofi edenunuec, ‘Ngeni monggoc kemma yaka kapianec monggoc bummehabisia.’
Ifi deu yofi deing, ‘Neni tembucnina naric mi kennide. Munanina ngicdzia nenigoc hau nenahafoc kennide. Ye nenigoc mi kenudeu neni ngic imocac kicmesuya naric mi hennide.’ ”
“Ifi deni mannina enac tofoc tofohogango yofi dema edenunuec, ‘Enennango medac yohockangsac meyuruec imoc ngeni negendae.
Nga mong imoc wanuma kemma sufuec. Sufuu ni yofi deai, “Wasaiyang yeneng ye kibucgema nedacgec.” Imocac ye monggoc mi hemma kefaingo kecduae.
Anu medac yomoc kecde ye ifingoc wangecnuma kenggec faka mong fingecmiudeu ngeneng ubamangang meficgenenggecde imoc ni yegbonnagoc homecamau kembade.’ ”
“Imoc yofiac, medaha ngicdzia imoc wosea yombong. Anu ni medac yea kpac enac tofoc tofohoga mannina yearu dzigenebadeu imoc mi ngereeude.
Ye medaha yomoc mi mekenni henudemoc neni ebic meficgemini mannina ye ngickpengenggac amma ubamangangngo memau yegbongagoc homema homecamau kenude.

Anu enac tofoc tofohoga ni medac imoc garenggebadeac manna deserima edema yofi deai, ‘Ni monggoc hesickema mi habadeu ine geac kicfu kopocsicnagoc amma kecbareng bangecfu kekecnasona wisickebeso.’ Ifi deai.
Imocac amma enac tofoc tofohoga ni medac imocac turunga kunenna geac wanacngic amma kecbadeac negennena. Kecba medac imoc ye dacfora yenigoc dzigenema kembeso.
Nga ni medac yea kpac mannaaru naric mi kembade. Ni manna ebicfu enu hembaiac. Hemma ebic imoc tofohobadeacsoc mi anduae.”
Edeyunuma seriangoc kiaru aigitangic yeni negenggec nga Parecoac amau tacgec yeni ifingoc negenggec.
Anu ye dacfora yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ni Yosef, manna kecde me?” Ifi deu dacfora yeac kicfu nanggec yeni kengecngo mehomeyunuu yoac turunga mong mi merenggec.
Anu ye dacfora yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ngeni nearu wegenac hagec.” Deu yeni yearu wegenac kenggec yofi deec, “Ni munangina Yosef. Ngeni Aigita bangecfu suenugec hayai ni yomocnoc.”
Yofinenggac bangecninau bodinasou kecmina kifa yohockang bic wisickede. Nga kifa 5 fede imocac manau bangec mong mi fukegecde nga semengfora mong mi mekpedzuc anggecde.
