Nga neng yoac sasawa dederecge angemmekefai, ngeni imoc hafoangoc modacdacgecdeac kpouyemmebisia. Amma negendae, ni wenaha wenaha ngenigoc kecbare naso wisickebesande.”
Yomoc Yesu Kristo Anutuac Medac, yeac siduc gombung hanahema fingerec,
imocac siduc. Profete Yesaiango yofi ohoec,
“Negenggec, ni enacdedena sueba yeng waraigemma singga memengere anudeac habesande.
Nga bangec kisiu kpakpac mong yofi fingerude, ‘Ngeni
Nga ngicngac yeni Yudaia provins nga Yerusaleng taonnunac amanene yearu kenggec. Kemma kopocsicngina deficgemagec yeng Yodang dokuu namma doku nadzicyemmeec.
Ye ngicngac yoac yofi edekpou ayemmeec, “Ngic neac ngadeu haude, yeac kucngo neac kuc ferahade. Ni ifiango ngonducnema yeac hanitabea witiha yungecba naric mi ngereeude.
Ni doku nadzicngemmeduae nga yeng hama Tiri Asungo nadzicngemmeude.”
Naso imohai Yesungo Nadzarete taong Gariraia bangec wama Yodang dokuu hasikeec. Hasikeu Yohanengo doku nadzicmiec.
Nadzicmiu Yesungo dokuunac eremanu imohaingoc kurumeng anggeu Asungo kebesacac siric amma yearu mau henec.
Hemmanu kurumennunac enacudumeng mong yofi fingeru negenec, “Ge neac songomedacna, ni gengsongo anggenduae.”
Nga imohaingoc Asungo Yesu sueu bangec kisiu kenec.
Kemma uameme 40 kecmanu Satangngo ye tobanggeec. Tobanggeu imohai kateyang yenigoc kecmanu angero yeneng henggareng ammigec.
yofi deec, “Naso bic hau Anutuac eucererengngo mewegenengunudeac ngeni ubangina dzigeneu siduc gombung negensinggegec.”
Anu Yesungo Gariraia dzohong tegiau kengkecma Simong nga munea Anderea yerenu yeri uficngira ukuma nanoc. Nocac yeri kondungyang meme ngic.
Yeremma Yesungo yofi edeyuruec, “Ngeri hama modacnuec ngic yeneng kondungyang meandae, ngeri ifi isoc ngicmeme ua meecdeac kpoungemecbade.”
Ifi deu yeri imohaingoc uficngira wama Yesu modaroc.
Nga yeni kapianec kemma Yesungo Dzebedaioac medachora Yakobo nga munea Yohane yerenec. Yeri gombau uficngira memengere amma taroc.
Tarec yeng yeremma kpacyuruu yeri negenoc. Negemma imohaingoc mangngira Dzebedaio nga uangicfora gombau tacmagec wayunuma Yesu modaroc.
Anu yeni Kafanaung taonnu kensikegec. Kensikemagec sabata naso anu Yesungo kpekpeturang amau emma Anutuac yoac kpouyemmeec.
Kpouyemmeu ngicngac yeneng kpoukpouyoara negemma imoc negenggec engena anec. Ye kpouyemmeec, imoc ngic uakibi mekecdae, yeneac siricfu kuhagoc amma mitiac negen negengngic yeneac dede isoc mi deec.
Anu naso imohaingoc kpekpeturang amau ngic mong asu seuhagocngo tacma arohoec.
“Yesu Nadzarete mingina, neneac wiac imoc geac mi ande. Ge memanganenununadeac hanec me? Ni gensiduaenoc, ge Anutuac kpetiac ngic.”
Ifi deu Yesungo asu seuhagoc ngaba ammima yofi edeec, “Ge waickema ngicfunac erema kenna!”

Kenu ngicngac sasawango kerectegec amma yenaocngoc kpesiemegec, “Imoc noc wiac? Imoc kpoukpou gboria nga yeng ua minginaac kuhagoc kpounemmeu asu seuhagoc ifingoc yoac edeyunuu yeni yoara negemma tofohogec.”
Nga siduhango Gariraia provinsiu bic kemma sokodarec.
Anu yeni kpekpeturang amaunac mama Yakobo nga Yohane yerigoc Simong nga Anderea yereac amau kenggec.
Kemma enggec, imohai Simong sefena sebigerec ammiu feec, imoc Yesu edegec.
Edegec Yesungo yearu kemma mariau mema miaru imohaingoc hafeia kpac anu yenenggareng ayemmeec.
Ifi anu wenac kiwa kemeu ama tofore hamanu ngicngac yeneng hafeigoc nga hadehade amma yafinggoc sasawa Yesuaru meyunu kenggec.
Nga taonggac ngicngac sasawa yeni ama naguyau kpedzucnegec.

Kpedzucnemagec Yesungo ngicngac hafeingina hania haniagoc mengereyunuma hadehade nga yafingngina homac kporarec. Nga hadehade nga yafing kporacyunuec, yeni haniaya negenggecac yoac degecdeac dederac ayemmeec.
Numuu Simong nga tosofora yeni ye hofockemma meficgema edegec, “Ngicngac sasawango ge hofocgudae.”
Ifi degec yofi edeyunuec, “Nenang taong goa wegenac tackende, imohai ifingoc kemma yoac edekpou ayemmebade. Nocac ua imocnoc mebadeac hadua.”
Ifi deu yeni Gariraia bangec yerecge kenggec. Kemma kpekpeturang amasoc yeng yoac edekpou ayemmema hadehade nga yafing kporacyunuec.
Anu ngic kubecserigoc mongngo yearu hama fafoc heima desambic ammima deec, “Geng negenna naric anu naric medzuacnubang.”
Ifi deu Yesungo ubea manganeu maria sinema ngic kpeserema yofi deec, “Ngereenadeac songona fede.”
Demanu imohaingoc kubeha mosiu sebia ngereec.
Ngereeu Yesungo ngic derahema suema yofi deec,

“Negenna, sebigau faka fingecdac, imocac ngic mong mi edebesena. Ge womonggareng yearu kemma sebiga edzahema Mosengo seseac deec, imocac sirihau modacma faibesena! Ge ifi faina yeneng sesega hemma negentegecgecde.”
Ifi deu yeng ine kemma siduc imoc sifu deyadiec. Imocac amma Yesungo taonnu fingec fingec monggoc mi enec. Ye ine ngadeau bangec kisiu kecmanu ngicngac noboc nobocnacngo yearu hakecgec.
Uameme goa wisickemanu Yesungo monggoc Kafanaung taonnu kenec. Kenu ngicngac homacngo imoc negemma ama wakema naguya hedzickemagec yeng Anutuac yoac edekpou ayemmeec.
Ammanu ngic 4 yeneng ngic mong hanimaria homemea tofohoma yearu mekenggec.
Mekenggec ngic homacngo nanggecac hoangau faigecdeac obohoma ama witiau enggec. Emma ama bubuya meickegec titinga fingerec. Fingeru yeni Yesu nanecfu imohai ngicpuring dzakeagoc faigec kemeec.
Kemeu Yesungo negen negensingngina hemma ngicpuring yofi edeec, “Medacna, kopocsicga imoc bic wawaya.”
Ifi deu mitiac negen negengngic goa ihai tacgec, yeneng ubanginau yofi negenggec.
“Ngic imoc ye nocac yoac ifi dema Anutu emmide! Anutu mocgungo kopocsic naric waude.”
Yeni ifi negenggec Yesungo ongaasuyau negengyemmema yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni nocac negen negeng ifia ubanginango negensidae?
Damocngo efea ande? Ngic puring yeac debesonga, ‘Kopocsicga bic wawaya ande’, me ‘Ge yacma tofoga mema kenna.’
Nga Ngicac Medac, yeng bangecfu kopocsic wawaac uayoac nga kuc femide, ngeni imoc negenggecdeac amma yofi deba.” Ye ifi dema ngicpuring yofi edeec,
“Ni edeguduae, ge yacma dzakega mema amagau kenna.”

Ifi deu imohaingoc ngic ye yacma dzakea mema ngicngac kicnginau kenec. Kenu ngicngac sasawango imoc hemma kpidohoma kerectegec amma Anutu dengerema degec, “Wiac yomoc mi hehennina yaguc fingeru hendimbe.”
Anu Yesungo ama imohacnac mama dzohong tegiau kenec. Kenu ngicngac homacngo yearu kenggec kpoukpou ua meec.
Nga kemma Lewi Arifaioac medac takesimeme ameau taru hemma yofi edeec, “Ge hama ni modacnuna!” Ifi deu yeng yacma modarec.
Kecma Yesungo Lewiac amau yaka nema tacmanu takesimeme ngic nga manganameme ngic homacngo Yesu nga medacfora yenigoc yaka momoc negec. Ngic ifia homacngo yeni modacyunuma kenggec.

Ifi anu Yesungo takesimeme nga manganameme yenigoc tacma yaka neu farisaio yenearunac mitiac negen negengngic goa, yeneng imoc hemma medacfora kpesiyemmegec, “Ye nocac takesimeme nga manganameme yenigoc yaka nede?”

Ifi degec Yesungo negemma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngicngac hafeingina kpac kecdae, yeni dotaac mi ayemmeude. Nga hafeinginagoc, yeneng ine dotaac ayemmeude. Nga ni ngicngac dindingac kpacyunubadeac mi mayai, kpac. Ni ine manganameme ngic kpacyunubadeac mayai.”

Yohaneac medacfora nga farisaio yakasege kecandae, yenearunac goango hama Yesu kpesimigec, “Yohane nga farisaio medacfocngina yeni yakasege angandae. Nga geac medacfocga yeneng nocac yaka sege mi angandae?”
Ifi kpesigec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Memeturang ngicngo tosofora yenigoc taru yeneng yakasege naric mi kecgecde. Monggoc deba, yeng yenigoc tacmanungoc yakasege naric mi kecgecde.
Kecma naso monnu ngic yeneng memeturanggac ngic yenearunac meickegecde, naso imohai yakasege anggecde.
Ngac mongngo ngakpi eseau kporucsusuc gboria mong mi kpebiude. Kporucsusu gboriango esea taiu dzamema titingtoa fingecbac.

Nga ngic mongngo waing gboria bokong yangseberango memea eseau naric mi kpeu kemeude, kpac. Waing gboriango bokong esea tindziru yerahafoc manganebaoc. Imocac waing gboria imoc bokong gboriau kpeu kemeude.”
Naso monnu sabata nasou Yesungo wit ua dzongiau sing modac kemmanu medacfora yeneng witfora mocgu mocgu merecgema megec.
Merecgegec farisaio yeneng degec, “Henna, yeni nocac sabata nasou faka mi angana andae?”

Abiatango womonggarengtoa kefec, naso imohai Dawidingo Anutuac womonnu enec. Emma ic sogong Anutuac sese faifaia, imoc menema uamedacfora ifingoc gumecyunuec. Nga ic sogong imoc womonggareng yenengsac naric negecde, ngictehec yeneng kpac.”
Ngicac Medac ye sabataac Kebu kecdengoc.”
Yesungo naso monnu kpekpeturang amau enu ngic mong maria noboc homemea, ye ihai tarec.
Nga ngic goa yeni Yesu yoacfu faigecdeac negensigec amma ngic imoc sabata nasou mengereude me kpac, imocac hembikecgec.
Hembikecgec Yesungo ngic marimangang yofi edeec, “Ge yacma botucninau nanna.”
ifi dema yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Sabata nasou noc faka naric ambesonga, faka gombunga me mangana? Amma homebeso andae, yeni agengngina tinide me yunuhomenide?” Ifi deu yeneng engsac ning kpegec.
Ning kpegec yeng ubaseringinaac negenghodungaima herea buu kic fikengfiha amma ngic yofi edeec, “Ge mariga sinena!” deu ngic ye maria sineu ngereec.
Ngereeu farisaio yeneng naso imohaingoc Herodeac arengfora yenearu ioha kemma dafiu mema kpegecdeac yoac dedzege anggec.
Anu Yesu nga medacfora yeni amabangec wama Gariraia dzohonnu kemmagec Gariraia bangecfunac habu kunengngo modacyunugec.

Ngicngac Yudaia bangecfunac nga Yerusaleng taonnunac amma Idumaia bangecfunac nga Yodang edibigeng amma Tiro nga Sidong bangecfunac, habutoa imoc yeni Yesungo faka sasawa meec, imocac siduc negemma yearu hagec.
Nga Ngicngac homacngo hasikema Yesu igockebauac medacfora yeneng wage wegenac faigecdeac edeyunuec.
Nga ye ngic homac mengereyunuu hafeigoc yeneng kemma kpeseregecdeac hefacemegec.
Nga asu seuhagoc yeneng Yesu hemma ngonducnema yofi dema kpacma degec, “Genoc Anutuac medac.”
Ifi degec hania dekperagibauac Yesungo dederac ayemmeec.
Anu ye tikiu emma medac goa ubango negengising ayemmeecmoc, deu yearu kenggec.
Kenggec medac 12 meisingyunuma aposoro kpac yemmeec. Yemmeu yeni yegoc kecmagec yoac edekpou ayemmegecde nga hadehade nga yafing kporacyemmegecdeac uayoac nga kuc yemmeec.
amma Dzebedaioac medachora Yakobo nga munea Yohane, yereac kpacngira Boanerges yemerec. Imocac titiha, parandanggac medac.
Nga Anderea amma Firipo nga Batoromaio amma Mataio nga Toma amma Yakobo, imoc Arifaioac medac nga Tadaio amma Simong Kananaio nga Yuda Karioto amaunac, yeng kecma Yesu kerereu megec.
Anu Yesungo amau kensikeu habutoango hama kpedzucnegec medacforagoc yakaneneac titing mong mi fingerec.
Wiacfora yeneng yofi negenggec, “Ye ubea sufude.” ifi dema megecdeac kenggec.
Ifi degec Yesungo kpacyunuma yoac heima yofi edeyunuec, “Satang yengenaocngoc dafi kporacemeude?
Bangec monggac ngicngac yeni ngaba angemema tohogecdeu bangec imocngo naric mi fekefude, kpac.
Nga amamana mocgungo tohoma ngaba angemeudeu amamana imocngo kpac anude.
Nga Satangngo tohoma yengenaocngoc kporacemeudeu ye ifingoc kpac anude.
Ngic mongngo ngic kuhagoc, yeac amau emma iwaiya naric mi wangerude, kpac. Ye ngic kuhagoc imoc witickemaguc amea manau emma iwaiya tacde, imoc naric wangerude.
Foracngoc, ngicngac yeni kopocsic hania hania angandae nga wiac hania haniaac deendema nga dedenggbaring angandae, kopocsic ifia sasawa, imocac wawa fede, imoc edengunuduae.
Nga ngic mongngo Tiri Asu denggbaringgeude, yeac kopocsic ine wawaya mi fede. Kopocsihaac turunga imoc fekengkecbesande.”
Yeneng degec, “Ye asu seuhagoc.” imocac amma yeng ifi edeyunuec.
Ifi degec Yesungo habu yeneac botucfu tacmanu ngicngac yeneng edegec, “Nonggo munafocga ngadeau namma ge hofocgudae.”
Ifi degec yeng merengyemmeec, “Damoc yeneng neac nonggo munafocna?”
Ifi dema yegoc momoc tacgec, kiwa yenearu fima yofi deec, “Nonggo munafocna imoc ngicngac ngeni yomoc tacdae.
Nga ngic Anutuac songo nga negen negeng modacma yeac ua mekecdae, yeneng neac nonggo naing nga dacmunafocna.”
Amma ye yoac heima yoac homac kpouyemmema yofi deec,
“Negenggec, gbome kpegi kpegingic mongngo gbomea kpegiudeac uau kenec.
Kemma kpegiu gbome goa mama sinnu heiu neng yeneng hama nedacgec.
Nga goa harongannu heiu ihai bangec efeanec feecac gbome imoc bic nemonggema ereec.
Erema godea ine homac mi faiecac wenacngo erema kpeu gbome imoc ururuema homeec.
Nga gbome goa haseng manau heiu hasengngo yadima heihomeu fora kpac anec.
Nga gbome goango bangec gombungau heima kpea nemonggema fora gombunga anec. Monggac imoc gbomea 30 nga monggac 60 amma monggac 100, ifi fingerec.”
Yesungo ifi dema yofi edeyunuec, “Kedzahagoc yeng yoac yomoc negembeso.”
Anu ngicngac habutoa kenggec medacfora 12 nga ngicngac goa yegoc kecgec, yeneng yoac heihei imocac hania Yesu kpesimigec
yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Anutuac eucererenggac negen negeng sufu sufuya, imoc ngeni bic ngemmengemmea. Nga ngicngac ngadeau kecdae, yeni ine yoac heiheiusingsac yoac sasawa negenggecde.
Ifi anu
‘Yeni kicnginango hemma wiac mong ine mi henggecde nga kedzacnginango negemma wiac mong sifu mi negentegecgecde. Imocac yeni ubangina dzigenebacac Anutungo kopocsicngina mi wayemmeude.’ ”
Anu Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ni yoac heima deduae, ngeni imocac hania mi negendaeu yoac heiheiac hania goa monggoc deba imoc ifingoc dafi negentegecgecde.
Gbome kpegi kpegi ngicngo Anutuac yoac kpegiec.
Gbome sinnu heiec, imoc ngic goa yeni yoara negenggec nga Satang ye ine bic hama gbome ubanginau kpegi kpegia meickeude.
Nga gbome harongannu heiec, imoc ngic goa Anutuac yoac negemma heresongogoc bic hoanggegecde.
Amma yoac ubanginau godea mi meecac naso wegenanecsac taru Anutuac yoacac amma kpendzeng me yunukporac faka fingeru yeni makpegecde.
Nga gbome hasennu heiec, imoc goa yeni Anutuac yoac negenggec.
Negemma bangectoa bangec yomocac kekecac fagung nga dzofinacac faitobang nga wiac goaac hensongo angandae, imoc sasawango ubanginau kemema yoac heihomeu fora mong mi fingerude.
Nga gbome goa bangec kerehagocfu heiec, imoc ngic goango Anutuac yoac negemma mekecgec fora fingerude. Goango 30 nga goango 60 amma goango 100 meficgeude.”
Wiac sufu sufuu fede, imoc kecma didiu fingectegerude nga wiac seme semea, imoc kecma kperagiau fingectegerude.
Mong ye kedzahagocngo yoac yomoc negembeso.”
Imoc yofiac, mong ye wiac goa femide, ye wiac monggoc migecde. Nga mong ye wiac mong mi femide, yearunac wiacbisic femide, imoc ifingoc wangecgecde.”

Amma monggoc yofi deec, “Anutuac eucererenggac siriha, imoc ngic mongngo gbome kpegiec, ifi isoc. Kpegiu hadzing toforec feyac ammanu gbome imoc nesarima ereude. Nga imoc dafiac erede, imoc ngicngo mi negentegecde.
Nga bangec yengenaoc wiac meyadiu erema tebang angkecde. Amma fora amma wadzima kpaueude.
Kpaueu fora kpememe naso anu ye semeng bic kperecgeude.”
Yesungo monggoc yofi deec, “Nenang Anutuac eucererenggac siriha yofi heima deni naric anude.

Anutuac eucerereng imoc mastet gbomea isoc. Mastet gbomea imoc gbome sasawa yeneac kapiangina. Nga imoc bangecfu faini erema yadima semeng uaac mondzang feracyunuma fawa kuneng angande. Nga sawau neng yeneng imocac nokumucfu hama faec heima tacgecde.”
Yesungo yoac heima yoac ifia homac dema ngicngac negen negengnginaac sirihau Kebuac yoac edeyunuec.
Amma yoac deec, imoc ine yoac heimasac edeyunukefec. Edeyunuma medacfora meyunuma tembucfu kemma hania dekperagima edeyunukefec.
Anu ama marai anu Yesungo medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Nenang dzohong noboc kenni.”
Ifi deu yeni ngicngac habutoa wayunuma Yesu gombau bic tacmanu yeni ye wangecma kenggec. Kemmagec gomba goango ifingoc modacyunugec.
Nga imohai firang engena kpeu tembong kucgoc kpeu dokungo gomba manau erema gomba mewakebeso anec.
Anu Yesungo gomba ngadeau kparicgang heima gau femanu medacfora yeneng midima degec, “Kpoukpou, kemebesonga andimbe, ge imocac fagung mong mi annec me?”
Ifi degec ye gauunac yacma firang kpetarimima dzohong yofi edeec, “Ge waickema fena!” ifi deu firang kpac anu dzohong imoc ning kpema eng feec.
Feu Yesungo medac yeneac yofi deec, “Ngeni nocac kengec andae, negen negensingngina mong mi fede me?”
Ifi deu yeni kengec nga damutoa yombong amma kpesiemegec, “Ye noc ngic, firang nga dzohongtoa yereng yeac enac tofohodape.”
Anu dzohong ferecgema Gerasene bangecfu edigeng kenggec.
Kensikema Yesungo gombaunac mamanu ngic mong asu seuhagocngo kicsereunac hama Yesu meficgeec.
Ngic imoc ye kicsereu feyac angkefu ngic mongngo ye witickeudeacsoc mi anec. Nga yeni sengngo witickebeso ifingoc obohogec.
Ngic yeni naso homac hanimaria sengngo witickegec yeng seng kperecgedarec nga hania aiengngo witickegec, imoc ifingoc kperecgedarec. Nga ngic sasawa yeni ye mendanggegecdeac obohogec.
Ngic imoc ye hadzing toforec kicsereu nga fagannu arohoma yengenaoc sebia hocfu heiherecge angemekefec.
Amma ye hereaungoc Yesu hemma nedzikemma haniau makpeec.
Makpema seriangoc arohoma deec, “Yesu Anutu engenatoaac Medac, neac wiac imoc geac mi ande. Ni Anutuac kicfu edeguduae, ge kpendzennu mi fainuna.”
Yesungo asu seuhagoc kporaru yearunac erema kenudeac edeec, imocac amma ngicngo ifi deec.
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi kpesimiec, “Ge kpacga merac?” kpesimiu deec, “Ni kpacna habutoa, nocac neni homac.”
Ifi deu ye kporacyunuu bangec imoc mi wagecdeac seriyombonggema derecgeec.
Anu bangec botuc imohai berechabutoa mong fagang wegenacfu surukpema kecgec.
Kecgec asu seuhagoc yeneng yofi dema desambic ammigec, “Ge suenununa berecfu kemeni.”

Ifi degec Yesungo negengyemmeu yeni ngicfunac erema berechabu yenearu kemegec. Kemegec berec yeni fagannunac nedzima dzohonnu kemema doku nema homedacgec. Nga berec homegec, yeneac kpetengina imoc 2 tauseng isoc.
Anu berecgareng yeneng kengec worama taonnu nga amabisicfu ngic kecgec, yenearu kemma faka fingerec, imocac siduc edeyunugec yeneng imoc hengecdeac hagec.
Nga yeni Yesuaru hasikema henggec ngic hadehadehabugoc warac kefec, yeng negentegecma wamba heima taru yeni ye hemma kengecyunuec.
Nga ngic kicnginango faka imoc henggec, yeneng ngic hadehadegoc, yearu faka fingerec nga berec yeneac siduc momoc ngicngac ayemmegec.
Nga yeni yoac imoc negendacma Yesungo amabangecngina waudeac edegec.
Ifi edegec ye gombau emmanu ngic hadehadegoc ngereec, yeng yegoc kenudeac derecgeec.
Derecgeu Yesungo ine kpetarimima yofi deec, “Ge amagau kemma Kebungo geac ubea manganeu wiac sasawa anggendac, imocac siduc tosofocga ayemmebesena.”
Ifi deu ye kemma Yesungo faka sasawa yearu meec, imocac siduc Dekapolis bangecfu ngicngac yoac dekperagiyemmeu yeni imoc negemma kerectegec anggec.
Anu Yesungo gombau emma monggoc dzohong ferecgema hasike nammanu ngicngac homacngo yearu heockema kemma kpedzucnegec.
Kpedzucnemagec kpekpeturang amaac gareng mong kpara Yairo, yeng hama Yesuac haniau makpema desambic amma deec,
“Naroanna homebeso ande. Ge hama marigango witiau faina ngereeude.”
Edeu negemma kemmaec ngicngac habutoango hefacemema yearu hagec.
Anu ngac mong ihaingoc nanec, ye sacherec amma kecmanu kifa 12 bic anec.
Amma ye kpendzeng kpema dota homac yenearu kemma hiedzoya eng kpedzonggeu sebiau ngerec ngeree mong ine mi fingecmiu eng monggoc manganeec.
Amma ngac imoc ye Yesuac siduc negemma ngicngac ngadenginausing kemma yofi negenec, “Ni ngakpia kpeserema ngereebadenoc.” ifi negemma Yesuac ngakpihereha kpesereec.
Kpesereu imohaingoc sawa gbanggeu sebia nomaneu kpendzenga kpac anu negengemeec.
Ifi deu medacfora yeneng degec, “Ngicngac homac yeneng hefacgumagec geng merang kpeserenude dema kpesinec, imoc mi heide.”
Nga Yesu ye ine ngacngo kpesereec, ye hentegerudeac fikengfiha anec.
Ammanu ngac ye kengec kpeu dzonoma fedeu Yesuac haniau makpema haniaya hafoangoc deficgedarec, nocac sebiau faka fingerec, imoc negenec.
Deficgeu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Naroang, negen negensinggango mengeregudac. Ge sebiga ngereeu ruaegoc kenna!”
Anu Yesungo yoac denammanungoc ngic goa yeneng kpebung garenggac amaunac hama Yairo edegec, “Naroangga bic homedac, kpoukpou monggoc ebic mi mina!”
Ifi degec Yesungo yoacngina wama gareng yofi edeec, “Ge mi kengecguu, eng negensinggena.”
Ifi dema habu kpetariyemmema Petoro nga Yakobo amma munea Yohane, yeni meyunuu kenggec.
Kemma garenggac amau kensikema henu ngicngac habu yeni ubahodung amma kpeborongtoa kpema kiacsonggong anggec.
Nga Yesungo ine ama manau emma ngicngac yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni nocac kpeborong kpema kiacdae? Naroang ye mi homedac, ye gau fede.”
ifi deu yeni dzomoremigec. Yeng ine ngicngac sasawa kporacyunuu ngadeau madacgec. Magec naroanggac nonggomama nga medacfora harebec meyunuu naroang feec, ihai enggec.
Emma mariau mema yofi edeec, “Tarita koumi!” imocac titiha yofi, “Ngacbisic, ni edeguduae, ge yacna.”
Ifi deu naroang ye imohaingoc yacma kengha anu yeneng hemma kpidohoma negenggec imoc wiac engena anec. Naroang imoc ye kifaya 12 anec.
Nga Yesungo faka fingerec, imoc mi deficgegecdeac seria deracyunuma naroang yaka migec neudeac edeyunuec.
Yesungo bangec imoc wama yengena amabangehau kenu medacfora yeneng modacgec.

Nga sabata naso anu ye kpekpeturang amau emma ngic edekpou ayemmeu ngicngac negemma tacgec yeneng kerectegec amma degec, “Negen negeng imoc merang kpoumiec nga uayoac merang miecac mariango faka kuhagoc ifia mekecde?
Ye Mariaac medac nga amamemengic. Ye Yakobo nga Yosec amma Yuda nga Simong yeneac dacngina nga naingfora yeni nenanggoc kecdae.” Yeni ifi dema dehesi amma wagec.
Nga ye faka kuhagoc mong yenearu meudeacsoc mi anec. Ye ngic hafeigoc mocgu mocgusac mariango kpesereyunuu ngereegec.
Nga yeni mi negensinggegecac negenu naric mi anec. Amma ye guruama tackenec, imohai yerecgema edekpou ayemmeec.
Yesungo medacfora 12 kpacyunuma yohockang yohockang hendzicyunuma asu seuhagoc kporacgecdeac uayoac nga kuc yemmema sueyunuec.
Amma yeng yofi dema dederecge ayemmeec, “Ngeni singgac mefic mong mi mema yasusac mebisia. Ngeni yaka me hie mi mebisia amma dzo mong fadeng nabehau mi baribisia.
Ngeni hanitabe faima ngakpi yohockang ine mi mekembisia.”
Ifi dema yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni kemma ama monnu kensikegec ngic yeneng ama heingemmegec ngeni ama imohai tacyac angkecgec wisickeu wama amabangec monnu kembisia.
Yesungo ifi deu yeni kemma ngicngac ubangina merenggecdeac Anutuac yoac edekpou ayemmegec.
Amma yeni hadehade nga yafing homac kporacyunugec nga ngicngac hafeigoc kerecngo nadzicyemmema mengereyunugec.
Ifi degec ngic goa yeneng degec, “Imoc Eria.” nga goango degec, “Ye profete. Profete warac kecgec, yeni isoc.”
Anu Herodengo ine yoac imoc negemma deec, “Yohane ubea kperecgeai, yennoc gboriec kecde.”
Anu Herodiango Yohaneac herebu negenec. Negenu Herode ye ine Yohaneac kengec kpeu garenggeecac amma Herodiango kpeudeac sing obohoec.
Imoc yofiac, Yohane ye ngic dindingac nga kpetiac, Herodengo imoc negentegecma henggareng ammikefec. Amma ye yeac yoac negemma naso homac negengyohoc meficgema sifu yoara negenudeac ammiec.

Kecma Herodiaac naso gombunga mong yofi fingerec. Herodengo fingec fingec nasoyau ngickuneng yeac bageau kecgec nga wasaingicforaac enarafocngina amma Gariraia bangecfunac ngicenarafocngina, yeni heitaiyunuma neneyaka ohoyemmegec.

Ohoyemmema tacmagec Herodiaac naroangngo hama kicnginau yegec fedeec. Fedeu Herode nga ngic yegoc yaka negec, yeneng imoc hemma songo negenggec. Imocac amma ngictaungo naroanggac deec, “Ge wiac monggac negemma derecgenenna imoc naric gembade.”
Dema nemuya monggac kpacfu yofi deseriec, “Ge wiac sasawa derecgenenna gengyombonggebade nga bangecna nobohaac dena mendzicma gembade.”
Ifi deu naroang ye kemma nonggea kpesimiec, “Ni noc wiacac debade?” deu nonggeango deec, “Ge Yohane dokunadzicac oruha dena.”
Ifi deu naroang ye imohaingoc ngictau yearu kemma deec, “Yohane dokunadzicac oruha yagucngoc terau faima nennadeac anende.”
Ifi deu ngictaungo ubaebic meec. Amma ngic tacgec, yeneac kicfu yoac bic deseriecac amma ine imoc wabesonga negenu naric mi anec.
Nga ye imohaingoc wasaingic mong sueu Yohaneac hatea mehaudeac witicamau kenec. Kemma Yohaneac ubia kperecgema
hatea imoc terau faima mehama naroang miu naroangngo imoc mekemma nonggea miec.
Anu Yohaneac medacfora yeneng siduc imoc negemma kemma farenga mehama tonggogec.

Nga ngicngac homac yeneng kengha anggecac tacnegeng nga yakaneneac titing mong mi fingerec. Imocac Yesungo medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni hagec tembucnina kecnideac nigoc bangec kisiu kemma kecnegembisia.”
Ifi deu yeni tembucngina gombau emma bangec mong ngiha kpacfu kenggec.
Kemmagec ngicngac homacngo ine yenemma yenentegecma taong tackenec, imohacnac nedzima warac warac ihai kensikegec.
Kensikema Yesungo gombaunac mama ngicngac habutoa ifi yenemma yeneac ubahodung negenec. Nocac yeni rama garengngina kpac kecdae, ifi isoc kecgec. Ifi negemma wiac homac edekpou ayemmeec.
Ayemmema kefu marai anu medacfora yeneng yearu hama degec, “Bangec yomoc ngiha kpac anu naso bic kendacde.
Imocac ge ngicngac sueyununa ama tackende, imohai kemma yaka bummenec ambisia.”
ifi degec yeng yofi deec, “Ngeneng yaka yemmegec negec.” Ifi deu merenggec, “Neni kemma 200 denaringo
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ngenearu ic sogong dafiguc fede, ngeni kemma henggec.” Ifi deu kenghemma edegec, “Ic sogong marimong nga kondungyang yohockang metacdimbe.”
Ifi degec yeng ngicngac kpindzinnu matacgecdeac edeyunuec. Edeyunuu yeni mama goa 100 nga goa 50 ifi habu mema kpindzinnu tackenggec.

Tacmagec Yesungo ic sogong marimong nga kondungyang yohockang imoc meec. Mema kiwa kurumennu fiu enu kenehema ic sogong tuema medacfora ngicngac gumecyunugecdeac yemmeec. Yemmema kondungyang ifingoc mederema yemmeu medacgec.
Mema ngicngac sasawango negebec amma
ic sogong nga kondungyang tosea neti anggec feu kpedzucnegec kemema sakac 12 wakeec.
Ngic yaka negec, imoc yeneac kpetengina 5 tauseng.
Nedacgec wisickeu Yesungo ngicngac faiyunuudeac namma medacfora sueyunuu yeni waraima gombau emma Besaida taonnu kenggec.
Kemmagec ye ngicngac faiyunuma numuudeac tikiu enec.
Nga ama toforeyemmeu gombango dzohong dzongiau kemmanu Yesungo tembuha yeigeng kefec.
Kefu medacfora kemmagec ama werec wereckenggac firangngo kenggecfusing haecac puri kpebibiegec. Ifi anggec Yesungo yenemma yenearugeng dzohong witiau titi kemma feracyunubeso anec.
yeng yofi bic edeyunuec, “Ngeni wosongina makiu, imoc ni, ngeni mi kengecngunuu.”
ifi dema gombau emma yenigoc taru firang kpac anec. Nga yeni ongangina worau kerectegec anggec.
Amma yeni herengina dzege dzegea feecac amma yakau faka fingerec, imoc mi negentegecgec.
Anu yeni dzohong ferecgema Genesarete bangecfu kensikema gombangina dzegegec tarec.
Taru gombaunac mamagec ngicngac yeneng Yesu bic hensigec.
Hensima amea amea nedzikemma ngicngac hafeigoc tofou faiyunuma, “Ye ihai me ihai kecde.” imoc negemma ihai meyunu hakecgec.
Yesungo taonnu nga amabisicfu endaru ngicngac yeneng ngicngac hafeigoc meyunuma didiu faiyunugec ngakpia susiaac witiha kpeseregecdeac derecgegec. Amma kpeseregec, yeni sasawango ngereegec.
Farisaio nga Yerusalennac mitiac negen negengngic goa yeneng Yesuaru hama kpeturanggema kecgec,
imohai Yesuac medacfora goa yeni maringina mi dzuac dzuac yaka menec anggec yenenggec.
Imoc yofiac, farisaio nga yudangic sasawango bangecfocnginaac singyoac modacma maringina dzuacmaguc yaka neandae.

Ifi anu farisaio nga mitiac negen negengngic yeneng Yesu kpesimigec, “Medacfocga yeni nocac bangecfocnina nga esangabofocnina yeneac singyoac mi modacma maringina mi dzuac dzuac yaka eng menec angandae?”
ifi degec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Profete Yesaiango ngic ikoha ngeneacnoc kpefing fora yombong yofi ohoec,
‘Ngichabu yomoc yeni enacbibicngo sesehenuandae nga herenginango ine neac hereau kecdae.
Yeni ngicngac wiac kpouyemmeandae, imoc ngicac singyoac edekpou ayemmeandae amma ni eng dengerenugec hemba fora kpac angkecde.’
Ngeni Anutuac dedeseriyoac meickema ngic yeneac singyoac hoanggeandae.”
Amma monggoc yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni ngenang singyoac hoanggeandaeac Anutuac dedeseriyoac meickeyombonggegecde.
Mosengo yoac mong yofi deec,
‘Ge nonggomanghocga seseheyurubesena.’ nga ‘Ngic mong ye nonggea me mamaac sowecyoac deude, ye homebeso.’ ”
Ngeneng ine yofi deandae, “Ngic mongngo nonggea me mama yofi edema deude, ‘Wiac gemba nanggegudeac dedua, imoc bic Anutuac sese
Ifi deu ngeni ngic nonggea me mama meficgeudeac dekpetari ammigecde.
Amma ngeni singyoacngina kpabanggema Anutuac yoac semema faka goa ifia homac angandae.”
Yesungo ifi dema ngichabu monggoc kpacyunuu hagec yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni kedzac kpema negentegecdacgec.
Wiac mongngo ngadeaunac kemeande, imocngo ngic ubahere naric mi heidzadzu kpeude, kpac. Nga ngic heremanaunac wiac ereande, imocngo ine ngic heidzadzu kpeude.
Ngic kedzahagoc kecde, yeng yoac yomoc negembeso.”
Ye ifi dema ngicngac wayunuma amau enu medacfora yeneng yoac heima deec, imocac kpesimigec yofi edeyunuec,
“Ngeni negen negentegecngina kpac, ifi isoc kecdaengoc. Ngadeaunac wiac mong heremanau kemeande, imocngo naric mi heidzadzu kpeude, ngeni imoc mi negentegecdae me?
Wiac imocngo ubanginau mi kemeandeac hereu kemema isinggeu keractennu kemeude.” Yesungo ifi dema yaka sasawa nenideac desorongaiec.
Amma torokpema yofi deec, “Wiac mong ngic ubahereunac ereande, imocngo ine heidzadzu kpeude.

Nga ngic ubahereunac wiac yofia ereande, negen negeng mangana nga kaiserofaka amma hamangecfaka nga ngickpekpe amma eweeneng mewa nga kic hodung amma manganaac areng meme nga ikoc faka amma faka sicsauha nga keracmangang amma desureyoac nga sebiengeng amma ubafong,
imoc sasawango ubahereunac erema ngic heidzadzu kpeude.”
Anu Yesungo yacma imohacnac kenec. Kemma Tiro nga Sidong amabangecfu kensikema ama monnu enec. Enu ngicngac yeni taong imohai siduha mi negenggecdeac, ifi negenec amma ye ine sufuma tarudeac obohoec.
Ammanu imohaingoc Sirofoinikia bangecfunac grikngac mongngo haec. Hama Yesuac haniu makpema naroanga asu seuhagoc kporacmiudeac derecgemiec.
Derecgemiu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Nambarac yeni yaka warac warac nema gebecyunubeso. Nambarac yeneac yaka wangecyunuma kasi yenearu ukunide, imocngo faka gombunga kpac.”
Ifi deu ngacngo meremmiec, “Kebu, imoc negenduae, amma kasi yeni sifu nambarac yeneng yaka kisisickegec tebo bageau maande, imocsac neandae.”
ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge yoac ifi denecac kenna, hadehade ye naroangga bic wadac.”
Ifi deu ngac ye ameau kemma henu hadehadengo naroanga bic wau naroang ye fefeau waickema feec.
Yesungo Tiro bangecfunac dzigenema Sidong taong ferecgema Dekapolis
Kensikemanu ngicngac yeneng ngic mong kedzacfong nga yoac dedeac enara ebiria, ye mehama Yesu mariango kpesereudeac desambic ammigec.
Ifi degec negemma ye ngichabu yenearunac meickema ngic ngadeau faiu nanu gbongango kedzahau faima mariau sofohoma nedzaranga kpesereec.
Kpeserema kurumennu fiu enu asu heima deec, “Effata!” Imocac titiha yofi, “Ge sarina!”
Ifi deu ngic kedzaha bic sariu nedzaranga monggoc merenu yoac tongganang deec.

Ifi degec ngicngac yeni homac wareckema kerectegec amma degec, “Ye wiac sasawa mema kecde, imoc ngereeyombonggedacde. Ye ngicngac kedzacfong yeneac kedzac mesariude nga yoacngina kpac, yeni yoac meficgeyemmeude.”
“Ngicngac yomoc yeni yakangina kpac uameme harebec bic nigoc kecdauac ubana manganede.
Goa yeni amabangec hereaunac hagecac yakaya kpacfu sueyunuba amanginau kengkecma kicgigi ayemmebacac.”
Ifi deu medacfora yeneng degec, “Nenang bangec kisi yofiau yaka dafiu meficgema habutoa yemmeni gebecyunuude?”
ifi degec Yesungo kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni ic sogong dafiguc mekecdae?” deu yeni “Seweng” degec.
Ifi degec negemma Yesungo habu bangecfu matacgecdeac edeyunuec. Edeyunuma ic sogong seweng mema Anutuac ubangerec dema tuema medacfora yemmeu yeneng mederema ngicngac arennu yemmegec.
Amma ye kondungyangbisic bisic goa metacgecmoc, imoc ifingoc Anutu ubangerec edema faiyemmegecdeac edeyunuec.
Faiyemmegec yeni negec gebecyunuu yaka tosea tarec, imoc mema kpedzucnegec sakac 7 anec.
Nga ngic 4 tauseng ihai tacgec, yeni negec wisickeu sueyunuu kengha anggec.
Nga Yesu ye imohaingoc medacforagoc gombau emma Darimanuta bangecfu kenggec.
Farisaio yeneng hama Yesugoc yoacngina engemmama anec. Yeni kuha isinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc mong kurumennunac meu henggecdeac derecgemigec.

Ifi degec yeng ongaasuyau ebic meficgema yofi deec, “Naso yomocac ngicngac ngeni nocac faka kuhagoc henggecdeac derecgeandae? Foracngoc, ngicngacareng yomoc ngenearu faka kuhagoc mong naric mi fingecngemmeude, imoc edengunuduae.”
Ifi dema ngic imoc wayunuma gombau monggoc emma dzohong nobocgeng kenggec.
Naso imohai medac yeni ic sogong nigecyunuu mocgusac gombau taru mekenggec.
Nga Yesungo gorongina kpema yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni farisaio nga Herode yeneac yis, imocac henghomema kecbisia.”
ifi deu yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “Nenang ic sogonnina kpac, imocac amma ifi dede.”
Ifi denegeng anggec ye imoc negemma edeyunuec, “Ngeni ic sogong mi mehadauac denegeng andae nga ngeni yoac imoc wagec. Ngeni herenegen negengngina dzege dzegeaac amma wiac mong mi negentegecdae.
Ngeni kicnginagocngo wiac mi hengandae nga kedzacnginagoc ammanu wiac mi negengandae.
“Anu monggoc ic sogong 7 tuema ngic 4 tauseng gumecyunuba tosea taru sakac dafiguc kpedzucnegec wakeec?” kpesiu yeni 7 degec.
Ifi degec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni yaguc ifingoc negen negengngina mi ireckedengoc.”
Anu yeni Betsaida amabangecfu kensikemagec ngicngac yeneng ngic kicpisic mong Yesuaru mehama mariango kpesereudeac desambic ammigec.
Ifi anggec ye kicpisic mariau mema guruama ngadeau hesicke kemma kiwau sofohoma mariango witiau faima kpesimiec, “Ge wiac mong hennec me?”
Kpesimiu kicpisic yeng kic fima deec, “Ngic yeni siricngina ic isoc yenemba kengha andae.”
Ifi deu Yesungo kiwau maria monggoc faiu ngereema wiac sasawa gombunga nga dindingac henec.
Henu suema yofi edeec, “Ge amagau kemma taonnusing mi embesena.”
Amma Yesungo medacfora yenigoc Kaisarea Firipo taonnu kenggec. Sinnu kemmagec yeng medacfora yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ngicngac yeni neac merac deandae?”
Ifi deu degec, “Ngic goango Yohane dokunadzic deandae nga goango Eria amma goa yeneng ine profete mong esea deandae.”
Ifi degec yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Anu ngeni ngenaoc ine neac merac deandae?” deu Petorongo deec, “Ge Messia.”
Ifi deu yeng yoac imoc ngic mong mi edeyunugecdeac deracyunuec.

Anu Yesungo yofi edekpou ayemmeec, “Ngicac Medac ye kpendzeng homac kpebeso. Yudangic enarafocngina nga womonggareng enara amma mitiac negen negengngic yeneng ye ubango wama kpegec homebeso. Homeu uameme harebec ammanu monggoc gborima yacbeso.”
Yoac imocac didiu yombong edeyunuu Petorongo ngadeau wangec kemma tembucfu namma kpetarimiyombonggeec.
Kpetarimiu Yesungo dzigenema kiwa medac yenearu fima Petoro kpetarimima edeec, “Satang, ge ngadenau hakenna. Ge wiac negennec, imoc Anutuarunac kpac, imocngo ine ngicac negen negeng ande.”
Imoc yofiac, ngic mong ye kekeha segereudeac negemma uaya mede, ye kekeha sufumiude. Nga ngic mong ye neac amma nga siduc gombunggac amma kekeha waude, ye ine kekeha fingecmiude.
Imocac ngic mongngo bangectoa bangec yomocac wiac sasawa meficgeecac kekeha ukuu sufuude, imocngo ngic naric mi meficgeude.
Ngickekec monggoc memeaac sing mong mi fede.

Imoc yofiac, ngic mongngo neac negenu gameagoc anude amma neac yoacnaac negenu gameagoc ande, yearu yofi fingerude, Ngicac Medacngo Mamaac kuc nga kibikperagiau angero kpetiac yenigoc haude, yeng ngic imoc yeac ifingoc negenu gameagoc ambesande.”
Ngakpia hereha kperagima kongac koporarac yombong anec. Bangecfu ngic mongngo wamba kongac kongac ifia naric mi meficgeude.
Anu imohaingoc Mose nga Eria fingecyemmema Yesugoc yoac denegeng anoc.
Ifi anggec Petorongo Yesu edeec, “Kpoukpou, yei kecni songea andeac bedzo bedzo harebec meni. Geac mong nga Moseac mong amma Eriaac mong.”
Yeni homac kengecyunuecac ye noc wiac debeso, imoc obohoec.
Ifi nammagec hoeng mongngo hama semeyunumanu hoeng manaunac yoacudumeng mong yofi fingerec, “Yomoc neac Songomedacna, ngeni yeac yoac negembisia!”
Yoac wisickeu imohaingoc yeni fikengfiha amma Yesungosac yenigoc nanu henggec nga ngic mong mi henggec.
Nga yeni tikiunac mamagec Yesungo deracyunuma yofi deec, “Ngeni wiac hendaumoc, imocac siduc ngic mi edeyunubisia. Kecma Ngicac Medac homecfunac gborima yaruguc ine debisia.”
Edeyunuu medac yenaocngoc kpesiemegec, “Homecfunac gborima yacyac, imocac hania dafi?”
Ifi degec yofi edeyunuec, “Eriangonoc hama wiac sasawa memengere anude. Nga mitikibiu yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Ngicac Medac ye kpendzeng homac kpeu desure ammigecde.’ imoc dafiac negensidae?”
Amma yofi edengunuba, “Eria ye bic haec nga ngic yeni songonginaac arennu faka hania hania ammigec, imoc yeacnoc oho ohoya fede.”
Yeni tikiunac mama medacfora goa yeneng yenearu hama henggec ngicngac homac yeneac botucfu mitiac negen negengngic yenigoc yoacngina engemmama anec.
Nga ngicngac nanggec, yeneng Yesu hemma kpidohoma bic nedzikemma wenacngerec demigec.
Ifi anggec Yesungo kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni nocac yoacngina engemmama ande?”
Ifi deu habu yenearunac ngic mongngo deec, “Kpoukpou, hadehade mong yoara kpacngo medacnaac enac mema medzickeu gearu mehaduae.

Nga hadehadengo naso homac ye mema kpekpefac ammiande. Ammiu ye hanimaria goriu enaraunac nambang sofororoc ereu enara kirandziande. Imocac medacfocga yeneng asu mangana kporacmigecdeac deba yeni kporacbibiema wadau.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi merenec, “Areng yomoc ngeni negen negensingngina kpac yombong. Ni ngenigoc naso herea monggoc tacbadeac modzona tide. Ngeni medac imoc megec hau.”
Ifi deu mekenggec hadehadengo Yesu hemma medac kpefahau bangecfu makpeec. Makpeu enaraunac nambang nga sofororoc ereec.
Ereu Yesungo mama kpesimiec, “Hafei yomoc noc nasoac hanahema fingecmiec?” deu mamango deec, “Imoc sabahaungoc fingecmiec.
Fingecmiu hadehadengo naso homacngoc medac kpehomeudeac gerecfu me dokuu kpefahau kemeande. Nga ge meficnurunadeacsoc andeu sifu ubaga manganeu meficnuruna.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Imoc ambadeacsoc, denec. Ngic mong ye negensinggede, yearu wiac sasawa naric fingerude.”
Ifi deu imohaingoc medac mamango arohoma deec, “Ni negensingguba negen negensinna wegenedeac geng meficnuna.”

Ifi deu ngicngac homacngo Yesuaru nedzima kenggec yeng yenemma asu seuhagoc yoac seria ammima yofi edeec, “Asu kedzacfong amma yoacga kpac, ni edeguduae, ge medac imoc wama erema kemma monggoc dzigenema yearu mi kembesena.”
Ifi deu hadehadengo kucgoc yombong arohoma tima erema kenu medac ye homemea isoc feec. Feu ngic yeneng imoc hemma bic homedac degec.
Ifi degec Yesungo ine mariau mema miaru yarec.
Yaru Yesungo amau enu medacfora yeneng tembucfu yegoc tacma kpesimigec, “Neni dafiac hadehade imoc kporacnideac obohoding?”
Ifi degec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Hadehade ifia yakasege kecma nunumungo kporacbesonga.”

Nga ye imohai kemma medacfora yofi edekpou ayemmeec, “Ngicngac yeni Ngicac Medac kererema ngic yeneac mariu faigecde. Faigec yeneng ye kpegec homeude. Homeu uameme harebec ammanu gborima monggoc yarude.”
Ifi deu yeni ine imoc mi negentegecma kpesigecdeac kengecyunuec.
Anu Yesungo Kafanaung taonnu kensikema amau emma medacfora yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni sinnu noc wiacac denegeng andau?”
Kpesiyemmeu waickema tacgec nocac yeni sinnu yenanggarunac merang engena kecde, imocac denegeng anggec.
Tacgec Yesungo medacfora 12 kpacyunuma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mong ye enara kecbeso negende, yeng ngic tosofora sasawa, ngeneac ngadeu kecma ngeneac kingangkpekpe ambeso.”
Ifi dema nambarac yenearunac mong mema botucnginau faima hoanggema yofi edeyunuec,
“Ngic mong ye nambarac yenearunac mong yofia neac kpacfu hoanggeude, ye ni hoannuude. Nga ngic mong ni hoannude, yeng nisac mi hoannuude, kpac. Yeng Anutu suenuec, ye ifingoc hoanggeude.”
Anu Yohanengo Yesu yofi edeec, “Kpoukpou, ngic mong ye geac kpacfu hadehade nga yafing kporacyemmeu hending. Amma ye nenanggoc mi kecdeac kpetarimiding.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni mi kpetarimibisia. Ngic mong ye neac kpacfu ua mong kuhagoc meude, yeng kpacna bic mi demanganeude.
Ngic mong ye neneac ngaba mi ande, yeng ogonina anude.
Nga ngic mong ye ngeni Kristoac medac dema doku kpakenecfu kpengemmeu negecde, foracngoc, yeng wiac imocac buma mi obohoude, imoc edengunuduae.”

“Amma nambarac kapia mongngo ni negensinnukecde, ngic mongngo nambarac ifia faka mangana kpoumibacac amma ye yagucnoc dzamandzingtoa ubeau ubahemima kondungtoau ukugec kemeu, imocngo ngic yearu ngereebac.
Nga mariga mongngo anggenu kopocsic meficgenadeu ge imoc herecgema ukubesena. Mariga yohockanggoc kecma hofeac gerec pisic pisickea kpac, imohai kemebanggac maritegec kecma kekecseriu enna ngereeude.
‘Hofeu kamangina mi homeude nga gerecngo mi pisickebesande.’
Amma haniga mongngo anggenu kopocsic meficgenadeu imoc herecge ukubesena. Haniga yohockanggoc kecma hofeu kemebanggac hanitegec kecma kekecseriu enna ngereeude.
‘Hofeu kamangina mi homeude nga gerecngo mi pisickebesande.’
Ngicngac kondung hosoandae, ifi isoc ngicngac sasawa gerecngo hosoyunubesonga.
Kondung imoc wiac gombunga nga imocngo ine kiacma songea kpac anudeu geng songea monggoc naric mi meficgenade. Ngeni kondung songea ubaherenginau mekecma ruaefaka angemmebisia.”
Yesungo bangec imoc wama Yudaia bangecfu Yodang nobocgengau kenec. Kensikeu ngicngac habutoango yearu monggoc kemma kpeturanggegec. Kpeturanggegec ye fakaya modacma edekpou ayemmeec.
Nga farisaio goa yeni ye tobanggegecdeac negemma kpesimigec, “Ngic mong ye enema naric waude, imoc singngo dede me kpac?”
ifi degec yofi merengyemmeec, “Mosengo imocac dedeseriyoac dafi ngemmeec?”
ifi deu yeneng degec,
“Mosengo yofi naric annideac deec, ‘Mong ye ngac wabeso dema yeng wawakibi mima wau kembeso.’ ”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni ngic ubaseri nga herengina dzege dzegea, imocac Mosengo dedeseriyoac imoc ohongemmeec.
Nga hanac hanaheau Anutungo siricngira ngic nga ngac anecdeac, ifi meficyuruec.
yegoc sebi mocgu anecde. Ifi anecdeac yohockang monggoc mi andape, yeri sebi mocgu anecde.
Anutungo wiac dzegeec, imoc ngicngo naric mi herecgebeso.”
Nga yeni amau monggoc emma medacfora yeneng imocac kpesimigec
Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mongngo enema wama ngac mong meude, ye serofaka enema esea ammiude.
Nga ngac mongngo ewea wama ngic mong meude, ye serofaka ammiude.”
Ngicngac goa yeni Yesungo nambaracfocngina mariango kpesereyunuudeac meyunu hagec. Hagec medacfora yeneng ine kpetariyemmegec.
Ifi anggec Yesungo imoc hemma negenu homac manganeu yofi edeyunuec, “Nambaracbisic yeni nearu naric hagec, ngeni kpae mi heiyemmegec. Kurumenggac eucerereng imoc nambaracbisic yofia yeneac.
Foracngoc, ngic mong ye nambarac kapia yeni isoc mi anudeu ye Anutuac eucererennu naric mi enude, imoc edengunuduae.”
Ifi dema nambarac tabucyunuma maria witinginau faima kenecyunuec.
Yesungo kembesonga kemmanu ngic mongngo yearu nedzikemma yeac kicfu fafoc heima kpesimiec, “Kpoukpou gombunga, ni dafi amba kekecseri imoc neac ambesande?”
ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge nocac gombunga denennec? Anutu mocgungo gombunga kecde.
Ge dedeseriyoac bic negennec,
‘Ge ngicngac mi yunuhomebesena, kaisero mi ambesena, hamangec mi mebesena, enacfu faifai mi ambesena, ngic yeneac wiac mong mi wangecyunubesena, nonggomanghocga seseheyurubesena.’ ”
Ifi deu yeng meremma edeec, “Kpoukpou, ge denec, imoc sasawa sebigborinaungoc angereai.”

Ifi deu Yesungo yearu kic fima yeac songo negemma yofi edeec, “Ge wiac mocguac kpedadanggenec. Ge kemma finacga sasawa fegende, imoc suena dzo kirecgeu imoc ngicngac makpekpea yemmebesena. Ifi anna kurumenggac dzofinac fingecgenu hama modacnubesena!”
Ifi deu ngic ye ubea manganeu negengebirima kenec nocac ye dzofinaha homac femiec.
Kenu Yesungo fikengfiha amma medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic dzofinactoanginagoc yeneng Anutuac eucerereng manau enggecdeac ambibieyombonggegecde.”
Ifi deu medac yeneng yoac imoc negemma kerectegec anggec monggoc yofi edeyunuec, “Nambaracfocna negenggec, ngic finactoayagocngo Anutuac eucerereng manau engeng, imoc uatoayagoc.
Kamelengo bungic singau engeng, imoc ua efea nga dzofinactoagoc yeng Anutuac eucererennu engeng, imocngo ine uatoayagoc.”
Ifi deu yeni kerectegec yombong amma degec, “Ifi anu merang naric komoc kpeude?”
Ifi degec Yesungo kiwa yenearu fima yofi deec, “Ngicngac yeni imoc ambibiema wagecde nga Anutungo wiac sasawa naric mema wiac monggac mi obohoude.”
Ifi deu Petorongo deec, “Negennec, neni wiacnina sasawa wadacma ge modacguma kecdimbe.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ni fora yombong edengunuba, ngic mong ye amabangeha me daramunea me nonggomama me nambaracfora me amauaya, imoc neac nga siduc gombunggac amma waude,

yeng turunga mi obohoude. Amma ye wiac wadac, imocac turunga naso 100 monggoc meude. Ngicngac yeni naso yomohai ama nga daramuna amma nonggonasia nga nambaracfora amma amaua migecde, imoc sisic ammima kpekporac ammimagec mekefude. Nga ngade bangec siriha mong haude, imohai Kebungo kekecseri ifingoc mibesande.
Anu ngic warac warac kecdae, yenearunac homacngo ngadea anggecde nga ngadea kecdae, yenearunac homacngo warac warac anggecde.”

“Negenggec, nenang Yerusalennu endimbe. Enni ngic yeneng Ngicac Medac womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic yeneac mariu faigec, yeneng ye homeudeac desigecde. Desima ye bangec monnunac ngic Anutu mi negemmidae, yeneac mariu faigecde.
Faigec, yeneng faifagoc ammima sofohoma dzikacngo kpema kpehomegecde. Nga uameme harebec ammanu ye monggoc gborima yarude.”
Anu Dzebedaioac medachora, Yakobo nga Yohane, yereng Yesuaru kemma deoc, “Kpoukpou, neri wiac monggac derecgede anecmenadeac negendipe?”
Ifi deec kpesiyemerec, “Ni noc wiac angecmebadeac negendape?”
Kpesiyemeru deoc, “Kecma kibikperagigau nerearunac mongngo foigau nga mongngo kanagau tacdede, imoc deserinemecna.”
Ifi deu yereng deoc, “Oc, naric andede.” ifi deec Yesungo yofi edeyuruec, “Ni kpakenecfu nebade, imoc ngeri ifingoc neecde nga doku nadzicbade, imoc ngeri ifingoc nadzirecde.
Nga merang foinau me kananau tarude, imocac fora ine neng naric mi desibade. Tatac imoc ngic damoc yeneac mengec mengerea fede, yeneng ihai tacgecde.”
Anu medacfora 10 yeneng imoc negemma Yohane nga Yakobo yereac negenggec manganeec.

Manganeu Yesungo kpacyunuu kenggec yofi edeyunuec, “Bangec monnunac ngicngac enarafocngina deyecdeyemmea, yeni ngicngac yeneac ngickuneng siricfu yenigoc kecandaeac kuc feyemmede. Nga kunengfocngina yeni kuc feyemmeu ngicngacfocngina yeneng yoacngina modacgecde, ngeni imocnoc negendae.
Nga ngenearu faka ifia ine mi fingecbeso, kpac. Ngenearunac ngic mongngo engena kecbeso ammide, yeng ine botucnginau kingang kpekpengina kecbeso.
Amma ngeneac botucfunac mongngo warac warac ambeso ammide, yeng tosofora sasawa, yeneac wanacngic kecbeso.
Imoc yofiac, ngicngac yeneng Ngicac Medac kingang kpemigecdeac mi maec, kpac. Yeng ine yeneac kingang kpema ngicngac homac yungecyunuma kekeha wau yeneac doudeac maec.”

Yesu nga medacfora yeni Yeriko taonnu kensikegec. Ihai kecma ngicngac habutoa yenahafoc Yeriko monggoc wagec. Wamagec ngic kicpisic mong kpara Batimaio, imocac titiha Timaioac medac, yeng sing tegiau tacma iwaiac derecgekefec.
Derecgekefu Yesu Nadzarete taonnunac, yeng hama kende, yeni yoac ifi degec ye imoc negemma kucgoc kpacma deec, “Yesu, Dawidiac bangec, ge neacnec ubaga manganeu.”
Ye serima ifi kparu ngicngac homacngo waicke tarudeac edegec. Edegec yeng ine seria monggoc kparec, “Dawidiac bangec, ge neacnec ubaga manganeu.”
Kparu Yesungo namma yofi deec, “Ngeni kpacgec ye nearu hau.” deu ngic yeneng ngic kicpisicac kpacma degec, “Ye kpacgude, ge ubaga ngereeu yacma kenna.”
Ifi degec ngic ye ngakpihereha ukuma futucke yacma Yesuaru kenec.
Kenu Yesungo kpesimiec, “Ni noc wiac anggembadeac negennec?” deu ngic kickundungngo deec, “Kpoukpou, kicfifi ambadeac negenduae.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Negen negensinggango mengeregudac imocac naric kenna!” Ifi deu ye imohaingoc kicfifi amma Yesu sinnu modacma kenec.
Anu yeni kengkecma Yerusaleng taong mewegenebeso amma Oliwatikiu Betefage nga Betani amabangec tarocfu kensikegec. Kensikemagec Yesungo medacfora yenearunac ngic yohockang sueyuruma yofi deec,
“Ngeri dindingac kemma guruama sing enarau tacde, imohai emma donggi medaha mong ngicngo witiau mi tatara, imoc witickegec nande, ngeri imoc meficgema witic yungecma mema haec.
Yungerec ngic mongngo kpesingemecma deude, ‘Ngeri dafi anecdeac andape?’ ifi deu yofi edebesera, ‘Kebungo imocgoc ua meudeac dede.’ ifi deec minginango donggi bic faiu haude.”
Ifi deu yeri kemma donggi medaha sinnu ama naguyau witic witickea nanec, imoc hemma yungeroc.
Yungerec ngic goa ihai nanggec, yeneng yeremma degec, “Ngeri dafi negemma donggi medaha yungecdape?”
Ifi degec yeri Yesungo yoac edeyuruec, imoc edeyunuec yeni negemma wayurugec kenoc.
Kemma donggi Yesuaru mekemma ngakpingira herea hesima donggi medaha witiau tiameec Yesungo imocac witiau tarec.
Taru ngicngac homacngo ngakpingina herea hesima sinnu tiamegec goango ua tegiaunac ic fawa herecgema sinnu faikenggec.
Nga ngicngac kiwau kenggec nga ngadeau modacgec, yeneng kpacma yofi degec,
“Ohec, ngic Kebuac kpacfu hade, ye kenehagoc, hosanna.
Mannina Dawidiac eucerereng hade, imoc kenehagoc. Wi kurumennu kpara dengeregec, ohec waec, hosanna.”
Yesungo ifi Yerusalennu emma Anutuac womonnu enec. Emma hennegeng andacma ama marai anecac medacfora 12 meyunuu Betania amau kenggec.
Wereckengau yeni Betania wama mama Yesungo hereaac homeec.
Homema hereau fima fig ic mong maria tengging tengging henec. Hemma negenu foragoc isoc anu ic haniau kensikema maria meficgeec. Fig nasoya mi anecac ifi anec.
Nga ye fora hofocma ic yofi edeec, “Gearunac ngic mongngo fora monggoc mi nebeso.” ifi deu medacfora yeneng yoac imoc negenggec.

Yesungo Yerusalennu kensikema Anutuac womonggac oda manau enec. Emma ngic wiac emekpesi anggec, yeni imohacnac kporacyunuec. Ye ngic hiedzo emekpesi anggec, yeneac tebo heimerenec nga kebesac emegec, yeneac tatac heimeremma
Anutuac womong manau wiac ifia meenggecdeac kpetariyemmeec.
Kpetariyemmema yofi edekpou ayemmeec, “Yoac yofi oho ohoya fede,
‘Amana imoc bangeha bangeha ngicngac sasawa yeneac nunumuama, kpara ifi kpacbesonga.’
Nga ngeneng merenggec imoc ine hamangecngic yeneac sufu sufuama ande.”
Nga ama marai anu Yesu nga medacfora yeni taong wama kenggec.
Wereckengau yeni sinnu kemma henggec fig ic imoc godeaunacngoc sokuema nanec.
Nanu Petorongo imoc hemma negensima Yesu edeec, “Kpoukpou ge henna, ge fig ic soweckedang, imoc bic ururuema nande.”
ifi deu Yesungo yofi merennec, “Ngeni Anutu negensinggebisia.
Foracngoc, ngic mong ye ubeau negengyohoha kpac kecma wiac mong me mong dema imocac fora fingerudeac negensiudeu yeng tiki edimoc yacma kondunnu kemeu deu imoc foranoc fingerude, imoc edengunuduae.
Ni imocac amma yofi edengunuduae, ngeni wiac imocac me imocac negensima menide, ifi negemma negensinggema numugec wiac imoc fingecngemmeude.
Nga ngeni ngic yeneac kopocsic mi wagecdeu ine Kurumeng Mangnginango ngeneac kopocsic ifingoc mi waude.”
Yesu medacforagoc yeni Yerusalennu dzigene enggec. Emma Yesungo Anutuac womong manau yerecgemanu womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic amma enarafocngina, yeneng yearu hama kpesimigec,
“Ge noc kucfu ua yomoc menec nga merang ua imoc menadeac uayoac genec?”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Ni yoac mong kpesingemmeba turunga edenugecguc ni ifingoc uakibinaac hania imoc edengunubade.
Yohanengo dokunadzic ua mekefec, ua imoc kurumennunac me ngicfunac, ngeni imoc edenugec negemba.”
Ifi deu yeni yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “ ‘Imoc kurumennunac.’ ifi denideu yeng yofi kpesinemmeude, ‘Ifi negemmaguc ngeni nocac ye mi negensinggegec?’ ”
Nga ngicfunac, imoc debesonga ngic yeneac amma kengecyunuec. Nocac ngic yeni sasawango Yohane ye profete fora, ifi negenggec.
Imocac yeni Yesu meremmigec, “Imoc mi negendimbe.” degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Ifi degec, ni ifingoc noc uayoacac kucfu ua mekecduae, imoc mi edengunubade.”
Kemma kecmanu fora kpememe naso hau wanacngiha mong sueu waingngic yenearunac waing uaac fora noboha yeac anec, imoc meudeac kenec.
Kensikemanu waingngic yeni wanacngic mema dzoboya kpema entegeng suegec kenec.
Kenu minginango wanacngic mong yenearu sueu kenu yeneng ye kpekpatanggema desofoc ammigec.

Ifi ammigec ua minginango serima wanacngic monggoc mong sueu yenearu kenu ye kpehomegec. Kpehomegec ua minginango wanacngic homac sueyunuu kenggec uangic yeneng medac goa dzoboyunugec nga goa ine yunuhomegec.
Wisic wisickeau ua minginango songomedacyombonga mocgu kefec, ye yofi negemma sueec, ‘Yeni sifu medacyombonna eweheimigecde.’
Ifi negemma sueu uangic yeneng ine medacyombonga hemma denegeng amma edeemegec, ‘Yeng kecma ua yomoc tiu enude, imocac ngeni hagec kpeni bangeha nga maridzominga imoc nenang ambeso.’
Yeni ifi dema ua minginaac medacyombonga mema kpehomema farenga waing ua ngadeau ukugec kemema feec.
Anu ua minginango dafi anude? Ye hama waing uangic yunuhomema waing uaya imoc uangic areng mong yemmeude.
Mitikibiu yoac yofi oho ohoya fede,
‘Amameme ngic yeneng hoc mong mangana dema ukugec. Nga hoc imocngo amaac hoc wotung amma seria nanude nga nambesande.
yengenaoc faka imoc meu imocngo nenang kicfu wiac bibiagoc ande.’ Ngeni yoac imoc osonegeng angandae.”
Nga Yesungo enara yeneac negemma yoac imoc heima deec, yeni imoc bic negenggec. Nga yeneng ye mendanggegecdeac sing ine hofocgec. Nocac yeni ngicngac yeneac kengecyunuu wama kenggec.

yeneng Yesuaru hama degec, “Kpoukpou, yoac fora dema ngic engena me mamea yeneac mi negensiannec. Ge ngicngacareng socfungoc ayemmekecnec, imoc negendimbe. Nga ge Anutuac sing dindingac edekpou anemmekecnec. Ifi anu ngictau Sisa takesi mibesonga me mi mibesonga, singngo dafi dede? Nenang ngictau Sisa takesi naric minide me kpac?”
Ifi degec Yesungo ikocfakangina negentegecma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni nocac faitobannu fainudae? Ngeni dzo mong meficgema edzacnugec hemba.”
Ifi deu yeni dzo mong migec yeng imoc hemma yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Onga nga kibi yoc, imoc meracac?” kpesiyemmeu degec, “Imoc Sisaac.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Imocac ngeni Sisaac wiac, imoc Sisa mibisia nga Anutuac wiac, imoc Anutu mibisia!” Ifi edeyunuu negemma kpidohogec.
“Kpoukpou, Mosengo dedeseriyoac yofi ohonemmeec, ‘Ngic mong ye ngac mema gboriha mong mi kpeficge kecma homeudeu ngac ye kefu muneango daraac hotsec mema gboric kpeficgema daraac kpac miacbeso.’
Naso monnu daramuna seweng yeni kecgec. Nga waracdacnginango ngac mong mema gboriha kpac kecma homeec.
Homeu muneango ngac imoc mema ye ifingoc gboriha kpac kecma homeec. Homeu munea mongngo faka imocngoc anec.
Nga daramuna seweng yeni ngac imocngoc mema gboricfocngina kpac kecma homedacgec. Homedacgec hotsecngina kecma ngade homeec.
Homeu ngic seweng yeneng ngac imocngoc megecac kecma yacyac nasou homecfunac yacgecde, imohai ngac imoc meracac enema ambesande?”
Ifi degec Yesungo meremma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni mitikibi nga Anutuac kuc, imoc mi negentegecdae, imocac amma yoac desufudae.
Kecma homegec yeneng homecfunac yacgecde, imohai ngicngac yeni mi meemegecde. Nga manggac mongngo ‘Ni naroanna ngic mibade.’ imoc naric mi deude. Yeni imohai kurumenggac angero, yeni isoc anggecde.
Nga homecfunac yacyac deba, ngeni yoac yomoc Moseac kibiu imoc osoandae, Mosengo icfu gerecborang fingeru hemma ihai kenu Anutungo yofi edeec,
‘Ni Abrahang nga Isaka amma Yakobo, yeneac Anutu.’
Nga ye ngic homemea yeneac Anutu kpac. Ye ngic gbori kecdae, yeneac Anutu. Ngeni sing homac yombong segema kecdae.”
Ifi kpesimiu Yesungo yofi deec, “Dedeseriyoac engenangina yofi fede,
‘Israengic ngeni negenggec, Kebu Anutunina ye mocgu nga
ge ubaherega nga ongaga amma negen negengga nga kucga sasawa, imoc hafoangoc Kebu Anutugaac heresongo negemma kecbesena.’
Nga mong yofi,
‘Ge geangga anggengande, siriha imocngoc ngicngac gegoc wegenac kecdae, yeni heresongogoc hoangyunubesena.’
Dedeseriyoac imoc yereac engena mong mi fede.”
Ifi deu mitiac negen negengngicngo meremmiec, “Gombunga kpoukpou, ge fora yombong denec. Anutu ye mocgu, mongngo ye isoc mi kecde.

Nga ubaherega hafoangoc nga negen negengga hafoangoc amma kucga hafoangoc yeac songo heregoc negemma kecbesena amma geangga anggengande, siriha imocngoc ngicngac gegoc wegenac kecdae, yeni heresongogoc hoangyunubesena, wiac imocngonoc Anutuac hosuc heihei amma sese hania hania ferahade.”
Ngic ye gombunga yombong merenu Yesungo negemma yofi edeec, “Ge Anutuac eucererenggac hereau mi kecnec.” Ifi deu yeni Yesu monggoc kpesimigecdeac kengecyunuu wagec.
Yesungo Anutuac womonnu edekpou ayemmema yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Mitiac negen negengngic yeneng Messia ye Dawidiac kisicfunac nocac deandae?”
Dawidi ye Asungo meefaiu yengenaoc yofi deec,
Dawidi yengenaoc ‘Neac Kebu’, kparec. Nga Messia ye dafiu Dawidiac bangeha ande?” Ifi deu ngicngac habutoa yeneng negendzidziegec.

Ifi anggec Yesungo edekpou ayemmema yoac yofi torokpema edeyunuec, “Ngeni mitiac negen negengngic yeneac henghomema kecbisia. Yeni songonginaac amma ngakpi herea heima kecgec ngicngac yeneng wenacngerec deyemmegecdeac emenecfu kenghaandae.
Amma kpekpeturang amau nga yakatoa nasou warac warac tatacfu tacbesonga songongina angkecde.
Amma yeni ine ngachotsec ewefocngina homemea yeneac ama wangecyunuandae. Amma negen ngereengunugecdeac nunumu herea here numuandae. Yeni ikocfaka ifia angandaeac turunga ebiriangoc megecde.”
Anu Yesungo womonggac sesekatapa nobohau tacma henu ngicngac homacngo dzo imohai faigec kemeu ngic finactoagoc homacngo hama dzo ebiriangoc faigec kemeec.
Anu ngachotsec ewea homemea mongngo ifingoc hama hocdzo sacsac yohockang faiu kemeec, imoc toea mong kapianecsac.
Faiu Yesungo medacfora deu hagec yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, ngachotsec hiedzoya kpac yombong dzo faidacmoc, yeng ngicngac sasawa sese faidau, yeni feracyunude, imoc edengunuduae.
Ngicngac tosea sasawa, yeneng finactoangina wakema made, imohacnac sesengina faidau. Nga ngac ye ine wiac femidac, imocnoc hafoangoc faidacma entegeng kecde.”
Anu Yesungo Anutuac womonnunac mama kemmanu medacfora yenearunac mongngo edeec, “Kpoukpou, hoc gombunga gombunga nga ama kuneng kuneng tackende, imoc henna.”

Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ama kuneng kuneng tackenu hennec, imoc kecma naso mong haude, imohai wasaingic yeneng imoc sasawa hembarackegecde. Hembarackegec hoc mongngo monggac witiau wagec mi tacbesande.”
Yesungo Oliwatikiu Anutuac womong kiwa dindingacfu tacmanu Petoro nga Yakobo amma Yohane nga Anderea, yeneng yegoc tembucfu kecma kpesimigec,
“Ge yoac dedang, imoc noc nasoac fingerude nga naso imohai noc soi fingecmanu yoac sasawa imoc seribesande?”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mongngo ikocfu wangecngunubacac ngeni henghomema kecbisia.
Ngic homac yeneng hama neac kpac kpacma degecde, ‘Ni Messia.’ ifi dema ngicngac homac uba mesufu ayemmegecde.
Dzikactoaac siduc bangec wegenacfunac nga bangec hereaunac hau ngeni imoc negemma mi kpidohobisia. Foracngoc, faka ifia fingecbeso. Nga naso wisic wisickea ine imohai bic mi habesande.

Bangecareng goa yeneng bangecareng ogofocnginagoc dzikac kpema kecgecde. Nga ngictau monggac arengngo ngictau monggac areng yenigoc ngaba angemegecde. Bangec monnu nga monnu usoc meude amma bodinaso fingeckenude. Nga faka yomoc, imoc wiac gboria fingecbeso andeac ngac gadze kiude ifi isoc ande.

Imocac ngeni ngenaocngoc garengemema kecbisia. Ngic yeni yoacfu faingunugecde amma kpekpeturang amau dzikacngo ngunugecde. Amma yeni neac amma ngictau nga gawana yenearu yoacfu faingunugec ngeneng ihai namma ni dekperaginubisia.
Ngeni bangeha bangeha ngicngac siduc gombung edekpou ayemmegec negendacgecguc

ngic mengunuma ngic goa yeneac mariu faingunugecde, ngeni naso imohai, ‘Dafi denide?’ dema mi negengebiribisia. Tiri Asungo naso imohai yoac enacnginau faiude, ngeni imoc debisia. Ngeni yoac imohai degecde, imoc Tiri Asuarunac ambeso.
Anu dac mongngo munea enara yeneac mariu faiu yeneng homecfu faigecde nga manggac mongngo medahaac imocngoc anude. Nga nambarac yeneng nonggomangfocngina deendema ayemmema homecfu faiyunugecde.
Nga ngicngac sasawa yeneng neac kpacnaac amma ngeni ubango ukungunugecde. Nga ngic mong ye seserigoc kecmanu nasotoa haude, yeng komoc kpebesande.
Nga mong ye ama witiau tacde, ye kemema ama manau emma wiac mong mi mebeso.
Nga mong ye semeng uau nande, ye ngakpi hereha meudeac mi dzigenebeso.
Amma ngac heregoc kecdae nga nenggac sabac namuu meyunukecdae, yeni naso imohai ebictoanginagoc anggecde.
Kebungo naso imoc mi mewegenebac dede ngic mongngo komoc naric mi kpebac. Ngic meisingyunuyunuya, yeneac amma naso imoc bic herec herecgea fede.
Naso imohai yoac yofi fingecbesande, ‘Henggec, Messia yei fingecde.’ me, ‘Ye edi fingecde.’ Ngicngac ifi degecdeu ngeni mi negensingyunubisia.

Imoc yofiac, ngicngac fingecma ikoc amma degecde, ‘Ni Messia.’ yeni nga profete ikoha yeneng fingecma ngicngac uba mesufu ayemmegecdeac ngicngac tobangyunuma faka kuhagoc nga morora megecde. Amma yeni sing meficgegecdeu ngicngac meisingyunuyunuya ifingoc ikocfu wangecyunugecde.
Faka sasawa imoc mi fingecmanu imoc bic edengunuduae. Ngeni imocac negemma henghomebisia.
‘wenackiwa kundung kpeu afokperagia mi fingerude.
Nga asomeng yeni kurumennunac fotockema magec kurumenga kurumenga yeneac kuc sasawa kpemindzahegecde.’
Hama angerofora sueyunuu bangec nga kurumeng tegia noboc noboc wisickede, imohai kenggec yengenaoc ngicngac meisingyunuec, yeni kpedzucyunugecde.
Fig icngo hania edekpou angemmeu ngeni imoc negenghomebisia. Fawaya doku doku amma besaiu ngic ngeni yofi negengandae, wenac naso ande.
Nga ngeni wiac dedua, imoc fingeru hemma ifingoc yofi negembisia, Ngicac Medac nasoya bic wegenema hama nagu ngadeau nandenoc.
Foracngoc, areng yomoc ngeni mi homemagec wiac yomoc fingecdarude, imoc edengunuduae.
Foracngoc, bangec nga kurumeng yeri kecma kpac anecde nga neac yoac ine mi kpac ambesande.
Nga faka imoc noc uamemeu amma aua nofu fingerude, imoc mongngo naric mi negenude. Kurumenggac angero yeni imoc mi negenggecde nga Medacngo ifingoc mi negenude. Manggacngosac naso imoc negende.
Ngeni garengngina mema ubagbori kecbisia. Nocac ngeni naso mi negendae.

Imohai faka yofi isoc fingerude, ngic mongngo amea wama bangec monnu kenudeac negenec. Ifi amma ye amagareng wanacngicfora amaac wiac uanginaacsoc garenggegecdeac uayoac deyemmema nagugareng naguu kicfifi nanudeac edeec.
Imocac ngeni ubagbori kecbisia. Minginango ama toforemanu me tofocnac dzongiau me ama werec wereckenggac me asoac nasou dzigeneude, ngeni imoc mi negendae.
Ngeni gaufemagec hama ngenembacac yoac yomoc ngeni nga ngicngac goa sasawa edengunuduae. Ngeni imoc negemma ubagbori kecbisia.”

Makekenggac naso nga ic sogong yisya kpac nene, imocac hombanggac uameme yohockang feec. Femanu womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic yeni Yesu nofusing kic mesufu ammima mema kpegec homeudeac sing hofocma
yofi degec, “Ngicngac yenearu dzikac sicsauc fingecbacac amma ye hombang nasou mi mebesonga.”
Nadzicmiu ngic goa ihai tacgec, yeneng imoc hemma dehesi amma degec, “Ye nocac wiac buma engena ifi kpedzonggede?
Doku homuna gombunga ifiango kifa mocguac uabung
Ifi ammigec Yesungo yoacngina negemma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni nocac ngacac ifi degec ubaebic meficgeude? Ngeni faka imoc wagec. Ye faka gombunga yombong anende.
Ngic makpekpea yeni nasosoc ngenigoc kecgec ngeni meficyunubeso angemmeu naric meficyunukecgecde. Nga neng ine ngenigoc nasosoc mi kecbade.

Foracngoc, ngicngac yeneng siduc gombung bangectoa bangec, imohai kemma ngicngac edekpou ayemmegecde, imohai ngac yomocngo faka anec, imoc ifingoc degec negenggec feude nga febesande, imoc edengunuduae.”
Anu medacfora 12 yenearunac mong kpara Yuda Karioto amaunac, yeng Yesu meyemmeudeac dema womonggareng enara yenearu kenec.
Kenu yeni ubangerec negemma dzo migecdeac degec. Ifi degec Yudango naso gombung damohai Yesu doc mema yereac mariu faiude, imocac kicfifi kefec.
Ifi kpesimigec yeng medac yohockang yofi dema sueyuruec, “Ngeri taonnuu emma ngic mong dokuenanga tofohoma hau yegoc ewacma ye modacbesera.
Modarec kemma amau enude, ama imohai ama mingina yofi edebesera, ‘Kpoukpoungo yofi kpesigende, “Ama mana damohai mengerenenna ni medacfocnagoc makekenggac ramamedaha nenide?” ’
Ifi deec yeng ama witiau amamana mong kuneng ihai wiac bic mengec mengerea tacdacde, imoc edzacnguruu ngeri imohai iwainina mengerebesera.”
Ifi deu medac yeri ama wama taonnu enoc. Emma Yesungo edeyuruec, imocac sirihau wiac meficgedacma makekenggac ramamedaha ohomengere anoc.
Anu ama toforemanu Yesu nga medacfora 12 yenigoc kensikegec.
Kensikema yaka netacma Yesungo yofi deec, “Foracngoc, ngenearunac mongngo ni ngaba yeneac mariu fainuude, yennoc nigoc yaka nede, imoc edengunuduae.”
Ifi deu medac yeni negengebirima tembuc tembuc kpesimigec, “Ge imoc neac denec me?”
Ifi degec, yeng yofi merengyemmeec, “Imoc medac 12 ngenearunac mong anu yeng nigoc ic sogong terau nemuruckede.
Ngicac Medac ye wangunuma kenude, imoc neac negemma oho ohoya bic fede. Nga ngic ye Ngicac Medac doc meude, ye ine sowehagoc. Ye nonggeaac here manaunac mi fingecbacfu efaibac.”
Anu netacmagec Yesungo ic sogong mong mema Anutu ubangerec edema ic sogong imoc mendzicma medacfora yemmema yofi deec, “Ngeni yomoc megec, imoc fusina.”
Ifi dema kpakenec mong mema Anutuac ubangerec dema sasawa yemmeu negec.
Negec yofi edeyunuec, “Yomoc neac sac, imocngo dzadzahac amma imoc ngicngac homac yeneac amma kpetic kpetinggea.
Foracngoc, ni waing gbomeaac dokuya monggoc mi nene kecbarengoc Anutuac eucerereng manau waing gboria nebesandua, imoc edengunuduae.”
Anu yeni Anutuac yegec heigec,
Emma Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni sasawango neac negemmangang amma wanugecde, imoc yofi bic oho ohoya fede.
‘Ni ramagareng kpeba yeni sasawango sinsararang kpebesandae.’
Ifi deu Petorongo deec, “Ngicngac sasawango negemmangang amma wagugecdeu neng ine imoc naric mi ambade.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Foracngoc, yaguc tofocnac kokorecngo arohou atac yohockang mi ammanu geng neac busickpena harebec bic anude, imoc edeguduae.”
Ifi deu Petorongo serimangoc deec, “Ni gegoc homebade isoc sebi ine naric mi heibade.” Ifi deu ogofora yeni sasawango imocngoc degec.
Ifi dema Petoro nga Yohane amma Yakobo meyunuu kenggec. Kemma negen negenga fonggou negengebirima
yofi edeyunuec, “Ubaonganango ebiriyombonggeu homebeso anende, imocac ngeni yei garengngina meemema tacgec.”
ifi dema kpesima kemma bangecfu makpefema yofi numuec, “Imoc naric anu naso imocngo feracnubeso.” ifi
numuma yofi deec, “O Manggac manna, gearu wiac sasawa imoc efea. Ge kpakenec yomoc wangecnuna. Anu neac songo ine mi seribeso, kpac. Geac songo nga negen negeng imoc seribeso.”
Ifi numuu wisickeu dzigenema medacfora yenearu hama yenenu yeni gau fegec Petoro yofi edeec, “Simong, ge gau fenec, ge naric aua mocguac manau gaugbori kecbang me?
Nga faitobannu embauac ngeni ubagbori kecma numugec. Ongaasungo efaide nga sebingo ine ebiride.”
Ye ifi dema monggoc kemma nunumu imocngoc numuec.
Numuma hama yenenu yeni monggoc gau fegec. Nocac yeni kicngina ebiriec. Nga ye yoac deu yeni meremmigecdeac obohogec.

Nga ye atac harebecfu dzigene hama yenemma yofi deec, “Ngeni gau femangoc kecdae, imoc naric mi ande. Yaguc ine wisickede nga naso bic hadac. Negenggec, ngic yeni Ngicac Medac kererema kopocsicmeme yeneac mariu faigecde.
Benukererec ngicngo hadeac amma ngeni yacgec kenni!”
Anu Yesu ye ifi demanungoc medac
Hagec benukererec ngicngo yofi derecgeyemmeec, “Ni ngic muduckebade, ngeni yenoc mendanggema garenggeyombonggema mekembisia.”
Anu Yuda ye hama Yesuaru bic kemma, “Kpoukpou.” dema muduckeec.
Muduckeu yeni Yesu maria noboc noboc mema mendanggegec.
Mendanggegec medac yenearunac mongngo ine wasaibeang kpedzima womonggarengtoaac wanacngic kpema kedzaha noboc herecgeec.

Nga Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ni wenacsoc ngenigoc kecma womonnu edekpou angemmeba ngeni imohai ine mi menugec. Nga yaguc ine godzungic meandae, ngeni ifi isoc wasaibeang nga gbaruc mema menugecdeac hadae.” Yoac mitikibiu fede, imoc sasawango ine fingecdacbeso.
Anu sebigborimedac mongngo kporuc linengngo memea imocsac kpeec, yeng Yesu modaru megec.
Memagec, yeng kporuc kpesima senggang worama kenec.
Anu yeni Yesu mema womonggarengtoa yenearu mekenggec. Mekenggec womonggareng enara sasawa nga enarafocngina amma mitiac negen negengngic, yeni kpeturanggema hagec.
Nga Petoro ye ngadenginau hereaungoc modacyunu kemma womonggarengtoa yeac amaac oda manaungoc enec. Emma imohai uamedac yenigoc gerec dzeunegemma tarec.
Anu womonggareng enara nga yudangic yeneac tutumangtoa memba sasawa adzorogec. Adzoroma yeni Yesungo faka mangana dafi anec dema kpehomegecdeac manganaac kopocsicac yoac anggecdeac obohogec.
Nga ngic homacngo ikoc amma yeac enacfu faifaiyoac degec nga gubeyoacnginango socfungoc mi anec.
Ngic goa yeneng kicnginau emma namma yofi dema enacfu faifai ammigec,
“Ye yoac mong yofi deu negening, ‘Ni womong yomoc ngicmaringo memea, imoc hembarackema uameme harebecac manau mong ngicmaringo mi memea mebade.’ ”
Nga kopocsicac yoacngina imocngo ine ifingoc socfu mi anec.
Anu womonggarengtoango yacma botucnginau namma Yesu yofi kpesimiec, “Geac yoac dedae, imocac noboha mong mi denade me?”
Ifi deu Yesungo ine waicke namma turunga mong mi merennec. Nga womonggarengtoango monggoc kpesimiec, “Ge Messia, Kenec keneheac medac me?”
Ifi deu Yesungo deec, “Ni imocnoc.
Ifi deu womonggarengtoa yeng ngakpihereha membarackema deec, “Yoacninaac boingicac monggoc mi obohonide.
Ye Anutu emmima deu bic negendau, imocac dafi negendae?” Ifi deu sasawango ye kopocsihagoc negemma homeudeac deserigec.
Ifi deserigec ngic goa yeneng sofohoma kiwa kporucngo biranggema marigbung gbungngo heima degec, “Ge kpefingyoac dena!” degec gareng nanggec, yeneng ye mema kpegec.
Anu Petorongo oda manau nammanu womonggarengtoaac wanac naroang mongngo ihai haec.
Hama henu Petoro ye gerec dzeunegemma taru kiwa yearu fima deec, “Ge ifingoc Yesu Nadzaretenac, yegoc kefoc.”
Ifi deu Petorongo ine sebi heima deec, “Ye mi negemmiduae nga yoac denec, imoc mi negentegecduae.” Ifi dema ama naguyau kemeu kokorec arohoec.
Arohou wanac naroangngo Petoro hemma ngic wegenac nanggec, torokpema yeni monggoc edeyunuec, “Ngic yomoc ye yenearunac mong.”
Ifi deu Petorongo ine monggoc busickpeec.
Nga naso mi hereemanu ngic imohai nanggec, yeneng monggoc degec, “Foracngoc, ge yenearunac mong. Ge Gariraia bangecfunacngoc.”
Ifi degec ye yengenaoc sowecemema desopec amma deec, “Ngeni ngic dedae, ye mi negemmiduae.”

Ifi deu imohaingoc kokorecngo arohou yohockang anec. Anu Petoro ye Yesungo yoac edeec, imoc negensiec, “Kokorecngo arohou atac yohockang mi ammanu geng neac busickpena harebec bic anude.” Petorongo imoc negensima ubahodung kuneng mema kiachodung kiarec.
Mekenggec Piratongo Yesu kpesimiec, “Ge yudangic yeneac ngictau me?” ifi deu merenec, “Imocnoc geanggaoc denec.”
Nga womonggareng enara yeneng Yesu yoacfu faima yeac haniaya homac degec.
Ifi degec Piratongo monggoc kpesimiec, “Yeni geac yoac homac yombong dedaemoc, imoc negemma turunga mong mi merennade me?”
Ifi deu Yesungo turunga monggoc mi merenu Piratongo negen negeng ua homac meec.
Anu makekeng nasousoc ngic mong witicamau takefu yudangic yeneng yeac kpara kpacgec Piratongo yenoc witicamaunac wau makefec.
Amma ngic goa warac ngicngac here miac miac faka amma ngic goa yunuhomegec witicamau faiyunugec, yenearunac ngic mong kpara Baraba.

Nga womonggareng enara yeni Yesuac keracmangang amma yeac mariu mekenggec, Piratongo imoc bic negenec. Ifi negenu habutoa yeneng hama Piratongo angkefec, ifi isoc anudeac kpesimigec yeng meremma yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Yudangic ngeneac ngictau yungecngemmebadeac negendae me?”
Ifi deu womonggareng enara yeneng habu fenggeyemmegec yeneng Yesu wama ine Baraba naric yungecyemmegecdeac degec.
Ifi degec Piratongo monggoc meremma kpesiyemmeec, “Anu ni yudangic ngeneac ngictau dedae, yeac dafi ambade?”
Kpesiyemmeu yeneng arohogec, “Ge ye mariponnu kpena homeu.”
Ifi degec Piratongo monggoc kpesiyemmeec, “Nga ye noc kopocsic meec?” deu ine yeneng monggoc seriangoc arohogec, “Ye mariponnu kpebesena.”
Ifi degec Piratongo habu yeneac negen negeng modarudeac negemma Baraba wau kenec. Nga yeni Yesuac sebia dzikacngo kpemaguc mariponnu kpegecdeac wasai maringinau wayemmeec.
Anu wasaingic yeneng Yesu mema gawamang yeneac amaoda manau emma wasaingic sasawa hafoangoc kpedzucnegec.
Kpedzucnedacma ngakpiherec mong giweng giweng heimima somang batihema ira isoc oruhau heimigec kemeec.
Kemeu eweheihei siricfu kpacma edegec, “Ohec, yudangic yeneac ngictau.”
Dema yasungo oruhau kpema sofohoma haniau fafoc heima numumigec.
Anu yeni defagoc ammigec wisickeu ngakpiherec sacsac imoc hesima yengena wamba heimigec kemeu mariponnu kpegecdeac mema ngadeau kenggec.
Tofohou yeni bangec buma mong kpara Gorigata, titiha hatasic, imohai Yesu mekenggec.
Mekemma sopo mong aengagoc kpara mira, imoc wainggoc yerecgema migec nga yeng ine imoc waec.
Yeni asoac 9 kirocfu Yesu mariponnu kpegec.
Kpema ye yoacfu faigec, imocac hania tafebisicfu yofi ohogec, “Yudangic yeneac ngictau.”
Anu yeni godzungic yohockang, mong foiau nga mong kanayau yegoc mariponnu momoc yunugec. Ifi anggec yoac mitikibiu oho ohoya yomoc seriec,
“Ye manganameme yenearunac mong, ifi negenggec.”
Ge geanggaoc onggongemema mariponnunac mesiemema mana!”
Anu womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic, yeneng ifingoc ye desusuic ammima denegeng amma degec, “Ye ngic goa onggongyunukefec nga yengena ine naric mi onggongemeude.
Ye Messia, Israe neneac ngictau kecdengo yaguc mariponnunac mau hemma negensinggenide.” Nga ngic yohockang mariponnu ifingoc yurugec, yereng ifingoc deendema ammioc.
Wenac dzongiau 12 kiroc ammanu imohai ama kundung kpema kundungngo bangec sokoma fekemmanu 3 kiroc marai anec.
Imohai Yesungo ubaudumeng kunengngoc kpacma yofi deec, “Eroi, Eroi rama sabaktani.” Imocac titiha yofi, “Anutuna Anutuna, ge nocac wanudang.”
Ye ifi kparu ngic wegenac nanggec, yenearunac goango imoc negemma degec, “Negenggec, ye Eria kpacsambic ammide.”
Ifi demanu Yesungo ine ubaudumeng kunengngoc kparu asuya ereec.
Ereu womonggac kporuc kuneng
Anu wasaigareng yeac kicfu nanec, yeng Yesungo kparec nga homeec, imoc hemma yofi deec, “Foracngoc, ngic yomoc ye Anutuac medacnoc.”

Nga ngac goa ifingoc hereau namma faka fingerec, imoc henggec, yeneac botucfu Maria kpara mong Madara nga Maria, Yakobo mong munea deandae, ye nga Yosec yereac nonggongira amma Sarome, yeni yenahafoc nanggec.
Yesungo Gariraia bangecfu kefu ngac imoc yenennoc ye modacma meficgekecgec. Amma ngac tosea homac, yeni Yerusalennu yegoc bic kemma ihai ye hemma nanggec.
Marai bic anu hombanggac memengereac naso wegene hau sabataac naso femanu

Yosefe Arimataia taonnunac, yeng ihai haec. Ngic ye kpactoayagoc yudangic yeneac tutumangtoa, imocac membangina mong amma ye Anutuac eucererenggac tomai kefec. Yeng kengeha kpac Piratoaru kemma Yesuac fareng meudeac kpesimiec.
Kpesimiu Pirato ye Yesungo bic homeec, imocac kpidohoma wasaienara kpacma Yesu bic homedac me kpac, imocac kpesimiec.
Kpesimiu Yesu bic homedac deu Yesuac fareng Yosefe desimiec.
Desimiu Yosefengo linengkporuc mong bummema Yesuac farenga mariponnunac mesiu mau kporucngo tembonggema kicsereu mekenec.
Anu Maria Madara nga Maria Yosec nonggea, yereng Yesuac farenga dahai faiec, imoc henoc.
Sabata tatac naso wisickeu imohai Maria Madara nga Maria Yakoboac nonggea amma Sarome, yeneng kemma Yesuac fareng nadzicmigecdeac kerec homunagoc bummegec.
Bummema sonda gboria hanac hanaheau asoacngoc ama wereckenu kicsereu kemmagec wenac ereec.
Anu kemma yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “Merang hocsingaac naguya imohacnac hoc kpedidinggenemmeude?”
Ifi dema kic fima henggec hoctoa imoc ine bic kpedic kpedidinggea. Nga hoc imoc kunengtoa yombong.
Hemma kicsereu emma henggec medac mongngo ngakpihereha kongac kongac mong heiec, yeng foiugeng taru hemma kpidohoma kerectegec anggec.
Ifi anggec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni mi kengecngunuu. Yesu Nadzaretenac mariponnu kpegecmoc, ngeni ye hembeso hadae nga ye bic gborima yacdac, yei mi fede. Faigec fedac, fefea imoc henggec.
Ngeni kemma medacfora nga Petoro yofi edeyunugec, ye waraingemmema Gariraia bangecfu kende. Anu ngeni imohai kemma ye meficgegec, yengenaoc edengunuec, ifi isoc.”
Ifi edeyunuu yeni kpidohoma dzonongngina fedeecac kicsereunac worama kenggec. Amma yeni homac yombong kpidohoma kengecyunuecac amma ngic mong mi edeyunugec.
Yesungo sondau yarec, naso imohai hanahema Maria Madara fingecmiec. Ye warac hadehade 7 yearunac kporarec, ngac imocnoc fingecmiec.
Fingecmiu Mariango kemma ogofora yegoc momoc kecgec, yeni ubahodung negemma kiac kecmagec yofi edeyunuec,
“Yesungo bic yacdac kecde, ni hendua.” ifi deu yeneng ye mi negensinggegec.
Anu imocac ngadeau ngic yohockang yeri amabangec monnu kembesonga kemmaec ye siriha mong amma fingecyemerec.
Fingecyemeru yeri dzigenema goa edeyunugec, yeneng ine mi negensinggegec.
Edeyunuma yoac yofi deec, “Ngeni bangectoa bangec, imohai kemma wiac sasawa Anutungo deu fingerec, yeni siduc gombung edekpou ayemmebisia.
Nga negensinggegecde, ngenearu faka kuhagoc yofi fingerude. Ngeni neac kpacfu hadehade nga yafing kporacyunugecde amma nedzarangyoac uba gboriausing degecde.
Ngeni boidzoc maringo megecde nga doku hodungagoc ngic memanganeyunuande, ngeni imoc negecdeu, imocngo mi memanganengunuude. Nga ngeni ngicngac hafeigoc yenearu mari faigec, yeni ngereegecde.”
Anu medac yeni noboc noboc kemma siduc gombung ngicngac edekpou ayemmegec. Nga Kebungo yenigoc kefu yeni ua megec faka kuhagoc fingerec, imocngo yoara meseriec.
Ge yoac yomoc osoma yoac kpougenggec, imocac fora ande, imoc naric negennade.
Yuda bangecac ngictau Herode yeac nasou Abia ua arennunac womonggareng mong kefec, kpara Dzekaria. Yeac enema kpara Erisabete ye Aronggac fingecsahe, imohacnac.
Ngicngahoc imoc yeri Anutuac kicfu dindingac yombong kecma dedeseriyoac nga singyoac sasawa modacma ikocngira kpac amma kpetiac kefoc.
Yeri kufing kefocac amma Erisabetengo sabaha kpac kefu yeri kecma ngicngac yada bic anoc.
Nga naso botuc ihai Dzekariango Anutuac kicfu uaarengfora yenigoc ua megec
yeni fakangina modacma merang sesegerec homuna gombunga kpedzereckeude, imocac kpeing kpegec Dzekaria heficgeec.
Heficgeu sesegerec imoc kpedzereckebesonga nasoya hau ye Anutuac womong manau enec. Enu ngicngac habutoa yeni ngadeau numuma nanggec.
Ifi ammagec Kebuac angero mongngo hosuc heiheiac arata, imohai Dzekaria fingecmiec. Fingecmima foiaugeng nanec.
Nga Dzekariango hemma kpidohoma kengec ebiria anu
angerongo yofi edeec, “Dzekaria, ge mi kengecguu, Anutungo nunumuga bic negendac nga enengga Erisabetengo medac mong kpenanggema megenude. Ge kpara Yohane, ifi kpacbesena.
Yeng geac ubangerec nga sogac sogai anude. Nga ngicngac homacngo ye fingerecac amma ifingoc ubangerec negenggecde.
Imoc yofiac, yeng Kebuac kicfu kuneng anude. Amma waing doku me doku seria mong naric mi neude. Ye nonggo heremanaunacngoc Tiri Asu wake wakeagoc amma
Israe ngicngacfora homac wangecyunuu yeni ubangina Kebu Anutungina, yearu merenggecde.

Amma medac ye manggac wangecyunuu ubangina meremma heregoc nambaracfocngina yeneac songo negenggecde. Amma yoackpekpe yeni negen negeng dindingac meficgeyemmeudeac ua meude. Nga yeng Kebuac kicfu kecma Eriaac onga nga kucfu uaya mekefude. Ifi mekecma ngicngac meefaiyunuu yeni Kebuac kicfu efaima yeac ngicngacfora ambesandae.”
Ifi deu Dzekariango angero yofi edeec, “Ni neanna ngicyada nga enenna ifingoc, ye kifaya bic homac ammanu geac yoac dafiugeng negemba fora anude?”
Ifi deu angerongo deec, “Ni Gabirie. Anutuac kicfu nanganduae nga ye yengenaoc yoac edegubadeac suenuu hama siduc gombung yomoc edeguduae.

Negennec, yoac deduae, imocac nasoya hau foraya fingerude. Nga ge yoacna imoc mi negensinggedanggac ge yoacga kpac anu ifi kecmana wiac deduaemoc, imocac nasoya hama fingerude. Fingeru wenac imohaingoc yoacgagoc monggoc annade.”
Anu ngicngacareng yeni Dzekariaac tomai namma ye Anutuac womonnu naso herea yombong nanecac kerectegec anggec.
Ifi anggec ye ngadeau mau yoara kpac anu yoac edeyunuudeac obohou yeni bic negentegecgec, “O, ye womonnu emma onga mong hendac.” Kecma ye yoara kpac anu mariangosac faka anec.
Anu Dzekariaac womonggarenggac ua nasoya wisickeu ye mama ameau monggoc dzigenema kenec.
Kenu naso mi hereemanu enema Erisabete ye hereagoc amma afo 5 sufu sufuu kefec. Kecma yofi negenec,
“Yomoc Kebuac faka mong, yeng neac negensima naso yomohai gamena mesawerema faka yomoc anendac. Nga ngicngac yeneng neac deendema monggoc mi anggecde.”
Anu Erisabeteac afoya 6 ammanu Anutungo angero mong kpara Gabirie sueu Gariraia provinsiu taong mong kpara Nadzarete, ihai kenec.
Kemma ngac naroang kpara Maria, ye fingecmiec. Maria ye ngic mong kpara Yosefe, yeac enema anude, imoc bic deserigec amma Yosefe ye Dawidiac kisicfunac.
Angerongo Mariaac yofi deec, “Ohec, Kebungo gegoc kecde, wosoefactoayango gearu fedeac ubangerec negembesena.”
Ifi deu Maria ye imoc negemma kerectegec kuneng anec, “Angerongo noc wiacac negemma ifi edenude?” imoc negenu obohou negen negeng ua homac meec.
