Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Mannango uaya mehakefec nga yofinenggac medengoc imocac amma neng ifingoc ua mekecduaengoc.”
Ifi amma Yesungo sabatanasoac singyoac memanganeec nga torokpema Anutuac Manna dema ye isocngoc anec, imocac amma yudangic herengina monggoc yaru Yesu kpehomebeso anggec.
Imoc yofiac, Manggac ye Medaha songogoc hoanggema ua mede, imoc sasawa edzahekecde. Nga ua sasawa meu hengandae, imocac engenatoa edzaheu meu ngeni imoc hemma kerectegec anggecde.
Manggacngo ngic homemea midiyunuma megboriyunukecde, ifi isocngoc Medacngo ngic megboribeso negemmiu ngereeu megboriude.

Manggacngo ngic angammemengina mi desiude, kpac. Ngic sasawango Manggac eweheimiandae, ifi isoc Medac eweheimigecdeac yeng desi desiua Medahaac mariu faidarec. Nga ngic mong ye Medahaac eweheihei mi ammiande, yeng Manggac sueec, ye ifingoc eweheihei mi ammiude.
Foracngoc, ngicngac bic homegec, yeneng Anutuac Medacac ubaudumeng negemma kekec megecde. Naso imoc haude nga yaguc bic hadac, imoc edengunuduae.
Manggac yengenaaru kekec fede, siriha imocngoc yeng kekec Medac miu Medacaru ifingoc kekec fede.
Nga Medaha ye Ngicac Medac, imocac amma Manggacngo ngic isingyunuma desiyunuudeac kuc miec.

Ni wiac mong neanna ubaac naric mi mebade, kpac. Ni wiac kedzacnango negemma negenganduae, imocac sirihau fakangina isinggema desibade. Neanna songo mi modacanduae, kpac. Suenuec yeac songo modacbade. Imocac amma neac desi desiuango dindingac ande.
Ni neannaoc haniana dekperagibadeu dedekperagina imocngo fora mi anude, kpac.
Mongngo neac hepuc amma haniana dekperagiande. Nga yeng neac hanianaac wiac dekperagiande, imocngo fora ande, imoc negenduae.
Anu ngeni ngic goa sueyunugec Yohanearu kenggec, yeng yoac foraac hepuc amma imoc dekperagiyemmeec.
Ngic mongngo neac dedekperagi naric mi deude, kpac. Ngeni ebicfunac mesingunuba komoc kpegecdeac yoac yomoc edengunuduae.
Yohane ye siriha yofi, kifa mong dzema mekperagingunuande, ye ifi isoc anec. Mekperagingunuu ngeni naso wegenanec kperagi imocac songo negemma kperagia imohai kecgec.

Amma Manggac suenuec, yennoc hepucna amma haniana bic dekperagiec. Ye ngic sueu ngeneng ye mi negensinggedae amma Manggacac ubaudumeng mi negemma yengena dafia mi henggec nga enacyoarango ubaherenginau mi fede.
Mitikibingo kekecseri meficgengemmebesande, ngeni ifi negensinggema kibi imoc osonegeng angkecdae. Kibi imocngonoc neac hepuc amma neac hania dekperagiude.
Nga ngeni ine nearu hama kekec megecdeac mi angemmede.
Ni ngic yeneac dedengerec mi hoanggebade, kpac.
Nga Anutuac songo imoc ngeneac ubahereu mi fede, imoc negenduaengoc.
Nga ni Mannaac kpacfu haba ngeni mi hoannugecde. Nga ngic mong yengena kpacfu haudeu ngeni ye bic hoanggegecde.
Ngeni ngenaocngoc dengereemema Anutu mocgu yearunac dedengerec haande, imocac mi angemmeudeu ngeni ye negensinggegecdeac obohogecde.
Neng kecma Manggacaru yoacfu faingunubade, ngeni ifi mi negembisia. Ngeni Mosearu heirima kecgec yeng yoacfu faingunuude.
Mosengo neac negemma ohoec. Imocac amma ngeni imoc negensinggebau dede ni ifingoc negensinnubau.
Ngeni Moseac mitikibi mi negensinggedaeu neng yoac deduae, imoc ifingoc naric mi negensinggegecde.”
Yesungo yoac imoc dedacma Gariraia dzohongtoa, imocac kpara mong Tiberia dzohongtoa, imoc ferecgema edibigeng enec.
Nga yeng hafeigoc yenearu faka kuhagoc meu ngicngac yeneng imoc henggecac amma ngicngac habutoango ye modacgec.
Modacgec Yesungo medacfora yenigoc tikibumau emma tacgec.
Anu yudangic yeneac makekeng hombang naso wegeneec.
Nga Yesungo kic fiu kenu ngicngac habutoango kuting kuting yearu kenggec, yenemma Firipo yofi kpesimiec, “Nenang yaka dahacnac bummema ngicngac habutoa yomoc yemmeni negecde?”
Yeng noc faka meude, imoc bic negemma Firipo eng tobanggema kpesimiec.
Kpesimiu Firipongo meremmiec, “Nenang afo 8ac uabung, imocac socfu yaka bummema hesisicke yemmeni yeneacsoc mi anude.”
Ifi deu medacfora yeneac botucfunac Anderea, Simong Petoroac muneango deec,
“Medacbisic mong yei nande, ye ic sogong 5 bali gbomeango memea
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni ngicngac matacgecdeac edeyunugec.” Ifi deu edeyunugec kpindzingtoa feec, imohai matacgec. Ngic tacgec, yeneac kpetengina 5 tauseng isoc anec.
Tackenggec Yesungo ic sogong imoc mema Anutu ubangerec edema mederema ngicngac ihai tacgec, yeni yemmeec. Yemmeu wisickeu kondungyang ifingoc mema medereu songonginaac areng menec anggec.
Negec gebecyunuu Yesungo medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Yaka tosea neti anggec fema manganebacac ngeni imoc kpedzucnedacgec sakacfu kemedaru.”
Ifi deu yeni ic sogong 5 bic negec, imocac tosea kpedzucnedacgec kemema sakac 12 wakeec.
Wakeu ngicngac yeng faka kuhagoc meec, imoc hemma degec, “Foracngoc, ngic yocnoc profete bangecfu haudeac dedea.”
Nga ngic yeneng hama Yesu mendanggema ngictaungina faibesonga degec Yesungo negengyemmema meickema monggoc tembuha tikiu enec.
Enu ama kundung kpemanu medacfora yeni dzohongtoa tegiau kemegec.
Kememagec ama kundung kpeu Yesungo yenearu mi hamanu yenaocngoc gombau emma dzohongtoa ferecgema Kafanaung kembesonga kenggec.
Kemmagec firangtoa kpeu dzohonggac tembong kuneng yarec.
Nga yeni 5 me 6 kiromita, imocacsoc puri kpema kemmagec Yesungo doku witiau titi kemma gomba mewegeneu yeni hemma kengec anggec.
Ifi anggec ine Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Imoc ni, neannaoc haduae, ngeni kengec mi anggec.”
Ifi deu negemma Yesu gombau taiembeso ammagec gombango bangec kembeso degec, imohai bic kensikeec.
Wereckengau ngicngac habutoa yeneng dzohong noboc namma degec, “Gomba mocgungosac yoc taru hending. Nga Yesungo ine medacfora yenigoc imohai mi enu yeni tembucngina emma kendau.”
Ifi dema nammagec gomba goa Tiberia taonnunac kemma, Kebungo Anutu dangge dema ic sogong gumecyunuecfu, ama imoc mewegenema hagec.
Hama yeni Yesu nga medacfora ihai mi yenenggecac habutoango Yesu hofocbesonga Kafanaung taonnu kenggec.
Hofocma dzohong edibigeng kemma meficgema kpesimigec, “Rabbi, ge noc nasoac yei hadang?”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, neng faka kuhagoc meba hendau, imocac amma mi hofocnudae, imoc edengunuduae. Ngeni yaka negebec andauac hofocnudae.

Yaka mong hoaema kpac angande, ngeni imocac uatoa mi mebisia. Nga Ngicac Medacngo kekecseriac yaka ngemmeude, imocac uatoa mebisia. Imoc yofiac, yeac witiu Anutu Manggacngo yengena dedeseriac dzic faiec.”
Ifi deu yeni kpesimigec, “Anutuac ua mebeso dema noc ua meni ngereeude?”
Ifi degec turunga yofi merengyemmeec, “Anutuac ua yomocnoc. Anutungo ngic sueu haec, ngeni ye negensinggegec.”
Kisicfocnina bangec kisiu mannayaka
‘Ye kurumennunac yaka yemmeu nekecgec.’ ”
Ifi degec yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, Mose ye yengenaoc kurumenggac yaka mi mema ngemmeec, imoc edengunuduae. Mannango kurumenggac yaka fora ngemmeude.
Anutuac yaka, ngic yennoc kurumennunac mama bangecngic yeneac kekec meficgeyemmeude.”
Yeng ifi deu degec, “Kebu, ge yaka imoc nasosoc nemmekecbesena.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ni neannaoc yaka kekehagoc, imocac ngic mong ye nearu haude, yeng yakaac mi homeude nga mong ye ni negensinnuude, yeng dokuac monggoc mi ammiude.
Neng ine yofi bic edengunuai, ngeni bic nenggec nga sifu mi negensinnuandae.
Mannango ngicngac sasawa nenec, yeneng nearu hagec ngadeau naric mi kisangyunubade.
Ni neanna ubanaac kurumennunac mi mayai. Suenuec, yeac negen negeng modacbadeac mayai.
Nga suenuec, yeac songo nga negen negeng yofi, ye yengenaoc ngicngac nenec, yeni marina titingaunac mi mabisia nga yeni kecma naso wisic wisickeau midiyunuba yacdacgecde.
Mannaac negen negeng imoc yofi, ngicngac Medaha hemma negensinggegecde, yeni sasawango kekecseri megecde. Nga naso wisic wisickeau neng midiyunubesandua.”
ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni negemmangang wagec.
Mannango ngic mong mi heitaiudeu yeng nearu naric mi haude. Manggac suenuec, yeng ngicngac heitaiyunuec nga neng naso wisic wisickeau midiyunubesandua.
Profete yeneac kibiu yoac yofi oho ohoya fede,
‘Anutungo kpouyemmedarec.’
Imocac amma ngicngac sasawa Manggacac yoacfu kedzac faima yearunac negen negeng medae, yeneng nearu hadacgecde.
Ngic mongngo Manggac mi henec, kpac. Ngic mocgungo Manggacgoc kefec, yeng Manggac henec.
Foracngoc, ngic mongngo ye negensinggede, yeng kekecserigoc anude.
Kisicfocnina yeneng bangec kisiu mannayaka
Ngeni yaka kurumennunac maec, yocnoc nema mi homegecde.
Ni neannaoc yaka kekehagoc amma kurumennunac mayai. Ngic mong ye yaka imoc neudeu ye kekecseri meficgema kechereema kecbesande. Yaka imoc fusina. Ngicngo kekec meficgegecdeac yemmebade.”
Ifi deu yudangic yoacngina manganeu degec, “Ngic yomoc ye dafi sebifusia nemmeu nenideac dede?”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, ngeni Ngicac Medac sacfusia mi negecdeu kekecngo ngenearu mi feude, imoc edengunuduae.
Imoc yofiac, neac fusi, imocngo yaka fora nga neac sac, imocngo doku fora, imocac amma ngic mong ye sacfusina neude, yeng kekecserigoc anu neng naso wisic wisickeau ye megboribesandua.
Anu mong ye neac sac nga fusi neude, yeng neac heremanau kefu neng yeac heremanau kecbade.
Manggac suenuec, ye kekec mingina nga ni yeac amma kecduae. Nga mong ye fusina neude, ye ifi isocngoc neac amma kefude.
Yaka yomocngo kurumennunac maec kecde, imoc bangecfocninango yaka nema homegec, ifi isoc kpac. Mongngo yaka yomoc neude, yeng kecma kekecseri meude nga mekecbesande.”
Yesungo yoac imoc Kafanaung kpekpeturang amau ngicngac edekpou ayemmeec.
Ifi deu negemma medacfora yenearunac homacngo degec, “Kpoukpou imoc ebihagoc, mongngo imoc negemma naric mi modarude.”
Ifi degec Yesungo edekpou ayemmeu medac yeni yoac homac osogecac yengenaoc negengyemmema yofi edeyunuec, “Yoac imocngo memanganengunude me?
Nga Ngicac Medac ye warac kefecfu dzigene enu ngeni imoc hemma dafi anggecde?
Asungo kekec meefaiude nga sebiac kekec, imocngo memefiha kpac. Ni yoac edengunudua, imoc Asu nga kekec.
Anu ngeneac botucfunac goango ine yoacna mi negensinggedae.” Imoc yofiac, ngicngac damoc yeneng ye mi negensinggegec nga ngic merang Yesu doc mema ngaba yeneac mariu faiude, Yesungo imoc bic negenec.
Ifi anu yofi torokpeec, “Ngic goa ngeneng mi negensinggedae, imocac amma waraima bic edengunudua, Manggacngo ngic mong mi meefaiudeu, yeng nearu naric mi haude.”
Ifi deu medac homacngo Yesu wama amanginau kemma yegoc monggoc mi yerecgegec.
Kenggec Yesungo medacfora 12 yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni ifingoc wanuma kembeso angemmede me?”
Ifi deu Simong Petorongo yofi meremmiec, “Kebu, gearu kekecseriac yoac fora fedeac neni ngic monggaru naric mi kennide.
Neni bic negentegecma negensinggudimbe, genoc Anutuac Kpetiacngic.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Neng medac 12 meisingngunuai nga ngenearunac ine mongngo hadehade ande.”
Ye yoac imoc Simong, Karioto taonnunac yeac medaha Yudaac negemma deec. Ngic imocngo medac 12 yenearunac amma yeng Yesu doc meudeac anec.
Anu yudangic yeneac bedzo 40ac hombang wegene haec.
Nga Yesu munafora yeneng edegec, “Ge bangec yomoc wama Yudaia bangecfu kemma fakaga imoc ihai mena medacfocga henggecde.
Mong ye habu yeneac kicfu fingecbeso negende, ye sufu sufuu ua mi mebeso. Ge fakaga imoc annadeu ngicngac yeneng fakaga hentegecgecdeac didiu kecma mebesena.”
Nga munafora yeneng ifingoc ye mi negensinggegec.
Ifi anggec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Neac naso mi hadac nga ngeneac naso, imoc ine nasosoc feude.
Ngicngac yeni ubango naric mi ukungunugecde. Nga neng ine angammemengina mangana dekperagianduaeac ubango ukunukecdae.
Ngeni hombannu kenggec nga ni ine bic mi kembade nocac neac nasoyombong mi ande.”
Ye ifi dema wama Gariraia bangecfu tarec.
Taru munafora hombanggac kemmagec ye ifingoc kemma fingectegecma mi keng keng sufu sufuu kenec.
Ifi anu yudangic yeneng hombannu Yesu hofocma kpesiemegec, “Ngic imoc dahai?”
Kpesiemegec ngicngac habutoango yeac sangic kpema homac denegeng amma degec, “Ye ngic gombunga.” ifi demagec goa yeneng degec, “Kpac, ngic imocngo ngicngac habutoa ikoc ayemmeande.”
Amma yudangic yeneac kengecyunuu mongngo Yesuac yoac didiu mi deec.
Anu hombang imoc bic dzonginemanu Yesungo womonnu emma ngicngac edekpou ayemmeec.
Kpouyemmeu negemma yudangic yeneng kerectegec amma degec, “Ngic imoc ye dafi, ye negen negeng mong mi mema sifu mitikibiu yoac oho ohoya fede, imoc negende.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Ni yoac kpoungemmeduae, imoc neanna yoac kpac. Imoc suenuec, yeac yoac.
Ni yoac kpoungemmeduae, imoc Anutuarunac me neanna ubanaac deduae, imoc ngic mongngo Anutuac enac tofohobeso negende, yeng negentegerude.

Ngic mong ye ubeaac yoac deande, ye yengena dedengerec fingerudeac negensima imoc deude. Nga mong ye ngic sueec, yeac dedengerec fingerudeac ua meande, yeng ngic fora, yearu faka dindingac fede. Faka segesegea yearu mong mi fede.
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ni faka kuhagoc meba ngeni henggecac sasawango kerectegec andae.

Negenggec, Mosengo ngeni sebi tosangina, imoc herecgegecdeac uayoac ngemmeec. Mose ye yengenaoc imoc mi hanahemanu yeac bangecfora yeneng ine hanahegec. Imocac amma ngeni faka imoc modacma sabata nasoungoc ua imoc megecde.

Amma ngeni Moseac dedeseriyoac mi ferahegecdeac sabata nasoungoc ngic yeneac sebi tosangina herecgeandae. Ngeni faka ifia mekecdaeu neng sabata nasou ngic mong sebia hafoangoc mengerebare nocac ngaba anendae?
Ngeni kicnginango sebiu heheng imohai mi isinggema debisia. Ngeni ine yoac dindingac negengising amma debisia.”
Ifi deu Yerusaleng taonggac ngic goango kpesiemegec, “Ngic imoc kpehomebeso dedae me?
Nga ngic ye yoac didiu demanu nocac turunga mong mi merendae? Yeni ye Messia, imoc bic ireckedae gedang.
Nga Messia haudeu ye dahacnac haude imoc ngic mongngo mi negenude nga ngic yoc ye dahacnac, imoc ine negendacdimbe.”
Nga suenuec, ye negemmiduae, nocac yearunacnoc hayai.”
Nga habutoa yenearunac ngicngac homacngo ye negensinggema degec, “Messiango haude, imohai yeng faka kuhagoc meude, imoc ngic yocngo faka kuhagoc homacngoc meande, imoc mi ferahema meude.”

Habutoa yeneng ifi dema sangicfu yoac denengeng anggec. Anggec farisaio yeneng imoc negemma womonggareng enarafocngina yenigoc kpedzucnema keracnatang sueyunugec Yesu mendanggema witicamau faigecdeac kenggec.
Ifi anggec Yesungo yofi deec, “Ni naso wegenanecsac ngenigoc kecbade. Kecma suenuec, yearu monggoc dzigenema embade.
Ngeni ni hofocnubibiema naric mi meficnugecde nga ni kembade, imohai ngeni naric mi hagecde.”

Ifi deu yudangic yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “Ngic yomoc ye dahai kenu hofocma mi hennideac dede. Ye arengfocnina grik bangecfu sinsararang kpema kecdae, ihai gedang kemma grikngicngac yoac edekpou ayemmeude.
Ngeni ni hofocnubibiema naric mi meficnugecde nga ni kembade, imohai ngeni naric mi hagecde. Yoac imocac hania mi negentegecdimbe.”
Nga mongngo ni negensinnude, yeacnoc mitikibiu yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Yeac hereunac kekecac dokukiwa tohoma kenude.’ ”
Ngicngac ye negensinggema kecdae, yeneng Tiri Asu ngade megecde, imocac ifi deec. Yesungo naso imohai kurumennu emma kuc nga kibikperagiagoc mi anecac amma Asu imoc mi yemmeyemmea.
Amma goa yeneng degec, “Ngic imoc ye Messia.” nga goa yeneng degec, “Kpahac, Messiango Gariraia bangecfunac mi haude.”
Mitikibiu yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, “Ye Dawidiac dzominga Beterehennunac, imoc Dawidiac ama yombong.”
ngic yeni ifi dema Yesuac amma tohoemmegec.
Tohoma goango ye mendanggema witicamau faibesonga, ifi degec amma mongngo ine sebiau mi kpesereec.
Keracnatang yeni womonggareng enara nga farisaio yenearu eng dzigenema kenggecac kpesiyemmegec, “Ngeni nocac Yesu mi mehadae?”
Kpesiyemmegec degec, “Ngic mongngo yoac ifia deu mi negenning.”
Ifi degec farisaio yeneng merengyemmegec, “Ngeni ifingoc yeac ikocfu makpedau me?
Enarameme nga farisaio neneac botucfunac mongngo ye naric mi negensinggedimbe, kpac yombong.
Nga sicsauc areng yomocngo dedeseriyoac mi negentegecdae, ngeni sowec medae.”
Ifi deu turunga yofi meremmigec, “Ge ifingoc Gariraia bangecfunac me? Mitikibiu hennegeng amma yofi bic hennade, profete mongngo Gariraia bangecfunac mi fingerude.”
Ifi dema yacma amanginasoc kendacgec.
Yesungo oliwatikiu emma taru ama wereckembeso ammanu mama monggoc Anutuac womonnu enec. Enu ngicngac yearu hadacgec tacma miti kpouyemmeec.
Ifi amma tacmanu mitiac negen negengngic nga farisaio yeneng ngac mong serofaka anu hemma Yesuaru mehama kicnginau faigec nanec.
Nanu Yesu kpesimigec, “Kpoukpou, ngac yomocngo serofaka kicninau anu hending.
Nga dedeseriyoacfu Mosengo ngac ifianoc hocngo yenerehomenideac deserinemmeec. Geng yaguc dafi denec?”
Yeni Yesungo yoac mong dafi deu negemma yoacfu faini dema faitobang ammigec.
Ifi ammigec Yesungo ngonducnema gbongango bangecfu kibi ohoec.
Ohoma nammanu kpesima kpesi anggec kpehengaima yofi edeyunuec, “Ngenearunac ngic mong kopocsiha kpac kecde, yeng waraima hoc ukuu ukubisia.”
Ifi dema monggoc ngonducnema bangecfu kibi ohoec.
Anu yeni Yesuac yoac imoc negemma kifanginaac sirihau yadango waraima Yesu wama kendacgec ngac ye botucnginau tembuha nanec.
Ifi nanu Yesungo kpehengai hemma yofi kpesimiec, “Ngac, ngic yeni dahai kendau? Ge manganaac areng, imoc mong dedau me?”
Kpesimiu deec, “Kebuna, kpac.” Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Neng ifingoc ge mangana areng mi debade. Ge kemma kopocsic monggoc mi meficgebesena.”
Ifi deu farisaio yeneng merenggec, “Ge geanggaocngoc dekperagiemenec, imoc singngo mi dedeac yoacga fora mi ande.”
Ngeni bangecngic siricnginau ngicngac fakangina isinggema haniangina deandae. Neng ngic mong isinggema hania dede ua mi mebade.
Ni tembucna ua imoc mi mekecduae. Manggac suenuec, yegoc ua mekecdipe. Imocac neng desi desiua meduaeu imocngo foragoc ande.
Dedeseriyoacnginau yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Ngic yohockang dedengira mocgu anu yoacngira fora anude.’
Imocac amma neannaocngoc dekperagiemeba Manna suenuec, yeng ifingoc hepucna amma dekperaginuude.”

Ifi deu farisaio yeneng kpesimigec, “Geac Mangga dahai kecde?” degec Yesungo meremma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni ni mi negennudae nga Manna ifingoc mi negemmidae. Ngeni ni negennubau debac Manna ifingoc negemmibau.”
Yoac imoc, womonggac mana monnu soikia katapa tarecfu, imohai ngic edekpou ayemmeec. Nga ngic mongngo mendanggema witicamau mi faigec nocac ye ifi ammigecdeac naso mi anec.
Ifi deu yudangic yeneng degec, “Ni kembade, imohai ngeni naric mi hagecde. Ye nocac ifi dede? Yengena sebia eweude me?”
Ifi degec yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeneng emu bangecfunac nga ni bangecfunac kpac, ni wihacnac.
Imocacnoc edengunuduae, ngeni kopocsicnginagoc kecma homegecde. Ngeni ‘ni kecduaengoc’, imoc mi negensinggedaeu kopocsicngina fekefu homegecde.”
Ifi deu kpesimigec, “Anu ge merac?” degec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Ni haniana bic edengunudua.
Ni ngeneac haifakangina homac hennegeng amma isinggema desibadeac fede. Anu suenuec, ye yoac foraac mingina nga wiac yearunac negenduae, imoc bangecfu dekperagibade.”
Yesungo Mamaac negemma edeyunuu yeni obohogec.
Obohogec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni Ngicac Medac nanggegec nanude, ngeni naso imohai ‘ni kecduaengoc’, imoc negentegecgecde. Ni wiac mong neannaoc mi angkecduae, Mannango kpounenec, imoc debade.
Suenuec, yeng nigoc kecde. Ni yeac songo modacma ua mekecduae. Imocac amma ye wanuu tembucna mi kecbade.”
Yesungo yoac ifi deu ngicngac homacngo ye negensinggegec.
Yesungo yudangic ye negensinggegec, yeni yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni neac yoac hoanggema kecgecdeu neac medacfocna fora anggecde.
Ifi amma yoac fora negentegecgecde nga yoac forango witicfunac yungecngunuude.”
Ifi deu meremmigec, “Neni Abrahanggac kisicfunac, mongngo wanac mi menunuec. Nga merang wanac menunuecac geng yungecnununadeac denec?”
Wanac meu kecande, ye ama imocac manau hombonanga naric mi kefude. Nga Medacngo ama imocac manau hombonanga kefude.
Imocac Medacngo yungecngunuudeu ngeni witicngina kpac kecgecde.
Ngeni Abrahanggac kisicfora, imoc negenduae. Neac yoacac titinga mong ine ngeneac ubahereu mi nandeac nuhomebeso efaidae.
Ni Mannaac hoannu kecma wiac hennegeng anai, imocnoc edengunuduae. Nga ngeni ine mangnginaarunac wiac nga faka negengandae, imocnoc amma kecdae.”
Ni ngic mongngo Anutuarunac yoac fora negemma edengunubare ngeni nocac nuhomebeso andae? Abrahang ye faka ifia mong mi angkefec.
Ngeni ine mangnginaac kekec nga faka modacandae.” Ifi deu yeneng degec, “Neni sicsaucfunac mong mi fingering, kpac yombong. Mannina mocgu Anutu.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Ni Anutuarunac fingecma neanna ubanaac mi mayai. Yennoc suenuec, imocac ngeni Anutu mangngina ambac dede heregoc neac songo negemma hoannubau.
Nga ngeni ine yoacnaac kedzac kpegecdeacsoc mi ande, imocac amma ngeni yoac deanduae, imoc mi negentegecdae.
Nga ni yoac fora deduaeac ngeni neac yoacna mi negensinggegecde.
Ngenearunac mongngo neac kopocsic mong negendaeu naric mi heficgebac. Nga ni yoac fora deduae isoc ngeni nocac mi negensinnudae?
Anutuac arengfora yenennoc yoara negenggecde. Ngeni ine Anutuac arengfora kpac, imocac yeac yoac mi negenggecde.”
Ifi degec Yesungo meremma yofi edeyunuec, “Ni hadehadena kpac. Ni Manna eweheihei ammiba ngeneng ine eweheihei mong mi anengandae.
Ni neanna kpac kuneng mebadeac ua mi meanduae nga mongngo neac kpac miacma desiude.
Foracngoc, ngic mong ye neac yoac mekefudeu, ye naric mi homeude nga homebesande, ni edengunuduae.”

Ifi deu yudangic yeneng degec, “Ge hadehadegagoc, neni yaguc negenggudimbe. Abrahang ye homeec nga profete yeni ifingoc homegec. Geng ine denec, ‘Mong ye neac yoac mekefude, yeng mi homeude nga homebesande.’
Anu ge kisicnina Abrahanggac engena mi annec. Ye homeec nga profete yeni ifingoc homegec. Amma ge geanggaac negenna engena ande, imocngo naric mi ande.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ni neannaoc dengereemebadeu imocngo fora mi ambac. Nga Manna ngeneac Anutungina kecde, yeac ifi deandae, yeng eweheihei anende.
Ngeneng mi negemmidae, neannaoc ine ye negemmiduae. Neng ye mi negemmiduae debadeu, ngic ikoha amma ngeni isoc ambade. Ni negemmiduaengo yoara mekecduae.
Bangecngina Abrahang ye neac naso fingeru imoc hembeso negemma songotoa femiec. Femiu hemma songo negenec.”
Ifi deu yudangic yeneng degec, “Ge kifaga 50 mi andacngoc nga ge Abrahang hennec, imoc naric mi heide.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Foracngoc, Abrahang mi fingecmanu ‘ni kecduaengoc’, imoc edengunuduae.”
Ifi deu yeni hoc mema heibeso anggec yeng sufu sufuu womong ngadeau kemeec.
Yesungo sinnu kemma ngic mong kicpisic fingec fingera henec.
Henu medacfora yeneng kpesimigec, “Rabbi, ngic yoc meracac kopocsicac amma kicpisic fingerec? Yengenaac me nonggomama yereac kopocsicac?”
Suenuec, nenang yeac ua wenacfungoc mekecbisina. Nga ama toforemanu mongngo ua naric mi meude.
Ni bangecfu kecma bangecac kperagi anduae.”
Hosoma yofi edeec, “Ge Siroang dzohonnu kemma doku nadzicna.” (Siroanggac titiha imoc “Sueec.”) Ifi deu kemma nadzicma kicfifi amma dzigeneec.
Ifi amma dzigene hau amafora nga ngicngac goa warac iwaiac derecgekefu henggec, yeneng degec, “Ngic yomocngo tacma derecgekefec me?”
Goango degec, “Imoc yennoc.” Nga tosea yeneng ine degec, “Imoc ye kpac, imoc ye isoc mong.” nga yengenaoc deec, “Ni ngic yomocnoc.”
Ifi deu kpesimigec, “Ge dafi amma kicga fidang?”
Ifi degec deec, “Ngic kpara Yesu, yeng goteng yerecgema kicnau hosoma suenuma deec, ‘Ge kemma Siroannu doku nadzicna.’ ifi deu kemma nadzicma kicfifi andua.”
Ifi deu kpesimigec, “Nga ngic imoc damoc?” degec deec, “Ni mi negenduae.”
Ifi deu yeni ngic warac kicpisic kefec, imoc farisaio yenearu hesicke kenggec.
Nga Yesungo goteng yerecgema ngic kiwa merecgeu kicfifi anec, imoc sabata nasou ifi anec.
Nga farisaio yeneng ifingoc ngic hemma kpesimigec, “Ge dafi amma kicfifi andang?” degec deec, “Ye gotengngo kicnau hosou imoc nadzicma kicfifi andua.”

Ifi deu farisaio goango degec, “Ngic imoc ye sabata tatacninaac sing mi modacde, imocac ye Anutuarunac kpac.” Ifi degec goango degec, “Ngic kopocsihagocngo dafi faka kuhagoc ifia mebac?” Ifi dema yenaocngoc tohogec.
Tohoma kicpisicngo kicfifi anec, ye monggoc kpesimigec, “Ge ngic kicga merecgeec, yeac dafi denec?” degec deec, “Ye profete mong.”
Ifi deu yudangic yeneng ngic imoc kicpisic kefecfunac ngereema kicfifi anec, imoc mi negensinggegecac nonggomama kpacyuruma
kpesiyecmegec, “Ngic yomoc ye ngereac medac me? Ye kicpisic fingerec, ifi dedape me? Nga ye dafiu yaguc kicfifi ande?”
Ifi degec nonggomama yereng yofi merennoc, “Ngic yomoc nereac medac. Ye kicpisic fingerec, imoc negendipe.
Nga dafiu yaguc kicfifi ande nga merang kiwa merecgedac, imoc neri mi negendipe. Ye bic yadi yadiaac amma yengena kpesimigec, yengenaoc haniaya edengunubeso.”
Yeri yudangic yeneac kengecyuruu ifi deoc. Yudangic yeneng yoac mong bic yofi dedzege anggec, “Mongngo Yesu ye Messianoc ifi dema deficgeudeu neni ye kpebung yeneac ngadeau faini kefude.”
Imocac amma nonggomama yereng deoc, “Ye bic yadi yadiaac yengena kpesimigec.”
Ifi deec yeni monggoc ngic kicpisic kefecmoc, ye naso yohockang kpacma edegec, “Ge Anutu afehena. Ngic dedang, ye kopocsihagoc, imoc negemmidimbe.”
Ifi degec, yeng merengyemmeec, “Ngic imoc kopocsicmeme me kpac, imoc mi negenduae. Nga wiac mocgu negenduae, ni warac kicpisic kefaingo yaguc kicfifi anduae.”
Ifi deu kpesimigec, “Ye noc wiac anggendac? Ye siriha dafiu kicga merecgedac?”
Ifi degec yeng merengyemmeec, “Ni imoc bic edengunudacdua nga ngeni ine nearu kedzac mi faidau. Ngeni nocac monggoc negembeso andae? Ngeni ifingoc yeac medacfora ambeso negensidae me?”
Ifi deu yeni desusuic ammigec, “Genoc ngic imocac medac nga neni Moseac medacforango kecdimbe.
Anutungo Mose edeu yoara deec, imoc negendimbe. Nga ngic yomoc ye dahacnac, imoc ine mi negemmidimbe.”
Ifi degec yofi merengyemmeec, “Ngic imoc kicna merecgedac. Nga ye dahacnac haec, imoc ngeni mi negendae. Ni imocac warecngunuduae.
Nenang yofi negendimbe, Anutungo kopocsicmeme yeneac yoac naric mi negengyemmeude. Anu ngic mongngo eweheimima dedea tofohoande, Anutungo ye negemmiude.
Bicngoc yombong hanahema feerekefecfu siduc mong yofia mi negenning, ‘Ngic mong kicpisic fingecma kecmanu ngic mongngo kiwa merecgeec.’
Ngic imoc Anutuarunac mi mabac dede, ye ua mong ifia naric mi mebac.”
Ifi deu yofi meremmigec, “Ge hafoangoc manganaunac fingecnecngo yoac kpounemmenec, i.” Ifi dema kucgoc kisanggec maec.
Anu Yesungo ngic kisanggec maec, imoc negemma hofockemma meficgema edeec, “Ge ngicac medac negensinggenec me?”
Ifi deu ngic imocngo deec, “Kunenna, ye merac? Edzacnuna hemma negensinggeba.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge bic hendang. Ngic imocngonoc gegoc yoacyoac ande.”
Ifi deu deec, “Kebu, ni negensingguduae.” Ifi dema ye afeheec.
Nga Yesungo yofi deec, “Ni fakanginaac ising ising fingerudeac bangecfu mayaiac ngic kicpisicngo kicfifi anggecde nga kicfifi yeni kicpisic anggecde.”
Yoac ifi deu farisaio goa yegoc nanggec, yeneng imoc negemma degec, “Neni ifingoc kicpisic me?”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni kicpisic kecbau debac kopocsic mi fengemmebac amma ngeneng ine yaguc dedae, ‘Neni kicfifi kecdimbe.’ imocac amma kopocsicngina fengemmekefude.”
Ni fora yombong edengunuduae, “Ngic mongngo rama yeneac oda manau embeso dema oda naguya wama monnusing enudemoc, ye hamangec nga godzungic.
Ngic naguusing engande, yeng rama yeneac gareng.
Nga nagugarengngo yeac amma odanaguya naric witiude. Witiu rama yeneng ubea negenggec, yengenaoc rama kpacnginau kparu hagec waraiyemmeu yenahafoc ngadeau kemegecde.
Ye ramafora hesicyunuu kemedacgec waraiyemmeu ramafora yeni yeac ubea negendaeac ye modacgecde.
Amma yeni ngic furia naric mi modacgecde. Yeneng yeac ubea mi negendaeac kengec amma woragecde.”
Yesungo yoac yomoc heima deu yeneng ine imocac obohogec.
Obohogec Yesungo monggoc yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, neng rama yeneac nagu, imoc edengunuduae.
Ngic goa ni mi fingecbare hagec, yeneng hamangec nga godzungic. Nga rama yeneng ine yenearu kedzac mi faigec.
Ni neannaoc nagu. Mongngo nearu ferecgema oda manau enudeu Anutungo ye ebicfunac mesiu komoc kpeude. Amma ye naguusing engemmama amma nenesemeng meficgeude.
Hamangecngic yeng wiac hamangec meudeac nga yunuhomema kpetotieyunuudeac haude. Nga neng kekec monggoc nga monggoc mekecgecdeac hayai.
Nga ngic mong ye yagura kemma ngic monggac ramagareng kecde, yeng rama yeneac mingingngina mi amma kecmanu katekasi hau ine hengkpatema woraude. Worau katekasingo rama yininegiric ayemmeude.
Ngic imoc ye yaguraua mekecdeac rama yeneac negengyohoc mi anude.
Neannaoc ramagareng gombunga. Mannango ni negennude nga neng Manna negenduae, ifi isoc neannaoc ramafocna negengyunuduae nga ramafocna yeneng negennudae. Neng rama yeneac amma kekecna wabade.
Ni kekecna wama monggoc mebadeac amma Manggacngo neac songo negende.
Ngic mongngo nearunac kekecna naric mi meickeu ni neannaoc kekecna wabade. Amma kekecna wama monggoc mebade, imocac uayoac nga kuc nearu fede. Imoc Mannango deserinenec.”
Yoac imocac amma yudangic yeni monggoc tohogec.
Tohoma ngic homac yeneng degec, “Ye yafingagoc kecdeac ubasufu ande. Ngeni nocac yearu kedzac faidae?”
Nga ngic tosea yeneng degec, “Yoac ifia ngic yafingnginagoc, yeneac yoac kpac. Yafing yeni kicpisic kiwa naric mi merecgegecde.”
Yerusalennu nomang naso anu womong naguya bicngoc desigec, imocac hombannaso anec.
Imohai Yesungo womong manau firangmemeac mana mong feec, kpara Salomoac firangmeme mana, ihai kengha anec.
Ifi anu yudangic yeneng oronggema edegec, “Ge noc nasou haniaga dekperaginemmena negemma monggoc mi obohonide? Ge Messia kecnecfu imoc deireckenemmena.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merenec, “Imoc bic edengunuai anu ngeni mi negensinggedae. Ni Mannaac kpacfu ua mekecduae, imocngo haniana mekperagiude.
Ngeni ine mi negensinnudae, nocac ngeni neac ramafocna, yenearunac kpac.
Ramafocna yeni ubanaac kedzac faigec ni negengyunuba yeneng modacnugecde.
Modacnugec kekecseri yemmeba yeni wiac mongngo naric mi memanganeyunuude. Nga ngic mongngo marinaunac naric mi mesiyunuude nga mesiyunubesande.
Mannango yeni nenec, yeng wiac sasawa yeneac engena. Imocac Mannaac mariunac mongngo naric mi mesiyunuude.
Ni nga Manggac neri mocgu.”
Ifi deu yudangic yeneng hocngo heigecdeac hoc monggoc megec.
Ifi anggec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Manggacac ua gombung homac edzacngunuai. Anu hania damocac ngeni ngaba amma hocngo nerebesonga andae?”
Ifi deu yudangic yeneng merenggec, “Ua gombungaac amma hocngo gerebeso mi andimbe. Ge bangecngicngo geangaac Anutu dema Anutu emminec, imocac amma ine hocngo gerebeso andimbe.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merenec, “Dedeseriyoacnginau yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, imoc mi negendae me? Anutu yengenaoc deec,
‘Ni deba, ngeni sasawango anutuareng.’
Nga ngic Anutuac enacyoac bicngoc mekecgec, yeneac Anutungo deecfu, ‘Ngeni anutuareng.’ ifi anu Anutuac yoac mitikibiu fede, imoc netohonideac singa mong mi fede.
Anu Anutungo ngic meisinggema desima sueu bangecfu maec, imoc ni. Ni yofi bic dedua, ‘Ni Anutuac medac.’ Ifi deaiac ngeni nocac yofi dedae, ‘Ge Anutu emminec.’
Ua mekecduae, imoc Mannaarunac mi andeu ngeni mi negensinnubisia.
Nga Mannaac ua mebadeu ngeneng ine mi negensinnuma sifu faka kuhagoc mekecduae, imoc negensinggebisia. Ifi amma Mannango nearu kecde nga neng yearu kecduae, imoc negemma negentegecgecde.”
Ifi deu yeneng monggoc mendanggebeso anggec, yeng maringinaunac hesima woraec.
Ihai kecmanu ngicngac homacngo yearu hama degec, “Yohanengo negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc mong mi mekefec. Amma ye ngic yomocac hania deec, imoc sasawa sifu fora ande.”
Ifi dema bangec imohai ngicngac homacngo Yesu negensinggegec.
Nga Maria yennoc Kebuac haniu kerec homuna gombungango nadzicmima yengena orucsusiango mekerenggeec. Nga Mariaac naina Radzaro yenoc hafei ammiec.
Hafei ammiu nainghora yereng Yesuaru yoac faiec kenu deoc, “Kebu negenna, ngic hensongo ammiannec, ye hafei ammiu fede.”

Ifi deec kenu Yesungo imoc negemma yofi deec, “Ye homeudeac hafei mi ammide. Hafei imoc Anutuac kuc nga kibikperagi heficgeucdeac fingecde. Fingeru Medahaac kuc nga kibikperagi ifingoc fingectegerude.”
Nga Yesungo Mata muneagoc amma Radzaro yeni heresongogoc hoangyunukefec.
Anu yeng ine siduc imoc negemma uameme yohockang bangec ihaingoc torokpema kefec.
Ifi kecmaguc medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Nenang Yudaia bangecfu dzigenema kenni.”
Ifi deu medacfora yeneng degec, “Rabbi, yudangic yeneng hocngo gerebeso anggec nga geng naso mi hereemanu monggoc ihai kennade.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merenec, “Uameme mocguac manau aua 12 fede nga ngic mongngo wenacfu sing kengande, ye naric mi fopockeu makpeude nocac ye bangectoa bangec imocac kperagi henude.
Nga mong ye kundunnu kengande, ye fopockeu makpeude nocac yearu kperagia mong mi fede.”
Ifi dema yoac monggoc torokpema edeyunuec, “Nenang ogonina Radzaro gau feu ni midiba yarudeac ihai kembade.”
Ifi deu medacfora yeneng degec, “Kebu, ye gau fedeu fekecma ngereeude.”
Yesungo Radzaroac homecac deu, yeneng ine negenggec gautehec feu dede isoc anec.
Imocac ye tongganang yofi edeyunuec, “Radzaro ye bic homedac.”
Nga ngeni negensinggegecdeac amma ni imohai mi kefaiac ubangerec negenduae. Ngeni yaguc hagec yearu kenni.
Ifi deu Toma kpara mong Tombosonga
Yesungo Betania taonnu kensikeu Radzaro ye kicsereu wenac yohoc nga yohoc bic ferahemanu edegec negenec.
Yerusaleng nga Betania botucngirau kiromita harebec, imocacsoc wegeng wegeng taroc. Imocac
Yudangic homacngo naingngiraac amma demeefai ayecmebesonga dema Mata nga Maria yerearu hatacgec.
Tacmagec Yesu hade degec Matango imoc negemma meficgeudeac kenu Mariango ine amau tarec.
Taru Matango kemma Yesu edeec, “Kebu, geng yei nenigoc kecbang debac nainna mi homebac.
Nga geng yaguc iwai monggac Anutu kpesimina ye naric genude, imoc negenduae.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Nainggango gborima yarude.”
Ifi deu Matango deec, “Ye naso wisic wisickeau homecfunac yacyac fingeru yarude, imoc negenduae.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Homecfunac yacyac nga kekec, imoc ninoc. Mong ye ni negensinnude, ye homeude nga sifu kefude.
Nga ngicngac yei kecma negensinnudae, yeni sasawango mi homegecde nga homebesandae, imoc negensinggenec me kpac?”
Ifi deu deec, “Oc Kebu, ge Messia Anutuac Medac bangecfu mabeso dedeanoc, imoc bic negensingguduae.”
Ifi dema dzigene kemma munea Maria kparu kenu sangicfu edeec, “Kpoukpoungo hatacma geac dede.”
Anu Yesungo taonnu mi hasikemangoc Matagoc ewaroc ihaingoc nanecac Mariango yoac imoc negemma bic yacma kenec.
Kenu yudangic yeneng demeefaiac hama tacgec, yeni Mariango gereagoc yacma kenu hemma ye kicsereu kiarudeac kende dema modacgec.
Anu Mariango Yesu nanec, imohai kensikema Yesuac haniau makpema edeec, “Kebu, ge yei tacbang debac nainna naric mi homebac.”
Ifi dema kiaru yudangic yegoc hagec, yeni yenahafoc kiacgec Yesungo yenenu ubahodungngo ongaasuya meebiriu negenghodungaima kickumea mamanu deec, “Dahaigeng faigec?” deu degec, “Kebu, hama henna.”
Ifi anu yudangic yeneng hemma degec, “Henggec, ye Radzaroac heresongo kuneng femiec.”
Nga goa yenearunacngo degec, “Ye warac kicpisic kiwa merecgeec. Nga ye ngic yomoc gombunga garenggeu mi homebac.”
Yesungo monggoc ubaebic mema kicsereu kenec. Kicsere imoc hockedzebe anu hoc mongngo singa hedzickema feec.
Feu kensikema edeyunuec, “Ngeni hoc imoc meickegec.” ifi deu ngic homeec, yeac naina Matango deec, “Kebu, ye homunagoc bic andac nocac ye uameme yohoc nga yohoc bic kendac.”
Ifi deu Yesungo edeec, “Ge negensinggenadeu Anutuac kuc kibikperagiagoc hennade, ifi bic edegudua.”
Ifi deu hoc meickegec Yesungo kic fiu enu yofi deec, “Manggac, ge yoacna bic negendang, imocac geac dangge deduae.
Ge nasosoc nunumuna negengannec, imoc bic negendua. Anu geng ni suenunec, imoc ngichabu yoc nandae, yeneng negensinggegecdeac ifi edegudua.”
Ifi dema Yesungo kucgoc kpacma deec, “Radzaro, ge yacma ngadeau mana.”
Ifi deu ngic homemea hanimaria nga kicmesuya kporucsusucngo kpefusema birac biranggea, imocngo yacma maec. Mau Yesungo edeyunuec, “Ngeni yungecmigec kenu.”
Ifi anggec, yenearunac goango ine farisaio yenearu kemma Yesungo faka meec, imocac siduc ayemmegec.
Ayemmegec womonggareng enarafocngina amma farisaio, yeni tutumangtoaac memba kpedzucyunuma yofi degec, “Ngic yomoc ye negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc homac medeac nenang dafi anni?
Ye wani kecma faka ifia torokpema meudeu ngic sasawango ye negensinggegec Roma yeneng hama amawomonnina nga ngicngacfocnina wangecnunubauac.”
Ifi degec, yenearunac mong kpara Kaifa, ye kifa imohai womonggareng enara kefec, yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni wiac mong mi negentegecdae.
Ngicngacareng sasawa mi kpac anggecdeac ngic mocgungo bangec areng yeneac amma homeu ngereeude, ngeni imoc mi negentegecdae me?”
Yoac imoc yengena ubeaac negemma mi deec. Yeng kifa imohai yudangic yeneac womonggarengtoa kefec, imocac kpefing deec. Yesungo bangec areng yeneac amma homeudeac ifi anec.
Ye yeneacsac homeudeac mi maec. Ye Anutuac nambaracfora sinsararang kpegec kecdae, yeni kpedzucyunuu areng mocgu anggecdeac ifi deec.
Ifi anggec Yesungo negemma yudangic yeneac botucfu monggoc nonongkac mi yerecgekefec. Ye ine worama Eferaing ama bangec kisi wegenacfu feec, ihai medacfora yenigoc kemma kefec.
Yudangic yeneac makekeng hombang naso wegene hamanu ngicngac homacngo Anutuac kicfu kpetiac anggecdeac dzuacemegecde, imocac amma amangina wama Yerusalennu kenggec.
Kemma womong manau namma Yesu hofocma yenaocngoc kpesiemegec, “Ye hombanninau haude me dafi negendae?”
Nga womonggareng enarafocngina nga farisaio yeneng deserima ngicngac yofi edeyunugec, “Yesu dahai kecde, imoc mongngo meficgema edenunugec mendanggema mebisina.”
Yeni imohai Yesuac amma yaka gombunga ohogec Matango yaka faima arenggeu negec. Nga ngic Yesugoc tacma yaka negec, yenearunac mong Radzaro.
Tacmagec, imohai Mariango sebiac kerec lita noboha, kpete imocacsoc mema Yesuac haniau kpakema nadzicmiec. Kerec, imoc narda foraunac memea
Anu medacfora yeneac botucfunac medac mong Yuda Kariotonac, yennoc ngade Yesu doc meudeac anec amma yeng deec,
“Nenang kerec imoc faini kifa mocguac uabunggac dzo kirecgeu
Yuda ye imoc ngic makpekpea yeneac negensima mi deec, kpac. Ye ine hamangecngicac amma dzohiengina garenggekecma dzo hamangec menec angkefec.
Ifi deu Yesungo deec, “Ge ngac imocac yoac wana. Ye kerec imoc faiu femanu homeba naso imohai eng tonggonubauac amma nadzicnende.
Ngic makpekpea yeni nasosoc ngenigoc kecgecde nga neng ine ngenigoc nasosoc mi kecbade.”
Anu yudangic homacngo Yesungo Betania taonnu kecde, ifi negemma Yesuacsac mi kenggec. Yeni Yesungo Radzaro homecfunac megboriec, ye momoc hembeso kenggec.
Ifi fingeru yudangic homacngo Radzaroac amma enarafocngina yeneac dede wama Yesu negensinggegec. Imocac womonggareng enara yeneng Radzaro ifingoc kpegecdeac yoacua megec.
Wereckengau ngicngac habutoango hombanggac Yerusalennu kenggec. Kemma Yesungo Yerusalennu haudeac wegenanec hade, ngicngac yeni ifi negemma
ic maria dzuamagoc mema Yesugoc ewacgecdeac sinnu kenggec. Kemma yofi kpacgec,
“Ohec, ngic
Yeng Israe neneac Ngictau.”
Ifi kpacgec Yesungo donggi medaha mong meficgema imohai emma tarec. Imocacnoc yofi oho ohoya fede,
“Sionggac naroang ge mi kengecguu. Henna, ngictaugango donggi medahaac witiau tacmanu habesande.”
Anu ngichabu yeni Yesugoc kemma Radzaro kicsereunac kpacma homecfunac megboriu henggec, yeneng siduc imoc desahegec.
Ye faka kuhagoc imoc meecac amma habutoango yegoc ewacgecdeac kenggec.
Ifi anggec ine farisaio yeni yenaocngoc denengeng amma degec, “Negenggec, nenang wiac mong anganggac siriha kpac. Ngicngac kpedzongacngo ye modacma kendacdae.”
Anu ngicngac hombanggac Anutu afehegecdeac Yerusalennu kenggec, yeneac botucfu grikngic goa momoc kecgec.
Kecma Firipoaru hama degec, “Ngickuneng, neni Yesu hembeso negendimbe.” nga Firipo ye Gariraia bangec Besaida taonnunac.
Ifi degec Firipongo hama Anderea edeu yerahafoc kemma Yesu edeoc.
Foracngoc, wit gbomea mong bangecfu mi kemema tohoudeu imoc yengenaocsac tarude, imoc edengunuduae. Nga bangecfu kemema tohoudeu imocngo fora homac meficgeude.
Ngic mong ye sebiaac kekecac songo negengande, ye kekeha sufumiude. Nga sebiaac kekec bangec yomohai ubeango waande, yeng kekeha mekecma kekecseri meficgeude.
Nga ngic mong ye kingang kpekpena ambeso negendeu ye ni modacnubeso. Nga ni kecbade, ye imohai ifingoc nigoc kefude. Nga ngic mong ye neac kingang kpeudeu, Mannango ye seseheude.”
Manggac, ge kpacga mekperagina.”
Ifi demanu kurumennunac udumeng mong yofi fingerec, “Ni kpacna bic mekperagiai amma monggoc mekperagibade.”
Yoac ifi fingecmanu ngicngac habutoa nanggec, yeneng udumeng imoc negemma degec, “Parandangngo heide.” Nga toseango ine degec, “Angero mongngo yegoc yoac dede.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Udumeng imoc neac amma mi hadac, kpac. Imoc ngeneac memeficac fingecdac.
Yaguc bangectoa bangec imocac ngicngac fakangina ising isinggenaso nga yoacngina desigecde. Amma bangec yomocac ngictau meickegecde.
Anu ngic yeneng bangecfunac miacnugec ni emma ngicngac sasawa kpedziyunuba nearu hadacgecde.”
Yengena siric dafiu homeude, imocac dekperagima edeyunuudeac ifi deec.

Ifi degec Yesungo deec, “Kperagingo naso wegenanecsac ngenigoc kefude. Kundunggac kucngo semengunubacac ngeni kperagi fengemmemanu kperagigoc kecbisia. Ngic mong ye kundunnu kengkecde, ye sing dafiu kende, imoc naric mi negentegerude.
Imocac amma ngeni kperagingo ngenigoc femanungoc kperagi imoc negensinggebisia. Ifi angkecma kperagiac nambaracfora anggecde.” Yesungo ifi dema wayunuma yenearunac meickeec.
Yesungo faka kuhagoc homac kicnginau meu yeni ine ye mi negensinggegec.
Profete Yesaiaac yoac yomoc fora fingecbeso,
“Kebu, yeni yoac dekperaginemmegec, imoc ngic merac negensinggeec amma meracaru
Imocac amma yeni naric mi negensinggegec. Amma Yesaiango yoac mong yofi torokpema deec,
“Yeni kicnginango mi henggecdeac kicngina mekundung kpeec amma faka meu ubangina dzingfong anu mekundung kpeyunuec nga ubadzigec dzigene mi fingecyemmemanu mengereyunubaiac.”
Ngic yeneng dedengerec ayemmegecdeac songotoa feyemmeec nga Anutungo dedengerec ayemmeudeac wagec.
Anu Yesungo kucgoc kpacma yofi deec, “Ngic mong ni negensinnude, ye nisac kpac, ye suenuec, ye ifingoc negensinggeude.
Nga mong ye nende, yeng suenuec ifingoc henude.
Nga ngicngac negensinnudae, yeni sasawango kundunnu monggoc mi kecgecde nocac bangecfu kperagia mama fingectegerec, imoc ni.

Ngic mong ye yoacna negemma mi tofohoudeu neng fakaya mi isinggema desibade, kpac. Ni ngicngac fakangina isinggema desibadeac mi mayai. Neng ine ngicngac ebicfunac mesiyunubade nga yeni komoc kpegecdeac mayai.
Anu mong ye ngadenuma yoacna mi hoanggeude, wiac mongngo fakaya isinggema desimiude. Yoac deai, imocngonoc naso wisic wisickeau fakaya isinggema desiude.
Ni neanna ubanaac yoac mi deanduae, kpac. Manggac suenuec, yeac yoac debadeac dederecge anenec.
Yeac dedeseriyoac imoc kekecseri, imoc negenduae nga imocac amma Manggac yoara edenuec, imocngoc debade.”

Makekenggac hombang nasoac tofocnac mocgu femanu Yesungo bangec yomoc wama Manggacaru dzigeneudeac nasoya wegeneec, imoc bic negengemeec. Ifi negemma bangecfu wiacfora yeneac heresongoya fekefec, imoc hafoangoc edzacyunumaguc kekeha wisickebeso, ifi negenec.
Yeni maraiac yaka nema tacgec. Nga mangana minginango negen negeng Yuda, Simong Kariotoac medac ubeau bic yofi faiec, yeng Yesu docfu faiu ngaba yeneng mebisia.
Negemma tataha wama yacma ngakpi hereha hesima keremmeme mong mema kebangau dzegeec.
Dzegema tera yadaosong, imohai doku kpeu kemeu medacfora yeneac hani dzuacyemmema keremmeme kebangau dzegeec, imocngo haningina mekerenggeyemmeec.
Ifi amma Simong Petoroaru kenu Petorongo kpesimiec, “Kebuna, ge dafiac hanina dzuacnade?”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ni faka anduae, ge yaguc imocac hania mi negentegecnec amma ngadeguc hania negentegecnade.”
Ifi deu Petrongo deec, “Kpac yombong, ge neac hani mi dzuacnade.” deu Yesungo meremmiec, “Ni haniga mi dzuacbadeu, ge nearu mi tahockenade.”
Ifi deu Simong Petorongo deec, “Kebuna, ge haninasac kpac, orucna nga marina momoc dzuacnenna.”
Nocac ngic merang ye doc meu megecde, imoc bic negenec. Imocac yofi deec, “Ni sasawa ngeneac imoc mi deduae.”
Yesungo haningina dzuacdaru wisickeu ngakpi hereha heiu kemeu monggoc matacma yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ni faka ngenearu medua, imocac hania negentegecdae me?
Ngeni neac kpoukpou nga Kebu kpacnuandae, imoc naric deandae, nocac ni imocnoc.
Ni Kebu nga kpoukpounginango haningina dzuacduaeu ngeni ngenaoc ifingoc haningina dzuacemebisia.
Ni faka gombungaac ongea edzacngunuma angemmeduae, siriha imocngoc ngenaocngoc modacma mebisia.
Ngeni yomoc negemma modacgecdeu Anutuac ubangerecngo ngenearu feude.
Ni sasawa ngeneac mi deduae. Meisingngunuai, ngeni ine negengngunuduae. Amma yoac mitikibiu oho ohoya fede, imoc fora fingerudeac yoac yomoc heficgeec,
‘Ngic nigoc yaka neande, ye gofoc gofohango tifacnuudeac hania miarec.’
Foracngoc, ni ngic me ngac mong sueba hau mongngo ama heimiude, yeng ni ama heinende ande. Anu ngic mong ye ni ama heinenude, yeng suenuec, ye ama heimiudengoc.”
Yesungo yoac imoc demanu ongaasuya ebiriu yoac yofi dekperagiec, “Ni fora yombong edengunuba, ngeneac botucfunac mongngo docfu fainuu menugecde.”
Ifi deu medacfora yeni yenaocngoc kicngo engemma degec, “Imoc meracac dede?” ifi dema obohogec.
Nga medacfora yeneac botucfunac songomedaha yeng Yesuac hoannu tarec.
Ifi taru Simong Petoro ye hatango sosoc yofi anec, “Ge kpesimina, imoc meracac dede?”
Ifi deu medac imoc Yesuac mokucfu heifema kpesimiec, “Kebu, ge imoc meracac denec?”
Ifi deu Yesungo deec, “Ni ic sogong tosea yomoc nemuruckema ngic mong mibade, ngic imocnoc.” Ifi dema ic sogong mema nemuruckema Yuda, Simong Kariotoac medac miec.
Ifi deu medacfora tacgec, yeneng noc wiacac edede, imocac obohogec.
Imoc yofiac, Yuda ye dzohie mekefecac hombanggac wiac mong bummeudeac edede me ngic makpekpea wiac mong yemmeudeac dede, ifi negenggec.
Nga Yudango ic sogong tosea memanu imohaingoc yacma kemeec. Nga tofocnac naso yombong bic anec.
Ngicngac yeni Medac hemma Anutuac kuc nga kibikperagia negenggecdeu Manggacngo Medahaac kuc nga kibikperagia ngicngac mekperagiyemmeude, imocac naso wegenede.
Nambaracfocna, ni naso wegenanec ngenigoc kecmangoc kemba ngeni ni hofocnugecde. Anu yudangic edeyunuai, imocngoc yaguc edengunuduae. Ni kembade, imohai ngeneac hahaac sing mong mi fede, kpac.
Singyoac gboria mong ngemmeduae, ngeni ngenaocngoc heresongogoc hoangemebisia. Neng ngeni heresongogoc hoangngunukecduae, ngeni ifi isoc ngenaocngoc heregoc tembuc tembuc songogoc hoangemebisia.
Ngeni ngenaocngoc heresongogoc hoangemegecdeu ngicngac sasawango ngeni neac medacfocna kecdae, imoc negenggecde.”
Ifi deu Simong Petorongo kpesimiec, “Kebu, ge dahai kennade?” ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ge yaguc ni kembade, imohai naric mi modacnunade, kecma ngadeguc modacnunade.”
Ifi deu Petorongo monggoc kpesimiec, “Kebu, ni nocac yaguc naric mi modacgubade? Ni geac amma kekecna naric waba doude.”
Ifi deu Yesungo meremma yofi edeec, “Ge naric neac amma kekecga wana doude, ifi denec me? Foracngoc, ni edegubade, kokorecngo mi arohomanu geng atac harebec neac busic kpenade.”
Ngeni ubaebic mi mebisia. Ngeni Anutu negensinggema ni ifingoc negensinnubisia.
Neac Mannaac amau amamana homac fekende. Imoc mi febac dede yofi bic edengunubai, “Ni ngeneac ama mana mengerebadeac kembade.
Amma ngeneac amatatac heitumeibadeac kemma dzigene hama hesicngunubade. Ni kecbade, ihai nenahafoc kecnideac negenduae.
Amma dahai kembade, ngeni imocac sing bic negendae.”
Anu Tomango kpesimiec, “Kebu, ge dahai kennade, imoc mi negendimbe. Imocac sing dafi negentegecnide?”
Kpesimiu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ninoc sing nga yoac fora amma kekec. Ngic mongngo nia kpacfu Manggacaru keng keng imocac sing mong mi fede.
Ngeni ni negennudaeu Manna ifingoc negemmigecde. Amma ngeni yaguc namma enude imohai ye negemmima bic hendae.”
Ifi deu Firipongo deec, “Kebu, ge Manggac edzacnununa henni socnunuude.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Firipo, ni naso herea ngeneac botucfu kecbare ge mi negennunec. Ngic mong ye nenec, yeng Manna henec. Nga dafiac Manggac edzacngunuba henggecdeac denec?
Ni Manggacac hereu kecduae nga Manggacngo neac hereu kecde. Ge imoc mi negensinggenec me? Yoac edengunuanduae, imoc neanna ubaac mi debade, kpac. Manggacngo neac hereu kecma ua imoc mekecde.
Ngeni yoacna yomoc negensinggegec, ni Manggacac hereu kecduae nga Manggacngo neac hereu kecde. Ifi deba obohogecdeu uana meanduae, imoc negensinggebisia.
Medacngo Manggacac kuc nga kibikperagi heficgeudeac amma ngeni wiac sasawa neac kpacfu kpesigec, imoc ambade.
Amma wiac monggac neac kpacfu kpesinenggecdeu ni imoc ambade.
Ngeni heregoc neac songo negenkecdaeu singyoacna modacgecde.
Amma ye yoac foraac Asu. Nga bangecfunac ngicngac yeni ye naric mi megecde. Yeni ye mi hengandae nga ye mi negemmigecde. Nga ngeneng ye negemmidae, ye ngeneac botucfu amma herenginaunoc kefude.
Nga wangunuba beging isoc mi kecgecde, kpac. Ni ngenearu habade.
Naso wegenanec wisickeuguc bangectoa bangec imocac ngicngac yeneng ni monggoc mi nenggecde nga ngeneng ine nenggecde, nocac ni kecduaeac amma ngeni kecgecde.

Ngic mong ye neac singyoac hoanggema modacande, ye heregoc neac songo negenude. Nga mong ye heregoc neac songo negenudeu Mannango yeac songo ifingoc negenude. Amma neng yeac songo negemma fingecmibade.”
Ifi deu Yuda Kariotoac waseango Yesu kpesimiec, “Kebu, ge nenisac fingecnemmebesonga negensinec nga bangectoa bangec, imocac ngicngac yenearu kpac, imoc dafiac?”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ngic mong ye heregoc neac songo negendeu ye enacyoacna modarude. Modaru Mannango yeac songo negenu nereng yeac hereu amatatacnira mema kecdede.
Nga mong ye heregoc neac songo mi negenude, ye enacyoacna mi modarude. Nga ni yoac deba negengandae, imoc neac yoac kpac, imoc Manggac suenuec yeac yoacnoc.
Ni ngenigoc kecma yoac yomoc edengunuduae.
Nga Manggacngo memeficngina Tiri Asu neac kpacfu sueu mama yeng wiac sasawa kpoungemmema yoac edengunuai, imoc heigboringemmeude.

Ni faingunu kembade nga ruaena faiduae, imocngo ngenearu fekefude. Bangectoa bangecac ngicngac yeneng ruae yemmeandae, ruaena imoc ifi isoc kpac. Imocac ngeni kengec mi ambisia amma ubaebic mi mebisia.
Nga kembadeac fora ngadeguc fingectegeru ngeni negensinggegecdeac amma kembadeac fora mi fingecmanungoc siduha yaguc edengunuduae.
Ni naso herea monggoc ngenigoc yoacyoac mi ambade. Bangectoa bangec yomocac ngictau haude. Nga yeac wiac mong neac hereu mi fede.
Ni Manggacac songo negengkecduae. Amma yeng uayoac deserinenec, imocac sirihau ua mekecduae, bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac yeneng imoc negentegecgecdeac amma deduae, ngeni yacgec wama kenni.”
Ni waing ic fora nga Mannango wainguaac mingina.
Ic fawa goa nearu fema fora mi angkecgec ye imoc sasawa kperecgema ukuyunuude. Nga fawa fora angandae, imoc sasawa foraya homac anudeac ye imoc kperecgema memengere anude.
Ni enacyoac edengunuaiac ngeni bic kongac kpegec kecdae.

Amma ngeni nigoc kpeketahema kecbisia. Ifi anggec neng ngenigoc kpeketahema kecbade. Ic fawango waing icfu mi kpeketaheudeu, ye fora naric mi anude. Ifi isocngoc ngeni nearu mi kpeketahema kecgecdeu fora mong mi anggecde.
Ni neannaoc waing ic nga ngeni fawafocna. Ngic mong ye nearu kpeketahema kecde, neng yearu ifingoc kpeketahema kecba yeng fora homac anude. Ngeni nia kpacfu ua mong naric mi megecde.
Mong ye nearu mi kpeketahema kefudeu ye ngicngo fawa heregema ukuu dzanggeande, ifi isoc ye ukugecde. Nga fawa ifia kpedzucnema gerecfu ukugec dzeude.
Ngeni nearu kpeketahema kecgecde nga neac yoac ngenearu kpeketahema feudeu wiac monggac angemmeu kpesigec, imoc fingecngemmeude.
Nga ngeni fora homac meficgemagec Manggacngo faka imocac kpac kuneng meu ngeni medacfocna fingectegecgecde.
Manggacngo ni songogoc hoannukefec, neng ifi isocngoc ngeni songogoc hoangngunukefai. Ngeni neac songo manau kpeketahema kecbisia.
Ni Mannaac dederecge yoac modacma yeac songo manau kpeketahema kecduae. Ifi isoc ngeneng neac singyoac modacgecdeu neac songoac manau kpeketahema kecgecde.
Neac ubafeacngo ngenearu fede nga ubangerecngina hafoangoc fengemmeudeac yoac yomoc edengunuduae.
Mong ye ogofora yeneac amma kekeha waude, yeac heresongo imoc engena yombong.
Nga ni singyoac ngemmeai, imoc sasawa modacgecdeu ngeni neac ogofocna anggecde.

Kingangmedac ye minginango wiac angkecde, imoc mi negenude. Imocac ni ngeneac kingangmedac monggoc mi debade, kpac. Ni ngeneac ogofocna deduae, nocac ni Manggacarunac yoac negennai, imoc sasawa edengunudarai.

Anu ngeni neac kpacfu wiac monggac kpesigec Manggacngo imoc ngemmeudeac amma neng meisingngunuai. Ngeneng ine ni mi meisinnugec, kpac. Meisingngunuma fora meficgegecdeac uau faingunuai. Nga ngeni kemma fora meficgebisia. Meficgegec fora imocngo fefeseri feengkefude.
Anu ni singyoac yofi ngemmeduae, ngeni ngenaocngoc heregoc songo negengemekecbisia.
Bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac yeneng ubango ukungunudaeu ngeni yofi negembisia. Yeni ubango ngeni mi ukungunugec imohai ni ubango bic ukunugec.

Ngeni bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac kecbau yeni yenang ayemmeande, ifi isocngoc ngeneac songo negembau. Nga ngeni ine bangec yomohanac kpac, neng ine ngeni bic meisingngunuma bangec yomocac ngicngac yenearunac meicngunuai. Imocacnoc yeneng ngeni ubango ukungunugecde.

Ni yoac warac edengunuai, imoc negenggec febeso, wanacngicngo mingina naric mi feraheude. Imocac amma ngicngac nukporac anenggec, yeni ifi isocngoc ngeni ngunukporac angemmegecde. Nga neac yoac hoanggeandaeu ngeneac yoac ifingoc hoanggegecde.
Yeni suenuec, ye mi negemmidae. Imocac yeni neac kpacnaac amma ngeni ifi angemmedacgecde.
“Ni mama yenearu yoacna mi debai dede yeni kopocsicngina kpac kecbau. Amma yaguc ine kopocsicnginaac amma degbedic anggecdeac sing mong mi fede.
Ngic mong ye ubango wanude, ye ifingoc Manna ubango waude.
Ni ua mekecduae ngic mongngo faka kuhagoc ifia bicngoc mi meec, imoc yeneac botucfu mi mebai dede, yeni kopocsicngina kpac kecbau. Nga yeni ine imoc yaguc hemmaguc Mannagoc neri ubango ukunurugec.
Anu yoac yomoc,
‘Yeni hania kpacfu ubango ukunugec.’
imoc dedeseriyoacnginau oho ohoya fede nga imocngo hafoangoc fingerudeac ifi anggec.
Nga ngeneng hanac hanaheaunacngoc nigoc kecgec, imocac ngeni ifingoc naric dekperaginugecde.”
Ngeni negemmangang amma mi wanugecdeac yoac yomoc bic edengunudua.
Ngic yeni kpekpeturang amaac kpae heingemmema ngadeau faingunugecde. Nga naso mong haude, imohai ngic yeni Anutuac ua medimbe dema ngunuhomegecde.
Yeni Manggac nga ni mi negennurudaeac ifi anggecde.
Ni hanac hanaheaunacngoc yoac imoc mi edengunuai nocac ni naso imohai ngenigoc kefai. Nga naso mong haude, imohai ni yoac edengunudua, imoc mi nigecngunuudeac amma yaguc monggoc edengunuduae.
“Ni suenuec, yearu dzigenebadeac naso wegene hade. Nga ngenearunac mongngo yofi mi kpesinende, ‘Ge dahai kennade?’
Neng yoac yomoc edengunuduaac ine ngeni ubahodungngo mewakengunuude.
Ni yoac fora edengunuduae, ni kembade, imocngo ngenearu ngereeude. Ni mi kembadeu memeficngina naric mi haude. Neng kemma ye sueba ngenearu haude.
Yeng hama bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac kopocsicngina nga faka dindingac amma desi desiua imoc edzacyunuma heficgeyemmeu negenggec fora anude.
Kopocsicac hania yofi, yeni ni mi negensinnudae.
Nga faka dindingacac hania yofi, ni Manggacaru emba ngeni mi nenggecde.
Amma desi desiac hania yofi, bangectoa bangec yomocac ngictau ye yoacfu bic makpeec.

Yoac foraac Asu maude, yeng yoac forau mekpedzuc angemmedarude. Amma ye yengena ubeaac yoac mi deude. Ye Anutuarunac yoac negengande, imoc deude nga faka ngadeu fingecbesande, imocac momoc edengunuude.
Ye ni dekperagingemmema kpac kuneng nenude, nocac ye neanna ubatohonnunac yoac imoc meude.
Manggacaru wiac sasawa fede, imocac mingina ni. Imocac amma yofi deduae, wiac sasawa Asungo mema dekperagingemmeude, imoc nearunac.
Ngeni naso wegenanec mi nenggecde nga naso wegenanec monggoc fede, imohai nenggecde.”

Ifi deu medacfora goa yenaocngoc kpesiemegec, “ ‘Naso wegenanec fede, imohai mi nenggecde nga naso wegenanec monggoc fede, imohai nenggecde.’ yoac imocac hania dafi? Amma monggoc dedac, ‘Ni Manggacaru kembade.’ ”
Anu negenggec obohou degec, “Naso wegenanec fede, imocac hania dafi? Neni yoac imocac hania obohodimbe.”

Medacfora yeneng kpesimibeso anggec Yesungo imoc bic negemma yofi edeyunuec, “Naso wegenanec fede, imohai mi nenggecde nga naso wegenanec monggoc fede, imohai nenggecde. Imocac ngenaocngoc kpesiemedae me?

Foracngoc, ngeni kiac songgong ammagec bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac yeneng sogaigecde, imoc edengunuduae. Nga ngeni ubahodung anggec ubahodungngina imocngo merennu ngeni ubangerec monggoc meficgegecde.
Ngac mong ye medacmeme nasoya wegene hau kpendzeng kpema sabac meude. Sabac mema ye kpendzeng imoc nigeckpeude. Ye sabac bangecfu bic fingecdac, imocac amma sogaiude.
Ngeni imocacsoc yaguc ubaebicgoc kecdae. Amma monggoc ngenemba imohai ngeni ubangerec negemma sogaigec ngic mongngo sogac sogaingina imoc naric mi meickeude.
Ngeni warac neac kpacfu wiac monggac mi numukecgec. Nga sogac sogainginango hafoangoc fengemmeudeac ngeni wiacac numuma mebisia.
Ni yoac heima yoac edengunukefai. Kecma nasoya hau ni yoac heima ngenearu monggoc mi debade, kpac. Ni didiu yombong Manggacac wiac dekperagibade.
Naso imohai ngeni neac kpacfu numugecde. Nga neng ngeneac amma Manggacaru numubade, imoc mi deduae.
Ngeni heregoc neac songo negendae nga ni Manggacarunac hayai, imoc negensinggegecde. Imocac Manggac yengenaoc ngeneac songo negende.
Ni Manggacarunac hama bangecfu mayai nga monggoc bangec wama Manggacaru dzigene kembade.”
Ifi deu medacfora yeneng degec, “Negenna, ge yaguc yoac mi heima didiu denec.”
Amma wiac sasawa negendacnec, imoc yaguc negendimbe. Ge mongngo kpesigenggecdeac mi obohonecac amma ge Anutuarunac hanec, imoc negensinggedimbe.
Ifi degec Yesungo medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni yaguc negensinggedae.
Ngeni nearu ruaegoc kecgecdeac yoac yoc edengunuduae. Nga ngeni bangectoa bangec yomohai kpendzeng kpema kecgecde. Nga ni bangec yomoc bic feraheaiac ngeni ubangina kuha mi mabeso.”

Yesungo yoac imoc dema kiwa kurumennu fiu enu yofi numuec, “Manggac, naso bic hadac. Ge medacgaac kuc nga kibikperagi ngicngac mekperagiyemmena. Ge ifi anna Medacngo ifingoc geac kuc nga kibikperagi ngicngac mekperagiyemmeude.
Geng bangecngicngac sasawa yeac kuc bageau faiyununec. Nga yeac areng denec yeng kekecseri yemmeudeac yeni yeac bageau kecgecdeac uayoac nga kuc ye minec.
Anu yeni Anutu mocgungo fora kecde amma yeng Yesu Kristo sueu maec negennurugecde, imocngo kekecseriac hania.
Ni ua mebadeac denennec, imoc mesiai amma geac kuc nga kibikperagi bangecfu mekperagiyemmeai.
Manggac, bangec nga kurumeng mi fingecmaecngoc ni geac kicfu kuc nga kibikperaginagoc kefai, ge kuc nga kibikperagina imoc nenna.
Manggac, ge geanggaoc ngicngacfocga bangec yomohacnac meisingyununa geac kpacga mekperagiyemmeai. Yeni geac ngicngac kecgec geng yeni nennec nga yeneng yoacga tofohoma kecgec.
Amma enacyoac nennec, imoc bic yemmeba megec. Imocac yeni wiac sasawa gearunac hau nennec, imoc negendae. Nga geng suenuna gearunac hayai, imoc ifingoc yaguc fora yombong negendae.
Imocac yeneac numugenduae. Bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac yeneac mi numuduae, kpac. Ni geng ngicngac nennec, yeneac amma numugenduae nocac yeni geac ngicngacareng
nga neac wiac sasawa imoc geac nga geac imoc neac. Nga ni yeneac kekecfu kuc kibikperagigoc mema kecduae.

Kekecnasona bangecfu wisickebeso ammanu yeni bangecfu kecmagec neng gearu habade. Kpetiac Manggac, nerang mocgu nga ifi isoc yeneng mocgu anggecdeac geng kpacga nennec, imoc arennu yenenggareng ambesena.

Neng yenigoc kefai, naso imohai kpacga nennec, imocngo garengyunuma onggongyunuba ngic mongngo mi sufuec. Yenearunac mocgusac, hofeac medac, yeng manganeec. Mitikibiu yoac fede, imoc hafoangoc fora fingerudeac ifi fingerec.
Anu neac feac feacngo yenearu sokodarudeac amma yoac sasawa yomoc bangec yomohaingoc dekperagima yaguc gearu habade.

Ni enacyoacga yemmeai. Amma yei kuriha kecduaeac bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac yeneng ubango ukunugec nga siriha imocngoc yeni kuric kecdaeac bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac yeneng yeni ubango ukuyunugec.
Ge bangecfunac meicyununadeac mi numugenduae, kpac. Manganaac minginango memayunubacac geng kaso ayemmebesena, imoc numugenduae.
Ni bangectoa bangec yomohanac kpac nga yeni ifi isocngoc yomohanac kpac.
Geac yoac imoc fora amma imocngo kpetiac kekecfu meyadiyunubeso.
Nga geng ni bangectoa bangec yomohai suenunec, ifi isocngoc neng yeni bangecfu sueyunuduae.
Yeni yoac forau kecma kpetiac kecgecdeac neng yeneac amma kpetiac kekecfu kecduae.
Anu ni yeneacsac mi numugenduae. Nga enacyoacga degec ngicngac yeneng imoc negemma negensinnugecde, yeneac momoc numugenduae.

Yeni sasawa mocgungoc anggecde nga geng suenunec, imoc ngicngac bangectoa bangec yomohai negensinggegecdeac yeneac yofi numugenduae, Manggac, ge neac hereu kecnec nga neng geac hereu kecduae, siriha ifingoc yeneng nerang here manau kecbisia.
Nerang mocgu kecdipe, ifi isoc yeni mocgu kecgecdeac amma geng kuc kibikperagiagoc nennec, imoc bic yemmeai.

Yeni mocgu yombong kecgecdeac neng herenginau kecba geng neac hereu kecnade. Ifi fingeru bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac yeni geng suenuna mayai, imoc negentegecgecde. Nga ge neac songo negennec, ifi isoc yeneac songo negengkecnec, imoc ifingoc negentegecgecde.

Manggac, bangec nga kurumeng mi fingecmaec ge bic heresongogoc hoannuma kuc nga kibikperagi nennec. Nga ngicngacfocna nennec, yeni neac kuc kibikperagiagoc imoc henggecdeac neng kecbade, imohaingoc nenahafoc kecbesandimbeac anende.
Faka dindingacac Manggac, bangecngic yeneng ge mi negenggugec neng ine negengguai. Nga geng ni suenuna mayai, neac ngicngacfocna imoc bic negendae.
Geng ni songogoc hoannunec, songo imocngo yeneac hereu feude nga ni herenginau kecbadeac neng geac kpac bic dekperagiyemmeai amma dekperagiyemmebade.”
Nunumu wisickeu Yesungo medacfora yenigoc mekemma Kidrong doku ferecgema noboc yufu ua mong feec, ihai kemma enggec.
Nga Yesungo medacfora yenigoc naso homac imohai kpeturanggekecgecac Yuda ye Yesu docfu faiu megecde, yeng ifingoc yufuua imoc negenec.
Ye ifi negemma womonggareng enara nga farisaio yeneac wasaingicfocngina amma kingangngicfocngina goa meyunuu hagec. Hama yenahafoc kifa hania hania nga yareac wiac goa momoc mekenggec.
Anu Yesungo faka fingecmiude, imoc bic negendarecac amma yenearu wegenac kemma yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni merac hofocdae?”
Kpesiyemmeu degec, “Yesu Nadzaretengic, ye hofocdimbe.” ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Imoc ni.”
Nga Yesungo yofi deec, “Imoc ni.” imohai yeni ngade ngade kemma bangecfu makpegec.
Kpefemagec monggoc kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni merac hofocdae?” deu degec, “Yesu Nadzaretengic.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merenec, “Ni bic edengunudua, imoc ninoc. Ngeni ni hofocnudaeu naric medac yomoc wayunugec kembisia.”
Nga Yesungo yoac bic deec, imocngo hafoangoc fora anudeac torokpema yofi deec,
“Ge ngic nennec, yenearunac mong mi waba sufuec.”
Anu Simong Petoro yeng wasaibeang mong ameagoc mekefec, imoc kpedzima imocngo womonggareng enaraac wanacngiha kpara Mariku, ye kpema kedzaha foiaugeng herecgeec.
Herecgeu Yesungo Petoro yofi edeec, “Ge beangga ameau faina kemeu. Manggacngo kpendzenggac sokoc nenec, imoc nedacbesare.”
Anu wasaingic goa nga enara amma yudangic yeneac keracnatang goa yeneng Yesu mendanggema maria dzegema
hanahema Hanasiaru mekenggec. Nga Hanasi kpegea Kaifa ye kifanaso imohai womonggarengtoa kefec.
Nga “Ngic mocgungo ngicngacareng yeneac amma homeude, imocngo ngereeude.” Imoc Kaifango yudangic bic dederecge ayemmeu feec.
Yeni Yesu mekemmagec Simong Petoro nga medac ogea mong, yeri Yesu modaroc. Modarec medac imocngo womonggarengtoa negemmiecac yeri Yesu modacma womonggarenggtoaac ama imocac oda manaungoc enec.
Enu Petoro ye ine oda naguac ngadeau nanec. Nammanu medac ogeango womonggarengtoa negemmiec, yeng mama nagugareng ngac naguu nanec, ye edema Petoro hesickeu oda manau enoc.
Emmaec wanac naroang nagugareng nanec, yeng Petoro kpesimiec, “Ge ifingoc ngic mehadau, yeac medac me?” deu Petorongo deec, “Ni imoc kpac.”

Nga ama nomang anecac wanacngic nga keracnatang yeneng hama gerecmosora kpedzucnema figec wewengaima feu sebingina megec gereeu nanggec. Nammagec Petoro ye ifingoc sebia meu gereeudeac hama botucnginau nanec.
Anu womonggarengtoango Yesu medacforaac nga yengena kpoukpou uayaac dekpesi ammiec.

Ifi ammiu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ni didiu bangecfu ngicngac yoac edeyunukecma yoacna nasosoc kpekpeturang amanginau amma womongtoanginau dekefai. Nga yudangic sasawa kpeturanggeandae, imohai dema sufu sufuu mong mi deai.
Nga geng nocac imoc kpesinennec? Ngicngac yoac deba negenggec, yeni kpesiyemmena. Negenghenna, yoac deai, yeneng negendae.”
Ifi deu keracnatang yenearunac mong wegenac nanec, yeng Yesu kpepatanggema yofi edeec, “Ge noc sinnu namma womonggarengtoaac yoac turunga ifi meremminec?”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ni yoac mong mangana deduae, imoc dekperagina me fora deduaeu nocac nudang?”
Ifi deu Hanasingo Yesu witihagoc sueu womonggarengtoa Kaifa, yearu mekenggec.
Anu Simong Petorongo sebia meu gereeu nammanu yeni kpesimigec, “Ge medacfora yeneac arennunac mong me?” ifi degec, yeng sebi heima deec, “Ni kpac.”
Ifi deu womonggarengtoaac wanacngic mong, ye Petorongo kedzaha herecgeec, yeac arennunac, yeng deec, “Ge yufu uau yegoc tacna neng genai.”
Ifi deu Petorongo monggoc busic kpeu imohaingoc kokorecngo arohoec.

Wereckengau yeni Yesu Kaifaarunac wasaingic oda manau kecandae ihai mekenggec. Nga womonggareng yeni Anutuac kicfu wonongnginagoc amma makekenggac ramamedaha mi nebinggac dema ine oda manau mi enggec.
Ifi anggec Piratongo sobennu mama kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni ngic yomoc noc haniaac yoacfu faidae?”
Ifi deu yeneng turunga meremmigec, “Ye faka mangana mi ambac dede gearu mi faibing.”
Ifi degec Piratongo yofi edeyunuec, “Ifi anu ngeni mekemma ngenang singngina modacma fakaya isinggema desigec.” Ifi deu yudangic yeneng degec, “Neni ngic mong kpeni homeudeac kuc mi metacdimbe.”
Yesungo warac yengena home homecac sing deec, imoc hafoangoc fora anudeac faka imocnoc fingerec.
Nga Piratongo oda manau monggoc emma Yesu kpacma kpesimiec, “Ge yudangic yeneac ngictau me?”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ge yoac imoc geanggaoc denec me goango neac edegudauac denec?”
Ifi deu Piratongo yofi meremmiec, “Ni yudangic kpac. Geangga ngicngacfocga amma womonggareng enara yeneng nearu faigudau. Nga geng noc faka annec?”

Ifi deu Yesungo yofi merennec, “Neac eucerereng imoc bangectoa bangec yomohacnac kpac. Imoc yomohacnac ambac dede ni yudangic yeneac mariu mi fainugecdeac enac tofoc tofohofocna yeneng neac amma yenigoc ewekpekpe ambau. Nga neac eucerereng imocngo bangec yomohacnac kpac.”

Ifi deu Piratongo deec, “Fora, ge ngictau mong me?” ifi deu Yesungo yofi merenec, “Geng neac ngictau mong denec. O, ni ua imoc mebadeac fingecma yoac fora imocac hepuc amma imoc dekperagibadeac bangectoa bangec yomohai mayai. Nga ngic mong ye yoac foraac arennu kecde, yeng neac ubaudumennaac kedzac kpeude.”
Ifi deu Piratongo deec, “Nga nocngo yoac fora ande?”
Ifi dema monggoc Yuda yenearu dzigene mama yofi edeyunuec, “Ni yeac kopocsic mong mi meficgeduae.
Ni ngic mocgu makekenggac hombannu witicamaunac faingemmeba maande, faka ifi fedeac yudangic ngictaungina faingemmeba maudeac angemmede me?”
Ifi deu yeni monggoc kucgoc yombong arohogec, “Ngic ye kpac, Baraba ine faina mabeso.” Nga Baraba ye ine yarengic.
Anu Piratongo deu wasaingic yeneng dzikacngo Yesu kpema sebia kperec merecge kpegec.
Kpema somang batihema ngickunenggac ira isoc mengerema oruhau gborockegec. Nga yeni ngakpi mong herea giweng giweng heimigec kemeec.
Ifi amma hoangau hama degec, “Ohec, yudangic yeneac ngictau.” Ifi dema kpekpepetang ammigec.
Anu Piratongo monggoc ngadeau mama deec, “Negenggec, ni ngic yeac kopocsic mong mi meficgeduae, imoc negenggecdeac amma wangecma maduae.”
Ifi deu Yesungo ngakpia giweng giweng nga iraya waeagoc, imoc tacmanungoc mama nanu Piratongo deec, “Ngeni ngic yomoc henggec.”

Ifi deu womonggareng enara nga keracnatang yeneng ye hemma kpacgec, “Mariponnu kpegec, mariponnu kpegec!” ifi degec Piratongo deec, “Ni yeac kopocsic mong mi meficgeduaeac amma ngenaoc wangecma kemma mariponnu kpegec.”
Ifi deu yudangic yeneng meremma degec, “Ye yengena sebia meemma ni Anutuac medac deec, imocac neni dedeseriyoacnina fede, imohai namma ye homebeso, ifi dedimbe.”
Ifi degec Piratongo negemma monggoc damukpeec.
Damukpeu ye oda manau monggoc emma Yesu kpesimiec, “Ge dahacnac yombong?” ifi deu Yesungo turunga mong mi merenec.
Ifi anu Piratongo monggoc kpesimiec, “Ge neac yoac turunga nocac mi merennec? Ni naric mesigubade nga mariponnu naric gubade, imocac uayoac nga kuc nearu fede, ge imoc mi negennec me?”
Ifi deu Yesungo meremma yofi edeec, “Ge kuc imoc wihacnac mi genggena dede geanggaoc naric mi memanubang. Imocac yofi ande, ngic geac mariu fainudac, yeac kopocsicngo geac ferahede.”

Ifi degec Piratongo imoc negemma Yesu wau kenudeac sing hoforec. Hofocma Yesu wangeru ama ngadeau mama bangecbisic botuha mong kpara Hocdzake, ihai desi desitatacfu emma tarec. Bangecbisic imoc hebiraio yoacfu kpara Gabata.
Anu makekeng nasoac efac kpefac amma yaka kpedzucnegec femanu 12 kiroc wegeneu Piratongo yudangicngac yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni ngictaungina henggec.”

Ifi deu yeni kpacgec, “Meickena, meickema mariponnu kpena homeu!” Ifi kpacgec edeyunuec, “Ni ngictaungina mariponnu kpeba homeudeac negendae me?” Ifi deu womonggareng enara yeneng meremma degec, “Ngictaunina imoc Sisa, mong mi kecde, kpac.”
Ifi degec Piratongo mariponnu kpegecdeac maringinau faiec.
Faiu Yesu yengenaoc mariponga tofohou bangec buma mong kpara Hatasic degec nga hebiraio yoacfu Gorigata, imohai mekenggec.
Imohai kemma Yesu mariponnu kpegec. Nga yegoc ngic yohockang noboc nga noboc Yesu botucngirau, ifi yunugec.
Anu Piratongo yoacbuma mong yofi ohoma mariponnu faiu nanec, “Yesu Nadzaretenac, yudangic yeneac ngictau.”
Anu Yesu mariponnu kpegec, bangecbisic imoc amatoa wegenacfu feecac amma yudangicngac homacngo kibi imoc osogec. Kibi imoc hebiraio yoacfu nga latingyoacfu amma grikyoacfu oho ohoya nanec.

Ifi oho ohoya femanu yudangic yeneac womonggareng enarafocngina yeneng Pirato yofi edegec, “Yudangic yeneac ngictau, ifi mi ohona. Ngic yomoc yengenaoc deec, ni yudangic yeneac ngictau, ge ifi ohobesena.”
Ifi degec Piratongo deec, “Yoac ohoduae, imoc ohoduanoc.”
Anu wasaingic yeni Yesu mariponnu kpegec nanu wambaya mema mederegec, yohoc nga yohoc anu sokoma megec. Nga ngakpia imoc susuic dzuhura kpac,
yeni imoc hemma denengeng amma degec, “Nenang yomoc mi mesuckema meracac anudeac kpeing kpeni.” Anutuac yoac hafoangoc fora fingerudeac wasaingic yeni ifi anggec. Yoac yofi oho ohoya fede,
“Yeneng wambana botunginau mederema ngakpina merang meudeac kpeing kpegec.”
Nammagec Yesungo songomedaha henu nonggeagoc wegenac nanec yeremma nonggea yofi edeec, “Nenggac, imoc geac medacyombongga.”
Ifi dema medac, ifingoc edeec, “Medac, imoc geac nonggoga.” Ifi deu medac ye imohaingoc Yesu nonggea yegoc kefudeac wangeru ameau kenoc.
Ifi deu bokong mong waing aengagoc wake wakea nanec, yeni kondung sobing mong imohai mema wainnu nemuruckema babacmeacfu dzegema faigec Yesuac enarau enec.
Enu Yesungo waing imoc nema yofi dema arohoec, “Ni uana bic mesidacdua.” Ifi demanu ubea sorohoma mau asuya yaru homeec.
Kpesimigec wasaingic yeneng hama ngic Yesugoc mariponnu yurugec, yereac haningira monggac hanahema kpetackema monggac ifingoc kpetackegec.
Kpetackema Yesuaru hama henggec, ye bic homeec, ifi anu hania mi kpetackegec.
Nga wasaingic mongngo ine sangarango Yesuac pandzenga nembarackeu sac nga doku imohacsing maec.
Ngeni ifingoc faka fingerec, imoc negensinggegecdeac amma ni kicnango hendarai nga imoc dekperagiduae. Amma ni wiac dekperagiduae, imocngo fora ande, imoc negenduae.
“Yeni sira mong mi kpetackegecde nga kpetackebesandae.”
Yoac yomocngo mitikibiu oho ohoya fede, imoc hafoangoc fora fingerudeac ifi fingerec.
“Nembaracnugec, ngic imoc yeni kicnginango nembesandae.”

Imoc wisickeu ngic mong kpara Yosefe Arimatianac, yeng Piratoaru kemma Yesuac fareng mesiudeac kpesimiec. Kpesimiu Piratongo desiu Yosefengo kemma Yesuac farenga mesiec. Imoc yofiac, ye Yesuac medac anu ye yudangic yeneac kengec kpeu fingectegecma mi kefec.
Nga Nikodemo, ye warac tofocnac Yesugoc yoacyoac anoc, yeng ic sopea homuna gombunga ebiha 30 kiroacsoc, imoc mehaec. Sopo yereac kpacngira mira nga aloe, imocngo yerec yerecgea.
Yeri imoc mehama yudangic yeneac fareng tonggo tonggoac faka modacma farenga mema sopongo kpedanggema lineng kporucngo tembonggeoc.
Anu yeri Yesu mariponnu kpegec, bangec botuc imohaingoc ua mong feec, ua imocac manau kedzebe mong gboria ngicngo memea nanec. Nanu kicsere ngic mong warac mi faigec, imohai faioc.
Yudangic yeni imohai hombanggac efac kpefac anggec nga kicsere imoc wegenac feecac Yesuac farenga imohai faioc.
Sonda gboria uameme hanac hanaheau ama werec wereckenggac Maria Madarango kicsereu kemma kedzebe naguac hoctoa, imoc meic meickea henec.
Ifi hemma monggoc nedzikemma Simong Petoro nga medac mong, Yesuac songomedaha, yeri edeyuruec, “Yeni Kebu kicsereunac meickema dahaigeng faidau, imoc mi negendimbe.”
Ifi deu Petoro nga medac ogea yeri kicsereu kemma
yerahafoc sinnu nedzikemma medacogeango kucgoc nedzima Petoro ferahema yeng bic kicsereu kensikeec.
Kensikema okarima henu kporucsusu tembonggegec, imocngosac tarec. Nga ye manau ine mi enec.
Simong Petoro ye ngade hama kicsereu emma henu kporucsusu imoc tarec.
Kporucsusu oruhau kperahagec, imocngo tembuha kporuc tosea kpou faifaiango imocgoc mi tarec, ifi henec.
Ifi hemma nammanu medacogea waraima kicsereu kenec, yeng ifingoc kicsereu emma imoc hemma negensinggeec.
Imoc yofiac, Yesu homecfunac yacbeso, imocac mitikibiu oho ohoya fede, yeri imoc warac mi ireckemangoc
dzigenema amangirau kenoc.
Anu Mariango kicsere ngadeau namma kiarec. Kiacmangoc okarima kicsereu kic fima henec.
Henu angero yohockang yeri ngakpiherecngira kongac kongac yerenec. Yerenu Yesuac farenga feecfu, mongngo oruhaugeng nga mongngo haniaugeng, ifi taroc.
Tacma kpesimioc, “Ngac, ge nocac kiacnec?” kpesimiec Mariango merenec, “Yeni Kebunaac farenga meickema dahai faidauac obohoma kiacduae.”
Ifi dema dzigene henu Yesungo ngadeau nanec. Nanu Yesungo nande, imoc mi hentegeru
Yesungo yofi kpesimiec, “Ngac, ge merac hofocma kiacnec?” deu negenec, “Ua minginango kpesinende.” ifi negemma deec, “Kunenna, geng Yesuac farenga meickema monnu faidang isoc edenuna kemma meba.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Maria.” ifi deu dzigenema “Rabbouni.” deec. (Arama yoacfu Rabbouni, imocac titiha kpoukpouna.)
Nga Yesungo yofi edeec, “Mannaaru mi enduangoc, imocac mi kpeserenuna. Ge kemma tosofocna yofi edeyununa, ‘Ni Manna nga ngeneac Manggac amma neac Anutuna nga ngeneac Anutu, yearunoc embade.’ ”
Ifi deu Maria Madarango medac yenearu kemma Yesu henec nga yoac edeec, imoc edeyunuec.

Uameme imohaingoc ama bic toforemanu Yesu medacfora yeni yudangic yeneac kengecyunuu amangina nagu heima kpetinggema tacgec. Tacmagec Yesungo hama botucnginau namma yofi edeyunuec, “Ruae ngenearu febeso.”
Ye ifi dema maria nga pandzenga edzacyunuec. Edzacyunuu medacfora yeni Kebu hemma sogaigec.
Nga Yesungo monggoc yofi edeyunuec, “Ruae ngenearu febeso. Mannango suenuu hayai, neng ifi isocngoc ngeni suengunuduae.”
Ye ifi dema enacasuya fifiyemmema yofi deec, “Ngeni Tiri Asu megec.”
Ngeni ngic yeneac kopocsic wayemmegecdeu kopocsicngina wawaya anude. Nga ngeni kopocsicngina witickegecdeu kopocsicnginaac witicfu kecgecdengoc.
Medac 12 yeneac botucfunac mong kpara Toma, Tombosonga degec, yeng Yesungo medacfora fingecyemmeec, naso imohai mi tarec.

Imocac medac ogofora yeneng edegec, “Neni Kebu hending.” degec Tomango deec, “Ni kicnango biringngo kpegec mi hembade nga gbonnango maria titingau mi faibade amma pandzengau marinango mi faiba enudeu imoc naric mi negensinggebade.”
Ifi deu uameme 8 imocac ngadeau Yesu medacfora nga Toma yenahafoc monggoc emma tacgec. Yeni nagungina heima kpetinggema tacmagec Yesungo botucnginau fingecma namma yofi deec, “Ruae ngenigoc febeso.”
Ifi dema Tomaac yofi deec, “Toma, gbongga sinena marinaac titingau enu nga kicgango henna. Amma mariga sinena pandzennau enu negengyohoc wama negensinggena.”
Ifi deu Tomango deec, “Ge Kebuna amma Anutuna.”
ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge kicngo nendanggac negensinggenec. Nga ngic mong ye kicngo mi hemma negensinggeude, ye kenehagoc.”
Yesungo medacfora yeneac kicfu ngicngac yeneng negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc homac mekenec, imoc kibi yomohai mi ohodarai.
Nga Yesu ye Messia Anutuac medac, ngeni imoc negensinggema kekec yeac kpacfu mekecgecdeac kibi yomoc oho ohoya fede.
Imocac ngadeau Yesungo Tiberia dzohonnu medacfora monggoc fingecyemmeec. Imoc yofi fingerec,
Simong Petoro nga Toma Tombosonga dekecgec amma Natanae Gariraia bangecfu Kanang taonnunac nga Dzebedaioac medachora amma Yesuac medacfora yenearunac ngic yohockang, yeni yenahafoc tacgec.

Tacma Simong Petorongo ogofora edeyunuec, “Ni kondungyanggac kembadeac negenduae.” Ifi edeyunuu degec, “Neni gegoc momoc kennide.” Ifi dema yenahafoc gombau emma kemma tofocnac imohai kondungyang mong mi megec.
Wiac mong mi mekecmagec ama wereckenu Yesungo dzohong tegiau nanec. Nanu yeni Yesungo nande, imoc mi hensigec
Yesungo yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Medacfocna, ngeni kondungyang mong medau me kpac?” deu yeni degec, “Kpac.”

Ifi degec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni uficngina gomba foiaugeng ukugec kemeu goa meficgegecde.” Ifi deu yeni deec imoc modacma uficngina ukugec kemeu kondungyang ebiriango yombong uficfu kemegecac kpedzibibiema wagec.
Nga Yesuac songomedacngo Petoro edeec, “Imoc Kebunoc.” ifi deu Simong Petorongo negemma sebiasac nanecac ngakpia heima gombaunac yuma dzohonnu kemema waraiyemmeec.
Nga medacfora goa dzohong tegiaugeng 100 mitaacsoc hereau mi tacgecac yeni gombau namma uficngina kondungyangagoc kpedzi kpedzi kenggec.
Kensikema tegiau emma henggec ic sogong goa nga kondungyang gerecyohocfu tarec.
Ifi taru Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni kondungyang goa yaguc medau, imoc mehagec.”
Ifi anggec Simong Petorongo tembuha gombau emma ufic kpedziu tegiau enec. Nga imoc kondungyang kuneng kunengngo wakema kpetengina 153 imocacsoc anec nga uficngo sifu mi tegerec.
Nga Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni hama menegec.” ifi deu medacfora kengecyunuu yenearunac mongngo, ge merac dema, mi kpesimigec. Imoc Kebunoc, yeni ifi bic negenggec.
Nga Yesungo gerec kiwau hama ic sogong mema yemmema kodungyang ifingoc mema yemmeec.
Yesungo homecfunac yarec, naso imohai medacfora fingecyemmeec, imoc atac harebec anec.

Anu yaka negec wisickeu Yesungo Simong Petoro yofi kpesimiec, “Simong Yohaneac medac, ge neac songo heregoc negennec, imocngo tosofocga yeneac ferahede me?” ifi deu Petorongo deec, “O, Kebu ni geac heresongo negenduae, ge imoc bic negennec.” Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ge ramafocna medaha yaka gumecyunubesena.”

Dema Yesungo monggoc deu atac yohockang anec, “Simong Yohaneac medac, ge foracngoc neac songo heregoc negennec me?” deu Simongngo deec, “O, Kebu ni geac heresongo negenduae, imoc bic negennec.” ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ge ramafocna yeneac gareng kecbesena.”

Dema Yesungo monggoc kpesimiu atac harebec anec, “Simong Yohaneac medac, ge neac songo heregoc negennec me?” Yesungo kpesimiu atac harebec anu Petoro ye negengebirima Yesu yofi edeec, “Kebu, ge wiac sasawa negendacnec. Ni geac heresongo negenduae, imoc bic negennec.” ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge ramafocna meyunuma yaka gumecyunubesena.”

“Ni fora yombong edeguduae, ge sebigbori kecma geanggaoc wambaga faima songoga modacma kengha angannec. Nga ge kpengeng annade, naso imohai mariga miacna ngic mongngo wamba heigemma songoga mi fede, imohai megu kemma faigugecde.”
Petorongo homehau siric dafi homema Anutu dengereude, Yesungo imocac heabima deec. Amma monggoc edeec, “Ge hama modacnuna.”
Nga Petorongo medac imoc hemma Yesu kpesimiec, “Kebu, ge yeac dafi negennec?”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ni songona andeu yeng kecmanungoc dzigene habade, imocngo ine geac wiac mi ande. Ge eng hama modacnuna.”

Ifi deu tosofora botucnginaunac yofi netohogec wakeec, “Medac imoc mi homeude.” Nga Yesungo mi homeudeac mi deec, kpac. Ye yofisac deec, “Ni songona andeu yeng kecmanungoc dzigene habade, imocngo geac wiac mi ande.” Yoac wisic wisickea.
Yesungo wiac goa homac meec, ngic mongngo wiac imocac yoac sasawa kibiu ohodacbac, imoc bangectoa bangec yomohai faifaiac titinga negemba mi fingecbac.
Ye uaya mekengkefu nasoya wegene haec imohai Tiri Asuac kucfu aposoro warac meisingyunuec, yeni uaareng dederecge ayemmema kurumennu enec, imocac siducnoc ohodarai.
Amma yenigoc tacyac amma yoac yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni Yerusaleng bic mi wabisia. Manggacac dedeseriyoac edengunuba negenggec, imoc fora kpeudeac tomai kecbisia.
