Imoc yofiac, Yohane ye doku bic nadzicngemmeec nga yoc ine naso mi hereemanu Tiri Asu nadzicngemmeude.”
Negenggec, Tiri Asungo ngenearu mama kuc ngemmeu ngeni siducdedefocna anggecde. Nga ngeni Yerusaleng amma Yudaia nga Samaria bangec sasawa yerecgema yoacna dekenggec bangeha bangeha sokodacbeso.”
Yesungo ifi edeyunuma kicngina witiau efaima enec. Emmanu hoengngo kicnginaungoc merucgema meenec.
Meemmanu yeni fimodacma hofocgec ngic yohockang ngakpingira kongac kongacngo mi yenearu fingecma nambesera i.

Namma yofi edeyunuoc, “Gariraia bangecfunac ngic, ngeni kicngina sawau fimangoc mi nambisia. Anutungo Yesu kurumennu meenu ye wangunuma endac. Amma ngic enu hendau, yennoc kecma siriha ifiangoc habesande.”

Yerusalennu kemma ama tacyac angkecgec, imohai emma tacgec. Tacgec, yeneac kpac yofi: Petoro nga Yohane amma Yakobo, Anderea nga Firipo amma Toma, Batoromaio nga Mataio amma Yakobo Arifaioac medac, Simong Dzerote nga Yuda Yakoboac medac.
Ngic imoc yenennoc uba mocgu amma nunumu ua tatahoc mekecgec. Ifi anggec Yesuac nonggea Maria nga ngac goa amma Yesuac munafora, yeneng yenigoc yenahafoc kecma nunumu ua momoc mekecgec.
Anu Yesuac arengfora 120 nganoc ifingo kpedzucnema tacmagec Petorongo botucnginau namma yofi edeyunuec.
“Negen negensinggoc tosofocna, negenggec, Yudango ngic hesicyunuu kemma Yesu mendanggegec, yeacnoc Tiri Asungo bicngoc Dawidiac enacfu yoac faiu ohoec, imoc fora fingecbeso, imocac ifi anec.
Yuda warac nenang arennoc amma kefec, ye nenahafoc Kebuac uamemeac denecdenemmea.”
Amma imocac siduc Yerusaleng ngicngac sasawa negendacma bangec, imocac kpara Akedama degec, titiha yofi, ‘Bangec sac maecfu.’ ”
“Mitiyegecfu yoac yofi oho ohoya fede,
‘Ye amabangeha kisi fingeru ngic mongngo yeac kporucbedzou mi tacbeso.’
Amma monggoc yofi,
‘Ngic mongngo yeac ngicenaraac tatac mebeso.’
Petorongo ifi deu ngic yohockang meficyurugec: Mong kpara Yosefe Basaba dekecgec, yeac kpara mong Yusto, amma ogea Matia.
Meficyuruma yofi dema numugec, “O, Kebu ubaheheng mingina, ge ngic yohockang yoc yerearunac daoc meisinggema edzacnununa henni.
Henni yeng aposoro kpac mema Yudaac tatac mebeso. Yuda ye tataha imoc wama yengena sing monnu kenec.”
Ifi dema numuma meisinggeudeac kpeing kpegec Matia heficgeu aposoro 11 yenearu torokpegec.
Pentekos tacyacac naso wegenemanu yenahafoc ama mocguu kpedzucnema engensicfu tacgec.
Tacmagec kurumennunac udumengtoa mong firang kucgoc kpeande, imocac udumeng isoc ioha yombong fingecma maec. Mama ama tacgec, ihai emma wakeu
yeni siriha yofi henggec: Nedzarang gerecborang isoc fingecma ngicngac orucnginasoc tohoma tackenec.
Anu Tiri Asungo ubanginau kemema wakeec. Wakeu yoac siriha mong mong degec. Asungo minginasoc meficgeyemmeu yoac dekenggec.
Anu yudangic homac bangec noboc nobocnac hahayango Yerusaleng taonnu tacgec, yeni Anutuac yoac modacma kecgec.
Nga udumengtoa fingeru habu homacngo imoc negemma hama kpedzucnema kerectegec anggec. Imoc yofiac, Tiri Asugoc yeneng ngicngac yeneac yoacnginausing tembuc tembuc degec negenggec.
Negemma kerectegec amma warecyunuma degec, “Ngic yomoc yoac andae, yeni sasawango gariraiangic.
Nga yeni dafiu nenang yoacninausing yombong tembuc tembuc degec negendimbe?
Neni yoc patangic nga medengic amma erangngic, me Mesopotamia bangecfunac nga Yudaia bangecfunac amma Kapadokia bangecfunac, neni Ponto bangecfunac nga Asia bangecfunac,
amma monggoc Firigia bangecfunac, neni Pamfiria bangecfunac nga Aigita bangecfunac amma Ribia bangecfu Kirene ama tegia tegia, imohacnac amma Roma taongtoaunac hading.
Amma yudangic nga bangec monnunac ngic yudangic yenigoc torokpegec, kretangic amma arabiangic. Nenang ifingoc kecma yoacninasoc Anutu fakatoayaac yoacsiduc degec negendimbe.”
Ifi dema kerectegec amma obohoma denegeng amma degec, “Faka fingecde, imoc wiac siriha mong yombong, imoc mi negentegecdimbe.”
Goango ine yeneac deendema amma yofi degec, “Yeni waingdoku homac nedauac ubangina sufude.”
Ifi degec Petoro ye tosofora 11 yenigoc namma ubea meyadima yofi edeyunuec, “Yudangicngac amma ngicngac sasawa Yerusalennu kecdae, ni faka yomocac hania dekperagingemmeba negenggec.
Ngeni ngic yomoc yenemma yofi negensidae, ‘Waingdoku nema ubangina sufude.’ ifi kpac. Yaguc asoac 9 kirocsac andeac waingdoku mi nedau, kpac.
Nga faka yomocacnoc, profete Yoelengo yoac yofi deec,

‘Anutungo yofi dede, “Naso wisickebeso ammanu ni Asuna kpakeba mau ngicngac sasawango medacbesandae. Amma naroang medacfocngina yeni profeteyoac degecde nga sebigborifocngina onga henggecde amma yadafocngina gaukpefing henggecde.
Amma naso imohainoc ni enac tofoc tofoho ngicngacfocna, yenearu Asuna kpakeba mau yeni profeteyoac degecde.
Amma deba wi sawau soi fingerude. Nga emu bangecfu faka bibiagoc siria hania hania fingerude. Naso imohai sac nga gerec amma hosuctoa fingerude.
Kebuac nasotoaac kuc kibikperagiagoc mi fingecmanu wenackiwa meremma kundung kpeude nga afokiwa sac isoc anude.
Anu Ngicngac yeneng

Israengic, ni edengunuba negenggec, Yesu Nadzaretenac, ye Anutungo meefaima nonggo tacmimanu botucnginau faka kuhagoc nga negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc nga faka mi hengena meec. Imoc bic irec ireckeaac hania hentegecgec.
Yeacnoc Anutungo bicngoc negenu feec, imocac sing desima ngeneac mariu faiec. Ngeneng ye bangec monnunac ngic, dedeseria kpac
Anu homecngo ye naric mi segereec. Imocac Anutungo homecac kpendzennunac megboriu yarec.
Dawidingo yeac enac mema yofi deec,
‘Ni nasosoc kicna
Imocac ubaherenango ubangerec negemma nedzarannango sogaiu sebina ifingoc ruaegoc anude.
Geng ubaongana homecamau naric mi wanade. Amma ge kpetiac ngicga kisereu wana mi hoaeude.
Geng kekecac sing kpounennec. Geac kicfu sogac sogai hafoangoc fede nga foigaugeng ubangerec feengkecbesande.’
Yoac imoc Dawidingo dekperagiec.
Ye profete kefecac yofi negenec, ‘Anutungo yeac bangecyombonga yeneac arennunac medaha mong meisinggema ye ngictautatahau faiu tarudeac deseriec.’
Imoc kpefing hemma negemma Kristo yacyahaac yofi deec,
‘Anutungo homecamau mi waec nga farenga kisereu mi hoaeude.’
Anu Yesu yenoc Anutungo homecfunac midiu yaru neni kicninango fora hendaring.
Ye yacma dzigene enu Anutu marifoiango seseheec. Nga Mamango warac Tiri Asu miudeac deec, ye imoc mema kpakeu maec, imoc yagucnoc hennegeng andae.
Dawidi ye kurumennu mi enec, kpac. Yeng ine yoac yofi deec,
ngabafocga hanigaac bageau faiyunuba yeni hanigaac tatac ambesandae.” ’
Petorongo yoac ifi edeyunuu herengina yaru, yengena nga aposoro arengfora yofi kpesiyemmegec, “Tosofoc, neni dafi anni ngereeude?”
Ifi degec Petorongo yofi edeyunuec, “Anutungo kopocsicngina waudeac ngeni ubangina dzigeneu tembuc tembuc Yesu Kristoac kpacfu doku nadzicgec. Ifi anggec Anutungo wosoefahaac Tiri Asuya ngemmeude.
Nga dedeseriyoac imoc ngenang nga nambaracfocngina amma hereau kecdae, Kebu Anutuninango kpacngunuma heitaingunuudesoc, ngeni naric megecde.”
Petoro ye ifi dema gorongina kpema yoac homac torokpema edeyunuec, “Kebungo ngic mangac manganea yeneac faka imohacnac mesingunuu ngeni komoc kpebisia! Yenigoc manganema kpac ambauac.”
Anu wenac ihai ngicngac 3 tauseng yeni Petoroac yoac negensinggema doku nadzicma Yesuac habuu torokpegec.
Nga aposoro yenearu faka kuhagoc nga faka morora hania hania fingectegerecac ngicngac sasawango kerectegec anggec.
Anu Yesu negensinggegec, yeni uba urecfu wiac sasawangina imoc mekecgec.
Amma yeni bangec nga hiefinacngina suegec dzo kirecgeu tosofocngina wiac hofocgecsoc medereyemmegec.
Nga ngicngac wenacsoc Anutuac womonnu uba mocgu amma kpedzucnekecgec, yeni uba urecfu amaya amaya yaka nekecma yakangina imoc ubangerecgoc mederema emenec angkecgec.
Ifi amma Anutu dengerema kecgec ngicngac habutoango yeneng dzidziema eweheihei ayemmegec. Anu Kebungo wenaha wenaha ngicngac kopocsicfunac mesiyunuu komoc kpegec yengena arennu torokpeyunuec.
Wenac monnu 3 kiroc marai nunumunaso anu Petoro nga Yohane yeri Anutuac womonnu enoc.

Anu ngic mong hanimangang nonggo heremanaunac ifia fingerec, ye Kebuac womonnu nagu mong kpara Nagukereng, ihai wenaha wenaha tofoho emma faigec takefec. Ye ngicngac womonnu engemmama anggec, yenearu ubangerecac wiacac derecgeudeac ifi anggec.
Ngic imocngo Petoro nga Yohane yeri womonnu embeso ammaec yeremma ifingoc ubangerecac wiacac derecgeyemerec.
Derecgeyemeru yereng ye henserioc. Henserima Petorongo yofi edeec, “Ge nerenna!”
Ifi deu “Yereng wiac mong nembesonga dedape.” ifi negemma kic fima yerenec.
Ifi dema marifoiau mema miaru imohaingoc hania ubea seriec.
Seriu kucbiric yacma namma yerigoc womonnu enggec. Emma yeng yu engemmama nga sing kengha amma Kebu dengereec.
Kebu dengerema kengha anu ngicngac hafoangoc yeneng hemma degec.
“Yennoc womonggac nagu kpara Nagukereng, ihai hiedzoac derecgeyemmeudeac takefec.” Ifi dema hensima kpidohoma dzonong fedefede anggec.
Ngic ye Petoro nga Yohane yerearu kpeketaheu ngicngac homacngo Anutuac womong mana kakasang mong feec, kpara Salomo, imohai yerearu kemma kpedzucnedacma kerectegec anggec.

Ifi anggec Petorongo yenemma ngicngac yofi edeyunuec, “Israe ngicngac, ngeni ngic yomoc hemma kerectegec mi ambisia. Amma ngeni neri mi nerenseribisia. Faka imoc nereac kucac mi fingecdac nga imoc nereng Kebuac kicfu gombunga kecdipeac mi fingecdac.

Imoc kpahac, kisicfocngina Abrahang nga Isaka amma Yakobo, yeneac Anutu yennoc enac tofoc tofohoa Yesu ngickunenggac kuc kibikperagiagoc miec. Ngeni ine ye ngadehema bangec monnunac ngic Anutu mi negemmidae, yenearu faigec. Foracngoc, Piratongo yoara isinggema yungecbesonga desiec. Nga ngeneng ine wagec.
Yenoc ngic kpetiac nga faka dindingac mekecde nga ngeneng ine ye wagec. Amma godzungicngo ngic mong kpeu homeec, ngeni yenoc yungecngemmeudeac serima dema
kekecac enarameme kpegec. Nga Anutungo ye homecfunac megboriu yarec, neni imocac hepuc aning.
Nga neri Yesuac kpac kpacma negensinggedicac ngic yomoc hendae, ye kuc medac. Nga Yesuac kpacfu negen negensinggoc kecdipe, imocac amma ye ngereehomedac. Ngeni sasawango faka imoc hendae.
Foracngoc, Anutungo Messia meisinggeec, yeng kpendzeng kpekecma homeudeac profete sasawa yeneac enacfu yoac faiu degec, imoc sasawa Anutu deecfu fingecdarec.
Imocac ngeni kopocsicngina meicmeickea anudeac ubangina dzigeneu Anutu hoanggebisia.
Ifi anggecdeu Anutuac hoannunac kenec kuhagoc haude. Amma bicngoc Messia meisinggengemmeec, ye suengemmeude, imoc Yesunoc.
Ye kurumennu emma kecmanungoc, wiac sasawaac mengec mengere naso hau dzigeneude. Imocac yoac Anutungo bicngoc yombong kpetiac profetefora enacnginau faiu dekperagigec.
Mosengo yofi deec,
‘Kebu Anutunginango ngeneac arennunac profete mong ni isoc, ifia meficgengemmeu yeng yoac sasawa deude, imoc negendacbisia.
Anu mongngo profete imocac yoac mi tofohoudeu ye arengnginaunac meickema kpehomebesonga.’
Naso yomohai faka fingecdac, imoc Samuearunac profete sasawa nangeregec, yeneng bic dekperagigec.
Anutungo kisicfocngina yenigoc dzadzahac mema Abrahang yofi edeec,
‘Bangecga yeac arennu ngicngac bangeha bangeha keneheyunudacbesandua.’
Ngeni dzadzahac imoc nga profete yeneac ubamarac imoc mekecdae.
Ngeneacnoc bic negensima Anutungo medaha sueu mama fingerec, imoc ngeni sasawa kpenggodzuac sinnunac merengngunudacma kenecngunuudeac ifinoc anec.”
Petoro nga Yohane yeri ngicngac yoac ifi edeyunuma nammaec womonggareng amma womonggac tebengic enara nga sadukaio yeni yenahafoc yerearu kemma ihai nanggec.
Nga ngic nanggec yereng yoac edekpou ayemmema Yesu ye enaranina mema homecfunac yarec, imocac yoacsiduc desaheyemmedarec yeni herebu negemma ngaba ayecmegec.
Ifi ayecmema mendangyuruma ama bic marai anecac witicamau faiyurugec tacmaec ama wereckenec.
Anu habutoango Petoro yoac deu negenggec, yenearunac homacngo imoc negensinggema Yesuac habuu torokpegec. Anu ngicngac imoc kpetengina 5 tauseng anec.
Wereckengau yudangic yeneac tutumangtoaac memba nga enarafocngina amma mitiac negen negengngic, yeni Yerusalennu kpeturanggegec.
Kpeturanggema womonggarengtoa Hanasi nga Kaifa amma Yohane nga Aresande amma womonggareng enara kecdae, yeneac arengfocngina sasawa yenahafoc kpedzucnema tacgec.
Tacma Petoro nga Yohane meyuru hama kicnginau faiyurugec. Faiyuruma yofi dekpesi ayecmegec, “Ngeri noc kucfu nga meracac kpacfu faka yomoc medaoc?”
Kpesiyecmegec Petoro ye Tiri Asungo ubeau wakeu yofi edeyunuec, “Enarameme nga Israe garengfocnina deba negenggec.
Ngeni ngic hanimangang ye dafi ngereedac amma yearu faka gombunga dafi fingecmidac, imohaingoc kpesinecmebau.

Ngeni nga israengic sasawa negenggecdeac yoac yofi deireckeba, ngeneng Yesu Kristo Nadzaretenac mariponnu kpegec homeu Anutungo ye homecfunac megboriu yarec kecde. Nga yeac kpacfu ngic imoc ngereema kicnginau nande.
‘Amameme ngic ngeneng hoc mong mangana dema ukugec. Nga hoc imocngo amaac hoc wotung amma seria nanude nga nambesande.’
Anu Petoro nga Yohane yeri kibiama yadau mong mi tarocngo kengeha kpac enacefacngoc yoac deocac yeni imoc negemma kerectegec anggec. Amma yeri Yesugoc kefoc, imoc yerensigec.
Anu ngic sebia ngereec, yeng yerigoc nanu henggecac yoac merengyecmegecdeac obohogec.
Obohoma tutumangtoaunac ayecmegec sobennu mama nammaec yenaocngoc yoac yofi dema denegeng anggec.
“Nenang ngic yohockang dafi ayecmenideac obohode. Yeri negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc yombong meec fingectegeru Yerusalennac ngicngac yeneng siduha bic negendacdau, imocac busic naric mi kpenide.
Nga yoac imoc amasoc kenu negendacbauac yeri Yesuac kpacfu yoac monggoc mi edekpou ayemmeecdeac dekengec ayecmeni.”

Ifi degec Petoro nga Yohane yereng yoac yofi merengyemmeoc, “Wiac kicninango hening amma kedzacninango negening, imoc busic naric mi kpenide. Ngeni ngenaoc negenghenggec, ngeneac yoac me Anutuac yoac tofohobesonga. Damocngo Anutuac kicfu ngereede?”
Ifi deec yeni dekengec yoac monggoc ayecmema eng faiyurugec kenoc. Imoc yofiac, faka fingerecac ngicngac sasawa Anutu dengeregec. Imocac aposoro dafi ayemmebeso, imocac obohogec.
Nga ngic faka kuhagoc sebiau fingeru ngereec, ye ngicyada kifaya 40 feraheecac yeni aposoro eng wayurugec.
Wayurugec Petoro nga Yohane yeri arengfocngira yenearu dzigenema kenoc. Kemma womonggareng enara amma garengfocngina yoac edeyurugec, imocac yoacsiduc edeyunudarec negenggec.
Negemma yeni uba mocgu amma Anutu kpacma dengerema yofi degec, “Kuctoa mingina, ge kurumeng nga bangec amma kondung nga imocac iwai hania hania meficyununec.
Geng bicngoc Tiri Asu edena yeng kisicnina amma enac tofoc tofohoga Dawidi, yeac enara meefaina yeng yoac yofi deec,
‘Foracngoc bangec monnunac ngicngac Anutu mi negemmidae, yeni faka mangana anggecdeac yoac dedzege anggec nga ngiha ngiha yeni negen negeng ua mema kpedzongemegec, imoc mi ngereeec.
Bangecac ngictau yeni efaigec nga ngicenara uayoacnginagoc, yeni kpeturanggema
Amma waracngoc geangga kucfu nga enacgango denecac sirihau ifi ammidacgec.
O Kebu, yomoc ine dekengec yoacngina hennegeng amma enac tofoc tofohofocga kuc meficnunuma nanggenununa yoacga kengeha kpac dekperagiyemmebisina.
Demina mariga sinena sebiu ngerec ngeree nga negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc nga faka mi hehena kpetiac enac tofoc tofohoga Yesu, yeac kpacfu fingeckembeso.”
Ifi numugec wisickemanu amabangec kpedzucnema tacgec, imoc kpididieu Tiri Asungo ubanginau wakeu Anutuac yoac kengeha kpac ngic enacefac deireckeyemmegec.
Aposoro yeneng Kebu Yesu homecfunac yarec, siduc imocac hepuc amma kuhagoc dekperagigec. Nga danggunuctoayango sokoyunudacma feec.
Yeneac botucnginau mongngo wiac monggac mi obohoec, kpac. Ngicngac sasawa amabangecnginagoc kecgec, yeni amabangecngina imoc desigec hiedzo kirecgeu
Aposoro yenearu faigec. Faigec, yeneng ngic yeni iwaiac obohogecsoc medereyemmekecgec.
Anu ngic mong kefec kpara Yosefe, aposoro yeneng kpara mong Banaba degec, imocac titiha yofi: Demeseri medac. Ye Lewiac arennunac Kipiro nucfu fingerec.
Ngic yeng bangeha mong desiu hiedzo kirecgeu aposoro yenearu mekemma faidarec.
Anu ngic mong kefec kpara Anania, ye enema Safiragoc bangecngira noboha mong desiec dzo kirecgeec.
Kirecgeu dzo tosea meickema faiu tarudeac enema edeu negentegeru uba mocgu anoc. Amma toseasac aposoro yenearu mekemma faiec.

Amabangecga noboha fegembeso dema fegembac me desina dzo kirecgeu imocngo ‘ifi me ifi amba’ dema ambang. Ge ubagango tobangguu ifi andang, imoc naric mi ande. Negennec, ge ikoc annec, imoc ngic neni mi anemmenec, kpac. Ge Anutunoc ikoc ammidang.”
Ifi deu Anania ye yoac imoc negemma imohaingoc todingge makpeu asu heifeec, imoc kpac anu homeec. Anu yeni sasawango faka fingerec, imocac siduha negemma damuyunuu kengectoa anggec.
Nga ngicmedac yeneng yacma farenga biranggema tofoho kemma tonggogec.
Tonggomagec aua harebec wisickeu enema ye ewearu faka fingerec, imoc mi negemma haec.
Hau Petorongo yofi kpesimiec, “Bangec nobohango dzo kirecgedac, imocsac me?” kpesimiu yeng deec, “Oc, imocsacnoc.”

Ifi deu Petorongo yofi edeec, “foracngoc, ngeri Kebuac Asu tobanggeecdeac denegeng amma uba mocgu andaoc. Negennec, ewega tonggoma hadau, yeni nagu ngadeau nandae, mi hereemanu ge ifingoc tofogu kemma tonggogugecde.”
Ifi edemanu ye imohaingoc haniau todingge makpeu asuya ereu homeec. Homeu ngicmedac yeni ama manau emma ye bic homeec, ifi hemma farenga tofoho kemma ewea feec, imocac tegiau tonggogec.
Anu kpebung sasawa amma ngicngac sasawa yeneng siducngira negemma damuyunuu kengectoa anggec.
Kpeturanggegec ngicngac yeneng kengec amma yenearu mi torokpegec. Amma yeni sifu eweheihei ayemmema kecgec.
Ifi anggecac ngicngac homac yeni Kebu negensinggema yenearu kentorokpe anggec Yesuac habu yadiec.
Aposoro yeni faka kuhagoc megec henggecac amma yeni hafeigoc fefe nga dzakegoc sinnu yofi dema faiyunugec, “Petorongo kengha anu sifunec ongeango kpahacyunuu hafeingina kpac ambeso.”
Amma Yerusaleng taong yerec yerec amabangec hereau tackende, imohacnac ngicngac homac hafeinginagoc amma asu seuhagocngo memanganeyunugec, yeni hesicyunu kenggec ngereedacgec.
Faka ifia fingeru womonggarengtoa nga arengfora sadukaio ngichabu, yeneng keracmangang angkecma
aposoro mendangyunuma witicamau faiyunugec.
Faiyunugec tofocnac imohai Kebuac angero mongngo nagu meyemmema hesicyunuu magec yofi edeyunuec.
“Ngeni Anutuac womonnu emma namma kekec gboriaac hania ngicngac sasawa edeyunudadacbisia.”
Ifi edeyunuu negemma ama werec wereckenggac womonnu emma ngicngac edekpou ayemmegec.

Naso imohai womonggarengtoango arengforagoc yudangic yeneac tutumangtoa, imocac memba nga Israe ngicngac yeneac enaratoa kpacyunuu hadacma kpeturanggegec. Kpeturanggema aposoro meyunu hagecdeac witicamau yoac faigec kenec.
Kenu keracnatang yeni kensikema witicamau hofocyunuma dzigene hama degec,
“Neni kensikema nagu kia seria yombong memea henni gareng yeni naguu nandau. Anu nagu witima emma ngic hofocyunuma ine ngic mong mi hending.”
Yoac imoc degec womonggac tebengic enara nga womonggareng enara, yeneng faka fingecdac, imocac obohogec.
Ifi ammagec ngic mongngo hama deec, “Negendae, ngic witicamau faiyunudau, yeni womonnu ngicngac kpouyemmema nandae.”
Ifi deu tebengic kunengngina yeng keracnatang meyunuu kenggec. Nga ngic yeneng hocngo yenerebauac kengecyunuu aposoro yumeau hesicyunu hagec.
Nga yudangic yeneac gamang, imocac memba, tutumannu faiyunugec nammagec womonggarengtoango yoac yofi kpesiyemmeec.

“Ngeni ngic yeac kpacsiduha ngicngac edekpou mi ayemmegecdeac dederac angemmeing. Nga ngeni ine yoac imoc edekpou ayemmema Yerusalennu monggoc desahedae. Amma ngic imoc yeac sawaac kopocsic, imoc neneac witiu faibeso dedae.”
Ngeni Yesu maringinango mariponnu kpema kpehomegec kisicfocninaac Anutungo ye homecfunac megboriu yarec.
Yaru Anutungo meemma enaramemetoanina nga memengerecnina amma kasonina gununggeu foiau nande. Nga israengic ngeni ubangina dzigeneu kopocsicngina waudeac ifi anec.
Anutungo Tiri Asu enac tofoc tofohofora yemmeande. Nga Tiri Asu nga neni Yesuac siduc imoc nenahafoc dekperagidimbe.”
Yoac ifi edeyunuu wosongina meu aposoro yunuhomegecdeac degec.
Ifi degec tutumangnginau farisaiongic mong tarec, kpara Gamarie, ye mitiac negen negengngic nga ngicngac yeneng yeac ewea heikecgec. Yeng deec, “Ngeni ngic yomoc ama sobennu meyunu kemema nammagec.”
Ifi deu meyunu kemegec enarameme arengfora yofi edeyunuec, “Israengic, ngeni ngic yomoc haniangina negentegecma faka ayemmebisia.

Warac naso mong ngic mong kpara Teuda yengenaoc fingecma deec, ‘Ni ngickunengngina.’ ifi deu ngic 400 isoc yearu kpeketahegec. Nga ye yengena dzikac kima homeu arengfora ticpac tehegec uangina kpac anec.

Ye kpac anu takesiac amma kpac oso oso nga oho oho naso megec, naso imohai Gariraia bangecfunac ngic mong kpara Yuda, ye ngic goa herengina miaru yeni ye modacgec. Yuda yengena ifingoc kpegec kpac anu arengfora ticpac tehedacgec.
Imocac amma yofi edengunuba negenggec, ngeni ngic yomoc wayunugec kenggec. Yeni uaareng yomoc ngic negen negennu medaeu imoc bic kpac andarude.
Nga Anutungo nonggo tacmanu medaeu ngeni mi kpetariyemmegecdeacsoc anggecde. Kecma Anutu ngaba ammibauac.”
Amma yeni wenaha wenaha Anutuac womonnu nga amaya amaya, imohai Yesu ye Messia imocac siduc gombung edekpou ayemmema ua imoc mi wagec.
aposoro 12 yeneng Yesuac habu kpacyunudacma yofi edeyunugec, “Neni yaka hendzic hendzic ua imoc nanggema Anutuac yoac dede, imocac ua wadacni mau naric mi ngereeude.

Negen negensinggoc tosofocna, ngeni imocac amma ngic 7 ngenang botucfunac meisingyunubisia. Ngic Asungo ubangina wakeu negen negeng nga fakangina gombunga yenengkecdae, ngic fakangina ifia meisingyunubisia. Nga neneng ua imoc yemmeni mebisia.
Nenaoc ine ua imoc wama nunumu nga Anutuac enacdede ua mekecbisina.”

Yoac ifi degec habutoa yeneng negenggec ngereec. Anu ngic yofiguc meisingyunugec: Stefano, ye negen negensingtoayagoc amma Tiri Asu wake wakea femiec, amma Firipo nga Porokoro amma Nikano, Timong nga Pamena amma Nikorao. Nikorao ye Antiokianac nga ye bangec monnunac ngicngo warac Anutu mi negemmima kecma yudangic yenearu torokpeec.
Yeni ngic imoc aposoro yeneac hoannu faiyunugec nanggec aposoro yeneng maringina sebinginau faima yeneac amma numugec.
Stefano ye Anutuac danggunuc nga kuc homac femiec. Imocac amma yeng ngicngac botucnginau kecma Kebu negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc nga faka mi hehena homac meec.
Anu yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amangina mong kpara Feackekec
Nga Stefano ye Tiri Asuac kucfu yoac negentegecma deu yeni yoac turunga merembesonga osigec.
Osima ngic goa fenggeyunugec, yeneng Stefanoac yofi degec, “Ngic ye Mose nga Anutu demanganeyuruu negening.”
Ifi degec ngicngac habutoa amma yudangic enarafocngina nga mitiac negen negengngic, yeneac wosongina miacgec. Miacgec yeni Stefano mema mendanggema yudangic yeneac tutumangtoau mekemma
ihai ngic ikoha faiyunugec yeneng hepuc amma yofi degec, “Ngic imoc ye nenanggac ama kpetiac nga dedeseriyoacnina wisic wisickea kpac tatahoc demanganeande.”
Yeng yoac yofi deu negening, “Yesu Nadzaretenac, yennoc ama yomoc iriringgema singyoac Mosengo deficgenemmeec, imoc wama yoac gboria heficgenemmeande.”
Nga yudangic sasawa tutumangtoanginau tacgec, yeneng Stefano henserima henggec kicmesuyango angero yeneac siric isoc anec.
Womonggarengtoango Stefano kpesimiec, “Yoac dedae, imoc fora me?”

Ifi deu Stefanongo yofi deec, “Mangfocna nga sactosofocna, yoac deba negenggec: Kisicnina Abrahang ye Harang taonnu mi kemma Mesopotamia bangecfu kecmanu Anutu kuc nga kibikperagi mingina, yennoc fingecmima yofi edeec,
‘Ge amabangecga nga arengfocga wayunuma neng bangectoa mong edzacgubade, ihai kemma kecbesena.’
Hesicke hama bangec mong mi wamiu tiuenec, imoc kpac yombong. Ye nga bangecfora dengec tigec enudeac areng kpeyemmeec, imoc nambaraha kpac kecmanu edeec.
Amma Anutungo yoac mong yofi deec,
‘Esangaboga nga bangecfocga yeni kifa 400 ngic mong yeneac bangecfu kuric kecma wanacua memagec bangec mingina ngaba ayemmema ebic hania hania meficgeyemmebesandae.’
‘Bangec imohai yeni wanacua megecde, ngicngac imoc yeni turunga yemmebade. Imoc wisickeu yeni bangec imoc wama bangec yomohai neac enac tofohobesandae.’

kpendzennunac meickema ubangerecgoc kekec heficgemiec. Yeng Yosefe wosoefac ammima negen negentegec miu Aigita ngictau Faraongo negen negenga imoc hengngereema yengena amagerec nga aigitangicfora momoc garengyunuma kefudeac ngickuneng faiec.
Kecmagec ‘Aigita bangecfu semeng fede’ ifi degec negemma Yakobongo medacfora sueyunuu ihai kenggec.
Kecma naso monnu monggoc kenggec Yosefengo dacfora haniaya dekperagiyemmeec. Dekperagiyemmeu Faraongo Yosefe yengena nga arengfora haniangina negentegerec.
Ifi anu Yosefengo dacfora edeyunuu kemma mangngina Yakobo nga arengfocngina sasawa bic kpacyunugec hagec. Nga ngicngac hagec, yeneac kpetengina 75 anec.
Nga Yakobo ye Aigita bangecfu kemma kecma homeec nga medacfora kisicfocnina yeni ifingoc ihaingoc homedacgec.
Homegec farengngina Sikeng amau meyunu hagec. Hama Abrahangngo Sikeng amau Hamoro medacfora yenearunac bangec mong kicsereac amma silwadzo dafigucngo bummeec, imohai tonggoyunugec.”
Ifi amma kecmagec Aigita ngictau gboria mong fingerec, yeng Yosefeac hania mi negenec.
Ifi amma mekemma ama ngadeau tihereema faigec feec. Femanu Farao naroangango meficgema yengena medac isoc mema mekefu yadiec.
Yadiu Farao ngicfora yeneng aigitangic yeneac faka nga negen negeng kpoumigec negentegecma kecma wiac deme anu kuhagoc anec.”
“Kecma kifaya 40 anu ye israengic ogofora yenennegeng anudeac ubea efaiu kenec.
Kemma aigitangic mongngo israengic mong eng kpeu hemma ogea meficgema turunga meremma aigitangic homemea kpeec.
Kpema yofi negenec, ‘Ni arengfocna Faraoac mariunac mesiyunubadeac dema Anutungo ua nende, imoc negentegecdae gedang.’ Ye ifi negenec anu Israe ngicngac yeneng imoc ine mi negentegecgec.
Anu wereckengau monggoc kemma israengic yohockang eng eweec meficyuruma demefac ayecmema yofi edeyuruec, ‘Ngihoc waec, ngeri areng mocgungo ewedape, imoc naric kpac.’ ”
“Ifi deu ngic ogea kpeecngo Mose kpefahama yofi deec, ‘Mongngo mi nereac desidesingic me gareng faiguec.
Ge worang aigitangic kpehomedang, ifi isoc ni gedang ifingoc nubeso annec.’
Hemma kpidohoma hentegerudeac kenu Kebuac yoac yofi fingerec,
‘Ni kisicfocga yeneac Anutu, Abrahang nga Isaka amma Yakobo, yeneac Anutunoc.’ Fingeru Mose ye dzonong fedefede amma kengec kpeu kiwa sufuma ngonducnema nanec.
Nammanu Kebungo yofi edeec, ‘Bangec nannec, imoc bangec kpetiac, imocac hanitabega hesina.
Ni ngicfocna Aigita bangecfu sisicyunugec kiacudumeng anggec ereu yenenduae. Amma mesiyunubadeac yaguc maduae. Imocac Aigita bangecfu sueguba bic kembesena.’ ”
“Ngic yeneng Moseac yoac wama yofi degec,
‘Mongngo ge desidesingic me ngickuneng mi faiguec, kpac.’
Anutungo ngic yenoc israengic yeneac enarameme nga mesi mesingicngina anudeac dema angero sueu gerecborang manau fingecmima ua imoc demiec.
Ifi amma Anutungo Mose sueu kemma hesicyunu haec. Ye Aigita bangecfu nga Kondung sacsacfu nga bangec kisiu faka mi hehena nga negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc homac mema kecmanu kifa 40 anec.”
“Amma Mose yennoc israengic yofi edeyunuec,
‘Anutungo arengfocngina yeneac botucfunac profete mong ni isoc meficgengemmebesande.’
“Kisicfocnina yeni yengena wama yoara membaickema Aigita bangecfu dzigenegecdeac ubangina suema
Arong yofi edegec, ‘Ge nemuonga mong menemmena nemu imocngo warainemmebeso. Mosengo Aigita bangecfunac hesicnunu haec, ye gedang bic sufuma kpac anec.’
Ifi dema naso imohai nemuonga burumaka medaha siric isoc mema hosuc heimigec. Yeni maringinango onga mema imoc deafehe ammima hoanggegec.
Ifi anggec Anutungo ngadeyunuma sawau onga hadehade afeheyunugecdeac wayemmeec. Profete yeneac kibiu yoac imocac yofi bic oho ohoya fede,
‘Israe mingina, ngeni kifa 40 bangec hocsiragocfu kecma yang hosuc heima me sesegerec goa mong mi ohonenggec, kpac.
Ngeni nemu Morokoac kporucbedzo tofohokecgec nga nemu Refang, yeac asomeng onga mekecgec. Wiac imocnoc numumigecdeac memengere anggecac amma ni Babilon bangec hereau faingunubesandua.’ ”
“Kisicfocnina yeni bangec hocsiragoc, ihai Anutuac kporucwomong megec, imoc Anutungo Mose siriha edzahema derecgemiec, imocac sirihau memea.

Kporocwomong imocnoc kisicfocnina Yosuango enara meyemmeu yei bangecareng goa yeneac bangecfu mehama tacdacgec. Tacmagec Anutungo bangecareng kecgecmoc, yeni yunukporac ayemmeu kisicfocnina yeni bangec tigec enu Anutuac kporucwomong imohaingoc torokpeu torokpe mekengkecmagec Dawidi fingerec.”
Foracngoc, imoc yengenaoc kpac, Salomongo Anutuac womong memiec.
Engenatoa yeng ine ngic yeneng womong mong maringo memea, ihai tacyac mi angande. Profete mongngo enacyoac yofinoc deec,
‘Ngictau tatacna imoc kurumeng nga bangec imocngo titiserina, Kebungo ifi dede. Ngeneng amatatacna mong menenggec imoc ine mi ngereeude amma fefe monggac manau tacnegembade, imoc obohoude.
Foracngoc, ni marinango wiac sasawa meficgedarai.’ ”

Kisicfocngina yeni profete sasawa yunukporac ayemmegec. Profete yeneng dindingac mingina fingecbesandeac kpefingyoac degec nga ngeneac kisicfocngina yenennoc yenahafoc profete imoc yunugec. Kecma Ngic Dindingac yengena fingeru ngenennoc doc mema ye kpehomegec.
Ngeni angeroac enacfunac dedeseriyoac megec nga imoc ine sifu wagec.”
Stefanongo yoac ifi edeyunuu negemma wosonginau meu yeni herebu kuneng negemma yearubigeng fima enacngina kisaranggema nangengngina manganeec.
Stefano ye ine Tiri Asungo ubeau wakeu kurumennu fiu enu Anutuac kuc kibikperagiau Yesu Anutu foiau nanu henec. Hemma yofi deec,
“Negendae, ni kurumeng anggeu Ngicac Medacngo Anutu foiau nanu henduae.”
Ifi deu yeni sasawango kpeborongtoa kpema kedzacngina kpefonggema yearu ururunggema kpefahe kpefahe kemma
taong ngadeau kensikema hocngo ukuma heigec. Ifi amma hepucngic yeni ngakpingina herea hesima ngicmedac mong kpara Sauro, yeac haniu guruhegec.
Guruhema Stefano hocngo heigec yeng yofi dema numuec, “O Kebu Yesu, ge ubaongana mena.”
ifi dema fafoc heima arohoma kpacma deec, “Kebu ge kopocsicngina yomoc wayemmena.” ifi dema homeec. Homeu Saurongo faka imocac negenu ngereec.
So, naso imohaingoc Yerusalennu kpebung kecgec, yeni hanahema yunukporac ayemmegec. Ayemmegec ticpac tehema Yudaia nga Samaria bangectoau kendacgec aposoro yeneng ine tacgec.
Amma ngic goa Kebu eweheimima kecgec, yeneng Stefano mema kiacsonggongtoa yombong ammima tonggogec.
Anu Sauro ye kpebung yunukporac ayemmeudeac amaya amaya emma ngicngac metai ayemmema witicamau faiyunuec.
Yesuac habu yeni ticpac tehema kenggecngo ine guruamasoc kecma ngicngac siduc gombung dekperagiyemmekecgec.
Ifi ammagec Firipongo samariangic yeneac taonnu sikema Kristoac yoacsiduc dekperagiyemmeec.
Dekperagiyemmema negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc meu hemma kedzac kpema yoara yenahafoc negenggec.
Imoc yofiac, ye asu seuhagoc homac kisangyunuu ngic hereunac erema arohoma woragec. Amma ye puring hania hania homac mengereyunuec.
Ifi anu taong imohai ngicngac yeni ubangerec kuneng negenggec.
Anu taong imohai ngic mong kefec kpara Simong, ye bangecac asugoc ua mekefu samariangichabu yeneng henggec bibiagoc anec. Ye yengenaac negenu engena anec.
Anu engena mamea yeni yenahafoc yeac negenggec engena anu eweheimima yofi dema kecgec, “Anutuac kuc kunengngo yearu fede.”
Ye boru mema kerec ayemmeu kpidohoma yearu kpeketahema nasoherec kecgec.
Anu Firipongo Anutuac eucererenggac siduc gombung nga Yesu Kristoac kparaac hania deireckeyemmeu ngicngac yenahafoc negensinggema mitidoku nadzicgec.
Ifi anggec Simongngo ifingoc Yesu negensinggema doku nadzicma Firipoac hoannu kefec. Firipongo faka kuhagoc nga faka mi hehena meu Simong ye imoc hemma kpidohoma negen negeng ua homac meec.
Samariangicngac yeni Anutuac yoac negenguba anggec, imocac siduc Yerusalennu aposoro yenearu kenu negenggec. Negemma Petoro nga Yohane sueyurugec kenoc.
Ihai kemema yeni Tiri Asugoc anggecdeac Kebu numumioc.
Tiri Asungo warac yenearu mong mi mamanu yeni Kebu Yesuac kpacfusac mitidoku nadzicgec.
So, aposoro yeri maringirango sebinginau faiec yeni Tiri Asugoc anggec.
Aposoro yeri ngic yeneac sebiu maringira faiec Tiri Asugoc anggec, Simongngo imoc hemma dzo yerearu mehama
yofi edeyuruec, “Ngeri uayoac nga kuc imoc ni ifingoc nenec neng ifingoc ngicsebinginau marina faiba Tiri Asugoc ambisia.”
Ifi deu Petorongo yofi edeec, “Anutuac wosoefac imoc hiedzongo bummebeso negennecac hiedzogagoc ngerahafoc hofeu kemebesera.
Anutungo uba ikocga hendeac kuc yomocngo mong mi yafinggumanu entegeng kecnade.
Ge manganaga imoc wama ubaga dzigeneu Kebu numumina ubagau songo ikoha dzuacgembac.
Manganaac hodungango ge memanganeguu ngicngac memanganeyununadeac fakango fuseguecnoc.” imoc henduae.
Ifi deu Simongngo deec, “Wiac dedapemoc, imoc mi fingecnembeso. Imocac ngeraoc neac amma Kebu numumiec.”
Anu aposoro yeri ngicngac Kebuac yoac dekperagima edekpou ayemmema Yerusalennu dzigenebeso dema Samaria guruama tackendesoc siduc gombung dekperagiyemmema kenoc.
Kebuac angero mongngo Firipo yofi dema edeec, “Ge efaima sing Yerusalennunac emu Gadza taonnu kemede, imohai kembesena. Sing imoc kisi fede.”
Ifi dema edeu Firipongo efaima kenec. Anu Etiopia bangectoau ngactau mong kefec kpara Kandake, yeac ngickuneng mong
dzigenema keretacfu tacma ferecge kemma profete Yesaia, yeac yoackibi osoec.
Ifi ammanu Asungo Firipo yofi edeec, “Ge bic keretac edimocac hoangau kenna.”
Ifi deu Firipongo yearu nedzima kemma ngic ye profete Yesaia, yeac yoackibi osou negemma kpesimiec, “Yoac osonec, imocac hania negentegecnec me?”
Kpesimiu deec, “Mongngo mi dekperaginemmanu neannaoc naric mi negentegecbade.” Ifi dema Firipo ye keretau enu yerahafoc tarecdeac derecgemiec.
Yoackibi osoec, imoc yofi,
“Rama mong kpehou anggecdeac mekengandae me ramamedahango dzoea merec merecgengic yearu waickema feande, siriha imocacsoc amma enara mong mi anggeec.

Yeni yoacfu kuha memama yeac yoacac fora mi dema bangecfu kekeha meickegec. Anu yeac esangabofora yeneac kpetengina mongngo oso osoac siriha kpac. Imoc yofiac, Kebuac arengfora yeneng kekeha bangecfunac wangecgec.”
Ifi osoma ngickunengngo Firipo yofi dema kpesimiec, “Profete ye meracac ifi dede, ye yengenaac me ngic monggac?”
Kpesimiu Firipongo enara anggema mitikibiac yoac imohacnac torokpema Yesuac siduc gombunggac hania edekpou ammiec.
Ifi deu Firipongo deec, “Ubaga hafoangoc negensinggenadeu naric ambade.” deu yoac yofi meremmiec, “Yesu Kristo ye Kebuac medac, imoc negensinggeduae.”
Ifi dema keretac dzegeu taru Firipo nga ngickuneng yerahafoc dokuu kemema Firipongo doku nadzicmiec.
Nga dokuunac eremaec Kebuac Asungo Firipo ioha wangecma kenu ngickunengngo monggoc mi hemma ubangerec negemma kenec.
Firipongo ine Asodoc taonnu kenu henggec. Amma ihacnac hanahema amea amea siduc gombung dekperagiyemmema kengkecma Kaisarea taonnu mesiec.
“Ngic me ngac Damasko taonnu sing gboria modacdae, yeni meficyunuma meyunuma maringina dedeckema Yerusaleng taonnu meyunu habadeac Damasko kpekpeturang amaac enara, yeneac kibi mong ohoma nenna.”
Miu ye kemma Damasko mewegenebeso ammanu imohaingoc kurumennunac kperagingo ioha mama neraranggeec.
Neraranggeu ye bangecfu todingge kpeu fema yoac mong yofi fingeru negenec, “Sauro, Sauro, ge nocac nukporac anemma kecannec?”
ifi deu Saurongo kpesimiec, “Kebu ge merac?” ifi deu deec, “Nukporac anengkecnec, Yesu ninoc.
Imocac ge yacma amau kenna! Ihai kecmana dafi ambesonga, imocac yoac edegugecde.”
Anu ngic yegoc kenggec, yeni yoacngina kpac anu engsac iridzagec amma nanggec. Nocac yeni yoac negenggec amma ngic mong ine mi henggec.
Nga Saurongo yacma kic fiudeac kpanggung manggung anu ngicfora yeneng mariau mema Damasko mekenggec.
Mekenggec ihai uameme harebec kiwa nomaneu tacma nenedoku mong mi neec.
Damasko taonnu ubamereng ngic mong kefec kpara Anania, ye Kebungo ongau fingecmima kparec, “Anania.” kparu deec, “Kebu ni yomoc.”
deu Kebungo yofi edeec, “Ge yacma sing kpara Dindingac deandae, ihai kemma Yudaac amau emma ngic mong kpara Sauro, Tarso taonnunac, ye hofocma meficgebesena. Negenna, ye numuma tacde.
Ye ongau kpefing yofi hendac: Ngic mong kpara Anania, yeng yearu kemma kiwa fiudeac dema maria sebiau faidac.”
Ifi deu deec, “Kebu, ngic yeac homac degec negenganduae. Ye geac kpetiac arengfocga Yerusalennu megigi noc efea ayemmeande.
Nga yei ifingoc kpacga kpacma dengereandimbe, neni sasawa witicnunuma menunu kenudeac womonggareng enara yeneng uakibi migec yofinenggac mekecde.”
Ifi deu Kebungo yofi edeec, “Ge kenna. Ni ngic yenoc meisinggeba ye siducdedena bangec monnunac ngicngac nga ngictaufocngina amma israe medacfora yenearu kpacsiducna deyadibeso.
Ammanu kpacnaac amma sueba kpendzeng nga ebic hania haniaac witiau kecbeso, imoc edzahema kpoumibade.”
Ifi deu Anania ye kemma ama dedea, ihai emma Sauroac sebiu maria faima deec, “Tosona Sauro, yacna. Kebu Yesu sinnu fingecgenec, yennoc suenude. Ge kicga fina Tiri Asungo ubagau wakeudeac haduae.”
Ifi demanu ye imohaingoc kiwaunac wiac mong fonoc isoc mau kiwa fima yacma mitidoku nadzirec.
Nadzicma yaka nema seriec.
Sauro ye Yesuac habu Damasko kecgec, yenigoc uameme goa kefec.
Kecma imohaingoc yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amau emma Yesuac hania dekperagiyemmema yofi edeyunuec, “Yesu ye Anutuac medac.”

Ifi edeyunuu yeni negemma kpidohoma yofi degec, “Ngic imocngonoc Yerusaleng taonnu kpac imocnoc eweheihei ammigec megigi ayemmema yei ifingoc witicyunuma womonggareng enara yenearu meyunu kenudeac haec.”
Ifi degec Saurongo seriyombonggema namma yofi deec, “Foracngoc, Yesu ye Messia.” Ye imocac hania edzacyunuu yudangic Damasko kecgec, yeni negemma kpidohoma yoara turunga mi merenggec.
Ye uameme homac ifi angkefu yudangic yeneng Sauro kpegecdeac yoac dedzege anggec.
Ifi amma yeni kpegecdeac dema oda naguyau hadzing tofocnac gareng faiyunugec nangkecgec. Yeac dekiric anggec, imoc yengenaaru hau negenec.
Anu Sauro yoaraac uba merenggec, yeneng tofocnac ye uficfu barima oda titingau sing faigec ngadeau kemema kenec.
Anu Banabango Sauro mema aposoro yenearu hesicke kemma yofi edeyunuec, “Kebungo Sauro sinnu fingecmima yoac edeec. Ifi anu ye Damasko taonnu kengeha kpac Yesuac hania dekperagiec.”
Anu Saurongo yenigoc Yerusalennu tacyac amma yoac kengeha kpac deede ayemmema kengha anec.

Amma Kebuac kpacfu serima namma ngic siduc gombung kengeha kpac, enacefac edeyunuec. Edeyunuu yudangicngo grikyoac dekecgec, yenigoc Anutuac enacyoac denegenggac amma yoacngina engemmama anec. Anu ngic imoc yeneng ye kpebeso anggec.
Ifi anggec Yesuac habu yeneng imoc negemma Kaisarea taonnu hesicke kemema faigec kengkecma Tarso taonnu kengsikeec.

Anu kpebung Yudaia nga Gariraia amma Samaria bangecfu kecgec, yenearu ruae fingerec. Fingeru ruaegoc kecgec kpetengina kuneng anu serima kecma Kebu eweheimima ubango hoanggema afehegec. Anu Tiri Asungo ubaebicngina meickema meseriyunuec.
Petoro ye amabangec tackende, imoc yerecgema kengkecma Yesuac kpetiac areng
Sikema ihai ngic mong henec, kpara Ainea, ye puring amma fefeu fekefu kifa 8 bic anec.
Nga Petorongo yofi edeec, “Ainea, Yesu Kristongo mengeregudeac yacma fefega geanggaoc mengerena.” deu ye imohaingoc yacma nanec.
Ifi anu ngicngac Rida taong nga Sarong bangecfunacngo ye hemma ubangina meremma Kebuaru kenggec.
Yope taonnu ubamereng ngac mong kefec, kpara Tabita, kpara grikyoacfusing Dorkas. Yearu memeficac faka gombunga feecac makpekpea meficyunuma kefec.
Anu naso imohai Tabita ye hafei fingecmiu homeec. Homeu yeni farenga kerec nadzicmima amamana monnu meemma faigec feec.
Nga Yope imoc Rida taong wegenac tarecac Yesuac habu yeni Petorongo Rida tacde, imoc negemma ngic yohockang sueyurugec yearu kemma yofi desambic ammima edeoc, “Ge naric nenearu bic habang me?”

Deec Petoro ye negemma efaiu yerigoc kenggec. Kensikeu fareng feecfu hesicke enggec. Enu ngachotsec sasawa ewefocngina homemea yeni oronggema kiacubamangang anggec. Nga Tabita gbori kecma ngakpikporuc kpebiyemmekefec, imoc edzahedacgec.
Edzahegec Petorongo sueyunuu kemedacgec fafoc heima numuec. Numuu wisickeu farenga feecfu dzigenema yofi edeec, “Tabita ge yacna.” deu ye kiwa fima Petoro hemma yacma tarec.
Tacmanu Petorongo mariau mema miaru yacma nanec. Nanu Yesuac kpetiac areng amma ngachotsec Tabita gborima yarec, imoc henggecdeac kpacyunuec. Kpacyunuu hagec Tabita yarec, imoc edzacyunuec.
Nga yeni siduc imoc degec, imocngo Yope taonnu sokoma kenu homacngo Kebu negensinggegec.
Nga Petorongo ngic mong kpara Simong, yamberec seberameme, yeac amau naso herea isoc tacyac anec.
Kaisarea taonnu ngic mong kefec, kpara Konerio. Ye Itaria wasaiareng tosea, yenearunac ngic 100, yeneac kunengngina kefec.
Ye yengena nga arengfora sasawa, yeneng heregoc Anutuac songo negemma eweheimima kecgec. Konerio ye ubangereac wiac homac ngicngac makpekpea yemmekefec amma Anutu wenacsoc numumikefec.
Konerio ye 3 kirocac ua memanu Anutuac angero mongngo ongau yearu fingecma edeec, “Konerio.”

Ifi deu kpidohoma kengec kpeu kiwango gbong henserimanu deec, “Kebu noc wiac?” deu yeng deec, “Nunumuga nga ubangerecgaac wiac makpekpea yemmeannec, imoc sese isoc Anutuaru enu ye imocac negengngereekecde.
Imocac ge yaguc Yope taonnu ngic sueyununa kemma ngic mong kpara Simong, kpara mong Petoro, ye hesicke habisia.
Ye yamberec seberameme ngic mong kpara Simong, yeac amau kecde. Amea imoc kondung tegiau tacde.”
Angerongo yoac imoc edema kenu Konerio ye enac tofoc tofohongic yohockang nga wasaingickereng mong, ngic imoc heitaiyunuma yoac deu negenec.
Imoc ayemmedacma Yope taonnu sueyunuu kenggec.
Ngic yeni kengkecma sinnu fegec ama wereckenu monggoc kengkecma ama mewegenebeso ammagec, Petorongo wenac dzongiau numuudeac ama witiau waranda isoc feec, ihai enec.
Emma yakaac homema deu yaka ohomagec Kebungo kiwa merecgeu faka yofi henec:
Kurumeng anggeu wiac mong henec. Imoc kporuc isoc tegia noboc noboc mema bangecfu faigec mama, ifi isoc anec.
Imocac manau yamberec amma nengboudzoc hania hania feec.
Mamanu yoac mong yofi fingerec, “Petoro ge yacma kpenec anna.”
Ifi fingeru Petorongo yofi deec, “Kebu imoc naric kpac, ni wiac wonongagoc nga Kebungo kpae faiec, imoc mong mi neai nga naric mi nebade.”
Ifi deu atac yohockang anu deec, “Anutungo kpae imoc meickede, imocac ge wonongagoc mi dena.”
Nga faka imoc fingeru atac harebec anu imohaingoc kporuhagoc kpedziu kurumennu monggoc enec.
Enu Petoro ye onga henec, imocac negengfagung amma tacmanu Konerio ngicfora yeni Yope taonnu sikema Simonggac amaac kpesi kpesi kengkecma odanaguyau namma
kpachofoc amma kpesigec, “Simong kpara mong Petoro, ye ama yei kecde me?”
Nga Petorongo onga henecac negengfagung amma kecmanu Asungo yofi edeec, “Negennec, ngic harebec yeni hama ge hofocgudae.
Imocac ge yacma kemema yenigoc kembesonga dema negengyohoc mi ambesena. Ngic imoc yeni neng sueyunuba hadae.”
Ifi deu Petorongo yenearu kemema deec, “Ngic hofocdau ni yomocnoc, ngeni dafiac hadae?”

Ifi deu ngic yeneng yofi degec, “Wasaingic gareng Konerio ye Anutu eweheimima faka gombunga modackecde. Nga yudangic sasawa yeni yeac negenggec ngereeande, yenoc angero kpetiac mongngo fingecmima ameau heitaiguma enacgaunac yoac negenudeac edeec.”
Ifi degec Petorongo amau heitaiyunuma edoc bedoc ayemmeu fegec.
Fema wereckengau yacma ye nga ngic imoc yeni kembeso anggec Yesuac habuunac goa Yope kecgec, yeni yenahafoc kenggec.
Yeni sinnu tofocnac mong fema ama wereckenu yacma kengkecma Kaisarea kensikegec. Konerio ye arengfora amma tosofora heitaiyunuu tomai kecmagec kensikegec.
Kemma Petorongo amau embesonga ammanu Koneriongo hama hoangau fafoc heima numumiec.
Numumiu Petorongo mema miacma yofi edeec, “Yacna ni ngicogogangoc.”
Ifi denegeng amma ye ama manau emma ngic kpedzucnema tacgec, yenemma yofi edeyunuec.

“Ngeni yudangic neneac faka negendae. Neni bangec monnunac ngic ngenigoc ogo nga engemma kekec ifi mi annideac kpaeyoac seria fede. Ni ine ngeni ngic wonongnginagoc dema desusuic mi dengemmebadeac Anutungo imoc edeedzacnu anec.
Imocacnoc heitainugec haba dema mi obohoai. Anu yoc heitainudae, imocac hania degec negemba.”
Ifi deu Koneriongo yofi edeec, “Uameme 4 bic wisickemanu marai 3 kirocac ua memanu numubare ngic mong ngakpia kperagiagocngo nearu fingecma
yofi edenuec, ‘Konerio negenna, Anutungo nunumuga nga ubangerecgaac wiac makpekpea yemmeannec, imocac negengngereede.
Imocac ge Yope taonnu ngic sueyununa Simong kpara mong Petoro, ye hesicke habisia. Yeng yamberec seberameme Simong, yeac amau kecde. Amea imoc kondung tegiau tacde.’

Yoac ifi deu ni imocacnoc gereagoc sueyunuba gearu hadau. Hagec geng yoacna negemma hanecac naric ande. Nga Kebungo yoac edeguec, imoc seng dena negennideac Anutuac kicfu nenahafoc kpedzucnema tacdimbe.”
Ngic bangeha bangeha eweheimima angammeme dindingac angkecdae, yeneac negenu ngereeande.
Foracngoc, Anutungo Yesu Kristo mocgu, ngic sasawa nenang Kebunoc sueu maec. Yeng ruaeyoac gombung Israe ngicngac nenearu deficgenemmeec, imoc ngeni negendae.
Amma Gariraia bangecfu hanahema wiac fingecma Yudaia bangec sokoma kenec, imoc ngeni negendae. Imoc yofi: Yohane ye ngic dokunadzicac yoac edeyunuec.

Anu Anutungo Yesu Nadzaretenac kuc nga Tiri Asu faimiu yeng bangec yerecgema kengha amma ngic meficyunuma mengereyunukefec nga mangana minginaac kucngo ngicngac kekecngina memanganedarec, yeni mengereyunudarec. Anutungo nonggo tacmimanu yeng ua imoc meec.
Anu Yesungo yudangic neneac bangecfu nga Yerusalennu ua meec, imoc hennegeng andaring. Ifi amma kecmanu yeni ye mariponnu kpegec homeec.
Homema femanu wenac harebec anu Anutungo ye megboriu yacma ngicngac fingecyemmeu henggec.
Ngicngac sasawa yenearu mi fingerec, kpac. Anutungo waracngoc siducdedefora meisinnunuec, nenearusac fingerec. Ye homecfunac yaru neninoc nenedoku yegoc neing.
Nga Anutungo ngic yenoc ngic gbori nga homemea angammemenina desiudeac gununggeec, yoac imocac hepuc amma ngichabu gorongina kpema desaheyemmenideac denemmeec.
Anu profete sasawa yeneng yeacnoc hepuc amma yoac yofi degec, ‘Ye negensinggegecde, yeni yeac kpacfu kopocsicngina wawaya anude.’ ”
Mau ngic sebi tosangina herec herecgeango Yesu negensinggegec nga Petorogoc kenggec, yeni Tiri Asungo wosoefahaac kuc bangec monnunac ngicngac, yenearu ifingoc kpakeyemmeu
nedzarangyoac dema Anutu dengerema deafehe ammigec, yeni imoc negemma kerectegec anggec. Ifi anggec Petorongo yofi deec,
“Nenang Tiri Asugoc aning, faka imoc ngic yomoc ifingoc fingecyemmeu mitidoku naric mi segereyemmebesonga.”
Ifi dema yeni Yesu Kristoac kpacfu doku nadzicgecdeac deyemmeec. Nga yenigoc uameme goa tarudeac edegec.
Aposoro goa nga Yesuac habu Yudaia bangecfu kecgec, yeni bangec monnunac ngicngo Anutuac yoac negenguba anggec, imocac siduc negenggec.
Nga Petorongo Yerusalennu dzigene kenu sebi tosangina herec herecgea, yeneng dehou ammima
yofi edegec, “Ge nocac sebi tosangina mi herec herecgea, yeneac amau emma yenigoc yaka nedang?”
Ifi degec Petorongo faka haniaunacngoc fingecereec, imoc edeyunuec.
“Ni Yope taonnu numuma kecbare kicna merecgeu onga mong yofi henai: Wiac mong kporuc kuneng isocngo tegia noboc noboc menamma kurumennunac nearu faigec maec, ifi isoc anec.
Mau hereema kperirickema yofi henai, yamberec kuneng kapia nga goa enacnginagoc amma nengboudzoc hania hania feec.
Ifi yenembare nearu kpakpac yofi fingerec, ‘Ge yacma kpenec anna.’
Ifi deu yofi deai, ‘Kebu imoc naric kpac. Ni wiac wonongagoc nga
Ifi deba kurumennunac yoac mong fingeru atac yohockang anec, ‘Anutungo kpae imoc meickede, imoc wonongagoc mi debesena.’
Faka imoc fingeru atac harebec anu iwai imoc kporuhagoc monggoc kpedziu kurumennu enec.
Anu negenggec, naso imohaingoc Kaisarea taonnunac ngic harebec sueyunugec nearu hama ama kefai, ihai nammaggec
Asungo yofi edenuec, ‘Ge yenigoc kembeso dema negengyohoc mi ambesena.’ Ifi deu kemba negen negensinggoc tosofocna 6 yomoc, yeneng modacnugec kemma wasaingicgareng yeac amau ening.
Enni yeng yoacsiduc yofi anemmeec, ‘Neac amau angero mongngo fingecnemma yofi edenuec, “Ge Yope amau ngic sueyununa kemma Simong kpara mong Petoro, ye hesicke hagec.
Yeng yoac edeguu ge nga arengfocga ngeni yoac imoc negemma hoanggema komoc kpegecde.” ’
Ni imoc hemma Kebungo yoac yofi deec, imoc negensiai, ‘Yohane ye doku nadzicngemmeec, yoc ine Tiri Asu nadzicngemmeude.’
Nga nenang Kebu Yesu Kristo negensinggemina Anutungo wosoefahaac kuc nemmeec, yeng ine wosoefahaac kuc siriha imocngoc yemmeu ni ifiango Anutu naric mi kpetarimibade.”
Anu Yesuac habu botucnginau ngicngac Kipiro nucfunac nga Kirene bangecfunac kecgec, yeni Antiokia taonnu hama grikngic yenigoc ifingoc denegeng amma Kebu Yesuac siduc gombung dekperagiyemmegec.
Dekperagiyemmegec Kebungo kuc yemmeu ngicngac habutoa yeni negensinggema ubangina Kebuaru faigec.
Kensikema Anutungo danggunuc uaya bic meficgeec, ye imoc hemma ubangerec negemma ubanginango Kebuaru heiserigecdeac demeefai ayemmeec.
Ye ngic gombunga amma ye ubeau Tiri Asu nga negen negensing wake wakea femiu ngicngac homacngo imoc hemma Kebuaru torokpegec.

Kemma meficgema hesickeu Antiokia taonnu hama kpebung yenigoc kifa mocgu kecma ngic homac Anutuac enacyoac edekpou ayemmeoc. Nga Antiokia amau hanahema ngicngo Yesuac habu, yeneac kpac Kristoac ngic deficgeyemmegec.
Naso imohai profetengic goa Yerusalennac Antiokia taonnu magec.
Yenearunac tosongina mong kpara Agabo. Asungo kpefing edeu yeng yacma bangecsoc boditoa fingerudeac deficgeec. Nga bodi imoc Roma ngictau Sisa Kraudio kecmanu naso imohai fingerec.
Fingeru Yesuac habu yeni yoac imoc negemma Yudaia bangecfu negen negensinggoc tosofocngina kecgec meficyunugecdeac hiedzo feyemmeecsoc kpeturanggema yenearu faigec kenudeac deserigec.
Deserima hiedzo meficgegec, imoc Banaba nga Sauro yemecgec yeri imoc mekemma Yesuac habu Yerusalennu enarafocngina kecgec, yeni yemmegec.

Naso imohai ngictau Herodengo kpebung kecgec, yenearunac ngicngac goa yunuma memanganeyunuudeac negemma mendangyunuma witicamau faiyunuec. Ifi ayemmema ngade yoacfu faiyunuma ngaba ayemmema yunubeso negenec.
Amma yeng deu Yohane dara Yakobo wasaibeangngo kpehomegec.
Ifi anu yudangic yeni songo negenggec nga yeng yenemma ic sogong yisya kpac nene, imocac tacyacnasou deu Petoro ifingoc mendanggema witicamau faigec.
Ye makekenggac tacyacnaso wisickeu Petoro
Ifi anggec Petoro ye witicamau tacmanu kpebung yeni tatahoc Anutuaru numukecgec.

Anu Herodengo ama wereckenu Petoro yoacfu faiudeac deec, naso imoc wegenemanu tofocnac imohaingoc wasaingic yohockang yereng Petoro seng yohockangngo yeranggoc witickema faiec botucngirau feec. Femagec wasai goa yeni nagu ngadeau gareng nanggec.

Yeni ama manau ifi fegec Kebuac angero mongngo hama ihai nanu amamana imoc kperagidarec. Kperagiu angerongo Petoro pandzengau kpeserema midima deec, “Ge bic yacna.” demanu seng imohaingoc Petoroac mariaunac fotockema mau
angerongo deec, “Ge fadengga dzegema hanitabega heina kemeu.” Dema angerongo monggoc edeec, “Ngakpiga herea heina kemeu modacnuna.”
Ifi deu Petorongo yacma angero modacma kenec. Kemma angerongo faka yearu meec, imocac negenu onga isoc anec.
Nga yeri nagu yohockanggac gareng nanggec, imoc feracyunuma kemma aieng nagutoa taonggac kiwaugeng mewegenemaec, imoc yengenaoc anggeu kemeoc. Kemema sinnu kemma angero ye ioha aockeec.
Ifi anu Petoro ye negen negenga sariu yofi deec, “Yaguc negentegecduae, Kebungo angeroya sueu Herodeac mariunac nga yudangic yeneac herebuunac mesinude.”
Ifi negentegecma kemma Yohane Marekoac nonggea kpara Maria, yeac amau sikeec. Ihai homacngoc kpeturanggema numuma tacgec.
Tacmagec Petorongo ama naguyau namma nagu heiu uanaroang mong kpara Rode, yeng imoc negemma mama
Petorongo yoac deu ubea negemma nagu mi witiwiti, eng sogaima ama manau emma, “Petoro ye hadac naguu nande.” dema edeyunuec.
Edeyunuu yeni negemma degec, “Ubaga sufude me?” degec, yeng serima deec, “Fora yombong, yeng nande.” deu yeneng degec, “Imoc angeroyango gedang.”
Nga Petoro ye heimangoc nammanu yeni nagu witima yengena hemma kpidohogec.

Kpidohogec yeng maribarac tuema deracyunudacma Kebungo witicamaunac yungeru maec, imocac yoacsiduc ayemmema deec, “Ngeni siducna yomoc Yakobo nga negen negensinggoc tosofocnina edeyunugec.” Ifi dema meickema monnu kenec.
Herodengo meficgegecdeac deu hofocbibiegec. Hofocbibiegec dekpesi ayemmeu kpac anu wasai yeneng nagugareng imoc yunuhomegecdeac desiec. Desiyunuma Yudaia bangec wama Kaisarea kemema kefec.

Herodengo Tiro nga Sidonggac ngicngac herebu meficgeyemmekefec. Imoc yofiac, yeni nenesemengngina Herodeac bangecfunac megecac amma yeni kpedzucnema yearu hama ngaba kpac anu ruae fingerudeac kpesimigec. Yeni warac Herodeac ngickereng mong kpara Birasto, ye Herodeac gaufefe amea garenggema kefec, yearu kemma yeng yenigoc kefudeac dengombong ammigec.
Herodengo yoac imoc negemma imocac turunga merengyemmeudeac naso edeyunuec. Naso imohai ye ngictau ngakpia heima ngictautatahau matacma urecyoacngina edeyunuec.
Edeyunuu ngic yeni sasawango horianggemima yofi degec, “Yoac imoc ngicyoac kpac, imoc Anutuac yoac.”
Anu ye Anutu mi afeheecac amma naso imohaingoc Kebuac angero mongngo Herode kpeu kamango kigec homeec.
Anu Anutuac yoacngo yadima kenec.
Kpebung Antiokia kecgec, yeneac botucfu profete nga kpoukpou yofingo kecgec: Banaba nga Simong, kpara mong Nige, Rukeo Kirene amaunac nga Sauro amma Manaeng.

Anu yeni naso monnu yakasege kecma Kebu afehegecdeac kpedzucnema kecgec Tiri Asungo yoac yofi edeyunuec, “Banaba nga Sauro yeri neac ua meecdeac kpacyuruma ua yemerai, ngeni imoc meecdeac desiyecmegec.”
Ifi deu yeni yakasege kecma maringina sebingirau faima numukenehe ayecmema faiyurugec kenoc.
Tiri Asungo ifi dema sueyuruu yeri Sereukia taonnu kemeoc. Ihai sikema kporucwageu emma kengkecma Kipiro nucfu enoc.
Emma Sarami taong ihai kemma yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amangina tackenecsoc, ihai emma Anutuac yoac deireckeyemmekenoc. Kenec Yohanengo yerigoc yenahafoc kecma meficyuruec.
Anu nuc imohai hanising ferecge kengkecma Pafo amau kenggec. Ihai kensikema yudangic mong bangecac hadehadegoc nga profete ikoha kefec kpara Bara Yesu, ye meficgegec.
Ngic yeac tosoya kia mong kpara Sergio Pauro. Kia imoc ye negen negengtoayagoc nga Anutuac yoac negembesonga ammiu Banaba nga Sauro kpacyuruec.
Kpacyuruu Erima, ngic bangecac hadehadegoc, (Yoacninau merenni kpac imocac titiha ngic bangecac hadehadegoc.) yeng yereac yoac mefahema kiango Yesu negensinggebacac deraheec.
Ifi anu Tiri Asungo Sauro, kpara mong Pauro ubeau wakeu Erima kiwango henseriserima yofi edeec,

“Mangana minginaac medac, ge Kebuac sing dindingac fekende, imocac ngaba seria amma kecna ubagau ikoc nga manganango wake wakea. Ge Kebuac sing dindingac femanu mengbaringgekecnec nasoherec ifi kecma faka imoc mi wanec.

Imocac yaguc Kebuac kuc gearu fingeru hembesena. Kicga kundung kpeu naso botuc yomoc wenac kperagia mi heheng kecbesena.” Ifi deu imohaingoc wiac hoeng hoeng isocngo kiwa sangoheu kiwa kundung kpeu mariango meang kpeang amma mariau megecdeac deec.
Faka imoc fingeru kiango hemma Kebuac siduc gombung kpoumigec, imocac negenu engena anec.
Dzigeneu yeni Perege wama kengkecma Pisidia bangecfu Antiokia taong waseau, ihai kensikegec. Ihai kecmagec sabata naso anu yeni yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amau emma tacgec.
Tacgec gareng yeneng Anutuac dedeseriyoac nga profete yeneac yoackibi goa oso wisickema yofi edeyunugec, “Tosohocnina ngereng Anutuac enacyoac mong negendape isoc demeseri anemmeec negenni.”
Ifi degec Paurongo yacma waickema tacdacgecdeac maribarac kpouyemmema yofi edeyunuec, “Israengicngac, ngeni nga habu goa Anutu eweheimiandae, ngeni edengunuba negenggec:
Israengicngac nenang Anutungo kisicfocnina meisingyunuu yeni Aigita bangecfu kuric kecma sahegec. Amma ye kuctoayango imohacnac hesicyunu hama
bangec kisiu hocsiragocfu faiyunuma yenenggareng ayemmeec. Yenenggareng amma mebibieyunuma kecmanu kifa 40 wisickeec.
Wisickeu yeng Kanaang bangecfu amabangec seweng kpedzongyunuma kisicfocnina bangec imoc yemmeu minginasoc amma kecmagec kifa 450 wisickeec.
‘Ngictaunina mong fingeru.’ degec Anutungo Benyaminggac arennunac Kisi medaha kpara Sauro, ye meficgeyemmeu kifa 40 enaramemengina amma kefec.
Kecmanu ye meickema ngictaungina Dawidi faiec. Amma yeac hania yofi dekperagiec, ‘Ni Dawidi, Isaiac medac yeac ubana ngereeu ye hengising ammiai. Yennoc enac tofoc tofohona kefude.’ ”
Anu Yohanengo ngic botucfu mi fingectegecma kecmanu israengicngac sasawa ubangina dzigeneu mitidoku nadzicgecdeac edeyunuec.
Edeyunuma uaya mesiu wisickebeso ammanu yofi edeyunuec, ‘Ngeni ngic negennuandae, ni ye kpac. Negenggec, neac ngadeu hade, ye engenatoa nga ni ifiango yeac hanitabe witiha yungecba mi ngereeude.’
Tosofocna, Abrahanggac bangecfora nga habu goa Anutu eweheimiandae, ngeni yoacna deba negenggec, kopocsicac ebicfunac mesi mesiac sing fede nga komoc kpeni, yoac imoc Anutungo nenannu faiec fede.
Nga Yerusaleng ngic engena mamea, yeneng Yesu mi hentegecma ye kpegecdeac desigec. Yoacfu ifi faima desigec nga sabata tatac nasosoc profete yeneac kpefingyoac osonegeng angandimbe, imoc seriec.
Foracngoc, yeni Yesuac kopocsic hofocbibiema eng hodzinggema Piratoac mariu faigec, yeng desiu kpehomegecdeac degec.
Anu mitikibiu yoacsiduha oho ohoya fede, yeni imoc ammidacma mariponnunac mesima kicsereu mekenggec. Yeni mekemma kedzebe ngicngo miac miackeau sinegec emma feec.
Feu Anutungo ine homecfunac megboriu yarec.
Yacma ye ngicngac yegoc Gariraia bangecfunac Yerusaleng taonnu yenahafoc kenggec, yeni uameme homac fingecyemmeec. Fingecyemmeu henggec, yenennoc siducdedefora anggec kecdae.
Anu Anutungo bangecfocnina hanahema wiac yemmeudeac deseriyemmeec,
imoc Yesu megboriu nambaracfocngina nenannu fora fingeru imocac siduc gombung edengunuandimbe. Imocacnoc Mitiyegec nadung yohockang, imohai yoac yofi oho ohoya fede,
‘Ni yagucnoc megudua. Ge medacna nga ni geac Mangga.’
Yeng Yesu megboriu yarec nga ye ngade homehome nga hoachoae imoc yearu monggoc mi fingerude nga fingecbesande. Yoac imocac Anutungo yofi deec,
‘Ni Dawidigoc dzahacemeic, imocac fora kenec kenehe kpetiac ngemmebade.’
Amma Mitiyegec monnu yoac yofi fede,
‘Ge kpetiac ngicga hoaeudeac naric mi desibesannec.’
Dawidiac yofi negendimbe, Anutungo ye ua demiec, imoc ngicfora yenearu mesima homeec. Homeu esangabofora faiyunugec, ihaingoc tonggogec hoaema kpac anec.
Anu Anutungo ngic megboriec, yeng ine hoac hoaea kpac.
Tosofocna yofi edengunuba negenggec: Kopocsic wawaya, imoc ngic yennoc meficgeec, dedekperagi yoac imocngo ngenearu haec.
Nga kopocsicngina sasawa Moseac dedeseriyoacngo naric mi dzuaru dindingac anggec. Yeni ine Yesu negensinggedae, yeni sasawango dindingac Anutungo ifi deyemmeude.
Profete yeneng yoac yofi degec, imoc ngenearu seribacac nono edengunuduae.
‘Ngicngac ngeni defagoc angkecdae henggec. Ni naso imohai faka morora meba ngeni imoc hengkpidoc amma hofeu kemegecde. Ngic mongngo edengunuu imoc naric mi negensinggebau.’ ”
Ifi deu Pauro nga Banaba yeri kpekpeturang amaunac mamaec ngic yeneng sabata tatac naso monggac yoac imocacngoc edeyunuecdeac derecgeyemecgec.

Tutumang wisickeu mama yudangic nga bangec monnunac ngic homacngo yudangic yenearu torokpema kecgec, yeni yenahafocngoc Pauro nga Banaba modacyurugec Anutuac wosoefahaac arennu seria kecgecdeac demeseri ayemmeoc.
Nga sabata tatac nasongina monggoc anu taong imocac ngicngac yeni Kebuac yoac negenggecdeac ebiriango sikegec.
Sikegec yudangic yeneng yenemma Pauro nga Banaba keracmangang ayecmegec Paurongo yoac deu yeneng yegoc yoacngina engemmama anu yoara kpema desusuic ammigec.
Kebungo yofi denemmeec,
‘Neng ge bangec monnunac ngicngac, yeneac kifa faiguba geng ngicngac kopocsicac ebicfunac mesiyununa dema ge ua imoc gemba mekengkecma bangec tegiau mekemma ebicfunac mesiyununa komoc kpebesandae.’ ”

Ifi degec bangec monnunac ngicngac, yeneng imoc negemma ubangina ngereeu Kebuac yoacac dedengerec anggec. Nga kekec wisic wisickea kpac, imocac areng anggecdeac Anutungo negengyemmeecsoc, yeni Kebu negensinggegec.
Nga amabangec ihai Kebuac yoacngo wakema kenec.

Taong imocac ngac kuneng goa yeni yudangic yenearu torokpema kecgec. Yudangic yeni amagareng nga ngac imoc wosoumeme ayemmema meyunu kemma Pauro nga Banaba yurukporac ayecmema amabangecngina segerema kisangyurugec kenoc.
Kemma fakanginaac amma haningiraunac yube kpefanggeec mau wayunuma Ikoniong taonnu kenoc.
Nga Yesuac habu yeneac ubau songo kuneng nga Tiri Asu wake wakea fingecyemme kenec.
Yeri Ikoniong taonnu sikema ihai ifingoc yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amau emma siduc gombung kuhagoc deireckeyemmeoc. Imocac yudangic nga grikngic homacngo Yesu negensinggegec.
Yudangic goa yeneng ine yoac imoc wama bangec monnunac ngic Anutu mi negensigec, yeni fenggeyunugec negen negensinggoc tosofocnina herebu negengyemmegec.

Negengyemmegec yeri serima naso herea taong ihai kecma kengeha kpac Kebuac yoac kuhagoc dekefoc. Ammanu Kebu danggunuhaac yoac meseriudeac yengenaoc nonggo tacyecmemanu yeri negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc nga faka mi hehena homac mema kefoc.
Ifi anec taong imocac ngic tohoma goa yudangic yenearu kenggec nga goa aposoro yerearu kenggec.
Nga bangec monnunac ngic nga yudangic goa yeni garengfocnginagoc aposoro mangana ayecmema hocngo yereregecdeac yoac dzegegec.
Dzegegec yeri imoc negemma worama Rikaonia bangecfu kenoc. Kemma ihai Ristera nga Derebe nga amabangec goa wegenac tarecfu
siduc gombung dekperagiyemme kenoc.
Ristera taonnu ngic mong tarec, ye hanihora mangac manganea. Ye nonggo heremanaunac ifia fingecma kenghaya kpac eng takefec.
Tackefu Paurongo siduc gombung edeyunuu ngic ye negemma tacmanu yearu kic dindingac fima haniaya yofi negenec, “Ngic imoc ye ngerec ngereeac negen negensing femidenoc.”
Ifi negemma yoac kuhagoc yofi edeec, “Ge yacma hongngoc nanna.” ifi deu ngic ye poratacke yacma kengha anec.
Amma yeni Banaba ye nemu mong kpara Dia, ifi degec nga Pauro ye yoac dederecgeac ngic, imocac amma nemu mong kpara Hermes, ifi degec.
Nga nemu Dia yeac sesememengicngo deu yeni burumakangiwa goa nga dzundzaring taong tegiau odanaguyau mekemema ngihoc yereac eweheima hosuc heibeso anggec.
Ammagec aposoro yeri imoc negemma ubaebic mema ngakpingira merecgema amangira wama bic habu yeneac botucfu kemma yofi arohooc,

“Yei, ngicngac ngeni noc andae? Neri ngic ngeni isoc, ngeneac siric. Ngeni nemungina kucmama kecdae, yeni ngadeyunuma Anutu kekehagoc mewegenegecdeac siduc gombung dekperagingemmekecdipe. Yeng wiac sasawa bangecfu nga kurumennu nga kondunnu fedacde, imoc meficgedarec.

Keceregec ihoc bahoc mong mi angemmeec, kpac. Ye haniaya negenggecdeac ubangerec angemmema deu kiawenac sawaunac nasoyau fingeckecde. Nga ye nenesemeng nasoyau deu fingeru yakangina homac meficgengemmeu songo witiau kecdae.”
Ngihoc yereng yoac ifi gadzea mema yoac ua ebiriangoc mekecma dekpetari ayemmeec yereac hosucheihei imoc wagec.
Femanu Yesuac habu yeneng hama oronggema memidi ammigec gborima yacma amau enec. Nga wereckengau ye Banabagoc Derebe taonnu kenoc.
Yeri kemma ihai siduc gombung dekperagiyemmeec ngic homacngo Yesu negensinggegec. Ifi amma sing kenocfu, ihai monggoc dzigenema Ristera nga Ikoniong amma Antiokia taonnu tacyac hakefoc.

Hakecma amasoc sikema Yesuac habu negen negensingina kpedzucnema kecgecdeac demeseri ayemmema yofi edeyunuoc, “Nenang Anutuac eucererennu ennideac kpendzeng hania hania fingecnemmeu imocac witiau kecbisina.”
Amma kpebung taong mocgu mocgu kecgec, yeneac enarafocngina meisingyunugec. Nga ngicngac Yesu negensinggegec, yeneac amma yakasege amma numuma kenecyunuma Kebuac hoannu faiyunuoc.
Nga yeri Pisidia bangec ferecgema kengkecma Pamfiria bangecfu kenoc.
Ihai kemma Perege taonnu yoac edeyunuma Ataria taonnu kemeoc.
Kemema kporucwageu emma kengkecma Antiokia dzigeneoc. Taong imohainoc Yesuac habu yeni warac Kebuac kenecfu faiyuruma ua deyecmegec, imohai sikema mesioc.
Ihai hasikema kpebung kpedzucyunuma Anutungo nonggo tayecmemanu ua sasawa meoc amma bangec monnunac ngicngac, yenearu ua nagu mong meyecmeu Yesu negensinggegec, imoc edeyunudaroc.
Amma yeri naso hereangoc Yesuac habu yeneac botucfu kefoc.

Ifi degec Pauro nga Banaba yerigoc yoacngina engemmama anu uba mocgu mi anggec. Ifi angkecma yeni aposoro nga Yerusalennu habu enarafocngina yenigoc yoac imoc dengeregecdeac Pauro nga Banaba amma ngic goa meisingyunuma Yerusalennu sueyunugec kenggec.

Nga kpebung yeneng singgac wiac yemmema sueyunugec kenggec. Kemma Foinike nga Samaria bangec kensikema Yesuac habu ihai kecgec, yeni yofi edeyunugec, “Bangec monnunac ngicngac homacngo ubamereng anggec.” Ifi degec, yeni imoc negemma ubangerec kuneng negenggec.

Nga yeni kengkecma Yerusalennu kensikegec. Kensikema kpebung nga aposoro amma Yerusaleng kpebung enarafocngina, yeneng ama heiyemmegec. Heiyemmegec, yeni Anutungo nonggo tacyemmemanu misingua megec fora fingerec, imocac siduc meyemmegec.

Meyemmegec farisaioac mitiarennunac goango Yesu negensinggegec, yenearunac goa yacma yofi degec, “Bangec monnunac ngic yeni sebi tosangina herecgebesonga amma Moseac dedeseriyoac tofohogecdeac demeseri ayemmebesonga.”
Ifi degec aposoro nga enara yeni kpedzucnema yoac imoc tembuc denegeng anggec.

Yoacua mekecma Petorongo yacma yofi deec, “Tosofocna, bangec monnunac ngicngac, yeni neac enacfunac siduc gombung negemma negensinggegecdeac Anutungo warac nenang botucfunac meisinnuec, imoc negendae.
Anutu ye uba hehengngo warac Tiri Asu nemmeec, imoc ifingoc bangec monnunac ngicngac, yeneac negenecac Tiri Asu yemmeec.
Nenang negensinggeing, ifi isoc yeni negensinggegec Anutungo ubangina dzuarec.
Ifi anu ngeni Anutu tobanggema Moseac dedeseri, imocac tofo kuneng Yesuac habu yeneac witiu faibeso dedae, imoc naric mi ande. Bangecfocnina nga esangabofocnina amma nenang imoc tofobibiema obohoing.
Nga yofi negensinggedimbe, Kebu Yesungo yudangic nga bangec monnunac ngicngac, neni nenahafoc danggunuha nemmema ebicfunac mesinunuu komoc kpenide.”

Ifi deu habutoa yeni engsac negemma tacgec. Nga Anutungo Pauro nga Banaba nonggo tacyemecmanu ua meoc, imocac siduc meyemmeoc. Yeri bangec monnunac ngicngac, yenearu negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc nga faka mi hehena homac meoc, imoc edeyunuoc.
Anutungo hanahema bangec monnunac ngicngac, yenearunac ngicngac meyunuu yeac arengfora anggecdeac sing meficgeec,
Negenni yeac yoacngo profete yeneac yoacgoc socfungoc ande. Negenggec, mitikibiu yoac yofi ohogec fede.
‘ “Neng ngade kecma dzigenema Dawidiac amabara sesuhau monggoc heigborima meseribade.
Nga ngic toseango Kebu ni kpachofoc anemma meficnubesandae amma bangec monnunac ngicngac, yeneng ifingoc arengfocna ambisia.”
Kebu ye bicngoc yoac ifia deereecngo dedenoc.’
Imocac negengising amma yofi deduae, bangec monnunac ngicngac, yenearunacngo Anutu ubanginango hoanggema kecdae, yeni ebictoa mi yemmebisina.

Yofisac deserima kibi ohoyemmebisina, ngicngac yeneng nemunginaac sese dema wiac heiyemmekecdae, wiac wonongagoc ifia wabisia. Yeni serima kecma kaisero mi ambisia nga yamberec fusia sawagoc amma sacac segekecbisia.
Yeni Moseac yoac bic negendae. Nga imoc esea bicngoc yuda yeneng hanahema taonsoc osohakecgec. Amma imoc yofinenggac ifingoc sabata tatac nasoyau kpekpeturang amanginasoc osonegeng angandae.”

Anu aposoro nga kpebunggac enarafocngina amma kpebungtoa, yeni negenggec imoc naric anec. Nga yenearunac ngicenara yohockang meisingyurugec mong kpara Yuda, yeac kpara mong Basaba, amma Sira. Meisingyuruma yeri Pauro nga Banaba yerigoc yenahafoc Antiokia taonnu kenggecdeac sueyurugec.
Amma yoackibi mong yofi dema ohoma yemmegec kenggec,
“Neni tosofocngina aposoro nga enarango bangec monggac habuunac tosofocnina Antiokia nga Siria amma Kirikia bangecfu kecdae, ngenearu yoackibi yoc faingemmedimbe.
Wenacngerec. Neni mi sueyunumina nenearunac ngic goa yeni yenaoc ngenearu hama yoac edengunuma negen negengngina mesufugec negengyohoc anggec, imoc negending.
Neni imoc negemma uba mocgu amma ngic yohockang meisingyuruma tosohocnina Banaba nga Pauro yerigoc sueyuruni hadae.
Ngic yerinoc Kebunina Yesu Kristo, yeac amma kekecngira waoc.
Anu ngic imoc meisingyuruding, yeri hama yoac imoc enacfu dekperagingemmeec negembisia.
Tiri Asu nga neni nenahafoc ebic goa witinginau mi faingemmenideac negenni ngereede. Ngeni singyoac yomocsac modacgecdeac faingemmeni ngereede:

Ngicngac nemunginagoc yeneng nemungina yeneac sese dema yang heiyemmegec, ngeni imoc wama mi nebisia. Ngeni yamberec fusia sawagoc mi nebisia amma sac mi nebisia. Nga kaisero mi ambisia. Ngeni imoc sasawa wadacgec ngereeude.
Imocac ngeni ubangerecgoc kecbisia.”
Anu kpebung yeni ngic imocnoc sueyunugec kenggec. Kengkecma yeni Antiokia kemesikema Yesuac habu Antiokia kecgec, yeni kpedzucyunuma yoackibi imoc yemmegec.
Yemmegec memeseri yoackibi imoc hemma osoma ubangerec negenggec.
Amma Yuda nga Sira yeri profete kefocac yoac homac dema Yesuac habu ubangina meefaima demeseri ayemmeoc.
Ifi angkefec naso wisickeu Yesuac habu yenearu dzigenebesonga turunga ruae nga kenecyoac ayecmegec kenoc.
Nga Sirango ine ihai kecbeso negenec.
Pauro nga Banaba yeri Antiokia taonnu uangira monggoc torokpema mekefoc. Mekefec ngic homac yenigoc memefic amma Kebuac yoac ngicngac edekpou ayemmema siduc gombunggac hania dekperagiyemmeec.
Kecma Paurongo Banaba yofi edeec, “Nerang monggoc dzigene kemma taonnu Kebuac yoac dekperagiyemmeic, ihai negen negensinggoc tosofocnina dafi kecdae, imoc kemma hennegeng ambisira.”
Ifi deu Banabango Yohane Mareko yenahafoc kenggecdeac deec.
Nga Mareko ye warac yerigoc kengkecma Pamfiria bangecfu ua wama woraecac amma Paurongo yegoc kenggecdeac negenu mi ngereec.
Ifi amma Banabagoc yoacngira engemmama anu wama faiemeoc. Faiemema Banabango Mareko hesickeu kemma kporucwageu emma Kipiro nucfu kenoc.
Nga Pauro ye Sira meu kembeso deec Yesuac habu yeneng Kebuac danggunucngo ngerearu febeso degec kenoc.
Kemma yeri Siria nga Kirikia bangecfu kengkecma kpebung demeseri ayemmekenoc.
Amma Yesuac habu Ristera nga Ikoniong taonnu kecgec, yeneng Pauro yofi edegec, “Timoteo ye fakaya gombunga.”
Edegec Paurongo yerahafoc kenecdeac edeu naric deec. Anu yudangic bangec imohai kecgec, yeneng Timoteo mama ye grikngic, imoc negendacgec. Imocac Paurongo yeneac amma Timoteoac sebi tosea herecgeec.
Nga yeri amea amea kemma aposoro nga Yerusaleng habuac enarafocngina singyoac dedzege anggec, imoc tofohogecdeac Yesuac habu edeyunukenoc.
Ifi amma ua meec kpebung yeneac negen negensing yadiec. Nga wenacsoc bangec monnunac ngicngac, yeneng aposoro yenearu kemma torokpekecgec homac anggec.
Kengkecma Misia bangec nga Asia bangec botucngirau namma Bitinia bangecfu kembeso degec Yesuac Asungo kpae heiyemmeec.
Imocac yeni Misia bangec ferahema kengkecma Troa taonnu kemegec.
Ihai sikema tofocnac imohai Paurongo onga mong yofi henec, Makedoniangic mongngo yearu fingecma namma desambic ammima yofi edeec, “Ge dokutoa ferecgema Makedonia bangecfu hama meficnunubesena.”
Pauro ye wiac imoc henu Anutungo neni Makedonia bangecfu kemma siduc gombung dekperagiyemmenideac kpacnude, ifi negentegecma Troa wanideac bic efaiing.
Efaima kporucwageu emma Troa wama ferecgema kengkecma Samotrake nucfu kensikeing. Kensikema wereckengau imohacnac kengkecma Neapori taonnu sikeing.
Sikema ihai wageunac mama hanising kengkecma Firipi taonnu sikeing. Imoc Makedonia bangectoa imocac taongyada. Romangic yeneng warac bangec imoc megec. Anu taong imohai uameme goa kecmina

sabata naso anu taong odanagu wegenacfu doku mong feec, imohai yofi dema kemeing, “Ngicngac numuandae, yeneac tacyac mong doku tegiau fede me kpac, imoc kemema henni.” Ifi dema kemema ngac kpedzucnema kecmagec meficyunuma matacma yenigoc yoacyoac aning.
Yeneac botucfunac ngac mong Tiatira taonnunac kpara Ridia, ye finacama mingina nga kporuc sacsac faikefec. Ye Anutu eweheimima kefu Kebungo ubea mekperagiu Pauroac yoac kedzac kpema negenec.
Amma ye yengena nga arengfora mitidoku nadzicma yofi derecgenemmeec, “Ngeni negennugec ni Kebu fora negensinggeanduaeu neac amau erema nigoc tacyac ambisia.” Ifi dema ngombonnunuu ening.

Naso monnu numukecgec, imohai monggoc kememina ihai wanac naroang mongngo meficnunuec. Naroang ye yafingagoc kecma ngicngac yeneac kpefingdede kefec. Ifi amma ngic mingingfora hiedzotoa kirecgeyemmekefec.

Anu yennoc meficnunuma Pauro nga neni modacnunuma kpacma arohoec, “Ngic yomocngo Anutu Engenatoa, yeac enac tofoc tofoho nga kopocsicac ebicfunac mesi mesi amma komoc kpegecdeac sing mong derecgenemmedacgec ngeni sing imohai komoc kpegecde.”

Faka imoc wenacsoc anemmekefu Paurongo imocac modzea tiu sisirema dzigene yafing yofi edeec, “Ni Yesu Kristo yeac kpacfu demekiri amma edeguba, ge ngac hereunac erema kenna.” Ifi deu ye imohaingoc erema kenec.
Kenu ngac mingingfora yeni hiedzongina fingecyemmeande, imoc kpac anu negemma Pauro nga Sira mendangyuruma kpedziyuruma yoacfu faiyurugecdeac kia yeneac amasobennu kenggec.
Kemma kia yenearu faiyuruma yofi degec, “Yeri yudangicngo amaninau dzomu meficgema tacyacnina memanganedape.
Amma faka goa furia romangic nenaoc menideac kpaeyoac dedea fede, imocnoc mema modacdacnideac edenunudape.”
Dzikacngo homac kperec merecgeyuruma witicamau faiyuruma garengngo nagu seria heima gombunga yombong garengyuruudeac edegec.
Yoac seria ifia edegecac amma ye witicama mana ungguruha monnu faiyuruma haningira ic hendzic hendzirau faiu kindanggeu feoc.
Tofocnac dzongiau Pauro nga Sira yeri Anutu yegec nunumu ammioc. Ammiec witicngic goango kedzac kpema negengyecmegec.
Negengyecmemagec, imohaingoc usoctoa kuhagoc meu witicama kpemindzaheu naguya bic anggedarec amma ngic sasawa witicngina fotockedarec.
Anu witicama garengngo gauunac kpidohoma yacma nagu anggema nandaru hemma, yofi negenec, “Witicngic woradau.” ifi negemma wasaibeanga taima ewehomebeso anu
Paurongo kungengngoc kpacma deec, “Ge sebiga mi kpena, neni hafoangoc tacdimbe.”
Ifi deu gareng ye arengfora deu kifa migec ama manau emma dzonong fedefede amma Pauro nga Sira yereac haniu makpema feec.
Amma yacma ama manaunac hesicyuru mama kpesiyecmeec, “Ngickunenghocna, ni dafi amma komoc kpebade?”
Ifi deu yereng yofi edeoc, “Ge nga arengfocga ngeni Kebu Yesu Kristo negensinggegec yeng ebicfunac mesingunuu komoc kpegecde.”
Ifi dema ye nga arengfora Kebuac yoac edeyunuoc.
Edeyunuec gareng ye yacma tofocnac imohaingoc amau emma kubecngira dzuacsangohe ayecmema deu yengena nga arengfora doku nadzicgec.
Nadzicgec wisickeu yengena ama manau faiyuruma deu yaka gombunga mengerema yemecgec neoc. Anu ye nga arengfora yeni Anutuac ngic anggecac ubangina ngereeu sogaigec.
Ama wereckenu kia yeneng witicama gareng ngic yohockang yungecyuruudeac keracnatang sueyunugec.
Sueyunugec garengngo yoac imoc negemma Pauro yofi edeec, “Ni fainguruba kenecdeac kia yeneng yoac faigec hade. Imocac ngeri mama kemma ruaegoc kecbesera.”

Ifi deu Paurongo yofi edeec, “Neri romangic arennu torokpema kecde, yeni hanianira mi negendacma ngic kicfu eng dzikacngo nuruma witicamau fainurugec. Nga yoc waic waic suenurugecac negendae, imoc naric kpac. Yeni yenaoc hama hesicnurugec kendede.”
Anu Paurongo yoac ifi deu keracnatang yeni dzigene kemma kia yoac yofi edeyunugec, “Ngic yeri romangic arennunacngo kecdape.” Ifi degec yeni siduc imoc negemma damuyunuu kengec amma
ngihoc yerearu hama demembanang ayecmema witicamaunac hesicyuru mama amangina wama kenecdeac edeyurugec.
Ifi edeyurugec yeri witicamaunac mama Ridia yeac amau emma Yesuac habu yenemma demeseri ayemmema kenoc.
Pauro nga Sira yeri Amfipori nga Aporonia taong ferecgema Tesaronike taonnu kenoc. Nga ihai yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang ama mong tarec.
Nga Paurongo angande, ifi amma kpekpeturang amanginau emma sabata naso harebec yenigoc Anutuac yoac denegeng anggec.

Ifi amma yoac yofi dema mitikibiu yoac edzacyunuma deireckeyemmeec, “Messiango kpendzeng kpekecma homema monggoc gborima yarude, imoc mitikibiu dedea fede. Amma Yesu yennoc Messia, imoc dekperagikecduae.”
Ye ifi seria deireckeyemmeu yudangic goango ireckema Pauro nga Sira, yerearu kpeketahegec. Nga grikngic Anutu eweheimima kecandae nga ngac kuneng yeni homacngo yerearu torokpegec.

Anu ngic homacngo siduc gombung negenggec yudangic yeneng keracmangang ayemmema kpedzaroc sobennu kemma yarengic kpacyunugec. Kpacyunuma taonnu dzomugerec meficgema Yasonggac amau Pauro nga Sira taroc, imohai kpedzucnedacgec. Kpedzucnedacma ngihoc meyuruma ngic yeneac botucfu faiyurubesonga degec.

Dema hofocyuruma Yasong nga Yesuac habuunac goa meyunuma amaac enarameme yeneac kicfu kpedziyunuma kenggec. Imoc yofi dema aro aro kenggec, “Bangeha bangeha dzomugerec meficgema ngicuba miacyemmeandae, ngic imongonoc nenearu ifingoc hadau.
Haec Yasongngo ama heiyemeru tacdape. Yeri Ngictau Sisaac dedeseriyoac kpema ngictau furia mong kpara Yesu, ye kpanggema dedape.”
Yeni yoac ifi dema amangic nga enara wosongina megec.
Ifi anu gareng yeni Yasong nga tosofora ayemmegec sebingina kaso kpema hiedzo faigec wayunugec kenggec.
Ama toforeu Yesuac habu yeneng imohaingoc Pauro nga Sira Berea taonnu sueyurugec kenoc. Kemma ihai yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amau emma siduc gombung deoc.

Deec taong imocac yudangic yeni fakangina nga angammemengina kpacgoc nga Tesaronike yeneac faka isoc kpahac, imocac enacyoac ubaefac hafoangoc negemma hoanggegec. Amma yoacngira ikoha me fora dema wenaha wenaha mitikibi osoma deusu anggec.
Ifiac amma yudangic yenearunac homacngo Yesu negensinggegec amma grikngic nga grikngac kuneng homacngo yerearu torokpegec.
Torokpegec Paurongo Berea taonnu Anutuac yoac dekperagiu siduc imocngo Tesaronike kenu yudangic yeneng negenggec. Negemma Berea hama habutoa imoc demanganema herengina miacgec.
Ifi anggec Yesuac habu yeneng imohaingoc Pauro kondunnu suegec kemeec. Nga Sira nga Timoteo yeri ihaingoc kefoc.
Anu ngic yeneng Pauro hesicke kengkecma Ateng taonnu faigec. Faigec yeng Sira nga Timoteo bic haecdeac edeyunuu ngic yeni dzigenegec.
Pauro ye Ateng taonnu yereac tomai kefec. Nga nemuonga wakemangoc tackenggec ye imoc hemma ubahodung kuneng negenec.

Amma ye yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amau emma yudangic yenang nga grikngic goa yudangic yenearu torokpema kecgec, yeni yenahafoc mitiac denegeng anggec. Amma ye ifingoc wenaha wenaha kpedzaroc sobennu kemma ngic tacgec, yenigoc miti denegeng anggec.

Anu taong imohai kekecac hania negen negengngic kecgec, kpacngina epikuengic nga stoikengic. Ngic imoc yeneng Paurogoc yoac demereng anggec goango Pauroac yofi degec, “Ngic imoc yennoc yadi yadima yoac debeso ande, imoc mi negendimbe.” ifi degec toseango yofi degec, “Ye nemu furiaac dedekperagi ngic.” Paurongo Yesuac siduc nga homecfunac yacyac, yoac imoc deecac yeni ifi degec.
Ifi dema sobengtoa mong kpara Areopage ihai hesicke emma degec,
Yoac imoc kedzacnina furia, imocac ge haniagoc dena negembeso anemmede.”
Ateng ngic kuric nga ama mingina sasawa, yeni yoacsiduc furia negemma yoac imocsac denegeng amma siduc homac angkecgec.

Ifi anu Pauro ye Areopage tutumang botucfu namma ngic yofi edeyunuec, “Ateng ngic, ni wiac sasawa hemma haniangina yofi hentegecduae, ngeni nemu hania hania homac eweheiyemmema yeneac faka hania hania mekecdae.

Ni taongnginau kengha amma nemuongafocngina yenengkecma arata monnu kibi yofi oho ohoya feu henai, ‘Nemu mi hennegeng angana, yeac arata.’ Nga nemu imoc mi negemma eweheimiandae, yeac hania dekperagingemmeba negenggec.
Amma wiac mong hoforu ngicngo ua mema meficgemiande, imoc mi fede, kpac. Ye yengenaoc kekec nga asu amma wiac sasawa ngic yemmekecde.
Amma ngic mocgu meficgema deu yearunac ngic bangeha bangeha nga habuya habuya fingecsahe kecgecdeac deec. Amma naso nga kpete, imoc yengngoc deyemmeec.
Nga ngic yeni yenaoc ubanginango Kebu yengena hofocma meficgeandae, ye imoc negensima ifi anec. Foracngoc, ye hereau kpac, ye ngic nenang botucfu kecde.
Nga yennoc kekecninaac hania, nenang yeac kucfu kecma angammeme angkecdimbe. Amma ngeneac negen negengngic goango yofinoc degec, ‘Nenang Anutuarunac fingering.’
Ngeni warac wiac imoc mi negentegecgecac Anutungo hemma imocac yoara mi deec. Yaguc ine bangeha bangeha ngicngac sasawa ubangina dzigeneudeac demeseri ayemmekecde.

Yeng bicngoc naso mong deec, imoc fede. Naso imohai bangeha bangeha ngicngac hanianina desima turunga dindingac merennemmeude. Amma ngic mong ye ua imocnoc meudeac demiec, ye ngic imoc edzacnunuudeac homecfunac megboriu yarec.”
Anu Pauro ye homecfunac yacyac, imocac yoac deu goango demembaic ammigec nga goango degec, “Yoac imoc naso monnu dena monggoc negembisina.”
Ifi degec Paurongo wayunuma kenec.
Anu ngic goango ine Pauroaru kpeketahema Yesu negensinggegec. Imoc yenearunac desi desi ngickuneng mong kpara Dionisio, ye Areopageac memba mong nga ngac mong kpara Damari, amma ngicngac goa.
Paurongo uaya mesima Ateng wama Korinti taonnu kenec.

Ihai yudangic mong meficgeec kpara Akpira, ye Ponto bangecfu fingerec. Amma ye enema Prisika yegoc Itaria bangecfu kecmaec ngictau Sisa Kraudiongo yudangicngac Roma taonnu kecgec, yeneac dedeseriyoac dema sueyunuu kendacgec.
